en: Using Google Maps, an archaeologist finds nearly 2,000 potential archaeological sites in Saudi Arabia.

en: The Kremlin announces that Russia will hold the 2014 G8 summit in its southern Black Sea resort of Sochi, the host of the 2014 Winter Olympics.

en: Winds gusting up to 100 miles per hour have been recorded over much of the United Kingdom and Ireland, causing widespread damage and disruption.

en: He assured farmers that the mature locusts do not inflict damage on the crops right now.

en: Ras Theater Director, Meron Teshale told ENA that art has a power to strengthen unity in diversity and show diversity as a source of peace and harmony.

en: The Ethiopian national anti-doping office said it has begun doping tests on athletes.

en: A triple suicide bomb attack north of Tikrit kills at least 11 and injures another 34 members of Iraqi security forces.

en: Scientists discover a large colony of more than 750,000 pairs of Adélie penguins on the Danger Islands in Antarctica.

en: Albania's prime minister is embroiled in scandal after his brother is linked to the stunt.

en: In 2011, all the regions in the country except the Somali Region were validated for MNTE. The 2011 validation mission made recommendations that would see the Somali Region progress to MNTE over time.

en: US clothing company Gap Inc. agrees to distribute their apparels to Chinese e-commerce company JD.com.

en: In March alone, the carrier transported donations made to Africa by the Chinese business mogul Jack Ma in six days for all 54 African countries, the CEO stated, adding that “many African countries were surprised how the airlines distributed the medical equipment in a very short period of time.”

en: According to chief of staff of the African Union chairperson, Ambassador Abdoulaye Diop the next congress will take place at the AU’s headquarters in Addis Ababa in May 2020.

en: Following the qualification of the Ethiopian men's national team (Walias) to the 2022 African Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Cameroon after an eight year absence from the tournament, over 500 fans and 25 sports journalists are set to attend the event to be held from January 9 – February 6, 2022 in Cameroon.

en: Leza, a radio show on Sheger FM 102.1 hosted by Berhanu Digaffe, has been organizing Leza Awards for seven years now.

om: Feesbuukiin Mootummaa Itoopiyaa waliin tahuun ummata Itoopiyaa miliyoonaan lakka'amu isa "COVID-19 irratti odeeffannoo sirrii fi ho'aa" dha jedhu isaan biraan gahuuf.

en: The United Nations Children's Fund reports that an outbreak of the deadly Ebola virus that has so far claimed the lives of 59 victims has spread from southern Guinea to the capital Conakry.
om: akka Dhaabbanni Fundii Daa'immanii Mootummoota gamtoomanii gabaasetti weerarri dhibee balaafama Vaayirasii Iboolaa kana hanga ammatti namoota 57 galaafachuun isaa beekame kun gara kibba Giinii magaalaa guddoo konakriittii babal'ateera.

en: Mulatu Astatke’s trailblazing album, Mulatu of Ethiopia, was officially rereleased on Friday May 19.
om: Albamiin kalaqaa Mulaatuu Astaatikee, Mulaatuu isa Itoopiyaa, Jimaata Gaafa Caamsaa 19 irra deebiin ifaan gadhiifame.

en: State Minister of Education Dr. Geremew Huluka told journalists during the event that the government has changed the curriculum to encourage science and innovation in schools starting from the lower classes.
om: Ministeerri ministeera Barnootaa Dr. Garramaw Hulluuqaa qophicha irratti mootummaan sayiinsii fi kalaqa jajjabeessuuf manneen barnoota keessatti kutaalee gadii irraa eegalee sirna barnootaa jijjiiruu isaa gaazexesittootatti himaniiru.

en: This year’s 18th Great Ethiopian Run has grown to become a major street festival in Africa attracting thousands locals and foreign tourists every year.
om: Fiigichi Guddaan Itoophiyaa 18ffaan bara kanaa wagga waggaan jiraattootaa fi tuuristoota biyya alaa kumaataman lakkawaaman harkisuun Afiriikaa keessatti feestivaala daandii irraa isa guddicha gara ta'uutti guddatee jira.

en: The inquiry into the Deepwater Horizon oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico is released finding that the accident was entirely preventable.
om: Galoo galaana meeksiikoo keessatti kan argamu Deepwater Horaayizon keessattii qorannoo taasifameen dhangala'iinsi boba'aa mudate kan ittisuun danda'amaa ture ta'uun beekame.

en: Ministry of Health stressed the need for Health Professionals Competency Assessment and Certification to enable the community get access to quality health care services.
om: Ministiriin Eegumsa Fayyaa hawaasi tajaajiloota yaala fayyaa qulqullina qabu akka argatu gochuuf Ogeesonni Fayyaa Madaalli Gahumsaa fi Waraqaa Ragaa argachuu akka barbaachisu ibse.

en: The 10 years old Ethiopian Soliyana Gizaw has been named the winner of the 2020 African Code Challenge (AfriCAN Code), a newly launched continent-wide tech competition where young people were invited to create an educational computer game.
om: Isheen umrii 10 lammii Itoopiyaa Soliyaanaa Gizaw injifattuu Dorgommii Koodii Afrikaa bara 2020 (AfriCAN code), dorgommii tekinoolojii ardii guutuu dhiyoo jalqabme kan dargaggoonni geemii kompiwuteraa barnootaa hojjetachuuf afeeramanii taate.

en: The New York Police Department and London's Metropolitan Police Service open investigations into alleged sexual assault allegations against the American film producer Harvey Weinstein.
om: Kutaan poolisii magaalaa Niiyorkii fi Tajajjilli poolisii Mootiropolitani Landan dhimma himata gudeddii qopheessaa filmii lammii Ameerikaa Haarvey Winisten irratti dhiyaate irratti qorannoo geggessuu eegale.

en: Three Namibian women sue the state after they are sterilised without their informed consent after being diagnosed as HIV positive.
om: Dubartootni Naamibiyaa sadii beekumsa isaanii malee yaala dhabduu taasisu HIV'dhaan qabamuu isaanii erga barameen booda waan godhameefif bulchiinsi himatan.

en: Fanuel Leul, 22, a graphic designer and illustrator who has been a big fan of comic books, says Jember is a great start and looks forward to other Ethiopia-inspired comics making their way to bookshelves.
om: Fanu'eel Lihuul, 22, dizaayineriin giraafiksii fi agarsiisaan kitaabota qoosaa kan hedduu jaallatu, Jember jalqabbii gaariidha akkasumas qoosaa kaka'umsa Itoopiyaan qophaa'e kan biraa shelfii kitaabaa irratti akka eegu dubbate.

en: A national technical team headed by the institute and composed of experts from Ministry of Health, Pharmaceuticals Fund and Supply Agency, WHO, UNICEF and Center for Diseases Control is preparing swift preventive measures and control mechanisms to effectively stop the epidemic.
om: Gareen teekinikaa biyyaalessaa inistitiyuutichaan durfamuu fi ogeessota Ministrii Eegumsa Fayyaa, Ejensii Fandii fi Dhiyeessii Qorichaa, WHO, UNICEf fi Giddugala Ittisaa fi To'annoo Dhibee tarkaanfii ittisaa ariifataa tahee fi mala to'annoo ittiin weeraricha sirriitti dhaaban qopheessaa jiru.

en: Oswald Grübel, chief executive of Swiss bank UBS, resigns in the wake of a rogue trading scandal.
om: Oswald Grübel, hojii gegeessaa olaanaan baankii Iswiis UBS, sababa daldala seeraan alaa hojiisaa gadhiise.

en: However, to some members of the youth, it is more than that – it is political, writes Gouled Ahmed.
om: Haa ta'u malee, miseensa dargaggoo muraasaaf, isaa olidha - siyaasadha, Gowuled Ahimed'tu barreesse.

en: The Council, comprising of Ethiopians from a variety of civic and development associations, religious groups, artist groups, professional associations, business organizations, renowned personalities, academics, youth and women associations and other pertinent groups, was launched on 8th October during its first meeting at the Ethiopian Embassy in London.
om: Kaawunsilichi, lammiilee Itoopiyaa waldaalee siivilii fi guddinaa garagaraa, gareewwan amantii, gareewwan artistii, waldaalee ogummaa, dhaabbilee biizinesii, namoota bebbeekamoo, ogeessota akkaadamiksii, waldaalee dargaggootaa fi dubartootaa fi gareelee walfakkaatan biroo kan of keessaa qabu gaafa Onkoloolessa 8ffaa yeroo maree isaa jalqabaa Imbasii Itoopiyaa London keessaatti eegale.

en: In motorsport, Danica Patrick becomes the first woman to win pole position at the Daytona 500 and the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series.
om: dorgommii ispoortii doqdoqqeetiin Daanikaa Paatirik, Daayitoona 500 fi Fiigicha waancaa idilee NASCAR irratti dubartii jalqabaa bakka utubaa injifachatte taate.

en: Six people, including multiple elected officials, are arrested on charges of fraud for allegedly attempting to rig the 2013 New York City mayoral election.
om: Namoonni ja'a, aangawoota filaman garagaraa dabalatee, filannoo kantiibaa Magaalaa Niwu Yoork bara 2015 waliin dhahuuf yaaluun yakka waliin dhahuun shakkamanii hidhaman.

en: During a press conference held on Thursday, Oromia Regional State Tourism Bureau stated that 50,000 runners and several elite athletes are expected to participate in the event.
om: Ibsa gaazexeessitootaaf gaafa kamisa kennameen ,fiigdonni 50,000 fi atileetotni gameeyyiin qophicha irratti ni hirmaatu jedhamee eegama jechuun Biiroon Tuurizimii Oromiyaa ibseera.

en: “At the onset, the works were not sustainable in solving the problems to the required extent due to lack of awareness and vastness of the water shade to be covered,” he said.
om: "Jalqaba irratti, daafii hubannoo dhabuu fi guddana qaama bishaanii uwwifamuu qabuutiin hojileen rakkoo hanga barbaadame furuu keessatti itti fufoo" jedheera.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed called on the people of Ethiopia to duplicate the milestones achieved in the planning and implementation of the annual green legacy initiative in various sectors, facilitating Ethiopia’s inevitable prosperity.
om: Ministeerri Muummee Abiy Ahimad milkoomina karoora fi hojiirra oolmaa ashaaraa magaariisaa waggaa sektara hedduu keessatti bira ga'ame dachaan dabaluu fi badhaadhina carraa egeree Itoophiyaa ta'e mijeessuuf waamicha uummata Itoophiyaaf dabarsan.

en: The Canadian Security Intelligence Service warns of possible attacks within Canada due to the presence of Al-Qaeda affiliated groups in the country.
om: Tajaajilli Intaliijansii Nageenyaa Kanaadaa sababa gareen Al-Qaa'idaa waliin hidhata qabu biyyattii keessa jiruuf haleellaan biyya Kanaadaa keessatti tahuu akka malu akeekkachiise.

en: Shangtex Holding Co. Ltd has signed a lease agreement with the Ethiopian Industrial Parks Development Corporation to invest at Bole Lemmi II Industrial Park.
om: Dhaabbatni Shaangiteks Co. Ltd Korporeeshinii Ijaarsa Paarkiiwwan Industirii Itoophiyaa waliin Paarkii Industirii Boolee Lammii II tti dhangalaasuuf walii galtee liizii mallatteesse.

en: In rugby league, the Australian-based National Rugby League takes over control of the Gold Coast Titans following five current players being charged with supplying cocaine.
om: Liigii rabgii keessatti, Liigiin Rabgii Biyyaalessaa Awustiraaliyaa taphattoonni Goold Koost Taayitaan ammaa shan kokeenii dhiyeessuu hordofee to'annoo irraa fudhate.

en: Antifa militants, far-right groups, and pro-Confederacy groups clash at Stone Mountain, near the city of Stone Mountain, Georgia.
om: Joorjiyaa naannoo magaalaa 'Istoon Maawunteen' kessatti hidhattoonni Antifaa,gareen mirga fagoo fi gareen deeggartoota Confedereeshinii walitti bu'an.

en: Facebook inadvertently disabled some users' accounts when a system designed to detect fake accounts malfunctioned.
om: Feesbuukiin yeroo sirni adda-baastuu sobaa tokko akka malee dalage utuu karoora malee adda-baastuu fayyadamtoota tokko tokkoo uggure.

en: Deputy Prime Minister Demeke Mekonnen has held discussion with Director General of the World Health Organization (WHO), Dr Tedros Adhanom.
om: Itti aanaa Muummee Ministeeraa Dammaqee Mekonnin Daarikteera Waliigalaa Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO), Dr Teedroos Adhaanom waliin marii geggeessan.

en: The American Cancer Society recommends women at average risk of breast cancer should begin annual mammograms at age 45, and women 55 and older scale back screening to every other year.
om: Hawaasni Kaanserii Ameerikaa dubartoonni kaanserii harmaaf balaa giddugaleessaa irra jiran umrii waggaa 45'tti qorannoo maamogiraafii waggaatti tokkoo eegaluu akka qaban, akkasumas dubartoonni waggaa 55 fi isaa olii gara waggaa tokko gidduun oolchaa qoratamuutti akka gadi buusan gorse.

en: David Cameron, the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, refuses to join a European Union financial crisis accord after negotiations in Brussels.
om: Deevid Kaameruun, Muummichi Ministeeraa Yuunaayitid Kiingidem, mariilee Biruuzels keessatti ta'e booda seera waliigaltee jeeqama faayinaansii Gamtaa Awurooppaatti akka hin makamne dide.

en: Association football team FC Barcelona ends its 111-year history of refusing commercial shirt sponsorship as it signs a record £125 million deal with the Qatar Foundation.
om: Waldaan garee kubbaa miilaa FC Baarceloonaa Faawundeeshinii Qaatar wajjin waliigaltee seenaa miliyoona £125 mallatteessuun seenaa diddaa ispoonsara qomee daldalaa waggaa 111 xumure.

en: Zerfie Mersha, environmental technology director with LIDI, told The Reporter that the acceptable amount of chrome in water waste is 2 mg per liter but most Ethiopian tanneries discharge high concentration of chrome as high as more than 90 mg of chrome per liter.
om: Zarfee Marshaa, daayirekterri teekinooloojii naannoo LIDI, Ripportetichatti hangi keemikaala kiroomii bishaan balfaa keessaa fudhatama qabu liitiriidhaan 2 mg garuu warshaaleen gogaa Itoophiyaa harki caaluu bulbula keemikaala kiroomii olaanaa hanga liitiriidhaan90 mg ga'u dabalu jechuun himteetti..

en: The system has been supporting agriculture by developing soil fertility maps for more than 18,000 rural kebeles in the country and providing up-to-date soil fertility data as well as recommending the best type of fertilizer for soil in each region, Tegbaru said.
om: Sirnichi kaartaalee gabbina biyyee gandoota baadiyyaa 18,000 olii biyyicha keessaa qopheesuun daataa gabbina biyyee yeroo yeroonii dhiyeesuufii gosa xaa'oo gaarii tokkoo tokkoo biyyee naannichaaf tahus gorsa kennuun qonnaa deggeraa akka ture, Tagibaaruun dubbate.

en: The money Care will receive from the federal government will be spent on meeting the immediate humanitarian needs of drought-affected families in the West Hararghe zone of Oromiya state, he said.
om: Maallaqi Keer mootummaa federaalaa irraa argatu fedhii namoomaa battalaa maatiiwwan zoonii Harargee Lixaa Naannoo Oromoyaa keessaa guutuuf baasii taha, jedhe.

en: A suicide bomber attacks a charity in the Kabul suburb of Shāre Naw with the Taliban claiming responsibility.
om: Haleellaa boombiin of wareeguun godhamu kan qarqara Kaabul Sheer Naawu keessatti hojjetaa tola ooltummaa tokko haleele Taalibaan itti gaafatamummaa fudhate.

en: The 100km-long road, stretching from Ethiopia’s Asosa town to Sudan’s Kumruk (Kormuk), will enhance trade relations as well as social ties between the two countries.
om: Daandii 100-km dheeratu, Asoosaaa Itoophiyaatii ka'ee Kumuruk(kormuuk) sudaan kan ga'u, walitti dhufeenya daldalaa akkasumas hidhaa hawaasa biyya lameenii ni foyyeessa.

en: Genet is a painter, a collage artist and a printmaker, who creates her own paper from natural fibers including teff.
om: Gennet fakkii kaastuu, artistii kolaajii fi qopheessituu maxxansaa, kan waraqaa ofii ishee xaafii dabalatee faayiberii uumamaa irraa uumteedha.

en: Colombia evacuates towns near the Nevado del Ruiz volcano over concerns about a possible eruption.
om: Kolombiyaan magaalota naannoo volkaanoo Nevaadoo del Ruwiiz jiran sababa waa'ee yaaddoo dhuka'uu maluuf gara nagaa qabutti baaste.

en: Iraq is terrorised by unconfirmed reports of extremists crushing the skulls of emos with blocks of cement.
om: Oduu hin mirkanoofne kan namoonni finxaaleeyyin buqqee mataa Imoos bilookeetii simintootin cabsan jedhuun Iraaq shororkofteetti.

en: The Greek Navy's mine countermeasures vessel HS Kallisto is cut in two in a collision with a container ship.
om: Dooniin albuuda humna ittisa bishaanirraa Giriik, Kaallistoo HS doonii fe'umsaa waliin walitti bu'uu isaatiin bakka lamatti adda bahe.

en: The Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) is the sole government body for the importation of petroleum products while the Ministry of Trade sets retail petroleum prices upon the recommendations of the enterprise.
om: Interpiraayiziin Dhiyeessii Peetrooliyemii Itoopiyaa (EPSE) qaama mootummaa tokkicha oomisha peetrooliyemii biyyatti galchuudha, Ministeerri daldalaa gorsawwan interpiraayichaa irratti hundaa'uun gatii jumlaa peetroliyeemii ni baasa.

en: The Morganza Spillway on the Mississippi River has been opened for the first time in 37 years, deliberately flooding 3,000 square miles of rural Louisiana to save most of Baton Rouge and New Orleans.
om: Hidhni finca'aa Laga Missisippii irratti argamu Baatan Rooj fi Niw Oorliins baraaruuf jecha erga waggaa 37ti as yeroo jalqabaaf gad-dhiifamuun gandi baadiyyaa Looziyaana iskuweer maayilii 3000 ta'u lolaan dhiqame.

en: During his stay in Ethiopia, he will also attend Food Safety Conference organized by the African Union, World Health Organization and World Food Program that will begin next Tuesday.
om: Turtii isaa Itoophiyaa keessatti, konfiraansii Fayyummaa Nyaataa Gamtaa Afiriikaa, Dhaabbata Fayyaa Adunyaa fi Sagantaa Nyaataa Adunyaatin qindaa'ee Kibxata dhufu eegalu ni hirmaata,

en: ohn O’Connor, Director of African Operations at IOHK, expressed his eagerness to harness Ethiopia’s greatest attributes and discover solutions using technology of lower cost, more efficiency and functionality, leapfrogging the traditional usage of technology.
om: Ohon Okonor, IOHKtti Daayirekterri hojiiwwan Afiriikaa, duudhawwan gurguddoo Itoophiyaa eegachiisu fi teekinooloojii gatii gadi-bu'aa, bu'a qabeessaa fi faayida caalaa qabu, fayyadamaa tekinooloojii aadaa dhabamsiisu fayyadamuun furmaata barbaaduuf hedduu hawwiin eeguu isaanii ibsan.

en: The social media pages of Qedamawi feature Ethiopian patriots such as Emperor Menelik, Ras Alula and those that fought the Adwa war reimagined as superheroes.
om: Fuulli miidiyaa hawaasaa Qedaamaawwii gootota Itoopiyaa kanneen akka Mooticha Minilik, Raas Aluulaa fi warreen lola Aduwaa lolan akka gootota cimootti irraa deebiin yaadachiisuun dhiyeessa.

en: Yellow fever epidemic has occurred in Wolayita Zone of the SNNPR, according to Ethiopian Public Health Institute.
om: Weerarri dhukkuba busaa keelloo Zoonii Wolaayittaa SNNPR keessa mudate, akka Inistitiyuutiin Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaa jedhetti.

en: Eddie Maher, who spent almost 20 years as a fugitive in the United States, is jailed for five years for stealing a security van containing £1.2m in Suffolk, England.
om: Yunaaytid Isteetis keessatti koolu galtummaan waggoota 20 kan jiraate Edii Maher Ingiliz ,Sanfolk keessatti konkolaataa Vaanii kan qaama nageenyaa ta'e miliyoona £1.2 waliin hatuu isaatiin hidha wagga shaniin adabame.

en: Burkina Faso culls 115,000 chickens over a bird flu scare.
om: Burikinaafaasoon sababa sodaa dhibee utalloo sinbiraatiin handaqqolee biyyattii 115000 qaluufi.

en: In a press conference held today, State Minister of Minisry of Helath Alemtsehay Paulos said the country has resumed evaluation and certification of health care professionals which was stopped due to the pandemic.
om: Ibsa miidiyaa har'a godhame keessatti, Deettaan Ministeeraa Ministirii Eegumsa Fayyaa Alemtsehaay Phaawuloos biyyattiin Madaalli fi Waraqaa ragaa argachuu Ogeessota yaala Fayyaa sababa weerarichaa dhaabatee ture itti fufsiistetti jette.

en: According to Ambassador Asminew, Ethiopian forces are also given additional responsibility to train Somali forces to establish a strong national army that can conduct operations independently.
om: Marichi, guyyoota ja'aaf geggeeffame, Dr. Debrtsiyoon Gebiremikaa'eliin akka itti aanaa dura ta'aa jaarmiyichaati filateeras.

en: American film actor and producer Kirk Douglas, one of the last living movie stars of the Golden Age of Hollywood, celebrates his 100th birthday.
om: Urjiilee baroota warqii Hooliwuud dhumaa kessaa tokko kan kanta'e taatoon fiilmii Ameerikaa fi Prodiyusara kan ta'e Kiirk Daagilas guyyaa waggaa dhalootaa 100ffaa isaa ni kabaja.

en: Kassahun noted that the policy would enable the country to conquer its challenges as biotechnology plays important role in enhancing productivity, reducing climate change, improving health, and bringing about economic growth.
om: Kaasahun imaammatichi biyyattin rakkoowwan ishee akka injifattuf akkuma baayootekinooloojiin shoora olaanaa omishtummaa guddisuu keessatti, jijjjirama qilleensaa hir'isuu keessatti, fayyaa foyyeessuu, fi guddina dingadee fiduu keessatti taphatuun ni dandeessisa jechuun ibseera.

en: In addition, the launch of Ethiosat will offer Ethiopians a larger offering of both local and relevant international content in the future.
om: Dabalataan, jalqabsiifamuun Itiyoosaat lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa lamaan qabiyyee naannoo guddaa tahee fi fuulduratti ammoo addunyaalessaa barbaachisaa tahe akka argatan godha.

en: The agreement was signed between Solomon Kebede, Head of the Federal Urban Land and Land Related Issues Registration Agency, and his Korean counterpart Biki Chaw.
om: Waliigaltechi dura-ta'aa Ejensii galmeessa lafa magaalaa fi dhimmoota lafaan walqabatanii federaalaa Solomoon Kabbadaa fi gita isaanii kooriyaa Bikii Chaaw gidduutti mallattaa'e.

en: The newly established Japan-Korea-Ethiopia Friendship Association held a concert in Tokyo, Japan, with the view to strengthening the people-to-people relationship among the countries.
om: Waldaan Michummaa Jaappaan-Kooriyaa-Itoopiyaa haaraan hundeeffame konsertii hariiroo ummataa gara ummataa biyyoota kunneenii gidduutti guddisuuf kaayyaffefate Tookiyoo, Jaappaan keessatti geggeesse.

en: According to this outlet, ‘Broos has challenged his side to “do everything to get six points” from back-to-back matches against Ethiopia as the qualifiers enter top gear.’
om: akka dubbi himaa isaniitti,tapha deebii Itiyoophiyaa waliin qabuun "biruus gareen isaa qabxii 6 argachuuf waa hunda akka godhu" xiiqeffachiseera ,akkuma mo'ataan garee olii seentutti.

en: According to Wordy, “Ethiopia has the natural resources to generate all the clean energy it needs and to decouple its economy from the fluctuating prices and unsustainable nature of the oil-based economy.”
om: Akka Woorditti, "Itoophiyaan anniisaa barbaachisu hunda maddisiisuf akkasumas diinagdee jeeqamaa fi itti fufaa hin taane kan boba'a irratti hundaa'e dachaan dabaluuf qabeenya uumama qabdi.

en: Ethiopia will participate for the first time at the 2019 Cannes Film Festival in the African Pavilion, Tourism Ethiopia announced.
om: Itoopiyaan yeroo jalqabaaf Festivaala Fiilmii Kaannes 2019 irratti Paviloon Afrikaa keessatti akka hirmaattu Tuurizim Itoopiyaan beeksise

en: David Saint-Jacques becomes the fourth Canadian astronaut to take part in a spacewalk and the first in 12 years as he begins a roughly seven-hour mission.
om: Deevid Seeyint-Jakkus imala hawaa irraa irratti hirmaachuun astiroonotii Kanaadaa afuraffaa akkasumas ergama tilmaamaan sa'atii 7 tahu jalqabuu isaatiin waggaa 12 keessatti kan jalqabaa tahe.

en: Almazbek Atambayev, the newly elected President of Kyrgyzstan, states that a lease for a United States air base in Manas will not be renewed when it expires in 2014.
om: Almaazbeek Atambaayev, Pirasdaantiin Kaazaakistaan inni haaraan filatame, waliigalteen kiraa buufata humna qilleensaa Yunaayitid Isteetis yeroo bara 2014 keessa xumuramu irra deebiin akka hin haaromfamne ibse..

en: The Korea Forest Service has been expanding collaboration with Ethiopia to restore degraded forests through sustainable agroforestry.
om: Tajaajilli Bosonaa Kooriyaa bosonoota manca'an agiroofoorestirii walitti fufaan deebisuuf Itoopiyaa wajjin walta'iinsa isaa bal'isaa tureera.

en: Some representatives from the warring factions in South Sudan have arrived in Ethiopia’s capital, Addis Ababa.
om: Bakka buutonni qaamota Sudaan Kibbaa keessatti wal lolaa jiranii muraasi magaala guddoo Itoopiyaa, Addis Ababaa gahan.

en: The individuals get payments for their services from foreign telecom companies which was supposed to be made to Ethio Telecom.
om: Namoonni kunneen tajaajiloota isaaniif kanfaltii Itiyoo Teelekomiif godhamuu ture dhaabbatoota teelekoom biyya alaa irraa fudhatu.

en: Geo-hazards are affecting agricultural products and human life in selected areas of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples Region (SNNPR) of Ethiopia, according to Geological Survey of Ethiopia.
om: Balaan lafa keessa bakka muraasa Naanoo Saboota, Sablammootaa fi Ummattoota Kibbaa (SNNPR) Itoopiyaa keessatti oomishaalee qonnaa fi jireenya namaa miidhaa jira, akka Qorannoo Jiyoolojii Itoopiyaa jedhetti.

en: The National Veterinary Institute of Ethiopia is preparing to manufacture veterinary drugs to substitute imported drugs, an official said.
om: Inistiitiyuutiin Veterinarii Biyyaalessaa Itoopiyaa qorichoota Veterinarii oomishuun qorichoota alaa galan bakka buusuuf qophaa'aa jira, angawaatu jedhe.

en: The NFSDP will ensure an increase in Ethiopia`s forest coverage to 20 percent in 2020 and 30 percent in 2025 and make forest a core sector in economic structural reforms.
om: NFSDP'n Itoophiyaa keessatti uwwisa bosonaa 2020tti dhibbentaa 20tti fi 2025tti dhibbentaa 30tti akka guddatuu fi rifoormii caasaa diinagdee keessatti seektara bosonaa giddugaleessa akka ta'u ni mirkaneessa.

en: The measles vaccination campaign targets 928,000 children aged 6 months to 15 years among the internally displaced and host communities in Gedeo Zone.
om: Duulli talaallii miizilichaa warra qe'ee isaanii irraa buqqa'anii fi ummata zonii Geediyoo keessaa isaan simate keessaa ijoollee ji'a 6 hanga waggaa 15 928,000 xiyyeeffate.

en: Iran successfully puts the Fajr satellite in orbit using a Safir-B1 rocket.
om: Iraan rooketii Saafir-B1 fayyadamuun satalaayitii Fajir milkaa'inaan orbitii keessa galchite.

en: Several actors and experts in the wildlife sector, including from regional and international organizations partaken on the workshop, which among other things discussed on opportunities and challenges of the wildlife in Ethiopia.
om: Dhaabbatoota naannoolee fi Addunyaalessaa irraa dabalachuun hojjetoonni fi beektonni sektera bineensota caakaa muraasi leenjicha irratti hirmaatan, waan biraa keessaa waa'ee carraalee fi yaaddoowwan bineensota caakkaa Itoopiyaa keessaa mari'atan

en: Protests against the shooting of Michael Brown by the Ferguson Police Department in the US state of Missouri turn violent.
om: Yunaaytid isteetis Missurii kessatti kutaa polisii Fargusaniin dhukaasa Maaykel Biraawon irratti raawwate ilaalchisuun Mormiin geggeeffama jiru gara jeequmsaatti jijjiirame.

en: The 72kg satellite of Ethiopia was developed in collaboration with the Chinese Academy of Space Technology.
om: Satalaayitiin Itoopiyaa 72Kg tahu Akkaadaamii Teekinoolojii Hawaa Chaayinaan wal tahuun kan hojjetameedha.

en: YouTube suspends channels run by Myanmar's military and removes junta propaganda videos for "violating its community guidelines and terms of service".
om: Yuutiyuubin chaanaalii humna waraanaa maayanmaarin hoogganamu uggure, akkasumas suur-sagalee piroopagaandaa abbaa hirree 'walii galtee tajaajila hawaasaa isaatii cabsuu' kan jedhuun haqeera.

en: This grant will benefit approximately 6.5 million Ethiopians in need, of which 50 percent are expected to be women.
om: Pirojektiin kun tilmaamaan lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa miliyoona 6.5 ni fayyada, kanneen keessaa dhibbantan 50 dubartoota akka tahan ni eegama.

en: A new study suggests that altitude plays a role in language evolution, explaining why ejective sounds are more popular in languages of high-altitude regions.
om: Sagaleeewwan baafaman naannoowwan olka'iinsa qabanatti heddumminaan jiraachuuu ibsuudhaan, as dhufa afaanii keessatti olka'iinsi gahee akka qabu qorannoon haaraan tokko agarsiise.

en: On today, thousands people have taken to the streets of Addis Ababa to take part in Africa’s biggest road race, a challenging 10km run at 10,000ft above sea level.
om: Har'a irratti, uummatni kumaan lakkaawwaman gara daandiiwwan Finfinneetti dorgommii daandiirra guddicha Afiriikaa fiigicha rakkisaa 10km sirrii irra galaanaa irraa faana 10,000 irratti argamu irratti qooda fudhachuuf deemaniiru.

en: In an exclusive interview with ENA, the deputy mayor said besides being a place where Timket is celebrated, Jan-Meda is a place for hosting many social events and sports.
om: Af-gaaffii addaa ENA waliin gooteen, itti aantuun kantiibaa bakka itti ayyaanni Cuuphaa kabajamu tahuun alatti, Jaan-Meedaatti qophiiwwan hawaasaa fi ispoortii baayyeen akka geggeessamu dubbate.

en: However, there is still no indication as to when help will arrive after the UN announced on Wednesday that it was forced to suspend aid distribution in the northern Ethiopian town of Kombolcha after gunmen looted its warehouses.
om: Naannoo Tigraay, bakka namoonni miliyoona 5.2 tahan, namoota biroo Affaar keessaa 534,000 fi Amaara keesaa miliyoona 3.3 dabalatee balaa irra jira keessatti haalli gargaarsa namoomaa baayyee yaadessadha.

en: Pakistan, Iran, China, and Russia agree on joint efforts against the Islamic State group in Afghanistan, in an effort to ensure peace and eliminate terrorism from the region.
om: Paakistaan, Iraan, Chaayinaa fi Ruusiyaan dhamaati nageenya buusuufi shororkeessummaa balleessuuf godhamu deggaruuf jecha walii galteen garee mootummaa Islaamawaa Afgaanistaan irratti hojjechuuf waliigalan.

en: Over the past fiscal year, as part of its mandate, the authority said that it has disposed 600.8 million birr worth of drugs, medicine, cleaning products as well as foods and food ingredients which are declared outdated.
om: Bara baajata darbe keessatti, akka aangoo isaatti, abbaan taayitichaa qorichoota, dawaalee, fi oomishaalee qulqullinaa akkasumas nyaataa fi qabiyyeewwan nyaataa yeroo itti darbe birrii miliyoona 600.8 baasu akka gate dubbate.

en: The efforts being made to inscribe the Gada system on UNESCO’s world heritage list are yielding positive results, said the Oromia Regional State Culture and Tourism Bureau.
om: Yaaliin Sirna Gadaa hambaa addunyaa UNESCO'tti galmeessisuuf godhamaa jiru bu'aa gaarii agarsiisaa jira jedhe Biiroon Aadaa fi Tuurizimii Mootummaa Naannoo Oromiyaa.

en: The United States rejects the invitation of Iran by the United Nations in peace talks involving Syria.
om: Yunaayitid Isteetis marii nageenyaa Sooriyaa ilaallatuuf Mootummoota Gamtoomaniin afeeramuu Iraan mormite.

en: NBA team owners and players reach an agreement to end the 149-day NBA lockout and to begin the current NBA season on Christmas Day.
om: Abbootiin qabeenyaa fi taphattoonni garee NBA hamma waliigalteen godhamutti hojjetoonni akka hojii hin seenne dhowwuu guyyaa 149 dhaabuudhaan NBA tibbanaa guyyaa Ayyaana Qileetti akka eegalamu waliigaltee irra gahan.

en: Former Australian swimmer Dawn Fraser is criticised for controversial remarks during which she called for the boycott of the 2010 Commonwealth Games in Delhi.
om: Dorgomtuun Daakkii bishaanii kan duraanii Awustiraaliyaa Daawun Fireezer waamicha laguu dorgommii koman Weelz bara 2010 Deelii kessattii geggeeffamu irratti taasisteen walqabatee yaada burjajeessaa kenniteen hammeeffamuun hedduun irratti qaqqabe.

en: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration approves Truvada as the first drug shown to reduce the risk of HIV infection.
om: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Daawwaa U.S.,Tiruvaadaa akka daawwaa jalqabaa balaa dhibee HIV hir'isuu danda'utti mirkaneessan.

en: Speaking at the 5th ICT National Innovation Competition Award Ceremony and Mini Exhibition Event held today, State Minister, Getachew Negash, noted that the government has paid due attention to ICT through support, inspiration and creation of internationally competent ICT engineers to excel the sector.
om: Qophii Badhaasa Dorgommii Kalaqaa Biyyaalessaa ICT 5ffaa fi Taatee Agarsiisaa Xiqqaa har'a geggeeffame irratti dubbachuun, Ministeer Deetaa, Geetachoo Negaash, deggersa, kaka'umsaa fi injiineroota ICT akka addunyaatti dorgomoo tahan kan sektericha guddatan uumuun mootummaan xiyyeeffannaa barbaachisaa ICT'f kennaa jiraachuu dubbate.

en: Poems, drama, music, and dance, among others, are important instruments to teach the people about the beauty of diversity with few words and through entertainment, she added.
om: Kanneen biraa keessaa walaloowwan, diraamaa, muuziqaa, fi sirbi meeshaalee barbaachisoo ittiin ummata waa'ee bareedina adda addummaa jechoota muraasaanii fi karaa bashannansiisaa taheen barsiisaniidha, jette itti dabaluun.

en: A 300-bed isolation ward has been set up in Islamabad for Chinese citizens returning to Pakistan after vacations.
om: Kutaan siree 300 adda baafamanii tursiifamuu lammiiwwan Chaayinaa boqonnaa booda gara Paakistaanitti deebi'aniif Islaamaabaad keessatti qophaa'e.

en: The Tunisian parliament approves a new anti-terror law that allows the death penalty for terrorists.
om: Paarlaamaan Tuniiziyaa seera faallaa shororkeessummaa haaraa kan shorokeessitoota irratti adabbii du'aa heyyamu mirkaneesse.

en: His meeting with his teacher and mentor, Tadesse Mesfin, has also been a decisive one that he tamed his growth obtaining the right mentorship to devote his entire life to art.
om: Barsiisaa fi gorsaa isaa waliin walbaruun Taddasaa Masfin nama guddina isaaf gorsa gaarii jireenya isaa guutuu aartiidhaaf kennuf isa dandeessisuu filachuun nama murteessaa ta'eera.

en: According to the FBI, the couple that perpetrated the attack had long been radicalized, and had been practicing at a target range days before their murder spree.
om: Akka FBI'n jedhetti, cimdoonni haleellaa raawwatan yeroo dheeraa dura finxaaleyyii tahaniiru, akkasumas ajjeechaa geggeessuu isaaniin guyyoota dura dhiyeenya irratti qiyyaafachuun shaakala geggeessaa turaniru.

en: The Indian Space Research Organisation launches a record 104 satellites in single mission.
om: Dhaabbanni Qoronnoo Hawaa Hindii si'a tokkotti saatalaayitoota seenaa 104 furguggise.

en: Seven people die in clashes between security forces and worshippers taking part in an Ethiopian Orthodox religious ceremony marking Timkat (Epiphany) in Woldiya, Amhara, Ethiopia, over the weekend.
om: Walitti bu'iinsa humnoota nageenyaa fi waaqeffattoota yaadannoo ayyaana Cuuphaa (Epiphany) amantii Ortoodoksii Itiyoophiyaa Waldiyaa, Amaara, Itoophiyaa keessatti guyyoota boqonnaa torbanii irra geggeeffame irratti hirmaatan gidduutti mudateen namoonni torba du'an.

en: President of the Association, Meaza Kitaw, said the association is now providing integrated sexual and reproductive health services including maternal and child health, family planning, screening and treatment.
om: Pirasdaantiin Waldichaa, Me'aazaa Qitawu, waldichi yeroo ammaa fayyaa haadhaa fi daa'imaa, karoora maatii, calallii fi yaala dabalatee tajaajiloota fayyaa walquunnamtii saalaa fi walhormaataa walqabataa kennaa jira jedhan.

en: After being missing for over a week, the body of Sunil Tripathi is found in the Providence River.
om: Reeffi Suniil Trippazii torban tokkoo oliif erga dhabameen booda laga Piroovideens keessatti argame.

en: The meeting came as hopes rose of a potential vaccine to provide temporary shield against Ebola.
om: Walgahichi akkuma Eboolaa irraa ittisa yeroof kan oolu talaalliin argamuu akka danda'u abadiin dabalaa dhufeen tahe.

en: Speaking at the 2016 Samsung Africa Forum, Abey Tau, Corporate Citizenship and Public Affairs Manager, said: “As a global citizen, we felt it was important to use our technology to give back to society.
om: Foramii Samsung Afiriikaa 2016tti dubbii kennaaniin, Abiy Taawu, Hogganaa Lammummaa Gamtaa fi Dhimmoota Hawaasaa, "Akka lammii hundataatti, teekinooloojii keenya hawaasaaf deebisnee gargaaruuf fayyadamuun akka barbaachisaa ta'etti nutti dhagahame" jedhaniiru.

en: The Arab League threatens to take Syria to the United Nations within two weeks if the country does not accept its proposals to end the crackdown on the uprising.
om: Liigiin Arabaa siiriyaan tarkaanfii mormitoota irratti godhamu dhaabuuf karoora isaa torban lama keessatti hin fudhattu taanaan biyyattii gara Mootummoota Gamtoomaniitti akka dhiyeessu akeekkachiise.

en: Following the request by the Ethiopian Football Association to have its World Cup qualifier against Ghana in South Africa, the Ghana Football Association asked the world football governing body last Friday to ensure that there is fair play in the last two matches.
om: waldaan kubbaa miilaa Itiyoophiyaa dorgommii calallii waancaa addunyaa Gaanaa waliin Afirikaa kibbaa kessatti taasisuuf gaaffii dhiheesseen booda Waldaan Kubbaa Miilaa Gaanaa qaamaa kubbaa miilaa adunyaa bulchu jimaata darbe yeroo darban lamaanitti taphni haqa-qabeessi akka ture akka mirkaneessuf gaafatan.

en: United States Capitol Police and the Federal Bureau of Investigation arrested Amine El Khalifi, a man from Morocco who allegedly planned a suicide attack on the United States Capitol.
om: Polisiin kaapitoolii yuunayitid isteetis fi biiroon qorannoo federaalaa dhalataa morookoo kan ta'e Amiin El Kaliifaa shakkii yakka balleessanii baduu itti yaadame Kaappitoolii Yuunaytid Isteetis irratti gaggeessuutiin to'annoo jala oolcheera.

en: The discussion between the PM and the leaders of different political parties was held on Tuesday at the PM’s office; the two sides discussing various issues with the PM presenting a three-stage plan.
om: Mareen MM'chaa fi hoogganoota jaarmiyaa siyaasaa garagaraa gidduutti gaafa Kibxataa waajjira MM'chaatti godhame, MM'chaa karoora gulantaa sadii ibsuun gareen lamaanuu dhimmoota adda addaa irratti mari'atan.

en: The criminal bench was set to rule on whether charges filed by prosecutors of Federal Ethics and Anti Corruption Commission should be amended or not.
om: Dhaddachi yakkaa himannaan himattootaa Koomishinii Namusaa fi Farra Malaamaltummaa Federaalaatiin ta'e foyya'uu akka qaban yookin hin qabne qajeelchuuf dhaabbate.

en: The UN Human Rights Council issues a report accusing both IS militants and Syrian government forces of committing war crimes in Syria.
om: Manni maree mirga namoomaa dhaabbata UN gabaasa hidhattoonni IS fi humni waraana motummaa Siiriyaa yakka waraanaa rawwataniiru jedhu ifoomse.

en: While launching the application, Maternal and Child Health and Nutrition Director at Ministry of Health, Dr. Meseret Zelalem noted that in today’s world adolescents and young people rely on their mobile devices as sources of information so that ‘Yenetab Mobile Application’, which is available on Google play store, is proving to be an authentic source of health information with a strong emphasis on adolescent and youth sexual and reproductive health rights.
om: Yeroo appilikeeshicha hojii jalqabsiisan, Ministirii Eegumsa Fayyaatti Daarikteerri Fayyaa Daa'imaa fi Nyaataa, Dr. Meseret Zelaalem addunyaa har'aa keessatti saafeloonni fi dargaggoonni akka madda odeeffannootti bilbila isaanii irratti hirkatu kanaafuu 'Appilikeeshiniin Mobaayilaa Yennetaab' kan kuusaa Guugil Pley irratti argamu, madda odeeffannoo fayyaa amansiisaa kan mirga fayyaa wal-hormaataa saafeloota fi dargaggoota xiyyeeffatu tahuu mirkaneesseera jette.

en: Such actions will be continued in a well comprehended way in the future.
om: Tarkaanfiin akkasii bifa guutuu taheen gara fuulduraatti itti fufa.

en: Three-time Olympic champion Kenenisa Bekele, who finished third at this year’s London Marathon, has been named as a reserve, along with world silver medallist Adhane Yemane and 2013 world silver medalist Lelisa Desisa.
om: Shaampiyoonii Olompikii yeroo sadii Qananiisa Baqqalaa kan Maaraatoonii Landan bara kana sadaffaa ta'ee xumure, mo'ataa meedaliyaa birrii Adaanee Yimaanee fi mo'ataa medaaliyaa birrii 2013 Leellisaa Dessisaa waliin eeggattoota ta'uun moggaafamaniiru.

en: A Greek truck drivers strike ends with the situation expected to get back to normal quickly.
om: Lagannaan hojii konkolachistoota gosa konkolaataa 'Tiraakii' yeroo xumuramutti osoo hin turin haala barametti ni deebi'a jedhamee eegama.

en: The most charming Meskerem Abera that plays the love interest of Mesfin and daughter of the king of Gojam brightens the tension brought on by Endalk.
om: Hedduu simboo-qabeetti kan taate Maskaram Abarraa kan jaalallee Masfin fi intala mootii Goojjam taphattu dhiibbaa Indaalkin irratti dhufe salphisteetti.

en: American twins Bob and Mike Bryan win their fifth US Open men's doubles title, giving them 100 ATP World Tour titles as a team.
om: lakkuun lamaan lammiilee Ameerikaa Boobii fi Maayik Biriyaan geepha US Open cimdii dhiiraan si'a shanaffaaf mo'ataniiru, kunis akka gareetti mo'attoota badhaasa ATP WORLD TOUR si'a 100 taasisaanii.

en: On the day, a huge variety of runners from all age groups and fitness levels participated, it was indicated.
om: Guyyicha irratti, gartuun fiigdotaa baayyee olaanaa garee umurii hundaa fi gahumsa qaamaa sadarkaa hunda hirmaataniiru, jedhamuun ka'ameera.

en: Controversy is stoked after a video emerges of a U.S. religious minister outlining his plan to imprison the country's gay and lesbian population behind an electric fence until they die.
om: Erga suur-sagaleen karoora ministeerri amantaa U.S kan garee hawaasaa bukkee ta'an kellaa elektirikii irratti hanga isaan du'anitti hidha jedhu ba'ee as jeequmsi uumameera.

en: U.S. Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta makes an unannounced trip to Kabul and warns that his country is "reaching the limits of our patience here" with regard to Pakistan.
om: Ministeerri Ittisaa U.S. Liyoon Paanettaan imala hin beeksifamne gara Kaabulitti gochuun dhimma Paakistaaniin kan wal qabatu biyyi saa "asitti daangaa obsa keenyaa gahaa jirra" jechuun akeekkachiise.

en: Activities to prepare land on the outskirts of Addis Ababa started with the total investment expected to cost over USD one billion.
om: Hojiilee lafa gogaa Addis Ababa qopheessuu investimentii waliigalaa dolaara Ameerikaa biliyoona tokko ol baasa jedhamee eegamuun eegalame.

en: Having the conventional haircut has been perceived as a way to be more acceptable to certain relatives, as well as to the wider community.
om: Muraa Rifeensaa fudhatama qabu qabaachuun karaa ittin firoota , akkasumas hawaasa bal'aa biratti fudhatama argatan ta'ee ilaalama.

en: The day was marked under the theme: “ New Beginning with Full Sovereignty,” at the House of Peoples’ Representatives.
om: Guyyichi mataduree:"Jalqabbii Haaraa Birmadummaa Guutuu wajjin," jedhu jalatti Mana Marii Bakka Bu'oota Ummataa keessatti yaadatamee oole.

en: Partnering with sport ministers, city governments, race organizers and member federations around the world, the IAAF’s initiative incorporates the race to be held in a dozen cities across 15-time zones.
om: Ministeera ispoortii, bulchiinsota magaalaa, qindeessitoota dorgommii fi minseensota federeshinii guutuu adunyaa waliin michoomuun, dhaabbatni IAAF dorgommichi magaalota kudha lama zoonii yeroo 15 keessatti akka geggeffamu qindeesseera.

en: According to the Minister, Ethiopia set to have thousands of technology centered micro and small enterprises that could produce various technological products expected to join the global market.
om: Akka Ministeerichaatti, Itoopiyaan interpiraayizoota teekinoolojii giddugaleessa godhatan maayikroo fi xixiqqaa kumaan lakka'aman kanneen meeshaalee teekinoolojii garaagaraa gabaa addunyaa seenuu malan qabaachuuf karoorfattee jirti.

en: The UK's Manchester Airport launches an inquiry after an 11-year-old boy boarded a plane to Rome unaccompanied, and without passport, tickets or boarding pass.
om: Buufanni Xiyyaaraa UK Maanchester erga gurbaan umrii waggaa 11 kophaa isaa fi paaspoortii, tikeetii yookaan guca imalaa utuu hin qabaatin gara Room xiyyaaraan imalee booda qorannoo eegale.

en: 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup, the first ever FIFA women’s football tournament in the Middle East, kicks off in Jordan.
om: Baha giddu galeessaatti Dorgommii kubbaa miilaa dubartootaa FIFA jalqabaa kanta'e dorgommiin waancaa kubbaa miilaa dubartoota addunyaa bara 2016 umurii wagga 17 gadii Joordanoos keessatti ni eegala .

en: NASA scientists report the MarCO satellites, two CubeSats in deep space, have lost contact with Planet Earth.
om: Saayintistiin NASA saatalayiittoonni MarCo, bifa xaasaa kan qaban lama hawaa gad fagoo keessatti argaman , akka qunnamtiin isaan lafa wajjin cite gabaase.

en: In the NBA, Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers moves to third on the all-time point scorer list overtaking Michael Jordan.
om: NBA keessatti, Koob Biriyaantiin Leekersii Loos Anjiles, Mikaayel Jordaaniin darbuun gara tartee qabxii galmeessitoota yeroo hundaa sadaffaatti darbe.

en: A South Korean court rules that Apple Inc. and Samsung Electronics infringed each other's patents on mobile computing technology.
om: Manni murtii koriyaa kibbaa teekinoloojii komptiitara moobayilii irrattii Appil iinki fi Saamsang elektirooniksiin mirga ragaa abba qabeenyumma kalaqaa walii isaanii cabsuu isaniitiif manni murtichaa murtee nii dabarsa.

en: In American football, players in the US National Football League ratify a new collective bargaining agreement including provisions for tests for human growth hormone.
om: Tapha kubbaa miilaa Ameerikaa kessatti taphattoonni liigii kubbaa miilaa biyyalessaa US keessa jiran seerota qorannoo hormoonii guddina dhala nama dabalate waliigaltee waliinii haaraa kan biroos ni mirkaneessu.

en: In a platform organized to promote carbon trading, Oromia Forest and Wild Animals Development Enterprise Director, Ararsa Regassa told ENA that comprehensive work is being undertaken to ensure the public benefit from natural resources.
om: Waltajjii daldala Kaarbooniif qophaa'e irratti, Daayirekterri Interpiraayiziin Kunuunsa Bosonaa fi Bineensota Bosonaa Oromiyaa Araarsaa Raggaasaa ENAtti hojiin hunda haammachiisaa ta'e hawaasni qabeenya umaamaa irra fayyadamaa akka ta'e mirkaneessuf akka hojjetamaa jiru himaniiru.

en: The World Health Organization announces that, since the Ebola outbreak began in March 2014, last week marked the first week of no new cases worldwide.
om: Weerarri dhibee Iboolaa erga ji'a biootessaa bara 2014 irraa eegale as yeroo jalqabaaf akka idil addunyaatti torbeen darbe kan dhukkubsataan dhibee kanaa tokkollee hin gabaafamne ta'uu isaa Dhaabbanni Faayyaa Addunyaa gabaseera.

en: The Soflet Malt which joined the Bole Lemi Indistrial Park with an outlay of 70 Million Euros has finalized preparations to start production on coming March 2021.
om: Sooflet Maalt kan baasii Yuuroo miliyoona 70'tiin paarkii Industirii Boolee Lammiitti makame oomisha Biootessa 2021 oomisha eegaluuf qophii xumuree jira.

en: The Ethiopian Human Rights Council (EHRCo) called for legal and operational amendments for future elections based on its observation outcomes of the elections conducted on September 30, 2021.
om: Manni Maree Mirga Namoomaa Itoopiyaa (EHRCo) bu'aalee taajjabbii isaa filannoo Fulbaana 30, 2021 geggeeffame irratti hundaa'uun filannoowwan fuulduraaf fooyya'iinsi seeraa fi adeemsaa akka godhamu waamicha dhiyeesse.

en: The meeting that kicked off today in Addis Ababa will stay for two days.
om: Ministeeronni Bishaanii Itoopiyaa, Gibxii fi Sudaan koree teekinikaa wajjin Hidha Guddicha Haaromsaa Itoopiyaa irratti walgahii geggeessaa jiru.

en: The Saudi Arabian Government and business delegation led by Minister of State for African Affairs Ahmed bin Abdul Aziz Qattan arrived in Addis Ababa on Sunday.
om: Mootummaa Saawudii Arabiyaa fi jiilli daldalaa ministeera biyya dhimmootaa Afiriikaa Ahimed biin Abdul zii Qaattaaanin durfamu dilbata Addis Ababa seenaniiru.

en: According to preliminary tests at the Glendive, Montana city water treatment plant, the January 17 oil spill in the Yellowstone River contains benzene, a chemical that causes cancer.
om: Akkaataa qorannoo duraa warshaa bishaan qulqulleessuu magaalaa Montaanaa kan Gileendiiv'tti, boba'aan laga gaafa Amajji 17 Yelloowistoonitti lola'e, beenzina, keemikaala kaanserii isa fidu akka qabu agarsiisa.

en: The organizer contributed more than 80 million birr proceeds collected towards the ‘Dine for Ethiopia’ initiative.
om: Qindeessitoonni galii qophicha irraa walitti qabame birrii miliyoona 80 ol kaka'umsa 'Irbaata Itoopiyaa' f buusan.

en: Mexican police officers discover 16 corpses with signs of torture inside a vehicle in the southern state of Guerrero.
om: Miseensi poolisii lammii Meeksikoo naannoo kibbaa Gu'erero keessatti konkolaataa tokko keessatti reeffa 16 kan mallattoon miidhaa qaamaa irra gahe qabu arge.

en: These cattle can stand and walk only with human support as deadly drought takes hold in Borena.
om: Hongeen hamaan Boorana waan qabateef beeyladoonni kunneen deggersa namaa qofaani ka'uufi deemuu kan danda'an.

en: A British photographer designs and builds a drone as a low cost alternative for shooting nature documentaries.
om: Ogeessi suuraa lammii Biriteen Diroonota bobbocuu fi ijaaruun akka filannoo gatii gadi aanaatti waraabbii seenessa Uumamaaf akka olutti gabaaf dhiyeessa.

en: Hurricane Rina strengthens to Category 2 strength as it advances towards Cancun and other resorts on the Mexican Riviera.
om: Obomboleettiin Riinaa gara kankana fi Rizoortiwwaan Meksiikaan Riveera irratti argamanitti yeroo babal'atu sadarkaa 2tti ni guddata.

en: Abdiwak, who placed sixth in the Chicago race in 2019, finished in 2 hours, 6 minutes, 12 seconds.
om: Abdiwaaq, kan dorgommii Chikaagoo 2019 keessatti ja'affaa kahame, sa'atii 2, daqiiqqaa 6, sekondii 12'tti xumure.

en: “This year’s Gondar Epiphany is colorful with increasing number of foreign tourists and Ethiopian-born citizens shown an increase appetite for coming,” said Sertsefire Sibhat, Tourism Ethiopia Deputy Director.
om: "Ayyaanni Cuuphaa Gondar waggaa kanaa dabalaa dhufuu tuuristoota biyya alaa fi lammiileen dhalattoota Itoopiyaa dhufuuf fedhii agarsiisuu isaaniitiin hawataadha" jedhe Sertseefiree Sibhaat, Itti aanaan Daayirekteera Tuurizim Itoopiyaa.

en: And he says he never gets paid nearly enough commensurate with the level of hardship he goes through while training and the hustle he faces when he takes his show to the street.
om: Dabalees sadarkaa dhamaatii yeroo shaakalaa fi rakkoo yeroo qophii isaa daandii irra baasuuf isa mudatuutti kaffaltii ga'aa hin argatu.

en: FIFA announces that the President Gianni Infantino tests positive for COVID-19.
om: FIFAn pireezidaanti Jiyaanii Infaantiinoon dhibee Covid-19 qabamuu isaanii ifoomse.

en: The Water Ministers of Ethiopian, Egypt and Sudan are conducting a joint meeting with the technical committee on the Ethiopian Grand Renaissance Dam.
om: Abiyyi, inni turtii aangoo daangessuf murtii EPDRF yaadachiise, fooyya'iinsi inni turtii aangoo Muummee Ministeeraa daangessuuf gargaaru dhiyootti heeratti dabalama jedhe

en: Former Pennsylvania State Representative Stephen Stetler is convicted of all six counts in his corruption case.
om: Bakka bu'aan kutaa magaalaa peenisilveeniya duraanii Istiifen Isteetiler himata yakka malaammaltummaan himataman kessaa himannaalee 6n irratti murta'e.

en: The Department of Health of the Philippines declares a national dengue epidemic in the country, as cases spike to 622 deaths.
om: Qajeelchi Fayyaa Filiphiinsi akka lakkoofsi nama du'ee 622 tti ol guddateen, weerara biyyaalessa denguu biyyattii keessatti labse

en: The Vatican brings Pope John Paul II's coffin out from below St. Peter's Basilica in Rome in preparation for his beatification.
om: Vaatikaan reeffa Phaaphaasii Joon Pool II Galma Qulqullicha Peteros gadi kan Room keessaa irraa beetifikashinii isaaf qopheessuuf fide.

en: The Chinese securities regulator introduces legislation limiting the sale of shares by shareholders.
om: To'attoonni nageenyaa Chaayinaa seera gurgurtaa aksiyoonaa abbootii aksiyoonaan godhamuu daangessu hojiirra oolchan.

en: The President of the United States, Barack Obama, proposes to expand the Pacific Remote Islands Marine National Monument, creating the world's largest marine sanctuary in the Central Pacific Ocean.
om: Pirezidaantiin yunnaaytid isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan god-hambaa biyyooleessa galanaarra odolaawwan fageenya paasifik irratti argaman babal'isuuf yaada dhiyyeessan, kunis god-hambaa galaanarra guddicha adunyaa giddu galeessa garba Paasifik isa taasisa.

en: Speaking at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, the Premier said that bringing vitality to the economy is part of the sweeping reforms that the country has been undertaking.
om: Waltajjii diinagdee Adunyaa Daavos, Siwizerlaandii irratti dubbii taasisuun, Muummichi darbee jiraattuummaa diinagdeetti fiduun qaama riifoormiiwwan haarawoo biyyatti gochaa turteeti jedhaniiru.

en: Four people are injured and 85,000 households lose power as Sanba moves across Okinawa and Kagoshima Prefectures.
om: Saanbaan gara Okinaawaa fi Kaagooshimaa Pirefekchars keessa darbuu isaatiin namoonni afur miidhamanii maatiiwwan 85,000 ibsaa dhaban.

en: American swimmer Ryan Lochte agrees to a 10-month suspension while his other colleagues get four.
om: Bishaan daakaan Lammii Ameerikaa Riyaan Looch yeroo waayillan isaa afur argatan baatii kudhaniif akka dhaabu waliigale.

en: Due to the attention given, the prevalence of HIV/AIDS had been declining, Sahlework said, and pointed out “however, the disease is starting to be pervasive again because of the negligence among the leadership and the public.”
om: Sababa xiyyeeffannaa kennameefii, faca'iinsi HIV/AIDS hir'iseera jette Sahleworq, "hatahu malee, sababa eeggannaa gochu dhabuu hoggansaa fi ummataa dhukkubichi deebi'ee bal'inaan tamsa'uu akka eegale" tuqxeetti.

en: Dr. Kent Brantly, the medical director for Samaritan's Purse in Liberia, tests positive for the virus.
om: Dr. Keent Biraantilii, daayirekteerri medikaalaa Samaritaans Parsii Laayibreiyaa keessaa, qorannoo vaayirichaan poosatiivii taate.

en: Gianni Infantino, the newly-elected president of the world football's governing body, FIFA, visited Ethiopia this week.
om: Giyaanoo Infaatiinoo, pireezidaantii qaama bulchaa kubbaa miilaa adunyaa ta'ee, FIFA, torbee kana Itoophiaa daawwataniiru.

en: AACF president, Rezene Beyene, said that the annual tournament will be called the Coca-Cola Addis Ababa Cycling Tournament.
om: Pireezidaantii AACF, Rezeenee Bayyanaa dorgaa dorgeen waggaa dorgaa dorgee biskileetti Kokaa-Kollaa Addis Ababa jedhamee waamama jedhaniiru.

en: To that end, there is to be a WhatsApp Business API that will be used as a hotline with an online “chatbot”.
om: Gama sanaan, API Waatsaappii Biizinesii kan "chatboot" wajjin waltahuun akka sarara bilbilaatti tajaajilutu jira.

en: The Finance Minister hailed the signing of the cooperation framework which comes at a time when Ethiopia is undergoing a major strategic shift to embark on a transformational growth while fighting against the pandemic.
om: Ministeerri Faayinaansii yeroo Itoopiyaan utuma weerara dhukkubichaa loltuu imala guddina traanisformeeshiniif jijjiirama tarsiimoo ijoo geggeessaa jirtu caasaa waldeggersaa sun mallatteeffamuu jaje.

en: During the event, artists performed traditional dances that demonstrated the beauty of the diverse nations, nationalities and peoples of Ethiopia.
om: Yeroo qophichaa, artistoonni sirba aadaa bareedina adda addummaa saboota, sablammootaa fi ummattoota Itoopiyaa agarsiisu dhiyeessan.

en: Through Argentine Foreign Affairs Minister Jorge Faurie, the Lima Group say that "the use of force in Venezuela will be implemented when required".
om: Karaa Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Arjentiinaa Joorj Faawurii, Gareen Limaa "itti fayyadamni humnaa Venezuweellaa keessatti yeroo barbaadametti ni godhama" jedhe.

en: Oil prices reach a two-year high due to uncertainty in the Middle East most notably in Libya.
om: Gatiin boba'aa sababa tasgabbii dhabuu Giddugala Bahaa keessa jiru keessattuu kan Liibiyaa keessa jiru irraa ka'uun olka'a kan waggaa lamaa gahuu danda'a.

en: The latest event was a launch ceremony held on Wednesday for a book “Re-greening Ethiopia” co-published by Korean Forest Service and Ethiopian Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change.
om: Qophiin inni dhumaa gaafa Roobii sagantaa baniinsa kitaaba "Itoopiyaa deebisanii magariisisuu" Tajaajila Bosonaa Kooriyaa fi Ministirii Eegumsa naannoo, Bosonaa fi Jijjiirama Qilleensaan waltahuu maxxansan ture.

en: She graduated from Addis Ababa University Ale School of Fine Arts and Design in 1998.
om: Isheen bara 1998 keessa Yuunivarsitii Addis Ababaa Iskuulii Ale Faayin Aartii fi Dizaayinii irraa eebbifamte.

en: Boeing 787 aircraft are grounded worldwide over concerns about the safety of their lithium-ion batteries.
om: Xiyyaaronni Booying 787 yaaddoo waa'ee nageenya baatiriwwaan litiyem-aayoniin walqabatee guutummaa addunyaa irratti dhaabbatan.

en: Toronto's Sheraton Cadwell Orchestras closes and its management resigns following public backlash to a fat-shaming email that said only "physically fit and slim" singers would be featured in shows.
om: Oschestiraan Sheraaten Chaadwel Toroontoo muffii ummataa kan iimelii nama furdaa qaanessu kan "warra qaamaan mijatanii fi qal'aa" tahan qofatu qophiiwwan keessatti dhiyaata jedhu hordufuun dhufeen walqabatee cufame akkasumas bulchiinsi isaas hojii gadhiisan.

en: China's unmanned lunar rover Yutu shuts down after exploring the Moon for 31 months.
om: balaliin Hawaa nama-maleessi Chayinaa Yuutuun ji'oota 31f baatii abuuraa erga turteen booda cufamte.

en: Scientists from the European Space Agency and other institutions detect the presence of water vapour on Ceres.
om: Saayintistoonni ejensii hawaa Awurooppaa fi dhaabbilee gara garaa hukrii bishaanii akka seresitti argamu hubatan

en: Debenhams, one of the largest department stores in the United Kingdom which employs 25,000 people, collapses into administration.
om: Debenhaams, qajeelchi mankuusaa guddicha Yunaayitid Kiingidem keessaa tokko kan tahe kan namoota 25,000 qaxaru, bulchiinsa jalatti kufe.

en: Hadijah Nandago gave Uganda a 1-0 lead after 26 minutes before skipper Fauzia Najjemba made it 2-0 on 40 minutes when substitute goalkeeper Demelash Banchayehu failed to hold the ball.
om: Iskipper Fawuziyaan daqiiqaa 40 irratti waqtii manii-eegaan jijjiramee seene Dammallaash Banchayehu kubbaa qabuu hin dandeenyetti 2-0 gochuun dura Hadijah Nandaagoon daqiiqaa 26 booda dursa Yugaandaaf 1-0'n kennee jira.

en: Prominent Russian opposition figure Alexei Navalny registers himself to stand in September's vote for Moscow mayor.
om: Hogganaan Mormituu beekamaan Raashiyaa Aleeks Naavaaliriin filannoo Fulbaanaa kantiibaa magaalaa Mooskoof dorgomuuf galmaa'e.

en: Following treatment, a 2-year-old Mississippi girl born with the HIV/AIDS virus is pronounced to be HIV negative.
om: Yaalii fayyaa hordofuun, mucaan durbaa Msiisiippii umrii waggaa 2 vaayirasii HIV/AIDS wajjin dhalatte HIV irraa bilisa akka taate beeksifame.

en: Excessive level of water at Ethiopia’s giant hydropower dam, Gibe III, has prompted officials at Ethiopian Electric Power (EEP) to commence a controlled release of the water as of the coming week.
om: Hidha humna ibsaa guddicha Itoopiyaa Gibee III, keessatti bishaani sadarkaa humnaa olii gahe, Aangawoota Humna Ibsaa Itoopiyaa (EEP) akka isaan torban dhufaa jiru keessa bishaan to'annoo gadi lakkisuu jalqaban isaan godhe.

en: A curfew has ended in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir after 52 days of protest allowing for an all-party delegation to visit the state on Sunday.
om: Mormii guyyaa 52 booda dhorkaan naannoolee Jammuu fi kaashmiir biyya hindii keessatti argamanii qondaaltota paartii hundumaaf eyyema naannocha daawwachu kennun goolabame.

en: President Sahlework, who is also Secretary of the National HIV/AIDS Council, stated that the disease over the last 15 years has caused wide range of damages including social and economic.
om: Pirasdaant Saahleworq, barreessituu Mana maree HIV/AIDS Biyyaalessaas kan taate, dhukkubichi waggoota 15 darban keessatti miidhaa hawaasummaa fi diinagdee dabalachuun miidhaa guddaa tahe akka qaqqabsiise dubbatte.

en: Samsung Electronics agrees to buy the U.S.-based Harman International Industries for $8 billion in the biggest overseas acquisition ever by a South Korean company.
om: Elektirooniksiin Saamsung, Industiriiwwan Addunyaawaa Harman kan U.S. keessaa biliyoona $8n bituuf waliigale, kun bittaa biyyaan alaa dhaabbati Kooriyaa Kibbaa haga ammaatti godhe keessaa isa guddichadha.

en: Loza, who has joined the Malta based Football Club, Birkirkara on a one year contract a couple of months ago, is making history once again pushing her dream and international football career a step further.
om: Loozaa, Garee Kubbaa Miilaa Maltan hundaa'e Birkirkaratti kontiraataa waggaa tokkootin ji'oota lama dura kan makamte, ammas abjuu ishee dhugoomsuu fi ogummaa kubbaa miilaa internaashinaalii gara fulduraatti butuun seenaa dalagaa jirti.

en: he extraordinary spate of athletics world records in the super spikes era continued on Tuesday as Letesenbet Gidey smashed the two-day-old women’s 10,000m best, set by Sifan Hassan on Sunday, by more than five seconds.
om: Hunda-caalaan danummaan Rikoordii Atileetiksii addunyaa jarraa olaantummaa gaafa kibxataa ittti fufuun Eletesenbet Gidaay hunda caalaa 10000m dhalaa guyyaa-lama-ture mo'atte, Siifan Hasaniin Dilbata seekondii dabalataa shanii oliin qabatameera.

en: Two North Koreans are jailed in South Korea over an assassination plot on a high-ranking North Korean defector, Hwang Jang-yop.
om: Lammiiwwan Kooriyaa Kaabaa lama sababa yaalii ajjeechaa Hoogganaa Olaanaa Lammii Kooriyaa Kaabaa biyya isaa gane Hiwaang Jaang-yop'n walqabatee Kooriyaa Kibbaa keesatti hidhaman.

en: The World Health Organization says that hunger around the world has risen as a result of war and climate change.
om: akka Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa jedhutti addunyaarratti sababa waraanaa fi faalama qilleensaan walqabatee beellii babal'achuu jiraachuu ibse.

en: The University of Virginia reinstates President Teresa Sullivan after she was ousted without a formal vote earlier this month.
om: Yuunibarsitiin Virjiiniyaa Pirasdaantii Teressaa Sulliivaan kan dursa ji'a kanaa keessa filannoo seeraa malee hojiirra kaate hojiitti deebise.

en: The ministry, the federal government and Amhara regional government work together for the realization of the project that projected to cost two to three billion US dollars, he further stated.
om: Ministrichi, mootummaan federaalaa fi mootummaan naannoo Amaaraa milkaa'ina pirojektii isa dolaara US biliyoona lamaa haga sadii akka fixu tilmaamame kana waliin hojjetu, jedhe itti fufuun.

en: Speaking to The Reporter, the Amhara regional state police commissioner, Abere Adamu reaffirmed the readiness of the regional police force to go into operation in Benishagul region if the federal government is busy handling other matters.
om: Komishinariin poolisii mootummaa naannoo Amaaraa, Abberee Addaamuu, Ze Ripporteritti dubbachuun yoo mootummaan federaalaa dhimmoota biraa keessumeessuutti kan qabamu tahe humni addaa poolisii naannichaa naannoo Benishaangul keessatti opireeshinii geggeesuuf qophaa'aa akka tahe mirkaneesse.

en: U.S. President Joe Biden signs a law that would make Juneteenth a federal holiday, thereby making it the first federal holiday since the 1983 establishment of Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
om: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Joo Baayiden erga hundeeffama Guyyaa Maartin Luuter Kiing Jr. isa 1983 tii guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa isa jalqabaa kan isa godhu seera Juuntiinth guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa godhu mallatteesse.

en: Chinese author Mo Yan, famous for working in the style of writing known as hallucinatory realism, wins the Nobel Prize in Literature.
om: Barreessaan lammii chaayinaa gosa barreeffamaa 'hilluusinatarii riyaalizim' jedhamu barreessuun beekamu Moo Yan badhaasa Noobelii ogbarruun enjifate.

en: Pro-Palestinian protesters storm the Queensway tunnel in the United Kingdom, disrupting traffic.
om: Hirmaattonni hiriira deeggartoota Palastaayinii ujummoo daandii Kuwwiins wey Yunaaytid Kiingidam keessatti argamu weeraruun sochii konkolaattotaa daangessan.

en: The project is to be in the Amhara and Oromia Regional States and will place Canada’s foreign agenda of feminism at forefront and will look at gender discrimination in areas of early and forced child marriage, female genital mutilation, and early pregnancy.
om: Pirojektichi Mootummoota Naannoo Oromiyaa fi Amaaraa keessatti taha akkasumas ajandaa dhimma alaa Kanaadaa mirga dubartoota dursa kan kennuu fi qoqqooddii saalaa umrii ijoollummaa fi heeruma ijoollee dirqamaan tahu, dhaqna qabaa dubartootaa, fi ulfa ijoollummaa ni ilaala.

en: President Barack Obama reveals he talked with Iranian President Hassan Rouhani, marking the first time leaders from the U.S. and Iran have directly communicated since the Iranian revolution.
om: Pirasdaantiin Yuunaayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan, erga warraaqsa Iraanii as geggeessitoonni U.S. fi Iraan kallattiidhaan yeroo jalqabaaf haasa'uu kan mul'isu akka Pirasdaantii Iraan Hasan Rohaanii wajjin haasa'e ifoomse

en: Genale-Dawa III hydropower project, which generates 254 MW, was inaugurated by Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed this week.
om: Pirojektii humna-bishaanii Gannaalee-Daawaa III, kana 254 MW maddisiisu, torbee kana Muummeecha Ministeeraa Abiy Ahimediin eebbifame.

en: The West African nation is forecast to grow at 8.3% as against Ethiopia’s 8.2%.
om: Biyyi dhiha Afiiriikaa 8.2% Itoophiyaa waliin wal bira yeroo qabamuu 8.3%'n akka guuddattu raagameera.

en: Pakistani villagers find 13 bodies with bullet wounds in the Federally Administered Tribal Areas near Afghanistan as security forces step up an offensive.
om: Jiraattonni ganda baadiyyaa Paakistaan dhiyeenya Afgaanistaanitti kan argamtu, naannawaa uummata gosaa kan federaalaan bultutti reeffa 13 kan madaa rasaasaa qabu oggaa humnoonni nageenyaa humnaan dhiiban arganiiru.

en: Inferior quality salt with low content of iodine produced traditionally in the Afar Regional State is flooding the local market, it was learnt.
om: Soogiddi qulqullina gada aanaa qabu kan qabiyyee ayoodinii xiqqaa gabu karaa aadaan Mootummaa Naannoo Affaar keessatti gabaa naannoo guutaa akka jiru barame.

en: Every square inch of the United States is forecasted to have hotter-than-normal temperatures for the first time in recorded history.
om: Tokkoon tokkon bal'inni gogaa yunaytid Isteetis safara ho'aa caalaa seenaa keessatti yeroo jalqabaatif akka galmeesisu tilmamame.

en: President Sahle-Work Zewde has been selected as one of the World’s Most Powerful Women of 2019 by Forbes.
om: Pirasdaant Saahile-Warq Zawudee Forbisiin bara 2019 keessa Dubartoota Baayyee Cimoo Addunyaa bara 2019 tahun filataman.

en: According to EBC, more than 22 Ethiopian experts are taking part in the anti-doping tests.
om: Akka EBD'tti, ogeessotni Itoophiyaa 22 ol ta'an qorannoo farra qoricha nama jabeessuu irratti hirmaataa jiru.

en: A new infection of the Zika virus spreads to the Philippines.
om: Infeekshiniin Vaayirasii Ziikaa gosaan haaraa ta'e gara Filippiinsitti babal'ate.

en: The Solar Impulse, a solar plane, lands in Morocco, completing the world's first intercontinental flight powered by the Sun.
om: Xiyaarri humna aduu irra elektirikii maddisiisu fi xiyyaarri aduu balaliisa ardiilessa isa jalqabaa xumuruun boodaa Morookoo keessatti qubatee jira.

en: Canada's Chief of the Defence Staff General Jonathan Vance announces that some of its military personnel in Iraq will be moved to neighboring Kuwait over safety reasons.
om: Ajajaan waliigalaa humna waraanaa Kaanaadaa Jeneraal Joonaattaan Vaansee sababa sodaa nageenyaan loltoonni isaa Iraaq keessaa tokko tokko gara biyya ollaa Kuweet akka deeman beeksise.

en: Light rainfall less than 30mm is expected over parts of northern and southern Somalia, western Kenya, parts of western Rwanda, much of Uganda, eastern South Sudan, southern Sudan, and eastern Ethiopia.
om: Rooba salphaan 30mm gadi ta'e kutaalee kaabaa fi kibba Somaaliyaa, dhiha Keeniyaa, kutaalee dhiha Ruwaandaa, kutaalee Yugaandaa gara caalu, baha Sudaan Kibbaa, kibba Sudaan fi baha Itoophiyaatti ni eegama.

en: The Ministry of Trade has disclosed that it has planned to gain about 1.2 billion birr from the export of oilseeds and pulses this year.
om: Ministeerri Daldalaa bara kanatti midhaan zaayitaa fi boloqqee alatti erguu irraa qarshii biliyoona 1.2 argachuuf akka karoorse ifoomse.

en: Ashenda is a unique religious and traditional festival celebrated every year in Tigray and Amhara Regional States between 16 to 21 August.
om: Ashendaan ayyaana addaa amantii fi aadaaa waggaa waggaan Mootummoota Naannoo Tigiraayii fi Amaaraa keessatti Hagayya 16 fi 21 gidduutti kabajamudha.

en: Cuba starts releasing political prisoners as part of an historic agreement with the United States announced last month.
om: Kiyuubaan akka waliigaltee seena qabeessa Yunaayitid Iseetis wajjin godhame kan ji'a darbe beeksisametti hidhamtoota siyaasaa hiikuu eegakte.

en: The addition of Habesha Petroleum, JR-Petroleum Plc, Kernel Oil Trading Plc and Kalub Oil Ethiopia, pushed the total number of oil retail companies in the country to 22.
om: Ida'amni Peetirooliyeemii Habashaa, Petirooliyeemii-JR IKM, Dhaabbata dhuunfaa daldala boba'aa Kernel fi Boba'aa Kaalub Itoophiyaa lakkoofsa walii galaa dhaabbilee raabsaa boba'aa biyyaatti gara 22 buteera.

en: A Tunisian protester who set himself alight in unrest that sparked further protests across the country dies of his injuries.
om: Mormaan lammii Tuuniziyaa kan jeequmsa biyyattii guutummaa keessatti babal'ate irratti ibidda ofitti qabsiise miidhama isa irra gaheen lubbuun isaa dabarte.

en: A major holiday celebration and military parade is held in Washington, D.C., United States, by President Donald Trump to commemorate the Fourth of July/Independence Day.
om: Pirezidantii Donaald Tiraampiidhaan Adoolessa Afur/guyyaa walabummaa yaadachuf yuunaytid isteet, waashingitan diisiitti kabajni guyyaa ayyaanaa fi agarsiisni waraana ta'eera

en: The loan agreements in question are signed recently with the Chinese Export-Import (EXIM) Bank, which agreed to avail an aggregate outlay of USD 332.7 million for a highway road construction and power transmission projects envisaged to relieve the traffic congestions as well the fluctuating electric power supply in parts of Addis Ababa.
om: Waliigalteen liqaa gaaffii keessa jiru dhiyeenya Baankii Eksipoort- Impoort (EXIM) Chaayinaa wajjin kan mallatteeffame, kan hamma maallaqaa waliigalaa miliyoona USD 332.7 ijaarsa daansii saffisaa fi pirojektoota daddabarsa humna ibsaa kan walitti heddumachuu tiraafikaa akkasumas ciccituu dhiyeessii humna ibsaa kutaalee Addis Ababaa keessaa furuuf yaadame dhiyeessuuf.

en: Many Oromo activists are being held at the Qilinto facility, according to pro-opposition media.
om: Sirni Itoopiyaa federaalizimii sabummaa yeroo hunda namoota siyaasaa gara yaada duriitti deebi'uu dhiyeessaniin balaa irra buhuuf deema.

en: Wells Fargo of the United States becomes the world's largest bank by market capitalisation, replacing the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China amid an economic slowdown in China.
om: Weels Fargoon Yuunaayitid Isteetis, gadi bu'uu diinagdee Chaayinaa keessaa hordofuun Baankii Industirii fi Daldalaa Chaayinaa bakka bu'uun, gabaaf kaappitaala dhiyeessuudhan baankii guddicha addunyaa ta'e.

en: A spokesman for the Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurant chain reveals that hackers stole customer payment data from most of their stores over a span of three weeks starting from the end of March.
om: Dubbi himaan mana nyaataa Meeksiikoo chipootil Giriil akka ifoomsetti Haakeroonni dhuma ji'a bitootessaa irraa eegalee torban sadiif kuusaalee isaanii hedduu irraa seenaan kaffaltii mallaqa maamiltoota isaanii akka jala hatame ibse.

en: CAF announced that three countries – Ethiopia, Equatorial Guinea and Morocco – have requested to replace Kenya as host countries.
om: CAF biyyoonni sadii - Itoophiyaa, Ekuwaatoriyaal Giinii fi Moorookoon - keeniyaa akka biyya qopheesitootti bakka bu'uuf gaafachuu isaani beeksise.

en: Advertiser accuses Facebook of fraud after discovering that 80% of the clicks they're paying for are from bots, and not actual potential customers.
om: Beeksifataan erga cuqaasni inni kanfaluuf 80% boots irraa tahuu fi maammiloota dhugaa kan ta'uu malan irraa akka hin taane erga hubatee booda hannaan Feesbuukiin himate.

en: A second case of Legionnaires' Disease in less than a week is confirmed in Australia, leading to fears of a possible outbreak of the rare disease.
om: Namni Dhukkuba Leiyooneeriin qabame lammaffaan yeroo torban tokko hin geenye keessatti Awustiraaliyaa keessatti gabaasamuun, weerarri dhibee yeroo baayyee hin argamne mudachuu akka malu sodaa uume.

en: Former Zimbabwe finance minister Ignatius Chombo, who was arrested during Operation Restore Legacy, is charged in Harare Magistrate’s Court with three counts of fraud, abuse of power, and corruption.
om: Ministeerri Galiiwwanii Zimbaabuwee duraanii Iginaatiyoos Choomboo yeroo duula Duudha deebisu keessa kan To'atamanii turan yakkoota sadeen, burjaajessu,aangoo seeraan ala fayyadamuu fi malaammaltummaadhaan Hararee mana murtii Magistraatesitti himataman.

en: “I’m very happy to set a world indoor record. I have been training really hard and I set myself a target to break the world indoor record,” Gudaf Tsegay told the World Athletics website.
om: "ikoordii dorgommii mana keessa adunyaa fudhachuukoof hedduun gammadee jira. Ciminaan shaakalaan ture fi ofiikoo rikoordii dorgomii mana keessa adunyaa cabsuuf of qopheessan ture," jechuun Gudaaf Teggay toora marsariitii Atileetiksii Adunyaatti himteetti.

en: The PM told the house that the federal government has also identified the ringleaders, and vowed to bring them to justice.
om: MM'chaa mootummaan federaakaa qindeessitoota yakkichaa adda baasuu isaa fi seeratii akka isaaan dhiyeessu mana marichaatti hime.

en: Sky Sports presenter Richard Keys resigns following his comments about female referee Sian Massey.
om: Dhiyeessaan Iskaayi Ispoortii Richaard Kiis yaada isaa waa'ee taphachiistuu (referee) Siyaan Maasey kenne hordofuun hojii gadi dhiise.

en: As the trapeze artist swung from a hanging horizontal bar, the crowd gasped, held their breath as she flew up into the air and collectively exhaled once she landed safely on the ground.
om: Akkuma artistiin tiraapizii sibiila dalga rarra'e irra asii fi achi socho'u, hordoftoonni hafuura qabachuun, akkuma isheen qilleensa irra balaliituun hafuura isaanii qabachuun erga isheen nagaan lafa qubattee walduukaa hafuura baafatan.

en: The World Meteorological Organisation reports that the ozone layer is damaged to its worst extent ever in the Arctic.
om: Dhaabbanni Meetiroolojii Addunyaa baqqaanni oozonii Arkiitik keessatti gara sadarkaa isa hamaa haga ammaatti akka miidhame gabaase.

en: The Oxford English Dictionary confirms that it will change the definition of the word "marriage" to include the LGBT community.
om: Galmeen Jechoota Ingiliffaa Oksifoord hawaasa LGBT itti dabaluuf hiika jecha "gaa'ila" jedhuu akka jijjiiru mirkaneesse.

en: A mass funeral is held near the southern Italian town of Pozzuoli for the 38 victims of Sunday's bus crash.
om: Magaalaa kibba Xaaliyaanii Poozuulii keessatti namoota 38 kufuu baasii Dilbataan walqabatee du'aniif sirni awwaalcha jumlaa godhame.

en: Google is being sued over alleged inequality in the pay of male and female employees.
om: Guugiliin himannaa walcaalmaa kanfaltii hojjetoota dhalaa fi dhiiraa gidduu jiruuf himatame.

en: Several major internet companies and activist groups post messages defending net neutrality.
om: Dhaabbileen toora marsariitii hedduu fi gurmuun xinxaltootaa hinbaabsawummaa walii galaa deeggaruun ergaawwan ni dhoobu.

en: Ninety-four people die, and 45 others are hospitalized, after drinking moonshine in Mumbai (Bombay), India.
om: Mumbaayi (Bombay), Hindii keessatti erga muunshine dhuganii booda namoonni sagaltamii afur du'anii, 45 kan biroon ammoo hospitaala seenan.

en: Two hundred thousand people flee the Sri Lankan capital Colombo as floods caused by several days of heavy rain worsen.
om: Akkuma lolaan rooba ulfaataa guyyoota muraasaan dhufe hammaateen namoonni kuma dhibba lama ta'an magaalaa guddoo Siri Laankaa Koloomboo gadhiisanii baqatan.

en: To date some 1,785,132 sample tests have been conducted, 109,846 COVID-19 patients recovered and 231 patients are currently in severe condition.
om: Hanga ammaatti naamunaan qorannoo 1,785,132 godhameera, dhukkabsattoonni COVID-19 109,876 dhibee isaanii irraa foyya'aniiru akkasumas dhukkubsattoonni 231 haala yaaddessaa keessa jiru.

en: He died a week after he (through his daughter-in-law) received an honorary Doctoral Degree from Unity University – a recognition that is believed to be too little too late by many.
om: Digirii Doktireetii kabajaa Yunivarsitii Yunitii irraa fudhatee(karaa sayyuu isaa) torbee booda lubbuunn darbbe - beekamtii namoota hedduudhan xiqqoo haalaan barfate jedhamee amaname.

en: This concert focused on having a mini festival in introducing the best album, best singles and also best DJs in the country.
om: Konsertiin kun festivaala xiqqaa biyyattii keessatti albemii baayyee gaarii tahe, qeenxeewwan bareedoo fi DJ wwan baayyee gaarii tahan beeksisu qabaachuu irratti xiyyeeffate.

en: The tournament also doubles as the African qualifiers to the 2019 Women FIFA World cup.
om: Dorgommiin taphichaa akkuma dorgomtoota Afrikaa Geeba Addunyaa Dubartootaa FIFA 2019'f darbanii ni dabalama.

en: A suspected U.S. drone fired missiles at a house in northwestern Pakistan in Khushali, a village near Mir Ali, killing four people.
om: Diroonin kan Ameerika ta'uun ishee shakkame misaayela mana jireenyaa kaabaa-dhiha Paakistan kan dhiyeenya Miir Alii taate kushaaliitti argamu irratti dhukeestetti, namoonni afuris du'aniiru.

en: The United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom impose sanctions against Belarus for last month's diverting of Ryanair Flight 4978, which led to the arrest of journalist Roman Protasevich.
om: Yunaayitid Isteetis, Kanaadaa, fi Yunaayitid Kiingidem karaa irraa jal'isuu Balalii Riyaanee'ir 4978 kan hidhamuu gaazexeessaa Roomaan Pirootaasevichiitti geesse hordofuun Belaarus irra qoqqobbii kaa'an.

en: The sport betting company agreed to pay six million birr for this season.
om: Dhaabbatni tilmaama tapha Ispoortii kun marsaa kanaaf miliyoona jaha kaffaluuf waliigaleera.

en: Ireland upgrades its relations with Palestine to a diplomatic mission, short of recognition, though the Palestinian representative is now officially an ambassador.
om: Yoodhuma bakka bu'aa Filisxeem ifaan ambasaadara godhameyyuu, Aayirlaand hariiroo ishee Filisxeem waliiinii gara ergama dippiloomaasii, kan beekamtii gahaa hin argatinitti olguddiste.

en: Speaking to ENA, Commercial Bank of Ethiopia CEO, Abie Sano said the visit of 1 million Ethiopian Diaspora is a good news to the bank and the bank is making preparations to further develop packages and refresh services.
om: ENA'tti dubbachuun, Hojii-gaggeessaa Olaanaan Baankii Daldala Itoophiyaa, Abii Saanoon daawwannaan Diyaaspooraa Itoophiyaa miliyoona 1 baankichaaf oduu gaarii fi baankichis tajaajiloota kuufamaa fi haaromsaa dabalataan dhiyeessuuf qophii irraa jira jedhaniiru.

en: Thousands of supporters of former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra gather outside the home of a royal adviser accused of involvement in the 2006 coup that ousted the Prime Minister.
om: Deeggartootni muummicha ministeeraa duraanii Taay Taaksiin Shinaawaatiraa mana gorsaa mootummaa mormii 2006 ministeera muummichaa teessoo gad lakkisiise irratti hirmaachuun himatamee duratti walitti qabaman.

en: Apple Inc. and Google remove TikTok from their app stores in India after a high court in Madras ruled the app could expose children to sexual content and cyberbullying.
