om: Aappil Inc. fi Guugil erga manni murtii olaanaa Maadras keessaa aappiin Tiktok ijoollee qabiyyee saal-quunnamtii fi arrabsoo karaa interneetaan godhamuuf saaxila jedhee murteessee booda kuusaa aappii isaanii Hindii keessaa irraa aappicha balleessan.

en: The South African National Football team has arrived in Bahir Dar for FIFA 2022 World Cup Qualifiers match they have tomorrow with their Ethiopian counterpart.
om: Gareen biyyalessaa kubbaa miilaa Afrikaa kibbaa tapha calallii waancaa addunyaa FIFA 2022 Gita isaanii Itoophiyaa waliin qaban irratti boru hirmachuuf Baahirdaaar seenan.

en: The premier highlighted in a statement posted on his Face-Book page on Sunday that with the launch of this year’s Green Legacy, “let us not think that the government is asking citizens to throw caution to the wind.”
om: Pirimiyeerin yaada fuula Face-Book isaa irratti jalqabbii Ashaaraa Magariisaa barichaa irratti Dilbata maxxanse irratti," kottaa mootummaan of eegannoo gara qilleensaatti erga jira jennee hin yaadnu" jedheera

en: Azerbaijan rejects a claim by Iran that it has been helping Israeli spies in the killing of an Iranian nuclear scientist.
om: Azerbaajiyaan himannaa isa Iraan ajjeechaa saayintistii niwukileeraa ishee keessatti basaastota Isiraa'el gargaaraa turte jedhu mormite.

en: Twitter alters technology to enable country-specific censorship of messages.
om: Tiwiteerin mireeffannaa ergaawwan biyya irratti xiyyeeffataniitiif tekinooloojii jijjiireera.

en: Nigel Evans resigns as Deputy Speaker of the British House of Commons after being charged with eight sexual offences.
om: Naayijel Evaans erga badiiwwan walqunnamtii saalaan walqabatan saddeetiin himataniin booda hojii isaanii itti aanaa Af-yaa'ii mana maree Biriteen irraa gadilakkisan.

en: Tefera pointed out that substantial amount of land has been covered with watersheds, to protect flood, land degradation and soil erosion, which as a result increased agricultural productivity.
om: Lafti hedduun daagaadhaan uwwifamuu isaa Tafarra heereera, lola ittisuuf, dhiqama biyyee fi sigiga lafa ittisuuf, kunis omishtummaa qonnaa kan dabaleedha.

en: Mashhad in northeastern Iran was officially named the capital of the Islamic culture in 2017 by the ISESCO.
om: Kaaba baha Iraanitti kan argamtu Mashaad bara 2017 tti magaalaa guddoo aadaa Islaamaa jedhamuun ISESCO 'dhaan moggaafamte.

en: Kosovo's parliament unanimously approves deploying the Kosovo Security Force on international peacekeeping missions, following a formal request by the United States Central Command.
om: Paarlaamaan Kosoovoo gaaffii karaa seera qabeessa Ajaji Giddugaleessaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis dhiyeesse hordofuun Humna Nageenyaa Kosoovoo ergama naga eegdummaa addunyaaf akka bobba'an mirkaneessan.

en: The plant in Ethiopia is to manufacture garments for the company’s brand name customers from Europe, while the US facility is to supply knitted fabrics and garments to customers in the US, the firm said.
om: Iddoon oomishaa Itoophiyaa huccuuwwan maqaa dhaabbatichaa qaban maamiltoota Awurooppaatif yeroo dhiyeessu, iddoon oomishaa Ameerikaa immoo kafanawwan qophaa'anii fi huccuulee maamiltoota Ameerikaatiif akka dhiyeessu dhaabitichi dubbateera.

en: ISIL militants cut off the Syrian Army's main supply route to the city of Aleppo and capture the village of Khanasir, according to the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights.
om: Akka taajjabaan mirgoota dhala namoomaa Siiriyaa gabaasetti gareen ISIL daandii daddabarsa meeshaalee loltuu Siiriyaa gara magaalaa Aleeppoo geessu guddicha adda kutuudhaan ganda badiyyaa Kaanasir to'ataniiru.

en: According to Abayneh, this time, the zonal administration livestock and fishery office is finalizing all the necessary preconditions to relocate people who live in the surrounding areas to other places.
om: Akka Abbayineetti, yeroo kana, bulchiinsi waajjira horsiisa horii fi qurxummii qabuu godinaa uummata naannocha jiran bakkeewwan biraatti qubachiisuf tilmaamawwan barbachisoo hunda xumuraa jira.

en: Inhabitants around the recently inaugurated Genale-Dawa III Hydro-power said the project has opened immense opportunity for them, besides benefiting the country.
om: Jiraattonni naannoo humna-bishaanii Gannaalee-Daawaa III dhiyeenya eebbifamee pirojektichi carraa addaa akka isaanif bane, biyyatti fayyaduun biratti jedhaniiru.

en: 11 circus troupes from across the continent joined the festival to showcase their works.
om: Gareen sarkasii 11 guutuummaa ardichaa irraa hojii isaanii agarsiisuuf festivaalicha irratti hirmaataniiru.

en: The LG-KOICA HOPE TVET College has graduated 51 students in 3rd and 4th levels on Saturday.
om: Kolleejjiin LG-KOICA HOPE TVET barattoota 52 sadarkaa 3ffaa fi 4ffaan gaafa Sanbataa eebbisiise.

en: Walgreens and CVS ask customers not to bring guns into their stores in response to several deadly mass shootings last month.
om: Sababa dhukaasa hamaa nama heedduutti godhamu muraasa ji'a darbe keessa godhameef Walgriinsii fi CVS maammiltoonni qawwee baatanii akka gara kuusaawwan isaanii hin dhufne gaafatan.

en: The versatile artist who is highly drawn about three dimensional forms has been initially experimenting with materials such as gypsum and cement to create sculptures.
om: Artistiin versataayilii kan waa'ee bocawwan daayimeenshinii sadiin hedduminaan kaasu duratti bocawwan uumuuf meeshaalee akka jiipsamii fi simmintoon shaakalaa tureera.

en: File sharing site Pirate Bay returns online after having been shut down by Swedish authorities in December 2014.
om: Marsariitiin faayila qoodu Paayiret Beeyii'n erga Mudde 2014 keessa aangawoota Iswiidiniin cufamee booda gara sarara irraatti deebi'e.

en: The annual Innovation Africa Digital Summit that focuses on accelerating national ICT agendas, supporting African countries as they look to improve ICT maturity rankings, and laying foundations for achieving Sustainable Development Goals is underway here in Addis Ababa.
om: Walga'iin Dijitaalaa kalaqa Afiriikaa wagga waggaan adeemsifamu kan dhimmoota ICT biyyooleessa saffisiisuu, biyyoota Afiriikaa sadarkaa ga'oominaa ICT foyyeessuuf yaalan deeggaruu, fi dhagaa bu'uuraa guddina walitti fufaa fiduu irratti xiyyeefatu as Finfinneetti adeemsifamaa jira.

en: Taliban insurgents seize control of the strategic town of Sangin in the southern Helmand Province after a year-long battle with Afghan security forces.
om: Loltoonni Taalibaan humna nageenyaa Afgaan waliin lola dheeraa wagga tokko fudhate erga taasisaniin booda ,magaalaa giddun gala imaammataa taate Saangiin kan bulchiinsa kibba Heelmand keessatti aragamtu qabataniiru.

en: A surfer is killed by a shark off near Wedge Island, about 160km (100 miles) north of Perth in Australia.
om: Namni bishaan irra bololi'u tokko Odola Wiidji cina, kaaba Peerz irraa gara 160km (maayila 100) Awustiraaliyaa keessatti Shaarkiin ajjeefame.

en: After visiting the Lalibel Rock-hewn churches on Tuesday, President Macron had pledged to give technical and financial support for the renovation of the churches.
om: Pirasdaant Maakiroon, gaafa Kibxataa bataskaanota Rook-hewaan Laallibalaa erga daawwatanii booda, bataskaanota sana haaressuuf deggersa teekinikaa fi faayinaansii akka kennan waadaa galan.

en: Iranian women post videos of themselves dancing to protest the arrest of Instagram blogger Maedeh Hojabri.
om: Dubartoonni Iraan to'atamuu Biloogera Instaagiraamii Maadeh Hijaabri mormuudhaan Suursagalee waraabbii shubbisa ofii isaanii gadi lakkisan.

en: Researchers report that fishing rates in the Arctic are 75 times higher than those reported by the U.N., suggesting future increased exploitation is less possible than previously thought.
om: Qorattootni reeshoon qurxummii qabuu Arkitik irratti kanneen U.N'n gabaafame harka 75 caala jedhaniiru, olkaa'insi saamicha gara fuulduraatti hanga yaadameen gad ta'uu akka danda'us ibsan.

en: Tourism Ethiopia Director, Sileshi Girma told The Ethiopian Herald that they have identified 50 potential sites for investment in the coming 10 years in the tourism industry.
om: Daayirekterri Tuurizim Itoophiyaa, Silashii Girmaa bakkeewwan mijaawoo ta'an 50 investimentiif waggaa 10 dhufan keessatti industirii tuurizimii keessatti akka adda argatan Tajaajila Oduu Itoophiyaatti himaniiru.

en: Dangote Cement opens a new line of production at its Obajana facility in the Kogi State, making the plant the largest in Sub-Sahara Africa and one of the largest in the world.
om: Simmintoon Daangotee sarara oomishaa haaraa dhaabbata isaa Obajaanaa kan Isteetii Koogii keessa jiru keessatti bane, warshicha warshaa isa guddicha Sab-Saaharaa Afrikaa akkasumas gurguddoo addunyaa keessaa isa tokko gochuudhaan.

en: At the opening ceremony, Minister of Environment and Forestry Belete Tafere said strong institutional work was necessary to benefit from forest resources and the institute would play a pivotal role in sustaining the continued building of the green economy for which the country has gained recognition internationally.
om: Sirna baniinsa qophichaa irratti, Ministeerri Eegumsa Naannoo fi Bosonaa Bellexee Taafferee qabeenya bosonaa irraa fayyadamuuf hojiin inistiitiyuuti cimaan barbaachisaadha akkasumas inistiyuutichi ijaarsa diinagdee magariisa biyyattiin ittiin addunyaa irratti beekamtii argatte itti fufsiisuuf gahee olaanaa jedhe.

en: “I was not fully convinced with the results until I tried my hand on clay. I must say it was love at first touch. Clay is a material that speaks to me. I am able to express my ideas, emotions and thoughts through it,” read the artist’s statement
om: "Hagan harka koo suphee sana irra ka'adhutti itti bahiinaan guutummaatti of hin amansiifne. Tuqaatii jalqabaatiin jaalala akka ture dubbachuun qaba. Supheen meeshaa natti dubbatuudha. Yaadota, miirawwanii fi yaaddookoo ittiin ibsachuu nan danda'a" jedha ibsi artistittii.

en: They chose Lij Michael as their debut concert since his album entitled “Zare Yihun Nege” was well accepted among fans.
om: Isaan albemiin isaa "Zaaree Yihun Nagee" jedhamu hordoftoota biratti akka gaariitti waan fudhatameef Lij Mikaa'eliin akka ijoo konsertii isaaniitti filatan

en: The Bank of Japan announces a 6 trillion yen stimulus package to help invigorate the Japanese economy.
om: Baankiin Jaappaan diinagdee Jaappaan jabeessuuf akka gargaaruuf sagantaa kakaaastuu yeenii tiriliyoona 6 beeksise.

en: In her opening remark, Dr Lia Tadesse, State Minister of Health, noted that TB is one of the priority diseases closely supported in the Ministry of Health and the MoH continues to work very closely with partners, private sectors, civic societies, universities and other important stakeholders in order to identify missed TB cases, abort TB transmission to familiies, and public as well.
om: Haasaa saqiinsaa isheetiin, Dr Liyaa Taadesee, Ministeerri Ministeera Fayyaa, TB'n dhukkuboota Ministeerri Fayyaa itti dhiyeenyaan hordofuu keessaa tokkoo fi Ministeerri Fayyaa itti dhiyeenyaan miiltoowwan, sekteroota dhuunfaa, hawaasaa siivikii, Yuniversitoota fi qooda-fudhattoota murteessoo biroo waliin dhukkuba TB qaqqabbii dhaban argachuuf, maatii fi hawaasatti TB daddabarsuu ittisuuf ni hojjeta jedhaniiru.

en: UNESCO declares the Rizal Monument in Manila, Machu Picchu of Peru, Camino de Santiago of Spain, and the Dampier Archipelago of Australia as World Heritage Sites in Danger.
om: UNESCO'n siidaa Riizaa Maanillaa keessaa, Maachu Pichuu Peeruu, Kamiinoo de Santiyaagoo Ispeenii fi Dampiyeer Arkipelaagoo Awustiraaliyaa akka Bakkeewwan Seena-qabeessa Addunyaa Balaa irra jiranitti labse.

en: Authorities seek three men after they rob $6 million on New Year's Eve from the offices of high-end jewelry designer Gregg Ruth in New York City.
om: Niwuyoork keessatti waajjira Dizaaynerii meeeshaale faayaa olaanaa kan ta'e Greeg Ruuts keessaa gaafa jala bultii waggaa haaraa saamicha Doolaara Milliyoona 6 raawwatameen qaamoleen seeraa yakkamtoota sadii barbaadaa jira.

en: More than 150 elite athletes are undergoing the two-day tests being done in partnership with world athletics integrity unit, it said.
om: Atileetotni gameeyyin 150 ol ta'an qoranno guyyaa lamaa michummaa yuunitii amanamummaa atileetiksii adunyaa waliin gaggeeffamaa jiru irratti hirmaataa jiru, jedhameera.

en: President of the Ethiopian Olympic Committee (EOC), Ashebir Woldegiorgis (MD), announced that kenenisa Bekele will represent Ethiopia and compete in the coming Tokyo Olympics, scheduled to be held from July 23 to August 8, 2021.
om: Pireezidaantiin koree olompikii Itiyoophiyaa (EOC) Ashabbir waldagiyoorgis (MD) Qananiisaa Baqqalaa Olompikii Tookiyoo Adoolessa 23 hanga Hagayya 8, 2021tti gaggeeffamuuf saganteeffame irratti Itoophiyaa bakka bu'uun akka hirmaatu beeksisan.

en: There, they were studied by Daniela Eugenia Rosso of the University of Barcelona in Spain and Francesco d'Errico and Alain Queffelec of the University of Bordeaux in France.
om: Achitti, Daani'eella Iyugeniyaa Rossoo isa Yunivarsitii Barseloonaa Ispeen keessaa irrraa fi Firaanseskoo d'Erikko fi Aleeyin Kuwifelekii Yuunivarsitii Bordeks Faransaayi keessaan qoratamaa turan.

en: The Federal High Court fifteen criminal bench has postponed its ruling on corruption charges involving former intelligence Chief Woldesilassie Woldemichael.
om: Mana murtii Olaanaan Federaalaa dhaddachaa yakkaa kudha shanaffaan himata malamaltummaa dura-bu'aa basaasaa duraanii Waldasillaasee Waldamikaa'el dabalatee jiru dabarse.

en: One of five Hong Kong booksellers who disappeared in 2015 says he was forced by Chinese agents into a confession of "illegal trading".
om: bara 2015 keessa kan achi buuteen isa dhabamee tureefii Hong koong keessatti namoota kitaabaa gurguran shanan keessa tokko namni ta'e akka jedhutti qaamolee motummaaf hojjetan akka inni ''daldala seeraan alaa'' raawwachaa jirutti humnaan akka amanu taasisuu isaani dubbate.

en: At least two people are killed in attacks on bars in northern Kenya near the border with Somalia, with Islamist al-Shabaab militants possibly responsible.
om: Yoo xiqqaate namoonnni lama haleellaa manneen dhugaatii kaaba keeniyaa naannoo daangaa somaaliyaatti ta'een ajjeefamaniiru, kanaafis hidhatootni garee Isilaamawaa alshabaab shakkamu danda'u.

en: President of the Ethiopian Islamic Affairs Supreme Council, Mufti Omer Idris in his goodwill message of the celebration of Mewlid urged the Muslim community to enhance their support to people who are affected by natural and manmade problems in the country.
om: Pirasdaantiin Mana Maree Waliigalaa Dhimmoota Islaamaa, Muftii Omar Idiris ergaa hawwii gaarii isaanii kabaja ayyaana Mewlid irratti hawaasi Musliimaa namoota biyyattii keessatti rakkoowwan uumamaa fi namtolcheen miidhamaniif deggersa isaanii akka fooyyessan yaadachiisan.

en: In addition, the new partnership is to have a number of components, including supporting health practitioners for access to information, supporting fundraisers, removing harmful information that it deems is wrong.
om: Dabalataan, michummaa inni haaraan hojjetoonni fayyaa odeeffannoo akka argatan deggeruu, deggersa maallaqa waliitti qabuu, odeeffannoo hamoo soba taha balleessuu dabalatee qabiyyeewwan baayyee qaba.

en: He says the audience is yet to find its test in terms of street performance.
om: Gama agarsiisa daandii irratti hirmaattonni battallee isaanii arguuf jiru jedha.

en: Inside the largest circus tent to ever be erected in the country, the lights dimmed to welcome the South African troupe Zip Zap.
om: Dunkaana sarkasii guddicha biyyattii keessatti dhaabachuuf deemu keessatti, ibsaan garee weellistoota Afrikaa Kibbaa Zip Zaap simatu dimimmisaa'e.

en: Cambodian health officials identify Enterovirus 71 as a possible cause for an outbreak in which at least 64 children have died.
om: Aangawoonni fayyaa Kaamboodiyaa Intrirovaayiras 71'n sababa weeraraa kan yoo xiqqaate ijoolleen 64 itti du'anii akka tahuu danda'u adda baasan.

en: USAID’s Health Financing Improvement Program builds upon the successes of earlier investments like USAID’s community-based health insurance initiative, which currently provides medical coverage to nearly 20 million Ethiopians nationwide.
om: Sagantaan Fooyya'iinsa Deeggarsa Maallaqa Fayyaa USAID milkaa'ina investimentoota duraanii kanneen akka inshuraansii fayyaa hawaasa irra xiyyeefatee USAID irratti hundaa'e, yeroo ammatti tajaajila fayyaa lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa miliyoona 20tti siqatuuf ni dhiyeessa.

en: Letesenbet smashed the world record at the Valencia Half Marathon Trinidad Alfonso EDP, clocking 1:02:52 on her debut at the distance at the World Athletics Elite Label road race on Sunday.
om: Letesanbat rikoordii adunyaa dorgommii walakkaa Maaraatonii Vaalenshiyaa Tiriindaad Alfoonsoo EDPtti, galmee 1:02:52 jalqaba ishee irratti fageenya Atileetiksii figicha karaa irraa Ilaayit Label Sanbataa galmeessun cabsiteetti.

en: Research published in JAMA Internal Medicine describes that mothers should wait at least a year between giving birth and getting pregnant again to reduce health risks to mother and baby.
om: Qorannoon JAMA Internal Mediisinii keessatti maxxansame balaa fayyaa haadhaa fi daa'imatti dhufu hir'isuuf haadholiin ijoollee godhachuu gidduutti yoo xiqqaate waggaa tokko eeganii deebiyanii ulfaa'uu akka qaban ibse.

en: The award was given as symbol of their unwavering commitments towards promoting peace and unity in their localities and the country at large.
om: Badhaasichi naannoo isaaniittii fi akka biyya bal'aatti nagaa buusuuf kaka'umsa isaanii hin qusatamneef akka mallattootti kenname.

en: Especially his single “Zemenay Marye” was able to capture audience ears easily.
om: Keessumaa qeenxeen isaa "Zemenaay Maariyyee" salphumatti dhageettii hordoftootaa argachuu danda'eera.

en: Heavy to very heavy rainfall (top 10-5% on record) is expected in western Oromia (Western and Eastern Welega and Illubabor) and southern Benishangul Gumu in Ethiopia, and localized areas of central and south-western Sudan.
om: Roobni cimaa gara baayyee cimaa ta'e (olaanaa 10-5% galmaa'e) Itoophiyaa keessatti dhiha Oromiyaa(Dhihaa fi Baha Wallaggaa fi Illuubbabor) fi kibbaa Benishaangul Gumuz, fi naannoowwan giddugaleessaa fi kibba dhiha Sudaanitti ni eegama.

en: Various sport competitions, exhibitions and symposiums are also scheduled events of the festival.
om: Dorgommiileen ispoortii adda addaa, agarsiisonni fi simpooziyemiiwwanis qophiilee festivaalicha irratti karoorfamaniidha.

en: The Netherlands becomes the first European country to win a professional world baseball championship since 1938, after defeating Cuba 2-1 in the 2011 Baseball World Cup final in Panama City, Panama.
om: Neezerlaand erga Geeba Beezboolii Addunyaa isa xumuraa Paanamaa siitii, Paanaamaatti Kiyuubaa 2-1'n injifattee booda shaampiyoonii ogummaa beezbolii addunyaa mo'achuun erga bara 1938 biyya Awurooppaa jalqabaa taate.

en: Sea-Air cargo project that is twice as fast as the sea only and twice as cheap as the Air only transportation would massively scale up trade relations between the two countries as well as between the two continents; Africa and Asia; in particular China.
om: Pirojektiin fe'umsaa galaanaa-qilleensaa kan galaana qofaa irra dachaan saffisu fi kan qilleensa qofaa irra dachaan bushaa'u hanga olaanaa ta'en walitti dhufeenya daldalaa biyyoota lamaan gidduu akkasumas ardiilee lamaan Afirikaa fi Eshiyaa keessumaa Chaayinaa gidduu ol guddisa.

en: The Ethiopian Soil Information System (EthioSIS) project was launched in 2012 to transform the agriculture sector by improving the fertility of farming soil to support agricultural transformation.
om: Pirojektiin Sirna Odeeffannoo Biyyee Itoopiyaa (EthioSIS) gabbina biyyee qonnaa fooyyessuun tiraanisfoormeeshini qonnaa deggeruuf sektera qonnaa jijjiiruuf bara 2012 keessa eegalame.

en: Ethiopia and the Russian Federation established diplomatic relations in 1898, just after the Battle of Adwa.
om: Itoopiyaa fi Federeeshiniin Raashiyaa walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii bara 1898 keessa, Waraana Aduwaa booda hundeessan.

en: Pope Francis appoints a panel of nine high-ranking prelates from around the world to advise him of the running of the Catholic Church and advise him on the reform of the Vatican bureaucracy.
om: Poop Firaansis garee phaaphaasota sadarkaa olaanaa sagal guutummaa addunyaa irraa kanneen Waldaa Kaatoolikii akkaataa itti geggeessan irratti akkasumas biirookiraasii Vaatikaan akkamiin akka haaressan irratti isaan gorsan muudan.

en: UNESCO declares the old city of Hebron and the Cave of the Patriarchs, both in the West Bank, as world heritage sites.
om: UNESCON magaalaa 'Heebiroon" durii fi 'Holqa gootota kan 'weest baank' kessaattii argaman lamaan hambaalee seenaa qabeessa jechuun beekamtii kenne.

en: A new study suggests that common cholesterol reducing drugs may also prevent macular degeneration.
om: Qorannoon haaraan qorichoonni kolestiroolii hir'isan beekamoon makular dijenereeshiniis akka hambisuu malan akeekan.

en: Head of the bureau, Gebremichael Meles, said that efforts to register Ashenda as an intangible world heritage is getting momentum.
om: Hogganaan biirochaa, Gebiremikaa'el Melles, yaaliin Ashendaa akka hamdaa addunyaa hin qaqqabatamneetti galmeessisuu humna argataa jira jedhe.

en: For its inaugural launch, the band hosted an invitation-only event featuring an array of guests, esteemed individuals and participating artists.
om: Eebba hojii jalqabuu isaa irratti, baandichi sagantaa afeerraa qofa irratti hundaa'e kan keessumoota garagaraa, namoota kabajamoo fi artistoota hirmaatan haammate qopheesse.

en: A South African judge rules that the prosecution can appeal the decision not to convict Oscar Pistorius for the murder of Reeva Steenkamp in 2013 to the Supreme Court of Appeal.
om: Abbaan Murtii Afriikaa kibbaa Oskaar Piischeriyees bara 2013 ajjeechaa Riivaa Stiinkaampiin himanna irratti dhiyaate fudhachuu dhabuu isaatiin walqabatee mana murtii olaanaatti mirga oliyyaannoo akka egamuuf ibse.

en: As one of the rapidly urbanizing countries, Ethiopia has identified the essentiality of implementing effective waste management to realize its green growth strategy, he pointed out.
om: Akka biyya saffisaan magaalaa babal'isaa jirtuutti, Itoophiyaan tarsiimoo guddina magariisaa dhugoomsuuf barbaachisummaa hojii balfaa balleessuu bu'a qabeessa ta'e hojiirra oolchuu filatteetti.

en: Two firefighters are killed and four others are injured in a Baghjan gas well blowout fire in Assam, Northeast India.
om: Abiddi gaazii Bagajaan, Assaam, Kaaba-Baha Hindii keessatti dhuka'uun uumameen hojjetoonni abidda dhaamsuu lama du'anii afur kan ta'an biroon ammoo miidhaman.

en: Crop production and Marketing Directorate Director with the Ministry, Mulugeta Muhammed, told WIC that the country has planned to export 98.233 thousand tons of oilseeds and pulses this year and gain the stated amount of income.
om: Daayirektoreetni Daayirekteera oomisha fi gurgurtaa midhaanii Ministeerichaa, Mulugeetaa Mohaammad, biyyaattin midhaan zaayitaa fi boloqqee toonii kuma 98.233 alatti erguu fi galii heerame argachuuf karoorsuu ishee WIC'tti himaniiru.

en: Ethio Telecom CEO Frehiwot Tamiru acknowledged the employees of the company who participated in the implementation of the new technology at various levels and pointed out that effective work has been done.
om: Hojii geeggesituu olaanaa Etiyoo Telekoom Firewot Taammiruu hojjettoota dhaabbatichaa hojii irra oolmaa teekinooloojii haaraa irratti hirmatan hundaan galatooma jedhaniiru dabalees hojii inni caalu hojjetameera jechuun ibsaniiru.

en: Diana Nyad successfully completes a swim from Cuba to Florida, the first person to do so without a shark cage.
om: Diyaanaa Niyaad daakkii bishaanii Filooridaa gara Kuubaa osoo mannee ittisa shaarkii hin fayyadamiin haala milkaa'aan raawwachuun namaa jalqabaa taate.

en: Tiger Woods wins the Masters Tournament in Augusta, Georgia, his first major golf win in 11 years and his first win at the Masters since 2005.
om: Taayger Wuuds waggoota 11 darban keessatti mo'icha Goolfii isa jalqabaa kan ta'eefi erga bara 2005ii as mo'icha Maasteersii mataa isaa dura kanta'een dorgomii Maasteersii Joorjiyaa,Awugustaa keessattii injifate.

en: The FIFA referees committee has selected 27 referees, 42 assistants and 21 video assistants for VAR technology.
om: koreen abbootii murtii kubbaa miilaa FIFA abbotii murtii 27,gargaartota 42 fi gargaartota suursagalee 21 tekinooloojii VAR'iif filateera.

en: The United States closes 22 embassies in the Middle East and North Africa due to intelligence of an Al-Qaeda attack.
om: Odeeffannoo haleellaa Alqaayidaa sababeeffachuun yuunaytid Isteetis imbaasiiwwan 22 baha giddu galeessaa fi kaabaa Afrikaatti argaman cufte.

en: “I believe I can say, now is a time of fundamental change in Africa.
om: "Yeroon ammaa yeroo jijjiirama bu'uuraa Afirikaa keessaati, jechuu akkan danda'u nan amana"

en: Ethiopia’s Water and Irrigation Minister Sileshi Bekele, Sudan’s Minister of Water resources and Irrigation Muataz Musa; and Egyptian Water resources and Irrigation Minister Mohamed Abdel Ati have been attending the meeting.
om: Walgahichi har'a Addis Ababaa keessatti eegalame guyyoota lamaaf tura.

en: The FIFA U-20 World Cup match officials’ capacity building preparation will focus on the wide range of topics, such as their reading of the game and football understanding, teamwork and the importance of obtaining the best position or angle.
om: Qophiin ijaarsa dandeettti aanga'oota geepha adunyaa FIFA U-20 mata dureewwan garagaraa irratti xiyyeeffata, isaanis dubbisa taphaa fi hubannoo kubbaa miillaa, hojii garee fi faayidaa bakka yookin kofa gaarii argachuuti.

en: After a 56-day trek, British Army captain Lou Rudd becomes the second person to cross Antarctica alone and unaided, over two decades after the first solo crossing by Norwegian Børge Ousland.
om: Deemsa gaariin godhame guyyaa 56 booda, ajajaan Waraanaa Biriitish Luu Rud nama lammaffaa qofaa isaafi utuu gargaarsa hin argatin Antarkaatikaa qaxxaamure tahe, nama kophaasaa qaxxaamure jalqabaa lammii Noorwey Børge Ousland waggaa kurnan lama booda.

en: Leslie Buckley, a close associate of Denis O'Brien, is elected chairman of Independent News & Media.
om: Leslii Buuklee, deggeraan Deenis O'Breeyinitti dhiyaatu, dura ta'aa Oduu fi Miidiyaa Indipppeendent ta'ee filatame.

en: The legendary Ethiopian singer Alemayehu Eshete has been laid to rest at St. Trinity Cathedral, Addis Ababa with a massive funeral ceremony attended by many.
om: Weellisaan beekamaan lammii Itoopiyaa Alemaayyehu Isheetee Qulqulluu Kaatediraala Sillaasee, Addis Ababaatti sagantaa awwaalchaa guddaa namooti baayyeen irratti hirmaataniin awwaalame.

en: Hermon Haily’s Price of Love will be featured at the Lincoln Center this week at the New York African Film Festival as well as Director Yared Zeleke’s award winning drama Lamb: Red Leaves by Bazi Gere starring Debebe Eshetu; Afripedia X New York by Ethiopian and Eritrean filmmakers Teddy Goitom and Senay Berhe of Sweden; and the Dance of King David by Axel Baumann exploring the Ark of covenant.
om: Piraayis of lov'n Heermoon Haayilee akkasumas diraamaan Daayirekteera Yaared Zelleqee badhaasa mo'ate Laamb:Reed Livs Baazii Gereetin kan qophaa'e Debbebee Isheetuu kan qabate jiru: sagantaa Afiriipidiyaa Eks Niw Yoork qopheessitoota fiilmii lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa fi Ertiraa Teedii Gooyitoom fi Sennaay Barihee Iswiidiniitiin; akkasumas shubbisi mootii Daawwit yeroo bidiruu kakuu argate taasise Aleks Bawuumaanin giddugala linkonitti torbee kana agarsiisa Fiilmii Afiirikaa Niw yoork irratti ni dhiyaata.

en: Vietnam passes a new Constitution that reaffirms the dominant position of the Communist Party.
om: Veetinaam seera haaraa Olaantummaa paartii Koministii mirkanessuu irra deebiin tumte.

en: It is, therefore, shocking that the Ethiopian Football Association would seek to take their home match against Ghana to South Africa.
om: Gochaan waldaan kubbaa miilaa Itiyoophiyaa tapha dirree isaanii ture Gaanaa waliin qabana turan gara Afirikaa kibbaa akka deemu taasisuun,kanaafuu ajaa'ibsiisaa ture

en: Google introduces a so-called "fact checking" feature on its news aggregate service to combat alleged political bias.
om: Guugili isa walcaalsisuu siyaasaa ittiin himatame balleessuuf tajaajila oduu isaa irratti kutaa "haqa adda baasuu" jedhan sana jalqabe.

en: Deputy Health Minister Dr. Dereje Duguma underscored that the delta variant Coronavirus is currently causing a devastating crisis in Ethiopia.
om: Deetaan Ministeera Fayyaa Dr. Darajjee Dhugumaa gosti delta vaayirasii koronaa Itoopiyaa keessatti balaa hamaa geggeessaa akka jiru hime.

en: The World Health Organization warns that the Zika virus will continue to spread across Asia with cases already reported in Singapore and Thailand.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa vaayirasiin Ziikkaa dhibeewwan Singaappoorii fi Taayilaand keessatti argamuu isaatiin guutummaa Eeshiyaa keessa tatamsa'uu akka itti fufu akeekkachiise.

en: The President of Honduras Porfirio Lobo pledges a "full and transparent inquiry" into the events and suspends local and national prison officials.
om: Pirasdaantiin Honduras Porfiriyoo Looboo taateewwan sanatti "qorannaa guutuu fi ifaa" tahe akka godhamu waadaa galuun aangawoota mana hidhaa naannoo fi biyyaaleyyaa hojii dhaabsisan.

en: Doctors Without Borders alleges the World Health Organisation is rationing vaccines for Ebola in the Democratic Republic of the Congo despite adequate resources.
om: Dooktors Wizaawut Boorders, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa utuu galteen gahaan jiruu dhiyeessii talaallii Iboolaa Rippabilika Diimokiraatikii Koongoo keessatti daangesse jechuun himate.

en: Ukrainian forces say they managed to stop a larger part of a convoy of around 50 armoured vehicles, which entered Ukraine from the border with Russia near Novoazovsk.
om: Humnoonni Yukireen gara caalaa garee konkolaattota waraanaa 50 kanneen kara Raashiyaa wajjin waldaangessa naannoo Noovoozoviskiin Yukireeniin seenan dhaabuu akka danda'an dubbatan.

en: Astronomers discover 139 new "minor planets" in the Solar System that are beyond the orbit of Neptune, which helps boost odds of finding Planet Nine.
om: Qorattoonni hawwaa "pilaanetoota xixiqqoo" haaraa 139 kan orbitii Neeptiyuun ol ta'an, kan barbaacha Pilaanetii Sagalii dhibaa ta'e fooyyessuuf gargaaran, Sirna Soolaarii keessatti argatan.

en: In rugby league, the New Zealand Warriors are fined AU$15,000 for Russell Packer urinating on the field before a game.
om: Liigii Rabgii keessatti, Ruusel Paaker tapha dura dirree keessatti waan fincaa'eef Ze Niwuuzlaandi Waariyeers AU$15,000 adabaman.

en: Factories causing environmental pollution in Oromia Regional State were urged to promptly mend their ways and operate as per the set standards.
om: Warshaalee bulchiinsa naannoo Oromiyaa keessatti faalama naannoo fidaa jiran hatattamaan maloota hojii isaanii akka sirreessanii fi akka seera ka'ametti akka hojjetan gaafataman.

en: The government of Guyana reports that pirates attacked fishermen off the coast of neighboring Suriname.
om: Mootummaan Guyyaanaa saamtonni galaana irraa naannoo ollaa Surineemitti namoota qurxummii qaban akka haleelan gabaase.

en: Mountaineers led by Tim Mosedale confirm suspicions that Mount Everest's famous Hillary Step had completely collapsed.
om: Garee gaara yaabdota' Tiim Mosediin durfamu Oduun kutaa beekamaan gaaraa Everest hilaarii jedhamuun beekamu jigeera jedhamee shakkamaa ture dhugaa ta'uu mirkaneessan.

en: The Ethiopian Minster of Health, Dr. Kesetebirhan Admasu has been nominated by the co-chair of the Bill and Melinda Gates foundation, Mrs. Melinda Gates for the 120 under 40 awards.
om: Ministeerri Fayyaa Itoopiyaa, Dr. Kessetebirhaan Admaasuu badhaasota 120 40 gadiif dura teessu lammaffaa fawundeeshinii Biilii fi Melindaa Geetisii, Aadde. Melindaa Geetisi n filatame.

en: Four people are killed and around 40 injured after a passenger plane explodes in Surgut in eastern Russia.
om: Baha Ruusiyaatti kan argamtu Saargat keessatti balaa dhoohinsa xiyyaaraa imaltootaa irratti mudateen lubbuun namoota 4 yoo darbu namoonni 40 dhiyaatan miidhamaniiru.

en: During my young age, I had a chance to watch these competitions and in 2004, I competed in the Addis Ababa club championships.

en: The African Diaspora Maritime Corp. withdraws from the America's Cup amid controversy over being denied an opportunity to be the American defender in the competition based on ethnicity.

en: Asian-Pacific Film Festival kicked off this week to a devoted audience eager to experience foreign films.

en: In Betking Ethiopia Premier League match, happened in Hawasa, the champions Fasil Kenema beat Hadiya Hosaena 3 to 1.

en: As the country’s total debt surpassed 50 billion dollars since 2017, the country has become among the most indebted economies in Africa.

en: The Authority urged the public not to use “Herbal Colgate” as well as inform the concerned offices in case they notice the products being sold.

en: In golf, Tiger Woods is named as the PGA Tour's Player of the Year for a record 11th time.

en: Environment Commission Director with the Commission, Bayu Tola, the two factorie–Hansen Glass Factory and Dire leather factors got closed after they repeatedly failed to warnings to make corrections.

en: The recommendations were implemented especially corrective vaccination campaigns against tetanus in 2016.
om: Gorsaaleen sun hojiirra oolfamiiru keessumaa duulawwa talaallii sirreeffamaa titaanasii irratti bara 2016.

en: It covers 61 health centers, 229 health posts, and six primary hospitals in the two regions.
om: Buufataalee fayyaa 61, kellaa fayyaa 229, fi hospitaala jalqabaa ja'a naannoolee lamaan keessaa uwwisa,

om: Akka waliigaltichaatti, Nookiyaan Yuunivarsiitii lamaan wajjin leenjii mijataa fi sagantaalee leenjisuu ni kenna akkasumas sektera ICT keessatti barteewwan teekinikaa fi biizinisee dhiyeenyaa kan guddina addunyaa fi fedhii gabaa wajjin walsimatu nii qooda.

en: The working group will also produce a case study report that lay out the business for targeting the film industry as a job creation sector, she indicated.
om: Gareen hojii sun gabaasa qorannoo taatee biizinesii kan industirii fiilmii akka sektara hojii uummaatti xiyyeeffatu akka qopheessu, isheen akeekte.

en: This will foster healthy and growing advertising markets, which will result in a greater variety of content, and more localised content.”
om: Kun beeksisa gabaa nagaa qabuu fi guddachaa jiru, kan qabiyyeewwan garagaraa baayyee, fi qabiyyee naannoo caalmaa qabu ni guddisa,

en: The 122th Adwa Victory was commemorated yesterday at National Theatre with different programs that attracted officials and veteran patriots.
om: Injifannoon Aduwaa 122ffaan kaleessa Tiyaatira Biyyaaleessaa keessatti sagantaalee garagaraa kan aangawootaa fi namoota jaalala biyyaa qaban sooruma bahan hawwachuun kabajame.

en: Rescuers from New Zealand and McMurdo Station looking for three Canadians aboard an airplane presumed to have gone down in Antarctica were grappling with bad weather conditions.
om: Lubbuu baraartonni Niw Zilaand fi Bufata MaakMurdoo irraa lammiiwwan Kanaadaa sadan xiyyaara Antarkaatikaa keessatti kufeen imalanii turan barbaadan haala qilleensaa hamaa wajjin wallaansoo walqabaa turan.

en: On December 11, 2019 many media outlets were busy reporting about the Ethiopian goal prodigy.
om: Mudde 11, 2019 irratti tamsaasni midiyaa hedduun galmeessuu manii Itoophiyaa gabaasaa turan.

en: The main materials being procured internationally, according to Soleyana, are voter registration book (voter list books), voter cards book, and plastic boxes with seals, to be used in the transport of materials to a secured storage facility at polling stations for overnight stays, voter registration forms, and voter registration stationary kits.
om: Akka Sooliyaanaan jettetti barruuleen ijoon akka addunyaatti bitamaa jiru, barruu galmee filattootaa (barrruuwan tarree filattootaa), barruu kaardiiwwan filattootaa, fi saanduqota pilaastikaa cufaawwan isaanii wajjin, kan geejiba barruulee sana gara buufata filannoo turtii halkaniif iddoo nageenya qabuutti ittiin geessan, gucawwan galmee filattootaa, fi wantoota barreeffamaa galmee filattootaf fayyadu dha.

en: Zimbabwean politician Roy Bennett is killed in a helicopter crash near Raton, New Mexico, United States.
om: Namni siyaasaa Zimbaabuwee Rooyi Beneet balaa kufaatiin caccabuu heelikoptera yunaaytid isteetis,new meeksiikoo nannawaa Raaton keessattii isa qaqqabeen lubbuun isaa darbe.

en: Germany and the Netherlands suspend military training mission in Iraq citing escalating tensions in the region with Iran.
om: Jermanii fi Neezerlaand ergama shaakala waraanaa Iraaq keessaa olka'uu waldhabdee naannichaa Iraan waliin jiru sababeeffachuun adda kutan.

en: Following the resignation of my former instructor in 2008, I took a responsibility to manage Choi Hong Hi taekwondo club and since then, I have been working as an instructor.
om: erga 2008 leenjisaa duraanii hojii gadi lakkisanii Ergasii as garee Teekwaandoo chooy Hoong Hi hoogganuuf itti gaafatamummaa fudhadheera, akka leenjisaatti hojjechaan jira.

en: In his remarks after the signing agreement, Japanese Ambassador to Ethiopia Shinichi Saida commended the current geopolitical trends towards peaceful power transition taking shape in Africa.
om: Waliigaltee mallatteessuun booda, Itoophiyaattii Ambasaaddarri Jaappaan Shinichi Sayidaa taatee ji'oopolotiksii yeroo ammaa kan walharkaa fuudhamiinsa aangoo naga qabeessa Afrikaa keessatti bifa godhataa dhufe jajaniiru.

en: The Assad regime grants nationality to thousands of Kurds in al-Hasaka in a bid to appease protesters.
om: Bulchiinsi Asaad mormitoota tasgabbeessuf al Hasaakaatti kurdoota kumaan lakkaawamaniif lammummaa kenneera.

en: The United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is investigating 14 cases where the Zika virus may have been sexually transmitted.
om: Giddugalli Ittisaa fi To'annoo Dhibee Yunaayitid Isteetis namoota dhibeen qabaman 14 bakka vaayirasiin Zikkaa karaa quunnamtii saalaatiin daddarbuu hin oolletti qorachaa jira.

en: At the conference, Trade and Industry State Minister Teka Gebreyesus said Ethiopia and China have good historical foundation to bring the current industrial cooperation into higher level.
om: Konfiransicha irratti, Ministeerri Ministeera Industirii fi Daldalaa Takkaa Gabreyesuus walta'iinsa industirii yeroo amma kana gara sadarkaa olaanaatti fiduuf Itoophiyaa fi Chaayinaan walitti dhufeenya seenaa gaarii qabu jedhaniiru.

en: The Great Ethiopian Run scheduled to take place for the first time outside Africa is also the 1st edition in the US.
om: Figichi Guddichi Itoophiyaa yeroo jalqabaatiif Afiriikaa alatti tasifamuuf beellamame akkasumas Ameerikaa keessatti marsaa jalqabaati.

en: Ethiopian-Israel golfer Asher Iso, without taking anything away from the extraordinary achievements of the other winners this week, has championed Israel Men’s Masters Tournament at the Caesarea Golf Club.
om: Taphataa Goolfii lammii Itoophiyaa fi Isiraa'el Asher Isoo, osoo milkaa'ina aja'ibsiisaa mo'attoota biroo irra hin fudhatiin torbe kana dorgommii maasterii dhiiraa Isiraa'elif kilabii Goolfii Qisaariyaatti shaampiyoona ta'eera.

en: The Islamist terrorist group Boko Haram claims responsibility for a series of bomb and gun attacks in the north-eastern Nigerian town of Damaturu that have killed at least 63 people.
om: Gareen shororkeessaa Bookoo Haaraam dhohinsa bombii fi haleellaa dhukaasaa walitti fufaa magaalaa kaaba-baha Naayijeeriyaatti argamtu Damaaturuutti ta'e, kan yoo xiqqaate namoota 63 ajjeessef itti gaafatamummaa fudhate.

en: China Ecology and Environment Vice Minister, Liu Hua commended Chinese and Ethiopian professionals for doing their level best to see the satellite project succeed and meet its objectives.
om: Itti aanaan Ministeera Sirna Naanoo fi Naannoo, Li'uu Huhaan ogeessota Chaayinaa fi Itoophiyaa hojii gaarii piroojektiin saatalayitii milkaa'ee fi kaayyoo isa galmaan ga'ee arguuf gumaachaniif galata galchan.

en: “In Africa we are one, to show unity in diversity; we may have different borders like Ethiopia, Nigeria, Egypt, and Central Africa Republic but Africa is one.
om: "Afirikaa keessatti nuti tokko, adda addummaa keessatti tokkummaa agarsiisuuf; daangaa adda addaa akka Itoopiyaa,Naayijeeriyaa, Gibxii, fi Rippaabilikii Giddugaleessa Afirikaa qabaachuu dandeenya garuu nuti Afrikaa tokkodha.

en: With thousands of fans expected to show, the debutants in this year’s competition face a stern test in overturning the score and keeping a clean-sheet.
om: Deggartootni kumaan lakkaa'aman akka argaman kan eegamu, gareewwan gara liigiitti barana dabalaman qabxii fi tapha goolii irratti hin lakka'amne argachuuf qormaatatu isaan mudata.

en: Molecular testing machines inaugurated in the premises of St. Paul Medical Millennium Medical College and Ethiopian Public Health Institute are said to have a capacity of testing a total of 4,500 samples of TB, Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C, cervical cancer, various sexually transmitted diseases, and other cases in 24 hours.
om: Maashinoonni qorannoo molikiwuulii Kolleejjii Miliniyemii Medikaalaa Qulqulluu Phaawuloos fi Inistitiyuutii Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaa keessatti eebbifaman sa'atii 24 keessatti sumuda TB, Hepatetas B, Hepatetas C, Kaanseri gadameessaa, dhukkuboota walquunnamtii saalaan daddarban garagraa fi dhibeewwan biroo waliigalaa 4,500 qorachuuf dandeettii akka qabu himame.

en: The policy direction geared toward prevention has also been successful in engaging the public at large, said Yibeltal.
om: Kallattiin tarsiimoo gara ittisaatti xiyyeeffate bal'inaan hawaasa qaqqabuuttis akka milkaa'e, Yibelxaal dubbateera.

en: Irrecha, a thanksgiving festival of the Oromo people, has been celebrated at Hora Finfine in Addis Ababa today.
om: Irreechi, ayyaanni galata galfannaa ummata Oromoo, Hora Finfinnee Addis Ababaa keessatti harra kabajame.

en: Ethiopian Health Minister Dr. Lia Tadesse has met with the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (US-CDC) Ethiopia’s new country director, Dr. Caroline Rayan.
om: Ministeerri Fayyaa Itoopiyaa Dr. Liyaa Taaddesee daayirekteera biyyaa Giddugala Ittisaa fi To'annoo Dhibee Yuunaayitid Isteetis (US-CDC) Itoopiyaa haaraa, Dr Kaaroliine Raayaan wajjin mari'atte.

en: Tokyo Electric Power Co. resumes its policy of rolling electricity blackouts following ongoing problems caused by the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.
om: Dhaabbanni Humna Elektirikii Tookiyoo rakkoo walitti fufaa sochii lafaa fi sunaamii Tohokuu bara 2011'n mudate hordofuun, qajeelfama isaa adda cituu elektirikii akka itti fufu eegale.

en: The National Council endorsed the nomination of the executive committee the president presented at the same meeting
om: Manni maree biyyoollessaas kaadhima koree hojii-raawwachistootaa pireezidantiin dhiyeessaniif walga'ii wal fakkaataa irratti fudhatamummaa keenanniru.

en: EREC’s deputy project manager, Cai Qinhao, said his company is working to accomplish the project on schedule.
om: Itti aanaan hoogganaa pirojektii EREC, Chaayi Qinhaa'oon, kampaaniin isaa pirojekticha haala karoorfameen xumuruuf hojjetaa jira jedhe.

en: This year’s edition of the Great Ethiopian Run has seen participation of more than 44,000 runners; and the event has grown to become a major street festival attracting more and more locals and tourists, every year.
om: Figichi guddaan Itoophiyaa marsaa bara kanaa hirmaattota 44,000 ol argateera; dabalees sagantichi agarsiisa karaa irraa guddaa jiraattota naannoo fi tuuristoota dabalee dabalee harkisaa jiru wagga gara waggaatti ta'aa jira.

en: 24-year-old Italian motorcycle racer Marco Simoncelli dies after crashing and being hit by two other riders at the Malaysian MotoGP, leading to the cancellation of the race. ,
om: Dorgomaan dokdokkee lammii Xaaliyaanii ganna 24, Maarkoo Simonsellii MootooJiiPii Maleejiyaatti erga kufee dokdokkee ooftota lamaan rukutamee booda du'e, kunis gara dorgommicha haquutti geesse.

en: An Egyptian protester removes the flag from the Israeli embassy as thousands protest outside following the death of five policemen near the border.
om: Akkuma namoonni kumaan lakka'aman du'a poolisiiwwan shananii naannoo daaangaatti tahe alatti mormaniin, kan mormiitti hirmaate lammiin Gibxii tokko alaabicha imbasii Isiraa'el keessaa baase.

en: The World Health Organization says the novel coronavirus that originated from Saudi Arabia is not highly contagious.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa vaayirasiin koronaa inni Sa'udii Arabiyaa keessaa ka'e baayyee kan daddarbu akka hin taane ibse.

en: Information Communication Technology Sector Director-General at the ministry, Abiyot Sinamo told ENA that the national strategy designed to digitalize key public services has been well underway and being implemented as per the plan.
om: Ministeerichatti Daayirekterri Olaanaan Sektera Odeeffannoo Quunnamtii Teekinoolojii, Abiyot Sinaamoo tajaajiloota hawaasaa murteesoo tahan gara digitaalaatti jijjiiruuf tarsiimoon biyyaalessaa saxaxame hojiirra akka jiruu fi akka karoorichaatti hojiirra oolaa akka jiru ENA'tti dubbate.

en: Six delegates representing Ethiopia have finalized preparations to partake in the Cannes film festival including model and actress, Gelila Bekele as well as Film producer Mehret Mandefro.
om: Moodelii fi taatuu, Geliilaa Baqqalee akkasumas qopheessituu Fiilmii Mihret Mandefroo dabalachuun, jilli nama ja'aa Itoopiyaa bakka bu'an Festivaala Fiilmii Kaannes irratti hirmaachuuf qophii xumuraniiru.

en: All pluses and other commodities which are trading through the Ethiopian Commodity Exchange (ECX) are set to be mandatory starting from this Ethiopian budget year, according to the authority.
om: Qabeenyonni hundi fi meeshaalee biroon karaa Daldala Oomishaa Itoohiyaa (DOI) daldalaman bara baajataa kanaa qabee dirqama ni ta'u, akka abbaa taayitichaatti.

en: The institute has been diversifying efforts to improve the ecological system and conserving biodiversity during the period.
om: Giddugalichi yeroo kanatti sirna naannoo foyyeessuu fi baayoodaayiversitii eeguu irratti hojiiwwan garagaraa hojjechaa ture.

en: Researchers describe the recently rediscovered Hula painted frog, long thought to be extinct, as a "living fossil".
om: Qorattoonni fatteewwan Hula dibamtee jirtu kan dhiyeenya irra deebiin argamte, kan dura raawwattee baddeetti jedhamee yaadame, akka "foosilii jiraattuutti" ibsan.

en: East African countries have made sustained efforts to take advantage of their AGOA eligibility in recent years.
om: Biyyoonni baha Afiriikaa waggoota dhiyoo keessatti itti fayadamummaa AGOA fayyadamuuf carraaqaniiru.

en: The corpses of 53 pro-Muammar Gaddafi fighters are found in Sirte, all having apparently been summarily executed by NTC troops.
om: Reeffi loltoota Mu'aammar Gaadaafii deggeran 53 sirteetti argameera, gabaabumatti walitti qabaan hunduu loltoota NTC'tin ajjeefaman

en: EEFRI Director-General Abiyot Berhanu said the institute has been collecting tree seeds to recover deforested lands.
om: Daayirekteerri-Olaanaan EEFRI Abiyoot Birihaanuu giddugalichi ija mukaa lafa bosonni irra badee haromsuuf funaanaa akka jiru himan.

en: A runner who fled Ethiopia nearly a decade ago is preparing for Sunday's Tokyo Marathon with hopes of returning to Japan this summer as a member of the Refugee Olympic Team.
om: fiigaan waggoota kudhan dura Itiyoophiyaa kessa baqate maaraatoonii Tookiyoo Dilbata dhufuutiif qophaa'aa jira kanaan abdii akka akka miseensa Garee Olompikii Baqattootti Jaappaanitti deebi'uutiin .

en: This monthly Paugmé Shir-shir event usually involves two days spent venturing off into the surrounding hillsides for various outdoor adventures and one night spent camping under the stars.
om: Qophiin Shirr-shirriin Paagumee ji'a kanaa bashannana adda addaaf tulluuwwan naannoo jiran jala guyyaa lamaaf deemaa akkasumas guyyaa tokko urjiiwwan jala dunkaana keessa bulama.

en: The country is importing daily the same amount of fuel as it was in the past days via Djibouti and Sudan with more than 300 fuel trucks, he said.
om: Biyyattin guyyuu hammeentaa boba'aa wal fakkaataa guyyoota darban keessatti karaa Jibuutii fi Sudaan'tiin konkolaataa boba'aa 300 oliin gara biyya keessatti galchaa jirti, jechuun dabaleera.

en: The state minister noted that the evaluation process deals with issuance of certification for first degree graduates who pass the required examinations and get qualified for standards put in place to improve the service delivery.
om: Deetaan Ministeerichaa adeemsi madaallii eebbifamtoota digiri jalqabaa warra qorumsa barbaachisu darbeef waraqaa ragaa kennuun dhiyeessii tajaajilaa fooyyeessuuf standardii ka'amee guutuu akka tahe dubbate.

en: Dr Dereje underscored the need to identify strengths and weakness observed in the past and find ways to deal with them to eliminate the disease by 2030.
om: Dr Darajjee dhukkubicha bara 2030 tti balleessuuf yeroo darbe keessatti jabinootaa fi laaffinoota argaman adda baasuun karaa ittiin isaan furan barbaaduun barbaachisaa akka tahe dubbatan.

en: A vaccine for the ebola virus is discovered to be 99.78%–99.87% effective.
om: Talaalliin vaayirasii iboolaa 99.78%–99.87% bu'aa qabeessa akka tahe bira gahame.

en: The party has urged the young generation to understand the reasons behind the party’s armed struggle and ensure the already started journey of the country towards renaissance.
om: Ayyaannii hundeeffama Adda Bilisa Baasaa Ummata Tigraay (TPLF) 41ffaan Maqalee keessatti yaadannoo wareegamtootaa, marii paanaalii fi sagantaalee biraan kabajame.

en: NASCAR becomes the first major American sports league to resume its season since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States.
om: NASCAR Yunaaytid Isteetis keessatti erga weerarri covid 19 eegale as dorgomii waktii jalqabuun Ispoortii liigii olaanoo Ameerikaa keessa isa dura isa taasisa

en: Over 71,000 livestock have already died since the drought began.
om: Erga hongichi jalqabee kaasaa beeyladoonni 71,000 ol tahan du'aniiru.

en: Rochus Misch, the last witness to Adolf Hitler’s suicide in the Führerbunker dies at the age of 96.
om: Roochus Miisch, ragaan dhumaa of ajjeesuu Adoolf Hiitilar Fuhreerbanker keessattii umrii 96tti du'e.

en: Manufactured by Tomizawa & Co. Ltd, a small Japanese company, AdPower is a unique technology developed twenty years ago, Toru Tomizawa, President, told The Reporter on Thursday, while briefing reporters about the product.
om: Korporeeshinii Tomizaawaa & kan oomishame, kaampaanii xiqqaa Japan kan ta'e, AdPowerin tekinooloojii addaa waggaa digdama dura kalaqameedha, Toru Tamizawa, Pireezidaantii, Kamisa Ripporterichatti osoo waa omishichi ripporterootaaf ibsanii himaniiru.

en: U.S. President Barack Obama lifts a trade embargo of communications equipment and software to non-government Iranians.
om: Pirasdaantiin Yuunaayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan qoqqobbii daldalaa meeshaa koomunikeeshinii fi sooftiwerii Lammiiwwan Iraan qaama mootummaa hin taanee irraa kaase.

en: The Supreme Constitutional Court of Egypt rules that the country's Islamist dominated Parliament and Constituent Assembly of Egypt were illegally elected.
om: Manni Murtii Heeraa Olaanaan Gibxii Paarlaamaanii fi Walitti-qabamni naannoolee Gibxii kan hordoftoota amantii Isilaamaan dhuunfatame karaa seeraan alaa akka filatame murteesse.

en: Greenpeace sends Facebook a letter containing half a million signatures asking the company to cut its ties to coal based electricity.
om: Giriinpiis Feesbuukiif xalayaa mallattoowwan namoota walakkaa miliyoonaa qabu kan dhaabbatichi akka hidhata elektirika dhagaa cilee irratti hundaa'e waliin qabu adda kutu gaafatu erge.

en: A study in Nature shows species which are visually unusual or attractive go extinct at higher rates.
om: Qorannoon uumamaa tokko akka ibsutti sanyiileen bifaan adda ta'aan yookiin ammoo hawwatoo ta'anii reeshoo olaanaadhaan badu jedhe.

en: The United States expels 35 Russian diplomats over the alleged Russian interference during the U.S.'s 2016 presidential election.
om: Himannaa giddu-seentummaa Raashiyaa filannoo pirisdaantawaa U.S. 2016'n walqabatee Yunaayitid Isteetis dippilomaatota Raashiyaa 35 biyyaa baaste

en: The drastic increase of Ethiopia’s debt stock has been a source of debate among policymakers, researchers and political analysts in Ethiopia for the last half a decade.
om: Haalaan dabaluun kuufama liqaa Itoophiyaa qopheesitoota immaammataa, qorattootaa fi xinxaltoota siyaasaa Itoophiyaa gidduutti walakkaa waggoota kurnan darbaniif madda falmii ta'uun tureera.

en: Amongst the list of people and institutions responsible for the growing culture is ‘Kushineta skates.’
om: Tarree namootaa fi dhaabbatoota aadichi akka guddatu godhan keessaa 'Kushineettaa isteeks' tokko dha.

en: “When one regional state fails to protect the safety and security of citizens, the federal government is responsible to act,” said Abere, stressing the need for maintaining rule of law in the area where the killings are taking place.
om: "Yeroo mootummaan naannoo tokkoo eegumsaa fi nageenyaa lammiiwwanii eeguu dadhabu, mootummaan federaalaa hojjechuuf itti gaafatamummaa qaba," jechuun Abbereen, naannoo ajjeechaan keessatti raawwataa jiru keessatti olaantummaa seeraa mirkaneessuun barbaachisaa akka tahe jabeesse hime.

en: At least seven Ethiopian films are set to screen in NYC in May 2016 as part of the New York African Film Festival and the 13th Annual Sheba Film Festival.
om: Yoo xiqqaate fiilmiiwwan Itoophiyaa torba magaalaa NYCtti daawwannaaf akka qaama agarsiisa fiilmii Afiriikaa Niwyoorkii fi agarsiisa fiilmii waggaa Sheebaa 13ffaa dhiyaataniiru.

en: A Swedish court sentences Claver Berinkindi, a 61-year-old Swedish citizen originally from Rwanda, to life in prison for participation in the Rwandan genocide in 1994.
om: Mannii murtii Swiidin bara 1994 Ruwandaa keessatti yakka duguggaa sanyii keessatti hirmattaniitu himannaa jedhuun manguddoo umurii 61 lammii Siwidiin dhalootaan Ruwaandaa kan ta'an Klaaver Beerinkindii hidha umurii guutuun adabe.

en: Tens of millions of Hindus bathe in the Ganges River in the Indian city of Allahabad during the Maha Kumbh Mela festival.
om: Hordoftoonnii amantii Hinduwizimii miliyoona kudhaniin lakkaa'aman Laga Gangisii isa magaalaa Hindii Allahabaad keessaatti yeroo festivaala Maha Kumb Mela dhaqna dhiqatan.

en: In 2011, all the regions in the country except the Somali Region were validated for MNTE.
om: Bara 2011 keessa, Naannoo Somaalee irraa kan hafe naannolee hundi biyyattii keessaa MNTE'f mirkaneeffamaniiru.

en: He has long been one of the highest selling contemporary Ethiopian artists.
om: Artisoota Itoophiyaa yeroo ammaatti gurgurtaa olaanaa qaban keessaa tokko ta'eera.

en: However, if it does not get water, the seed will give output once in year during the rainy season, said the Minister Eng. Getahun Mekuria.
om: Haatahu malee, yoo bishaan hin argatu tahe, ijichi waggaatti yeroo tokko yeroo waqtii roobaa ija kenna, jedhe Ministeerichi Eng. Geetahun Mekuriyaa.

en: Designed by Hong Kong firm Hanson Robotics, Sophia has been programmed to speak Amharic, Ethiopia’s official language.
om: Dhaabbata Roobootiksii Hong Koongin kan wixineeffame, Sofiyaan afaan hojii Itoophiyaa Afaan Amaaraa akka dubbattuuf saganteeffamtee jirti.

en: Vladimir Putin orders troops near the Ukraine border to return to their bases with Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov calling the military exercises a "success".
om: Vilaadimir Puutin shaakala waraanichaa "milka'aa" jechuun loltoonni naannoo daangaa Yukireeyin jiran gara buufatoota isaaniitti akka deebi'an karaa dubbi himaa Kireemiliin Dimiitirii Peskoov ajaje.

en: This is to be a four year project and is to support Ethiopia’s priority in helping improve its national curriculum.
om: Kun pirojektii waggaa afurii taha akkasumas kaarikulamii barnootaa biyyoolessaa waan Itoopiyaan dursa laattuuf deggeruufi.

en: In athletics, Lamine Diack of Senegal is elected unopposed to another term as President of the International Association of Athletics Federations.
om: Atileetiksii keessatti, Lamiinii Diyaak'n Senegaal akka Pirasdaantii Waldaa Federeeshinii Atileetiksii Addunyaatti mormii malee marsaa biraaf filatame.

en: “The education system at present highly encourages science and innovation starting from the bottom; and through this we can establish and find many scientists in every child that can help our day to day life in a scientific way,” he stated.
om: "Sirni barnootichaa caalmaatti saayinsii fi kalaqa yeroo ammaa godaa eegalee jajjabbeessa, dabalees karaa kanaan daa'ima hunda keessatti saayintistoota hedduu jiruu guyyuu keenya karaa saayinsawaa ta'een gargaaran ni arganna" jedheera.

en: That particular Monday, Kaÿn Lab joined forces with Nur M. Adam, a trumpeter for a night of impromptu performances.
om: Wiixata sana, Kaayin Laab garee baandiitti Nur M. Adam waltajjiiwwan itti qophaa'amneef taphataa tiraampeetii kan ta'e waliin makamaniiru.

en: He further remarked that the milestones achieved in the planning and implementation of the annual initiative need to be duplicated in various sectors, facilitating Ethiopia’s inevitable prosperity.
om: Inni itti dabalee bakki karooraa fi raawwii kaka'umsa waggaa waggaa dhaqqabame sekteroota baayyee keessatti dabalamuu dabalamuun, badhaadhina Itoopiyaa isa hin hafne milkeessuu qaba jedhe.

en: Ethiopia’s first success at the Cannes Film Festival tells a simple tale, but the film’s director has set his sights on the world stage thanks to support from the French film industry.
om: Milkaa'inni jalqabaa Itoopiyaa Festivaalaa Fiilmii Kaannes irrattii oduu durii salphaa tokko hima, garuu galata industirii fiilmii Faransaayi daarikeeterri fiilmichaa ija isaa waltajjii addunyaa irra kaa'e.

en: The revenue increased by $224.5 million or 20% compared to the same period last year, according to the Ministry of Trade and Industry.
om: Akka ministeera Daldalaa fi Industiriitti galiin miliyoona $224'n yookin 20%'n bara darbee waliin yeroo wal bira qabamu dabaleera.

en: Comic books are increasingly becoming a popular medium for visual storytelling and many young digital artists are venturing into the field.
om: Kitaabotni qoosaa fakkiin oduu-himuuf karaa beekamaa tahaa dhufaa jira akkasumas artistoonni dijitaalaa dargaggoon baayyeen gara muummee kanaatti seenaa jiru.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed (PhD) met and discussed with members and leaders of opposition political parties who have returned home and those who are conducting their political activities in the country following the call by the PM during his inaugural speech back in April.
om: Muummeen Ministeeraa Itoopiyaa Abiy Ahimed (PhD) miseensota fi hoogganoota jaarmiyaa siyaasaa mormitootaa kanneen waamicha MM'chaa haasaa yeroo eebbaa Ebla keessa hordofuun biyyatti deebi'anii fi sochiilee siyaasaa isaanii biyyattii keessatti geggeessaa jiran wajjjin walargee mari'ate.

en: A Libyan starts court proceedings against 41 people accused of helping Muammar Gaddafi to attempt to suppress the opposition in the Libyan Civil War.
om: Liibiyaan mormii walwaraansa biyya keessaa irratti godhame ukkaamsuu kessatti Muammer Gaadaffi gargaruudhaan shakkaman 41 irratti himatama bane.

en: Solve IT 2020 will be implemented by iCog Labs, with sponsorship from the US Embassy, JICA Ethiopia, the Federal Small and Medium Manufacturing Industry Promotion Authority, and the Federal Urban Job Creation and Food Security Agency.
om: Soolv IT'n 2020 Laabota iCog'n, deggersa Imbasii US, JICA Itoopiyaa, Abbaa Taayitaa Beeksisa Industirii Manufakcheriingii Xixiqqa fi Giddugaleessaa Federaalaa, fi Ejensii Hojii Uumuu Magaalaa fi Wabii Nyaataa'n hojiirra oolfama

en: Two weeks after Elon Musk expressed his intentions of making Tesla, Inc. private, he and the company's board announce that the company will remain publicly listed.
om: Iloon Maask Teslaa, Ink. dhuunfaa gochuuf kaayyoosaa erga agarsiise torban lama booda, dhaabbatichi akka ifaan tarreeffamuu itti fufu innii fi boordiin dhaabbatichaa beeksisan.

en: He will also meet with Noel Daniel, who is a cofounder at Africa ‘Tech Next’, a global series of panel events on African tech entrepreneurship and market opportunities in the continent’s unfolding digital revolution.
om: Akkasumas Naa'ol Daani'el, hundeessaa Afirikaatti 'Teek Nekist', jijjiramaa dijitaalaa itti fufaa Afiriikaa keessatti sagantaa walitti fufaa qophii panaalii hojii-uumuu gama tekinooloojii Afiriikaa fi caarraa gaabaa waliin ni mari'ata jedhamee eegama.

en: Fiji declares a 30-day state of natural disaster in areas affected by Cyclone Harold.
om: Fiijiin yeroo balaa uumamaa guyyaa 30 naannoo Saayikloonii Haaroldiin miidhameetti labsite.

en: North Korea says it will put on trial two American tourists, Jeffrey Fowle and Michael Miller, for crimes against the state.
om: Kooriyaan kaabaa Tuuristoota lammiilee Ameerikaa lamaan Jeefrey Foowil fi Maaykel Miler yakka mootummaa irratti dalaganiin dhaddachatti akk dhiyeessitu himte.

en: The 12th annual meeting of the Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) concludes meeting re-electing Abay Woldu as a chairperson.
om: Jaarmiyichi dhalooti dargaggootaa sababoota qabsoo hidhannootti paarticha geessan hubachuu akka qabaniifi akkasumas adeemsa biyyattiin gara haara'umsaa eegalte mirkaneessuu akka qaban yaadachiise.

en: Seven-time Prime Minister of Italy Giulio Andreotti dies in Rome at the age of 94 years.
om: Muummeen Ministeeraa yeroo torbaa Xaaliyaanii Juliyoo Andireettii Room keessattu umrii waggaa 94tti du'e.

en: In cricket, the Boxing Day Test commences at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, with Australia playing against India.
om: Kirikeet keessatti, Booksiing Dey Teestiin falmii Awustiraaliyaan Hindii waliin gootuun dachee kachoo Meelboorn irratti ni eegala.

en: EPA quoted Prof. Fekadu Beyene saying “The country’s forest cover has hit 17.2 percent.
om: EPA'n haasaa Prof. Fiqaaduu Bayyanee "Uwwisi bosona biyyattii dhibbantaa 17.2 gahe" jechuun irra deebi'e.

en: Protests broke out in front of hospitals across Greece to oppose compulsory vaccination for healthcare workers which takes effect today that risk dismissal of 10,000 unvaccinated workers.
om: Hospitaalota Giriik keessatti argaman duratti mormiin talaalli dirqamaan hojjettoota fayyaatif kennamuu har'a ka'eera, kunis hojiirra ari'atamu hojjeettota fayyaa hin talaalaman 10,000 fida.

en: Dlamini-Zuma told the executive council of the 54-member body, meeting at the bloc’s headquarters in the Ethiopian capital Addis Ababa, of the urgent need to “craft a united, comprehensive and collective African response” to the outbreak.
om: Dilamini-Zuumaan mana maree addaa qaama miseensa 54 qabu sana, Waajjira ijoo garichaa magaalaa Guddoo Itoopiyaa Addis Ababaa keessatti walgahuun, barbaachisummaa atattamaa "deebii Afirikaa, tokkummaa'e, hunda uwwisee fi waliigalaan tahee" weeraricha ittisuun barbaachisaa akka tahe akeekkachise.

en: For much of the race – which doubled as the Ethiopian trials – she churned out 72-second laps before powering home in a final lap of 63 seconds, despite having to weave between other runners, to finish in 29:01.03.
om: Dorgommicha harka caalu - kan yaalii lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa dachaan dabale - seekondii 72 dursitee of humneeessun humneessa sekoondii 63 dura dhiibbaa fiigdota biroo waliin qabaachuun osoo hin ittifamne, 29:01.03tti xumuruuf

en: The prehistoric bird Pelagornis sandersi is identified as the largest flying bird yet discovered.
om: Allaattin seena qabeessi Peelaagoornis Sandeersiin allaattiiwwan barrisoo hanga ammaatti qorataman keessaa isa guddicha ta'uun isaa adda bahe.

en: The name Meskel derives from the Amharic term Holy Cross.
om: Maqaan Masqal jedhu jecha afaan Amaariffaa Fannoo Qulqulluu jedhu irraa dhufe.

en: Manchester United player Rio Ferdinand may face a disciplinary procedure after his sarcastic hand-clapping gesture before Cüneyt Çakır at the end of the game.
om: Taphataan Maanchester Yunaayitid Riyoo Fredinaand dhuma taphichaa irratti Cüneyt Çakır duratti agarsiisa harka walitti rukutuu faallaa isaatiif tarkaanfiin naamusaa isa eeggachuu mala.

en: Art contributes tremendously in raising morale during times of war.
om: Yeroo waraanaatti aartiin hamilee kakaasuuf gahee olaanaa qaba.

en: 2020 NFL season The National Football League will require all coaches and staff in bench areas to wear masks.

en: A study finds a correlation between snoring as a toddler and behavior problems later in childhood.

om: Weerara COVID-19 Silooveniyaa: Silooveeniyaan lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaa qaban erga Ebla 1 as isa guddicha, sa'atii 24 darban keessatti lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaan qaban 55 gabaase.

en: In 2018, Prime Minister Abiy’s administration announced commitment to liberalize the telecommunication sector and opened it up to domestic and foreign investments.
om: Bara 2018 keessa, Bulchiinsi Muummee Ministeeraa Abiy sektera telekoomunikeeshinii walaboomsuu fi Inveestimentii biyya keessaa fi biyya alaaf banaa gochuu beeksise

en: 64 Ethiopian illegal immigrants are found dead and 14 alive inside a cargo container on a lorry in Tete Province, Mozambique, apparently having died of asphyxiation.
om: Moozaambik kutaa bulchiinsa Teente keessatti baqattota seeraan alaa lammii Itiyoopiyaa ta'an konteeynarii fe'umsaatiin konkolaataa kessatti fe'amuun imalaa turan sababa qilleensa ga'aa dhabuun ukkaamamanii namoonni 14 lubbuun yoo bararaman namoonni 64 ammoo lubbuun darbaniiru.

en: A bomb targets a mosque in the city of Parachinar near the border with Afghanistan killing at least 22 people and wounding dozens more.
om: Haleellaan boombii masjiida magaalaa Parachiinaar iddoo daangaa Afgaanistaanitti dhiyoo tokko irratti qiyyaafate yoo xiqqaate namoota 22 ajjeesuun namoota darzanootaan lakkaa'aman madeesse.

en: Scottish Liberal Democrat leader Tavish Scott resigns after a collapse of his party's support at the Scottish Parliament election.
om: Geggeessaan Liberaal Dimokiraasii Iskootilaand Taavish Iskoot filannoo Paarlaamaa Iskootilaand keessatti deggersi jaarmiyaa isaa erga kufee booda aangoo gadhiisuufi.

en: The Board of Directors of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences decides to strip Harvey Weinstein of membership following several allegations of predatory sexual behavior.
om: Boordiin daayirekterota akkaadaamii Aartii Mooshin pikcheersii fi sayinsii Haarveey Weenistan sababa himannaa hedduu amala quunnamtii saalaatiin walqabatee miseensumma irra kaasuuf murteesse.

en: The Addis Ababa City Beautification, Park and Cemetery Development Agency announced that it will soon inaugurate six mulita-purpose parks in the city, which include features satisfying all age groups.
om: Magaalaa Addis Ababaa Miidhagsuu, Paarkii fi Ejensiin bakka Owwaalcha Misoomsu dhiyootti paarkiiwwan dhimma garagaraa ja'a, kan waan garee umrii hunda gammachiisu of keessaa qabu magaalattii keessatti akka eebbisiisu beeksise.

en: All 800 homes in the five tower blocks of the Chalcots Estate, in Camden, London, are evacuated after the cladding was declared to have failed fire safety tests.
om: Landan , kaamdeeen kutaa bulchiinsa Chaalkootis keessatti gamoolee shan irra manneen jireenyaa 800 ta'an hundarrattii yaaliin mirkaneessa ittisa balaa abiddaa godhame fashalawusaatiin jirattonni akka ba'an taasifame.

en: US health insurers gave over $86.2million to the Chamber of Commerce last year for the purpose of opposing the health-care overhaul.
om: Dhiyeessitoonni inshuraansii fayyaa US dhimma kunuunsa-fayyaa bira darbuu mormuu waggaa darbeef miliyoona $86.2 ol waldaa daldaltootaaf kennan.

en: The leaders of northern and southern Cyprus meet in Switzerland to restart talks about reuniting the island.
om: Bulchitoonni kaabaa fi kibba Qoophiros Siwiizerlaand keessatti wal arguun marii waa'ee odolicha walitti tokkummeessuu irra deebiin jalqaban.

en: According to a statement issued by the Ministry of Water, Irrigation and Energy of Ethiopia, the three countries negotiated on technical issues on the first filling and annual operation of the dam.
om: Akka ibsa Ministiriin Bishaanii, Jallisii fi Annisaa Itoopiyaa baasetti, biyyoonni sadan dhimma teekinikaa guutamuu jalqabaa fi adeemsa hojii waggaa waggaanii hidhichaa irratti mari'atan.

en: France reports its first death from the Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus as Saudi Arabia advises of five new cases.
om: Faransaayi du'a jalqabaa isa dhukkuba hargansuu Giddu galeessa Bahaan mudate yeroo gabaastu Saa'ud Arabiyaan ammoo namootni haaraa dhukkubichaan qabaman shan akka jiran hubachiifte

en: The Department of Health of the Philippines discover an additional two cases of Zika virus infections bringing the total to eight.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa Filiphiinsi dhukkubni vaayirasii Zikkaa dabalataa lama akka argamee fi waliigala gara saddeetiitti akka guddatu bira gahe.

en: Gunmen break into the home of an anti-terrorism police officer in the Baghdad suburbs, killing him and his family.
om: Namoonni qawwee hidhatan mana poolisii faallaa shororkeessummaa hojjetu tokko kan qarqara Baagidaad cabsanii seenuun isaa fi maatii isaa ajjeesan.

en: Tens of thousands of people march in Asia, Europe and North America, protesting against job cuts, inequality, and austerity measures.
om: Namoonni kumoota kudhanitti lakkaama'aman Eeshiyaa, Awurooppaa fi Ameerikaa Kaabaa keessatti, hojii hir'suu, dhabiinsa walqixxummaa, fi tarkaanfii qusannaa mormuudhaan hiriira bahan.

en: The government has enacted a law that compels salt producers to iodize the salt.
om: Mootummaan seera oomishtoonni soogiddaa akka inni ayoodinii qabaatu godhan dirqamsiisu baase,

en: Uber agrees to pay $20 million to settle U.S. Federal Trade Commission claims the company exaggerated prospective earnings and downplayed the costs of buying/leasing a car when recruiting new drivers.
om: Yuuber iyyannoo Komiishinii Daldalaa Federaalaa U.S. kan dhaabbatichi yeroo konkolaachistoota haaraa qaxaru galii fuulduratti eegamu garmalee ol guddisuu fi gatiiwwan bittaa/kiraa konkolaataa gadi buusu furuuf miliyoona 20$ kanfaluuf waliigale

en: However, the state minister pointed out that it will return back in Belg season.
om: Haa ta'u malee, Ministeerri Biyyaa waqtii Belg'tti akka deebi'an yaada kennanii jiru.

en: Ahmed Shide for his part said “the Cooperation Framework is the planned support of the UN Agencies to the national development priorities of Ethiopia as shown in the Ten Years Perspective Plan and the Home Grown Economic Reform.”
om: Ahmed Shidee gama isaan "Caasaan Waldeggersaa deggersa ejensiilee UN irraa guddina biyyoolesaa Itoopiyaa dursi kennameef akka Karoora Waggoota Kudhan gara fuulduraa fi Rifoormii Diinagdee Biyya Keessaa keessatti agarsiimetti karoorarfameedha.

en: Carworkers in South Africa end their eight-day strike with a 10% pay deal.
om: Hojjetooonni makiinaa Afirikaa Kibbaa keessaa waliigaltee kanfaltii 10%'n tarkaanfii hojii dhaabuu isaanii guyyoota saddeetii dhaaban.

en: In Somalia, a new parliament is formed, with the new task of electing the country's president.
om: Somaaliyaa keessatti mannii maree bakka bu'oota ummataa haaraan uumame kun filannoo Pireezidaantii haaraa biyyattiif akka taasisu eegama.

en: Officials of the region who visited factories in good standing conducted a half-day discussion with factories in the region on issues of environment protection today.
om: Anga'oonni naannochaa warshaalee sadarkaa gaarii irra jiran daawwatan warshaalee waliin dhimmoota eegumsa naannoo irrattti maree walakkaa-guyyaa har'a taasisan.

en: Donald Trump announces that he canceled his ceremony for the Super Bowl LII champion Philadelphia Eagles at the White House due to the National anthem protests controversy.
om: Doonaald Tiraamp qophii champiyoonaa Suupper Boowul LII, Filaadelfiyaa Eegiliif Waayit Haawosiitti qopheessuuf ture sababa mormii waldhabdee faaruu alaabaa Biyyaaleessaaf haquu isaa beeksise.

en: Jared Lee Loughner has been indicted on 49 counts in relation to the 2011 Tucson shooting in the US state of Arizona.
om: Jared Lee Laafner himannaa dhukaasa bara 2011 Tuksaan,biyyaa US magaalaa Arizoonaa kessatti rawwatameen walqabatee himannaaleen 49 irratti dhiyaate.

en: Iranian police arrest 46 people in fresh crackdowns on models and associated colleagues posting "immoral images" on Instagram.
om: Poolisoonni Iraan Modeelotaafi namoota hojilee isaan walfakkaatan keessatti hirmaatan kan toora Instagiramii irratti suuraalee safuu hin qabne gadilakkisan adabuuf jecha namoota 46 to'annaa jala oolche.

en: Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton are voted the most admired man and woman in the United States, according to Gallup's annual poll.
om: Akka dhaabatni galap yaada uummata irraa walitti qabeen ibsetti, Baarak Obaamaa fi Hilaarii kilintan namicha fi dubartii hunda caalaa ajaa'ibsifaman ta'uun filatamaniiru.

en: Ministry of Health has launched integrated measles, Vitamin A, and de-worming campaign for displaced people in Gedeo Zone of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples Region.
om: Ministirri Eegumsa Fayyaa duula walqabataa miizilii, Vaayitaamin A fi Raammo irraa bilisa baasuu ummata Zoonii Geedoo Nannoo Saboota, Sablammootaa fi ummattoota Kibbaa keessaa buqqa'aniif eegale.

en: The election will be held on tomorrow in Addis Ababa. Haile will be representing Addis Ababa competing with other officials from regional states.
om: Filannichi boor Addis Ababaa keessatti geggeeffama. Haayileen Addis Ababaa bakka bu'uun namoota biroo mootummoota naannolee irraa dhufaniin dorgoma.

en: In delivering opening remarks, State Minister H.E. Ambassador Redwan Hussien said the workshop demonstrates Ethiopia’s unwavering determination to be at the forefront of climate change issues in the international arena.
om: Haasaa baniinsaa kennu keessatti, Itti aaanaan Ministeera H.E Ambassadarri Reedwaan Huseen woorkshooppichi waltajjii addunyaa irratti dhimma jijjiirama qilleensaa irratti dursa ta'uuf kutannoo Itoopiyaa hin sochoone agarsiisa jedhan.

en: Hong Kong orders the destruction of 20,000 chickens after the H7N9 bird flu strain is found in chickens imported from mainland China.
om: Hoong koong sababa dhukkubni qufa simbira H7N9 handaqqoo biyya chaayinaarraa gara biyyattii seenan irratti mul'achuusaatiin handaqqoleen 20000 akka barbadeeffaman ajaja dabarsite

en: This time around however, Festal Tigray was for the first time celebrated colorfully in Mekelle the capital city of Tigray National Regional State.
om: Haata'u malee, yeroo kana, Feestaal Tigraay yeroo jalqabaaf Maqalee magaalaa guddoo Mootummaa Naannoo Tigraay keessatti haala ho'aa taheen kabajame.

en: The latest forecast puts Ethiopia at a percentage point behind Ghana.
om: Raagni dhiyeenyaa tuqaa dhibbentaatin Itoophiyaa Gaanaa duuba kaa'a.

en: India suspends rescue operations due to heavy rain in Jammu and Kashmir state where over 100,000 still await rescue.
om: Sababa rooba ulfaaataa naannoo Jammuu fi Kaashmir keessaaf Hindiin bakka namoonni 100,000 ammallee baafamuuf eeganitti hojii namoota baraaruu adda kutte.

en: The night parrot is confirmed sighted (and photographed) in Western Australia for first time in nearly 100 years.
om: Paarotiin halkanii Dhiya Awustiraaliyaa keessatti gara waggoota 100 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf ijaan argamuu (akkasumas suura kaafamuun) mirkanaa'e.

en: An archaeologist discovers a 25 m (82 ft)-wide ring cairn dating back to the Bronze Age near Tidenham, Gloucestershire.
om: Arkiyoolojistiin tokko naannoo Tidenhaam, Giluusestershaayir'tti amartii awaalame 25 m (82 ft) bal'atu kan barri isaa gara Bara Biroonziitti lakkaa'amu argate.

en: Former President of Bolivia Evo Morales lands in Argentina after being granted asylum.
om: Pirasdaantiin duraanii Boliiviyaa Evoo Moorales erga koolu galtummaa argatee booda Arjentiinaa keessa qubate.

en: Nowadays multiple skateboarding parks have been built in recognition of the culture after years of the youth skating in unauthorized and dangerous streets due to the unavailability of proper venues.
om: Waggootaaf bakki mijataan dhibuun erga dargaggoonni daandiiwwan hin eeyyamamnee fi hamoo tahan irra isteek godhanii booda, yeroo ammaa kana paarkiiwwan isteekboordiing baayyeen aadichaaf beekamtii kennuun ijaaramaniiru.

en: The Plumas County Sheriff's Office orders mandatory evacuations in the area amid the spread of the Dixie Fire.
om: Waajjirri Bulchaa Kaawuntii Piluumaas akkuma abiddi Diksii tatamsa'een naannicha keessaa baafamuu namootaa dirqama ta'e ajaje.

en: The United States and Australia issue travel warnings for India following the shooting of two Taiwanese tourists outside the Jama Masjid mosque in Delhi.
om: Dhukaasaan ajjeefamuu tuuristoota lammii Taa'iwan lama kan bakkee Masjiida Jaamaa Deelii keessattii hordofuun Yunaayitid Isteetisii fi Awustiraaliyaan akeekachiisaa imalaa Hindii irratti baasan.

en: Los Angeles experiences all-time record high temperature day at 45°C or 113F.
om: Loos Anjiles tempireechara guyyaa isa seena qabeessa olaanaa yeroo hundumaa 45°C yookaan 113F keessumeessite.

en: In an unprecedented move, Members of Parliaments (MPs), the 100 percent Ethiopian Peoples’ Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) and affiliates controlled Ethiopian Parliament, demanded to ascertain the country's external debt repayment capacity, before ratifying new concessional loan agreements recently entered into with the Government of China.
om: Deemsa hin talmaamneen, Miseensonni Paarlaamaa (MP), Addi Diimokiraatawaa Warraaqsa Ummata Itoopiyaa (EPRDF) dhibbantaa 100 fi kan isatti hidhata qabu Paarlaamaa Itoopiyaa qabatanii jiran, waliigaltee liqa haaraa dhiyeenya Mootummaa Chaayinaa wajjin seename mirkaneessuun dura mirkan dandeettii liqa alaa deebisanii kanfaluu biyyattii mirkaneessuu gaafatan,

en: The one-day exhibition is part of the annual celebrations to mark the 120th anniversary of the diplomatic relations between Ethiopia and the Russian Federation.
om: Agarsiisi guyyaa tokko sun qaama qophii waggaa waggaan walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii Itoopiyaa fi Federeeshinii Raashiyaa gidduu 120ffaa yaadachuuti.

en: Ministry of Mines announced that it will be implementing a policy change that will give metal and steel manufactures access to local iron ore in order to produce steel bars.
om: Ministeerri Albuudaa jijjiirama immaammataa oomishtoota sibiilaa fi hojii sibiilaa albuuda sibiilaa naannoo akka argatan dandeessisu kabala sibiilaa hojjechuuf dandeessisu hojiirra oolchaa jira.

en: UNDP Country director Louise Chamberlain said on her part that the goal of the plan can only be achieved with strong involvement of the people of Ethiopia and government leaders at all levels and across the country through strong partnerships.
om: Daayirekteerri biyyaa UNDP Laawuzii Chaamberliyaan gama isheetin galmi karoorichaa qoda fudhannaa cimaa ummata Itoophiyaa fi hoggantoota cimaa sadarkaa hundaa fi michummaa cimaa guutummaa biyyaa qofaan milkaa'a.

en: Chaos erupts in Stockholm after the Swedish Public Employment Service by mistake invites 61,000 persons to the same job interview.
om: Erga dogoggoraan Tajaajilli Qaxarrii Hawaasaa Iswiidin af-gaaffii hojii walfakkaataaf namoota 61,000 waamee booda Istookoolm keessatti jeequmsi kahe.

en: The Ethiopian economy will maintain its growth lead for the East African region according to the latest World Bank report.
om: Diinadgeen Itoophiyaa dursummaa guddina naannoo bahaa Afiriikaatiif akka gabaasaa dhiyeenyaa Baankii Adunyaatti ni tursiisti.

en: Rebelling government troops in Mali storm the state broadcaster in the capital Bamako.
om: Loltoonni mootummaa fincilan magaalaa guddoo Maalii Bamaakoo keessatti tamsaasa midiyaa biyyattii caccabsan.

en: Sewit disagrees with this statement.
om: Seewit hima kana waliin walii hin galtu.
