en: The United Nations World Food Program suspends a food program for 1.7 million Syrian refugees after donor countries fail to meet their commitments.
om: Sagantaan Nyaataa Addunyaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii erga biyyoonni arjooman waadaa isaanii eeguu dadhabanii booda sagantaa nyaataa baqattoota Sooriyaa miliyoona 1.7'f godhaa ture adda kute.

en: The Ethiopian national elections scheduled for August, 2020 were postponed due to the threat posed by the Coronavirus pandemic.
om: Filannoon biyyooleessaa Itoophiyaa Hagayya, 2020'f karoorfame daafii rakkoo weerara Vaayiresii Koronaatif darbeera.

en: An intoxicated hit-and-run driver in Austin, Texas, United States, drives into a nighttime crowd at the South by Southwest festival, killing two and injuring 23
om: Yuunaytid Isteetis, Teeksaas, Awustin keessatti konkolaachisaan machiin rukutanii miliquu walitti qabama uummataa galgalaa Kibbaa agarsiisa Kibbadhihaa keessa oofuun namoota lama yeroo ajjeesuu 23 ammoo miidhaa irratti qaqqabsiisee jira.

en: US Acting Assistant Secretary for African Affairs Donald Yamamoto said US needs to have a significant contribution for the industrial park development of Ethiopia.
om: Gargaara barreessaan raawwii dhimmoota Afirikaa Amerikaa Donaald Yamamootoon Ameerikaan gumaachaa guddaa babal'ina paarkii industirii Itoophiyaatiif gochuu qabdi jedhaniiru.

en: Ethiopia, the largest investment destination for Turkey in Africa, has attracted close to half of the latter’s investment in the continent.
om: Itoophiyaa, ga'umsa investimentii guddicha turkii Afrikaatti, investimentii ardichaa walakkaatti siqatu hawwateetti.

en: A few weeks after the controversial draft law establishing the Office of the Federal Attorney General got the approval of members of the parliament (MPs), the government has submitted yet another controversial draft law to provide for the computer crime.
om: Erga wixineen seeraa walfalmsiisaan hundeeffama Waajjira Abbaa Alangaa Federaalaa mirkaneessa miseensota paarlaamaa (MP) argatee torbanoota muraasa booda, mootummaan ammas yakka kompiwuteraaf dhiyeessuuf wixinee seeraa walfalmisiisaa kan biraa galche.

en: Near the town of Ramle, Israeli archeologists uncover hundreds of gin and whiskey bottles dating back to the First World War at the site of a former British Army barracks.
om: Naannawaa magaalaa Ramilaattii Arkiyoolojistoonnii Israa'el qaruuraa dhugaatii Jiinii fi Wiiskii waggaa dhibboota lakkoofsise kan yeroo waraana adunyaa tokkoffaa manneen bultii loltoota Biriteen duraanii jalaa qotanii baasan.

en: Five months after Ethiopia and Eritrea officially ended a two-decade old stalemate and somewhat restored normalcy in relations, President Sahle-work Zewde received a credentials letter of the newly appointed Eritrean head of mission, Semere Russom at the National Palace on Thursday.
om: Itoophiyaa fi Eritiraan ifatti wal dhabdee cufamaa waggoota kurnan lamaa dhabanii fi hamma ta'een walitti dhufeenya isaanii deebisanii ji'oota shan booda, Pirezidaantiin Sahile-Warq Zawudee xalayaa muudamaa Dura-ta'aa ergamaa Eritiraa haaraa Semmeree Rusoom masaraa biyyoolessaatti kamisa fudhataniiru.

en: With the celebration of the UNESCO registered Timket fesival approaching, restoration of Jan-Meda, the open field where the festival is celebrated, has been intensified, Addis Ababa City Deputy Mayor Adanech Abiebie said today.
om: Kabaji Feestivaala cuuphaa isa UNESCO'tti galmaa'ee dhiyaachuun walqabatee, Jaan-Meedaa, bakkee banaa itti festivaalichi kabajamu haaressuun jabaatee itti fufeera jette Itti aantuun Kantiibaa Magaalaa Addis Ababaa Adaanech Abeebee har'a.

en: The Ethiopian Catholic Church Cardinal Berhaneyesus C.M., on his part said that the faithful should commemorate and celebrate the holiday with the essence of helping, caring and loving for the well being of others' lives.
om: Kaardinaalli Waldaa Kaatolikii Itoopiyaa Birhaaneyesuus C.M., gama isaatiin warri amanan guyyaa ayyaanaa fayyummaa waliigalaa jireenya nama biraaf gargaaruuf, kunuunsuu fi jaallachuun yaadachuu fi kabajuu qabu jedhe.

en: Protests against the government resume in Santiago due to food shortages in the poorest neighborhoods of the city created by the lockdown to control the COVID-19 pandemic.
om: Mormiin mootummaa irratti godhamu Santiyaagoo keessatti sababa naannoo baayyee hiyyeessa magaalichaa keessatti hanqinni nyaataa sababa to'annoo weerara COVID-19'f mana turuun uumameef eegale.

en: There is a near riot in the Beijing Apple Store as the Apple iPad 2 goes on sale in the People's Republic of China.
om: Akka Aappil iPad 2'n Reppaabilika Ummataa Chaayinaa keessatti gurguramuu eegaleen Kuusaa Aappil Beejingi keessatti jeequmsi ka'uu gahee ture.

en: The delegation is expected to submit two proposals that Ethiopia has prepared to be discussed and decided up on the meeting.
om: Jilichi piropoozaalaa Itoophiyaan akka irratti mari'atmuu fi murtaa'uuf qopheesite ni dhiyeessa jedhamee eegama.

en: The Ministry of Trade and Industry (MoTI) as well as the Ministry of Mines, Petroleum and Natural Gas said they are not authorized to control fuel distribution in the country.
om: Ministeerri Daldalaa fi Industirii (MoTI) akkasumas Ministeerri Albuudaa, Peetirooliyeemii fi Boba'aa Uumamaa raabsa boba'aa biyyatti keessatti to'achuuf akka hin aangeffamne dubbataniiru.

en: The 2018 Total CAF Women’s African Cup of Nations will be held in Ghana from November 17 to December 1, 2018.
om: Geeba Dubartootaa Biyyoota Afirikaa Tootaal CAF bara 2018 gaafa Sadaasa 17 hanga Mudde 1, 2018 tti Gaanaa keessatti geggeeffama.

en: A hot Air Balloon carrying an American family crashes killing one person and injures four in the Swiss town of Montbovon.
om: Afuuffeen Qilleensa ho'aa maatii lammii Ameerikaa baatee ture tokko magaalaa Siwiizerlaand Moontboovon keessatti kufuun nama tokko ajjeesee namoota afur ammoo madeesse.

en: He stated that the participation of the private sector in tourism and hospitality sectors has been good over the past years.
om: Hirmaannaan sektara dhuunfaa sektaroota tuurizimii fi keessumeessuu keessatti baroota darban keessatti dansaa ta'uu isaa heeraniiru.

en: England becomes the first host nation and first former finalist to be knocked out of the Rugby World Cup during the group stages following their defeat to Australia.
om: Ingilaand Awurooppaa dhaan injifatamuu iseetiin walqabatee sadarkaa gareetti dorgommii waancaa Raagbiitiin qopheessituu dorgommichaa fi hirmaattuu tapha xumuraa duraanii geggeeffamte isee jalqabaa taate.

en: He is expected to meet with Ethiopia’s ‘Tech Queen’ Betlhem Dessie, Project Manager at ‘ICog’, a tech firm dedicated to advancing the frontier of artificial intelligence research and application quality products to customer based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
om: "Mootitti Teekinooloojii" Itoophiyaa Beteliheem Dassee, hoji-geggeesituu 'Icog', dhaabbata teekinooljii gama teekinooloojii qorannoo artifishaal intelligensii fi oomisha mosaajii sadarkaa olaanaatti fiuuf maamiloota Finfinnee, Itoophiyaatti argamaniif dhiyyeessu hojjetu waliin ni mari'ata jedhamee eegama.

en: Amparo is a performer and composer from Stockholm who has been a fulltime musician for more than a decade.
om: Ampaaroon weellistuu fi qindeessituu Istookoolmii irraa kan waggoota kudhanii oliif muuziqessituu idilee turteedha.

en: University of Arkansas head football coach Bobby Petrino is fired because of misconduct involving an inappropriate relationship with a female employee.
om: Leenjisaa hoogganaan kubbaa miilaa Yuunibarsiitii Arkaansas, Boobii Peetiriinoo hojjetoota dubaraa wajjin walitti dhufeenya hin barbaachifne qabaachuu isaan walqabatee naamusa cabsuu isaan hojiirraa ari'ame.

en: The Chosunilbo newspaper in South Korea reports that Kim Pyong-il, the half-brother of current North Korean leader Kim Jong-il, is under house arrest in Pyongyang.
om: akka barruun Choosiilboo kan kooriyaa kibbaa keessatti argamu gabaasetti Kim Piyoong Iil obboleessa gartokkee geggeessaa Kooriyaa Kaabaa yeroo ammaa kim Juung Iil kan ta'e yeroo ammaa PiyoonYaangkeessatti hidhaa mana keessaa jala jira jedhame.

en: Lionel Messi of Argentina wins the FIFA Ballon d'Or as world football player for the second successive year.
om: Liyoonel Mesiin Arjentiinaa, walitti aansuun waggaa lammaffaaf akka taphataa kubbaa miilaa addunyaatti badhaasa Baalan doorii FIFA injifate.

en: India's economy rebounded at a record rate of 20.1% in the three months to the end of June even as a devastating second wave of COVID-19 hits the country.
om: Diinagdeen Hindii yeroodhuma dambalii COVID-19 lamataa hamaan biyyattii rukutetti ji'oota sadii keessatti hanga dhuma Waxabajjitti hamma seena qabeessa 20.1% tiin fooyya'e

en: The parties have so far been discussing on modalities of negotiation, which would serve them as a bylaw for their future dialogue.
om: Jaarmiyaaleen sunneen haga ammaatti karaalee marii, marii fuulduraaf seeraatti isaan gargaarau irratti mari'achaa turan.

en: A garment factory boiler explosion in Dhaka, Bangladesh, kills 10 people and injures dozens.
om: Baangilaadish, Dakaa keessatti balaa dhohiinsaa danfisaa warshaa huccuu irratti qaqqabeen namni 10 yoo du'u namoonni hedduun miidhamaniiru.

en: Harvard Law School Professor Lawrence Lessig announces his decision, via a four-minute YouTube video, to end his campaign for the 2016 Democratic Party presidential nomination.
om: Pirofeeserri Muummee Seeraa Haarvaard Laawurense Leesig, karaa viidiyoo Yuutiyuubii daqiiqaa afur dheeratuu, duula kaadhimummaa pirasdaantii Paartii Diimokiraatikii bara 2016 akka dhaabu beeksise.

en: Ethiopia's Environmental Analysis conducted by World Bank, Forest, Environment and Climate Change, Finance and Economic Cooperation ministries and Ethiopian Development Research Institute was launched here today.
om: Xiinxalli Eegumsa naannoo Itoopiyaa Baankii Addunyaa, Ministeerota Bosona, Eegumsa Naannoo fi Jijiiram qilleensaa, Faayinaansii fi Tumsa Diinagdee akkasumas Inistitiyuutii Qorannoo Guddinaa Itoopiyaan geggeeffame harra asitti eegalsiifame.

en: Canadian-American game show personality Alex Trebek suffers a mild heart attack, but is expected to "fully recover".
om: Qopheessaan qophii taphaa lammii Kaanaadaa fi Ameerikaa kan ta'e Aleeks Tireebek dhukkuba onnee salphaan rakkatus guutummaan guutuutti ni dandamata jedhame eegama.

en: Tanzanian authorities charge four people with negligence in relation to the Zanzibar ferry sinking that cost at least 240 lives on September 10.
om: Aangawoonnii Taanzaaniyaa balaa dhidhima doonii Zaanzibaar ji'a fulbaanaa gaafa guyyaa 10 mudatee,yoo xiqqaate lubbuu namootaa 240 galaafateen walqabatee miiraa maalnadhibdeen himatan afur adabe.

en: UEFA confirms that a new annual European football club competition called UEFA Europa League 2 will be introduced in 2021.
om: UEFA'n dorgommii haaraa waggaa waggaa kilabii kubbaa miilaa Awurooppaa, UEFA Awurooppaa Liig 2 jedhamu bara 2021 keessa akka jalqabu mirkaneesse.

en: In boxing, Carl Froch knocks out George Groves in the eighth round to retain the World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation super middleweight championships.
om: gama dorgomii Bunyaan Kaarl Firook badhaasota gamtaa tapha Bunyaa addunyaa fi Federeshiniin bunyaa idil addunyaa Shampiyeenshippii olaanaan ulfaatina giddu galeessaa turisiisuuf Joorj Groovsiin marsaa saddeettaffaatti injifate.

en: “The people of the two regions recently sat down and agreed to resolve their problems peacefully. The rent seekers have also been identified by the two regions, and were relieved of their position,” he added.
om: "Ummati naannolee lamaanii dhiyeenya kana taa'anii rakkoolee isaanii karaa nagaan furuuf waliigalan. Kiraa sassaabdonni naannolee lamaaniin adda baafaman aangoo isaanii irraa kaafamaniiru," jedhe itti dabalee.

en: Thousands of people attend the beatification of Pino Puglisi, a Roman Catholic priest murdered by the Sicilian Mafia for speaking out against crime. ,
om: Namoonni kumaatamni sirna biitifikeeshinii Piyaanoo Puglisiin qeesii Kaatolikii Roomaa yakka mormuun dubbachuu isaatiin Maafiyaa Siisiliitiin ajjeeffame irratti argamaniiru.

en: The 70th edition of FIFA congress, scheduled to be held in Addis Ababa, has been rescheduled due to coronavirus (COVID-19) fears.
om: Kongiresiin FIFA 70ffaan, Addis Ababaa keessatti geggeeffamuuf karoorfame, sababa sodaa vaayirasii koronaa (COVID-19)'f irra deebiin saganteeffame.

en: After discovering one, Ahmedin Shafi, who was caught red handed while producing foods, beverages and preservatives using outdated ingredients this week, the Ethiopian Food, Medicines and Health Care Administration and Control Authority (FMHCACA) have issued an order to the company to recall all of its products from the market although some of the items produced by the food processor are still sold in some markets outside of Addis Ababa.
om: Erga tokko adda baasanii, Ahmeddiin Shaafii, kan utuu nyaata, dhugaatii fi waan nyaata tursu qabiyyeewwan yeroo itti darbe irraa qopheessuu harkaa fi harkatti torbana kan qabame, Abbaan taayitaa Bulchiinsaa fi To'annoo Nyaataa, Qorichaa fi Eegumsa Fayyaa (FMHCACA) oomishi qaama nyaata qopheesu sanaa tokko tokko gabaalee Addis Ababaa alatti gurguramus dhaabbatichi oomisha isaa hunda gabaa irraa akka deebisu ajaja baase.

en: Ethiopian long distance running legend, Haile Gebrselassie, will be running a different race—he will be running for the presidency of the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF).
om: Gooti fiiigicha fageenya dheera Itoophiyaa, Haayilee Gebiresillaasee, dorgommii kan biraa irratti hirmaata - pirezdaantummaa Federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EAF)'f dorgoma.

en: Nokia signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Addis Ababa Science and Technology University and Addis Ababa Institute of Technology in order to collaborate and provide high-level technical skills to students in line with rapidly changing market needs.
om: Nookiyaan tumsuu fi dandeetti teekinikaa sadarkaa olaanaa barattoota haala fedhii gabaa ariitiin jijjiiramaa deemuu wajjin walsimaniif kennuuf Waligaltee Walhubannoo (MoU) Yuunivarsitii Saayinsii fi Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa fi Institiyuutii Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa wajjin mallatteesse.

en: After the appointment of a new coach, Seyoum Kebede, the army side seems to be in a good run of form.
om: Muudama leenjisaa Siyyum Kabbadee booda gamni ittisaa haala gaarii waan jiru fakkaata.

en: The Ethiopian Public Health Institute (EPHI) announced today that the rapid spread of COVID-19 across the country, the positivity rate, mounting severe cases and high death rates are exceedingly concerning.
om: Inistitiyuutiin Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaa (EPHI) har'a guutummaa biyyattii keessatti tatamsa'inni COVID-19 dabalaa dhufe, hammi posetiivii, dhibee cimaan dabaluunii fi hammi du'aa olka'uun akka malee akka nama yaaddessu beeksise.

en: Mayor of London and cabinet member Boris Johnson says that U.S. President Barack Obama is "inconsistent and hypocritical" in persuading the British people to remain in the European Union.
om: Kantiibaan London fi miseensi kaabinee Booris Joonson Pirasdaantiin U.S. Baaraak Obaamaan ummata Biriitish akka Gamtaa Awurooppaa keessa turu amasiisuu isaatiin "dhaabbata hin qabnee fi of tuulaa" dha jedhe.

en: Officials of the Guji Zone in the Oromia Regional State has denied plans of transferring the Kenticha Tantalum Mine to youth associations saying that it was “merely an idea to entertain rather than an actionable plan” and that it had no intention of depriving the federal Mining, Petroleum and Biofuel Corporation off its mining concession and processing facility.
om: Aangawoonni Godina Gujii Mootummaa Naannoo Oromiyaa karoora Bakka Albuuda Tantalum Baasuu Kentichaa gara waldaalee dargaggootti dabarsuu 'karoora hojiirra oolu utuu hin taane yaada bashannanaa salphaa ti' jechuun haale akkasumas Korporeeshinii Albuudaa, Peetirooliyemii fi Baayoofiyuulii Federaalaa hojii albuuda baasuu fi dhaabbaticha deemsisuu dhowwachuuf karoora akka hin qabnes beeksise.

en: Ethiopia and Equatorial Guinea today signed a reciprocal visa waiver agreement for holders of diplomatic and service passports.
om: Birraatuu Yigezuu, daarikteerri waliigalaa CSA, lakkoofsa ummataa sana ji'oota lama booda geggeessuuf qophiileen xumuramuu gahaa akka jiran kaleessa FBC tti hime.

en: A study of more than 10,000 people finds a correlation between cesarean section birth and childhood obesity.
om: Qorannoon namoota 10,000 ol hirmaachise walitti dhufeenya yaalii baqaqsanii yaaluun dhalachuu fi ulfaatina garmalee ijoollummaa gidduu akka jiru mul'ise.

en: According to World Health Organization report (2008), 63% of global cancer death, or 56% of new cancer cases, are in the developing world.
om: Akka gabaasa Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (2008)tti, 63% du'a kaanserii addunyawaa, yookaan 56% dhibeewwan kaanserii haaraa, addunyaa guddachaa jiran keessatti.

en: More than half of politicians in Benin call for impeachment proceedings against President Boni Yayi over his involvement in a Ponzi scheme.
om: Hoggantoonni siyaasaa Beenin walakkaa ol tahan karoora dhoksaa Poontiitti hirmaachuu isaaf adeemsi aangoorraa buufamuu Pirasdaantii Boonii Yaayyaa akka eegalamu waamicha dhiyeessan.

en: The relationship between aesthetic and commercial value especially in relation to the works of living and contemporary artists will add a layer of complexity to the objectivity of viewers.
om: Walitti dhufeenyi bareedinaa fi daldala gidduu keessumaa walitti dhufeenya jiruu fi artistoota yeroo ammaa irratti dachaa walxaxaa irraawwatamumma biraa daawwattottaaf dabala.

en: A cornerstone has been laid today, to build the Ethiopia’s first specialized cardiac care center in the capital at a cost of 40 million Euro.
om: Giddugala Ispeeshaalitii waldhaansa onnee isa jalqabaa Itoopiyaa magaala guddittii keessatti baasii Yuuroo miliyoona 40'n ijaaruuf har'a dhagaan bu'uura kahame.

en: Having successfully premiered “Lamb” in the director’s home city of Addis Ababa earlier this month, the filmmakers have turned their attention to their next important release: in France on September 30.
om: Milkaa'inaan "Laamb" erga magaalaa jireenyaa daarikteerichaa Addis Ababaa keessatti jalqaba ji'a kanaa gadhiifamee, qopheessitoonni fiilmichaa xiyyeeffannoo isaanii gadhiisuu murteessaa itti aanu: Gaafa Fulbaana 30 Faransaay keessatti tahu irra ka'aniiru.

en: Royals catcher Salvador Perez wins the World Series Most Valuable Player Award.
om: Eegaan(qabduun ) Rooyaalota kan ta'e Saalvaadoor Pereez badhaasa idilee taphata hedduu fayyaduu addunyaa mo'ate.

en: For one, it is one of the few states in the world where perplexities of a rosy economic prospect and tainted democratic and human rights track record has co-integrated for more than 15 years. The shorter version of this story goes like this.
om: Tokkoffaa, biyyoota muraasa addunyaa kan ilaalchi abdii diinagdee bitaa galee fi seenaa qabiinsa mirgoota diimokiraasii fi namoomaa badaa waggoota 15 oliif walkeessa gale keessaa ishee tokkodha. Gosti gabaabaan seenaa kanaa akkas taha.

en: Clashes take place at a demonstration calling for the resignation of former members of Zine El Abidine Ben Ali's regime in the interim government.
om: Mootummaa yeroo kana keessatti waamichi Hiriira mormii miseensota bulchiinsa Zeen el Abdiin Been Alii duraanii akka hojii gadi lakkisaniif godhamaa jiru irratti jeequmsi uumame

en: President Sahle-Work Zewde has met with the General Manager for Africa of CANAL+ Group who presented the company’s work in Ethiopia.
om: Pirasdaantiin SaahileWorqi Zawudee Geggeessaa Olaanaa Garee CANAL+ Afrikaa isa hojii kampanichi Itoopiyaa keessatti hojjechaa jiru ibseen wal argan.

en: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation which was selected Chair of the International Council for 2018 at the last conference held in London 2017 made the announcement today.
om: Konfiransii darbe kan Landan 2017tti gaggeeffame irratti dursaa Mana maree Idil Aduyaa t2018 a'uun kan filatame Korporeeshiniin Sukkaaraa Itoophiyaa har'a ifooma taasise.

en: Meat production today is nearly five times higher than in the early 1960s – from 70 million tonnes to more than 330 million tonnes in 2017.
om: Oomishi foonii harraa isa bara 1960 jalqabaa keessaa gara dachaa shaniin caala - toonii miliyoona 70 irraa bara 2017 keessa gara toonii miliyoona 330 olitti.

en: Association football icon Pelé announces that he will sell 1,500 lots of his possessions via Julien's Auctions, which will include his medals, trophies, jerseys, and diplomatic gifts.
om: urjii gamtaa kubbaa miilaa kan ta'e Pele'n badhaasota isaa Meedaliya, Geephota,uffannalee Ispoortii fi badhaasota Diplomasii kan ofkeessatti qabatu caalbaasiii Juuliyeeniin qabeenyaa isaa 150 ta'an akka gurguru beeksise.

en: Grassroots movements have spawned, taking locals on tours around historic sites in Addis Ababa and beyond
om: Sochiin lammiilee daawwannaa naannoo bakkeen seena qabeessa Finfinnee keessatti fi isaan alaatti gochuun babal'ateera.

en: Uzbek midfielder Server Djeparov is named Asian Footballer of the Year for the second time, in a ceremony held at the Asian Football Confederation headquarters.
om: taphataan sarara giddu Uuzbeek kan ta'e Dijeeperoov qophii teessoo dura ta'aa Konfedereshinii kubbaa Miilaa Eeshiyaa tti geggeeffameerratti yeroo lammaffaaf taphata cimaa Eshiyaa bara kanaa jedhamuun moggaafame.

en: South Africa will become the first African nation to host the Commonwealth Games as Durban is granted the rights to host the games in 2022.
om: Afirikaan Kibbaa, Daarban mirga taphoota bara 2022 keessaa geggeessuu argachuu ishiin biyya Afirikaa yeroo jalqabaaf Taphoota Koomonweelz geggeessitu taati.

en: Ethiopia’s earth observatory satellite will be launched into space by November 2019 as preparations are finalized, according to Ethiopian Space Science and Technology Institute.
om: Akka Inistitiyuutii Saayinsii fi Teekinoolojii Hawaa Itoopiyaa jedhetti, saatalaayitiin hordoffii lafaa Itoopiyaa qophiilee waan xumurameef Sadaasa 2019 tti gara hawaatti ni furguggifama.

en: His appointment was announced this week at Intercontinental Addis.
om: Muudamni isaa torban kana Interkontineental Addisitti beeksifame.

en: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is sentenced to death for his role in the Boston Marathon bombings.
om: Joohaar Sernaa'iv yakka Boombii dhokaasuu Bostan Maratoon keessatti rawwatame keessatti hirmaanna taasiseen murtee du'aatiin adabe.

en: The 39-page report entitled, “Human Smuggling and Trafficking on the Horn of Africa-Central Mediterranean Route” was made public February 19, 2016 during a consultation meeting organized by the new ISSP office, which was opened in Addis Ababa.
om: Gabaasichi fuula-39 mata dureen isaa, "Daddabarsa namaa seeraa alaa fi kontribaandii Karaa Gaanfa Afrikaa-Mediteraaniyaa Giddugaleessa" tahe gaafa Guraandhala 19, 2016 yeroo walgahii maree waajjira ISSO haaraan qindeeffame, kan Addis Ababaa keessatti baname irratti ifa tahe.

en: The Belgian Army assigns 16 sapping instructors to a train-the-trainer program in Katanga, DR Congo, from Saturday until year's end.
om: Humni waraanaa Beeljiyeem leenjistoota ciccimoo 16 sagantaa leenjisaa-leenjisuu jedhuuf Reppubilika Dimokiraatawaa Koongoo Kaataangaatti moggaafteetti,

en: Before that, when things were normal, an activity that became commonplace among kids of all ages was spending their weekends at game zones.
om: Isa dura, yeroo wantoonni hundi nagaa turan, gochi ijoollee umrii hundaaf bakka waloo ture giddugala taphaatti sanbataa fi dilbata isaanii dabarsuu ture.

en: South Korea claims that North Korea has executed its defense chief Hyon Yong-chol with an anti-aircraft gun.
om: Kooriyaan Kibbaa Kooriyaan Kaabaa hoggaanaa Ittisaa ishee Yoon Yoong-Chooyin rasaasa farraa xiyyaara waraanaatiin ajjeeste jetti.

en: “The fragmentation of public prosecution weakens the institution, especially as different prosecution authorities are accountable to different ministries. This may be detrimental to the independence of the Public Prosecution Service,” it states.
om: "Gargar caccabuun himannaa ummataa dhaabbaticha ni dadhabsiisa, keessumaa akka aangawonni abbaa alangaa garagaraa ministeera garagaraaf itti gaafataman. Kun walabummaa Tajaajila Himannaa Ummataaf murteessaa tahuu mala," jedha.

en: Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed meets with Eritrean President Isaias Afwerki in Asmara and they pledge to restore diplomatic relations.
om: Muummichi Ministeeraa Itoophiyaa Abiyi Ahimed Pirasdaantii Eritiraa Isaayyaas Afawarqii waliin Asmaraa keessatti wal arge akkasumas walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii akka bakkatti deebisan waadaa walii galan.

en: The Confederation of African Football announces that football matches will continue to be played in Cabinda Province where the attack took place.
om: Konfidereeshinnin kubbaa miilaa Afirikaa dorgommiin kubbaa miilaa Piroviinsii Kaabindaa kan haleellaan keessatti tahe keessatti itti fufee akka taphatamu beeksise.

en: In athletics, Oscar Pistorius of South Africa becomes the first amputee to compete at the Olympic Games in the 400 meters.
om: gama Atileetiksiin lammiin Afirikaa kibbaa Oskaar Piischurus fageenya meetira 400n qaamaa hir'uu dorgommii Oloompikii irratti hirmaate jalqabaa ta'e.

en: Mare, who equaled her lifetime best of 2:19:52 when winning last year’s Xiamen Marathon, is joined on the women’s team by two-time Berlin Marathon champion Aberu Kebede and three-time Dubai Marathon winner Aselefech Mergia.
om: Rikoordii dhuunfaashee 2:19:52 yeroo Maaraatoonii Ziyaamen injifatte kan galmeessite, shampiyoonii Berliin yeroo lamaa Abarruu Kabbadee fi mo'attuu Maaraatoonii Dubaay yeroo sadii Asalefech Margaa waliin garee dubartootatti makamteetti.

en: Sierra Leone imposes quarantine on hundreds of people following a recent death from the Ebola virus.
om: Seeraa Liyoon du'a vaayirasii Koronaan dhiyeenya mudate hordofuun namooti dhibbaan lakkaa'aman akka adda baafaman murteessite.

en: Astronomers confirm the first-ever direct picture of an extrasolar planet orbiting its star.
om: Qorattoonni hawaa Suuraa pilaaneetii sirna soolaariin alaa urjii isaatti naanna'u kan jalqaba ta'e mirkaneessan.

en: Director General of INSA, Dr. Shumete Gizaw has presented the touchless hand sanitizing technology to Prime Minister Dr. Abiy Ahmed.
om: Geggeessaan olaanaa INSA, Dr.Shuumatee Gizaw teekinoolojii harka qulqulleeffannaa tuttuqaa hin qabne muummicha ministeera Dr Abiyyi Ahimadiif dhiyeesse.

en: Legendary Ethiopian saxophonist Getachew Mekuria passed away this week at the age of 81.
om: Ogeessi Saaksofoonii beekamaan Geetachoo Mekuriyaa torban kana keessa waggaa 81'tti du'aan addunyaa kana irraa darbeera.

en: The US Olympic Committee chooses the city of Boston as the American bid city to host the 2024 Summer Olympics.
om: komiiteen Oloompikii US magaalaa Boostan akka qopheessituu Olompikii Gannaa bara 2024 taatuuf magaalaa caalbaasii Ameerikaa kan dorgommichaa taate.

en: In Brooklyn New York, 2 brothers were stabbed, 1 fatally in a dispute after a school soccer match.
om: Niiwuyork Birookiliin keessaatti dorgommii kubbaa miilaa mana barumsaa booda wal-dhabdee uumameen obbolaan 2 yoo waraanaman tokko ammoo haala yaddeessa kessaa jira.

en: In an exclusive interview with FBC, a member of the Afro-Ukrainian hip hop trio Fo Sho, Betty Endale said that their group has a plan to promote immense tourism potentials of Ethiopia to the rest of the world.
om: Af-gaaffii addaa FBC wajjin godheen, miseensi hip hooppii Afroo-Yukiraniyaan tiryoo Fo Sho, Beetii Indaalee gareen isaanii qabeenya tuurizimii guddaa Itoopiyaa addunyaa bal'aatti beeksisuuf karoora akka qaban dubbatte.

en: Mati Multiplex, the first state-of-the-art cinema house in the country, has launched a plan to expand nationwide with branches across six major regional towns while Bahir Dar becomes the first town outside Addis Ababa to have 3D Cinema facility.
om: Maltipileksii Maatii, mana sinimaa aartii jalqabaa biyyatti, karoora babal'inaa biyyoleessa dameelaa jaha magaala gurguddoo naannolee keessatti Baahir Daarin magaala jalqabaa Finfinneen alatti tajaajila siniima 3D argattu jalqabaa taasisuun banuu jalqabe.

en: The signing ceremony was witnessed by PM Abiy, SalvaKiir, President of South Sudan and other Heads of States from neighboring countries.
om: Qophiin waligalticha mallatteessuu MM Abiy, Saalvaakir, Pirasdaantui Sudaan Kibbaa fi Hogganoota biyyaa biyyoota oollaa kan biroo dhaan rageeffame.

en: Meskel Square annually hosts the Meskel-Demera Religious Festival which has already been inscribed by UNESCO as world’s intangible heritage.
om: Adda Babahiin Masqalaa waggaa waggaadhaan Feestivaala Damaraa Masqalaa isa UNESCO'tti akka hambaa addunyaa harkaan hin qaqqabatamneetti galmaa'e ni keessumeessa.

en: On the occasion, the Health Minister, Dr. Lia Tadesse said the government along with various partner agencies has been undertaking different initiatives to enhance the laboratory quality and capacity nationally.
om: Qophicha irratti, Ministeerri Fayyaa, Dr. Liyyaa Taaddasee mootummaan ejensilee michoomaa garagaraa wajjin tahuun akka biyyaatti qulqullinaa fi dandeettii laaboraatorii fooyyessuuf hojiilee garagaraa raawwachaa akka juru dubbatan.

en: The 2011 validation mission made recommendations that would see the Somali Region progress to MNTE over time.
om: Ergamni mirkaneessa bara 2011 Naannoo Somaalee yeroo booda gara MNTE'tti ce'uun akka argu gorse.

en: The actress has performed in stages and played in numerous Amharic movies over the last 42 years especially representing unforgettable mothers’ characters.
om: Artistittiin waggoota 42 darbe keessatti waltajjiilee irratti weellisuunii fi fiilmiiwwan Amaariffaa hedduu keessatti taphachuun keessumaa taatee haadhaa hin dagatamne bakka buuteetti.

en: At least 47 people throughout the United States are infected with fungal meningitis from contaminated medicine, with five people dying.
om: Guutummaa Yunaayitid Isteetis keessatti yoo xiqqaate namoonni 47 daawaa faalame irraa dhibee meninjaayitasii fangasiin qabamanii, namoonni shan ammoo du'an.

en: A mudslide triggered by heavy rain near Sierra Leone's capital Freetown, kills at least 350 people with the death toll expected to rise as high as 500.
om: Magaala guddoo Seeraa Liyoon cinatti mucucaachuun lafaa sababa rooba ulfaataan mudate, yoo xiqqaate namoota 350 ajjeesuun hammi du'i eegamu akka gara 500'tti olka'u godhe.

en: She ran the Northern Ireland’s Antrim Coast Half Marathon in 63: 43 at the end of August, and has been representing Ethiopia in various continental races particularly, half marathon races.
om: Dhuma Hagayyaatti walakkaa maaraatoonii buufata Antrimii kaabaa Ayeerlaanditti 63:45tti fiigdeetti, dabalees dorgommiilee hedduu keessumaa dorgommiiwwan walakkaa maaraatoonii sadarkaa ardii irra Itoophiyaa bakka bu'aa turte.

en: A preliminary study by the National Toxicology Program finds that cellphone radiation has the potential to increase the risk of tumor growth in male rats.
om: Qorannoon dursaa Sagantaa Toksikoloojii Biyyaaleessaan godhame cararri bilbilaa hantuutota kormaa keessatti balaa tumarii fiduu akka qabu argate.

en: On the occasion, Indian Ambassador to Ethiopia, Anurag Srivastava said “we decided to make this year’s celebration at the very special and historic venue of Gandhi memorial Hospital, where Indian communities and Ethiopians contributed to build the hospital.”
om: Qophicha irratti, Itoophiyaatti Ambaassadarrii Hindii Anuraag Sirivastaavaan "kabaja ayyaanaa bara kanaa bakka addaa fi seena-qabeessa Hospitaala yaadannoo Gaandiitti qopheessun murteessineerra,bakka hawaasni Hindii fi Itoophiyaa hospitaala ijaaruuf gumaachanitti" jedhaniiru.

en: The Intergovernmental Authority on Development (IGAD) and Ethio-American Doctors Group, Inc. (“EADG”) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding agreeing to locate the Regional Cancer Center of Excellence (“RCCE”) at the hospital and medical village complex being built by EADG in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
om: Aabbaa Taayitaa Guddina irratti Mootummoota Waliinii (IGAD) fi Gareen Doktorota Itiyoo-Ameerikaa, Inc. ("EADG") Giddugala Kabajaa Kaanserii Naannoo ("RCCE") hospitaala fi mandara walxaxaa medikaalaa EADG'n Addis Ababaa, Itoopiyaa keessatti ijaaramaa jiru keessatti gochuuf Yaadannoo Walhubannoo waliin mallatteessan.

en: In the capital, Addis Ababa, the Muslim Community celebrated Al Maulid Al Nabawi at the Grand Mosque with prayers and spiritual events commemorating the birth of Prophet Mohammed.
om: Magaala guddoo,Addis Ababaa keessatti, Hawaasni Musliimaa Al Mawulid Al Nabawi Masjiida Guddaa keessatti kadhannaa fi qophiilee hafuuraatiin dhaloota Raajii Mohaammed yaadachuun kabajan.

en: Germany issues a recall of 73,000 eggs from the Netherlands suspected to be contaminated with fipronil.
om: Jarmaniin killeewwan 73,000 tahan kan fiprooniin faalamuu shakkaman Nezerlaand irraa akka deebi'an ajajje.

en: On the anniversary of the Columbine High School massacre, thousands of students across the United States walk out of school to protest against school shootings.
om: Yeroo ajjeechaa duguggii mana barnootaa sadarkaa lammaffa Kolombiin irratti rawwatameef yaadannoon waggaa godhamaa jirutti barattootni Yunaytid Isteetis kumaatamni dhukaasaa manneen barnootaa irratti godhamu mormuun manneen barnootaa gadilakkisanii bahan.

en: According to CAF’s statement, to be discussed are the amendments to the law of the game, which takes effect starting from June 1, 2019 and will be implemented during the tournament.
om: Akka hima CAF'tti, wantootni irratti mari'ataman foyya'iinsa seera taphaa kan Waxabajjii 1, 2019 irraa ka'ee dhiibbaa uumuu eegaluu fi yeroo dorgaa dorgeetti hojirra ooluuti.

en: Mohamed bin Hammam announce that Australia will host the 2015 AFC Asian Cup; this will be the first time Australia has hosted the competition.
om: Mohaammed Biin Hamaam Awustiraaliyaan Dorgomii AFC geepha Eeshiyaa bara 2015ii akka himuun kunis Awusitraaliyaaan yeroo qophicha qopheessitu biyyaattiif kan jalqabaa ta'uusaatii.

en: The helicopter and 12 Israeli wildfire experts have arrived this morning at the national park to support the eradication process of the wildfire raging in the national park.
om: Helikoopterichii fi ogeessonni ibidda caakkaa Isiraa'el 12 tahan adeemsa ibidda caakkaa paarkii biyyaalessichaa gubaa jiru dhabamsiisuu gargaaruuf ganama kana paarkii biyyoolessichaatti argaman

en: British neuroscientist John O'Keefe and Norwegian scientists May-Britt Moser and Edvard Moser share the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.
om: Niyuurosaayintistiin lammii Biriteeyin Joon O'Keefii fi saayintistoonni Noorwey Meey-Briit Mooserii fi Idvaard Mooser Badhaasa Noobelii 2014 kan Fiiziyoolojii yookaan Mediisinii qooddatan.

en: A British brain scan study of Lysergic acid diethylamide shows LSD may be useful in treating mental disorders such as major depressive disorder.
om: Qorannoo dubbistuu sammuu Laayisergic asiid diyaatilamaayidii Biriitish akka LSD'n dhibeewwan sammuu kanneen akka dhibee dhiphina olaanaa yaaluuf akka fayyadu agarsiise.

en: A graduate of Alle School of Fine Arts and Design, Addis Ababa University, Daniel Asfaw's painting has always been inspired by the experience of life.
om: Eebbifamaa mana barnoota Faayin Artis fi Dizaayin Allee Yuunivarsitii Addis Ababa kan ta'e, fakkiin Dani'el Asfaw yeroo hundaa kaka'umsaa muuxannoo jireenyaa irra ka'eedha.

en: Canada is contributing $30 million to several United Nations agencies and non-governmental organizations working to provide emergency humanitarian assistance to millions of people in drought-stricken in Ethiopia, federal minister of international development and La Francophonie announced Thursday.
om: Kanaadaan miliyoona $30 ejensiilee Mootummoota Gamtoomaniif dhaabbatoota miti-mootummaa deggersa namoomaa ariifachiisaa kutaa Itoopiyaa keessatti hongeen dha'aniif dhiyeessa jiraniif akka kennitu, ministeerri federaalaa guddina addunyaa fi La Fraankoofoonii gaafa Kamisaa beeksisan.

en: Wolfgang Wodarg, the Council of Europe's head of health affairs, claims that the 2009 flu pandemic was a "false pandemic" orchestrated by the pharmaceutical industry to sell vaccines.
om: akka manni Maree Olaanaan Dhimmoota Fayyaa Awurooppaa Woolfgaang Woodarg jedhutti weerarri dhibee utaalloo bara 2009'ii 'weerara Holola sobaa' kan Indastriiwwan oomishalee qorichaatiin Vaksiinii gugurachuuf jecha qindaa'e ta'u dubbata.

en: Canadian multinational aerospace and transportation company Bombardier Inc. is to cut 7,000 jobs worldwide over the next two years, including over a thousand jobs in the United Kingdom.
om: Dhaabbanni eerospeesii fi geejjibaa biyyoota adda addaa Kanaadaa Bombaardiyeer ink. akka addunyaatti carraawwan hojii 7,000 ta'an, Yunaayitid Kiingidem keessatti carraawwan hojii kuma tokkoo ol dabalatee waggoota lamaan dhufanitti adda kutuufi.

en: “I think Ethiopia has done a lot,” he said, adding that some 15 million hectares of land have been under restoration in Ethiopia.
om: "Itoophiyaan hedduu hojjetteetti jedheen yaada" jedhe, itti dabaluunis heektaarotni miliyoona 15 Itoophiyaa keessatti haaromfama keessa turan.

en: A measles outbreak from the Philippines has spread into Australia, Canada, Taiwan, and the United Kingdom.
om: Weerarri gosa dhukkuba Meezilii filippins irra ka'e gara Awustraaliyaa,kaanaadaa,Taaywaan fi Yuunaytid Kingidamitti babal'ateera.

en: Minister of Health Dr. Lia Tadesse visited the reform activities of Felegehiwot Hospital of Bahir Dar City including Clean and Save Hospitals (CASH) project and Electronic Health Records implementation and the efforts to make the service areas patient centered.
om: Ministeerri Fayyaa Dr. Liyyaa Taaddasee pirojektii Hospitaalota Qulqulluu fi Nageenya qabu (CASH) fi hojiirra oolmaa Galmeewwan Fayyaa Elektioonawaa fi tattaaffii bakka tajaajilaa dhukkubsataa giddugaleessa kan godhate gochuu dabalatee hojiilee rifoormii Hospitaala Felegehiwot Magaalaa Bahir Daar daawatan.

en: The Delhi government defers elective surgery to free up 1000 hospital beds to treat a dengue fever outbreak.
om: Mootummaan Delhi weerara dhibee qufaa deengee yaaluudhaaf wal'aansa baqaaqsanii yaaluu kan hatattamaa hin taane 1000 achi buuteera.

en: A bug in Apple Inc's FaceTime software is reported to have allowed users to spy on other devices.
om: Dogoggorri sooftiwerii Aappil Ink FeesTaayim keessa jiru fayyadamtoonni meeshaalee biroo irratti akka basaasan akka eyyamu gabaasame.

en: Burma's parliament opens without the party of Aung San Suu Kyi who boycotted the legislature over a disagreement on the wording of the oath of office.
om: manni maree bakka bu'oota uummataa Barmaa paartiin Aong Saan Suu qaamolee seeraa baasan lagachuun(mormuun) waldhabdee jechoota kakuu wajjiraa godhamu mormuun lagachuu isaaniitiin bakka isaan itti hin argamnetti baniinsa taasise.

en: It is to be recalled that Ethiopian Tokyo 2020 Olympics team had finished the competition with 4 medals including one gold medal.
om: Gareen Olompikii Tookiyoo 2020 Itoophiyaa dorgommii meedaliyaa 4 medaaliyaa warqee tokko waliin xumuruun isaa ni yaadatama.

en: The Prime Minister of Australia Tony Abbott issues a last-minute plea for Bali Nine drug smugglers Andrew Chan and Myuran Sukumaran facing the death penalty in Indonesia.
om: Muummichi ministeeraa Awustiraaliyaa Toonii Aboot Indooneezhiyaa keessatti daldaltoota qoricha sammuu nama adoochuu Baali Naayin kan turan Andreew Chaan fi Muyuraan Shukumaraan irratti adabbii du'aa darbe akka hafuuf jaarsummaa daqiiiqaa dhumaa taasisan.

en: Out of the total revenue, USD 504.7 million was obtained from gold export, he added.
om: Galiin walii galaa keessaa, dolaarri Ameerikaa miliyoona 504.7 warqee alatti erguu irrra argame, jechuun dabalee jira.

en: China Central Television Headquarters in Beijing is completed, a decade after its design by OMA.
om: Teessoon giddugala televiziyoona chaayinaa Beejiingitti argamu OMA dhaan wixineen isaa erga ba'e waggaa kudhan booda xumurame.

en: The death toll from the Kenya floods including the Nairobi building collapse rises to fourteen.
om: Keeniyaa keessatti balaa lolaa mudateef jiguu gamoo Naayroobii dabalatee lakkoofsi namoota lubbuun darbanii gara kudha afuriitti guddate.

en: The Hellenic Parliament passes a package of economic reforms to end the current stage of the debt crisis.
om: Paarlaamaan Heelenik sadarkaa rakkoo liqaa ammaa akka goolabamuuf sagantaa fooyya'iinsa diinagdee beeksise.

en: “I believe we will have micro and small-scale enterprises that can be produce electronics, software, IT and automotive electronics.
om: "Interpiraayizoota maayikiroo fi iskeelii-xiqqaa elektirooniksii, softiweerii, IT fi elektirooniksii awutoomotiivii oomishan akka qabaannu nan amana"

en: Record breaking rain causes flooding in the American states of Oklahoma and Texas with Oklahoma City recording record rainfall levels for the month of May.
om: Sadarkaa rikardii roobaa ji'a caamsaa magaalaa Oklaahoomaatiin galmaa'een roobni bulchiinsa Ameerikaa Oklaahoomaa fi Teeksaas keessatti roobni rikardii cabse lola uume.

en: Researchers discover prions spreading through airborne transmission on aerosol particles, in an animal testing experiment focusing on scrapie infection in laboratory mice.
om: Qorattoonni qorannoo yaalii bineensaa dhibee Iskiraappi irratti xiyyeefachuun hantuuta laboratorii keessaatti godhaniin priyoon wantoota qilleensaan baatamaniin qilleensa keessa akka daddarbu bira gahan.

en: After returning home, the champions have continued to prepare for their second leg encounter in Mekele.
om: Manatti deebi'uun booda, shaampiyoononni tapha deebii lammaffaaf maqaleetti qophii itti fufaniiru.

en: The city of Axum, in the Tigray Regional State with its magnificent obelisk overshadowing a city in need of direction and support, the historic city, despite its historical worth is still a hidden treasure of Ethiopia that has not received the respect it rightly deserves.
om: Magaalaan Aksum, kan Mootummaa Naannoo Tigraay keessaa kan kallattii fi deggersa barbaachaaf siidaa dinqiin magaalatti huwwisu, magaalaan seena qabeettiin, utuu seena qabeessummaa isheen gatii guddaa qabduu qabeenya dhokataa Itoopiyaa ammayyuu kabaja sirrii isheef malu argachuu dhabdee dha..

en: Iranian actress Marzieh Vafamehr is released from jail after her sentence for acting in the banned film My Tehran for Sale is reduced.
om: Taatoo fiilmii lammii Iraan kan taate Marziih Vafameehir sababa gosa filmii dhorkame 'Teehraan kiyya gurgurtaaf ' jedhu irratti hirmaachuuseetiin adabbiin hidhaa itti murtaa'e erga salphateefi booda mana hidhaatii gad lakkifamte.

en: He was elected to serve as vice president for the coming four years at the Associations’ General Assembly held in Kampala, Uganda today.
om: Walgahii Waliigalaa Dhaabbatichaa Kampaalaa, Yugaandaatti har'a geggeeffame irratti waggoota arfan dhufaniif itti aanaa pirasdaantii tahuu tajaajiluuf filatame.

en: The planned amount of export has increased by 26 percent as compared to the same period last year.
om: Hangi biyya alaatti erguu yeroo walfakkaataa bara darbee waliin yeroo wal bira qabamu dhibbentaa 26'n dabaleera.

en: Lesotho PM Tom Thabane is granted sick leave until 27 February when he is due to appear in court for the murder of his former wife.
om: MM lesettoo Tom Tabaneen yeroo yakka ajjeechaa hadha warra isaanii duraaniitiin mana murtiitti dhiyaachuuf jedhanitti sababa dhukkubaatiin yeroon boqonnaa hanga Onkoloolessa 27tti eyyamameef.

en: He noted that the current industrial chemical use in Ethiopia needs strong administration system to know how to use or how to dispose chemicals.
om: Itti fayyadamni keemikaala industirii yeroo amma Itoophiyaa keessatti akkaataa itti fayyadamaa yookin akkaataa keemikaaloota dhabamsiisuu beekuf sirna to'annoo cimaa akka barbaadu himan.

en: A plane carrying 153 people on board crashes in a residential neighborhood in Lagos, Nigeria, killing everyone on board and 10 people on the ground.
om: Naaayjeeriyaa ganda jireenyaa leegos keessaatti xiyyaarri imaaltoota 153 fe'uun deemaa ture kufuu isaatiin lafaarra namoota turan 10 dabalatee imaltoonni hundi lubbuun darban.

en: The PM is the 100th winner and was selected from 223 private and 78 organization nominees.
om: Koreen Noobelii badhaasicha Abiyyiin, tattaaffii inni nagaa fi waldeggersa addunyaa fiduuf godheef, keessumaa kaka'umsa isaa murteessaa waldhabdee daangaa biyya ollaa Ertiraa wajjin ture furuuf waggaa darbe fudhateef, Eebla 2018 keessa gara aangootti dhufee ji'oota sadii booda badhaase.

en: Australia and South Korea successfully negotiate a free trade agreement.
om: Awustiraaliyaa fi Kooriyaan Kibbaa waliigaltee daldala bilisaa milkaa'inaan geggeessan.

en: More than 150 scientists urge the Australian Government to slow development near the Great Barrier Reef.
om: Saayintistoonni 150 ol ta'an Mootummaan Awustiraaliyaa naannoo Gireet Baariyer Riif'tti misooma akka hirisu akeekkachiisan.

en: President Sahle-Work Zewde is a role model not only for Ethiopian women but women all around the world.
om: Pirasdaant Saahile-Warq Zawudee dubartoota Afirikaa qofaaf utuu hin taane dubartoota guutummaa addunyaa irra jiraniif fakkaeenyadha.

en: Mei Xiang, the Washington, D.C. National Zoo's adult female giant panda, gives birth to a cub, her second there, via artificial insemination.
om: Mee Shiyaang, paandaan saafelli dhalaan guddittii Paarkii Bineensotaa Biyyaalessaa Waashingitan, D.C, sanyii kormaa haala nama tolcheen itti galchuudhaan yeroo lammaffaa isheef achitti, ilmoo tokko dhalte.

en: A large oil field is discovered off the coast of Brazil that could contain between 8 and 15 billion barrels.
om: Dirreen boba'aa guddaaan tokko kan baarmela biliyooma 8 fi 15 gidduu qabachuu danda'u qarqara bishaanii Biraazilitti argame

en: Eka Kotebe General Hospital, which incorporates a mental institution in its premises, has been officially inaugurated today by Deputy Prime Minister Demeke Mekonnen and Health Minister Amir Aman.
om: Hospitaalli Waliigalaa Eekkaa Kotebee, kan dhaabbata sammuu haalduree isaa keessatti galche, har'a Itti aanaa Mummicha Ministeeraa Dammaqee Mokonninii fi Ministeera Fayyaa Amiir Amaaniin ifaan eebbifame.

en: 6 sailors taken hostage off the coast of Cameroon on September 12 by the Africa Marine Commando are released.
om: Habuurtootni bishaanirraa 6 kan humna galaanarraa Afriikaatin fulbaana 12 booji'aman gad-lakkifaman.

en: The Reproductive Health Innovative Fund (RIF) project founded and being implemented by the Ethiopian Public Health Institute, is attaining encouraging fruits in various ways.
om: Pirojektiin Fandii Kalaqa Fayyaa Walhormaataa (RIF) kan Inititiyuutii Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaan hundeeffameef ittiin geggeeffamu, karaalee adda addaan bu'aalee nama jajjabeessuu argataa jira.

en: Police in Italy arrest a man at Turin Caselle Airport on charges of impersonating a pilot.
om: Poolisoonn Itaalii Tuuriin buufata xiyyaaraa Kaasellee keessatti namticha sobaan eenyummaa isaa konkolaachisaa Xiyyaaraa osoo fakkeessuu qabame to'annoo jala oolchan.

en: President Mulatu noted that the Ambassadors shoulder great responsibility in promoting Ethiopia’s tourism, attracting investment in a bid to support developmental activities.
om: Qophicha irratti, Pirasdaanti Dr. Mulaatuu Teshoomee muudama isaanii irratti Ambasaaddaroota Itoopiyaa haaraa muudamaniin baga gammadan jechuun bara hojii milkaa'aa hawwaniif.

en: The Anniston Chemical Activity destroys its last mustard gas shells, becoming the fifth of nine US chemical weapons depots to close under terms of the Chemical Weapons Treaty.
om: Sochiin Keemikaalaa Aanisten haguugduu gaazii mastardii isa dhumaa barbadeessuun, kuusaa meeshaalee waraanaa US sagal keessaa isa shanaffaa seera Waliigaltee Meeshaalee Waraanaa Keemikaalaa jalatti cufame ta'e.

en: U.S. sports personality and Basketball Hall of Famer Dennis Rodman defends his visits to North Korea after he is criticized by the family of an American detainee.
om: qopheessa Ispoortii US fi gonfoon beekamtii kubbaa kachoo Deenis Roodmaan ceephoo maatii hidhamtoota Ameerikaatiin irra qaqqabeen booda dawwannaa gara Kooriyaa kaabaa taasisuuf ture dhiise.

en: Tropical depression Harvey becomes a hurricane, expected to make landfall on the Texas coast at Category 3, bringing life-threatening storm surge, rainfall, and wind hazards.
om: Bubbeen galaanaa Tiroopikaalaa Harveey hobonboleettii tahe, qarqara galaanaa Teeksas irratti Sadarkaa 3 gahuun lafa rukutuu mala akkasumas qaqqawwee, roobaa fi balaa bubbee jireenyaaf sodaachisaa ta'e fiduu mala.

en: Youths who are tasked to control effects of environmental hazards are expected to investigate factors related to noise pollution, liquid and solid waste effluences, among others and bring recommendations to address the problems accordingly, Sisay said.
om: Dargaggoonni miidhaa balaa naannoo to'achuuf ajajaman kanneen biroo keessaa sababoota faalama sagalee, dhangala'uu xura'aa dhangala'aa fi jajjabaatiin walqabatu qorachuunii fi gorsi rakkicha furuuf walfakkaataa kennuun isaanii ni eegama jedhe Sisaay.

en: Malaysia finds the bodies of more than 20 people believed to be victims of human trafficking in mass graves buried near the border with Thailand.
om: MaleezjiYaan reeffaa namoota osoo daddabrsa namoota seeraan alaatiin imalaa jiranii lubbuun darban jedhamee shakkamu awwalcha guddaa reeffa namota 20 ol ta'anii qabatu nannoo daangaa Taayilanditti argatte.

en: Demonstrations calling for economic and political change continue for a third day, amid reports of looting.
om: Oduuwwan saamicha yeroo jeequmsaa keessaas, waamichi hiriira jijjirama dinagdee fi siyaasaa guyyaa sadaffaaf itti fufee jira.

en: Prince Harry and his "Walking with the Wounded" team reach the South Pole after three weeks trekking in the Antarctic.
om: Ilmi mootichaa Heerii fi gareen isaa "Kan Madaa'ee Wajjin Deemuu" 'n torban sadii erga gaariin Antarkaatikaa keessa deemanii booda Poolii Kibbaa gahan.

en: Human Rights Watch claims that government-controlled health services in Egypt have been 'told to downplay protest deaths'.
om: Hiyumaan Raayit Wooch tajaajiloonni fayyaa mootummaan to'ataman Gibxii keessaa hamma nama mormii irratti du'ee akka xiqqeessanii himan akka ajajaman hime.

en: A car bomb kills 11 people and injures 10 others in an attack on a mall in Mogadishu, Somalia.
om: Haleellaa galma daldalaa Moqaadishuu, Somaaliyaa keessaatti boombiin konkolaataa namoota 11 ajjeesee namoota kan biraa 10 miidhe.

en: Vessels from the Philippine Navy and Chinese maritime surveillance are at a standoff after the Philippines attempted to arrest Chinese fishermen in the South China Sea.
om: Dooniiwwan humna galaanaa Filiphiinsii fi to'annoo galaanaa Chaayinaa erga Filiphiinsi qurxummii qabdoota Chaayinaa Galaana Kibba Chaayinaa keessatti hidhuuf yaaltee booda walgaarrefattan.

en: A decade ago, ETB17 was equivalent to a dollar. As the years rolled and following the repeated devaluation of the currency in order to boost the international competitiveness of the import-dependent country, the value of the Birr has been reduced by as much as 130%.
om: Waggaa kudhan dura, Birriin Itoophiaa 17 dolaara tokkoon qixxeedha. Baroonni haaluma darbanii fi maallaqicha gatii dhabsiisu walitti fufaa dorgomummaa adunyaalessaa keessatti galchuu irratti hundaa'e guddisuuf ta'e hordofee, gatiin Birrii 130% gadi bu'eera.

en: The Football Federation of Kosovo becomes the 55th member of UEFA following a secret ballot at the 40th Ordinary UEFA Congress in Budapest.
om: Federeeshiniin Kubbaa Miilaa Kosoovoo filannoo dhoksaa Kongiresii Idilee UEFA 40ffaa Budaapeest keessatti godhame hordofuun miseensa 55ffaa UEFA taate.

en: Recognizing talent by a selection of musicians and filmmakers, it has been one of the platforms where local artistic excellence is celebrated.
om: Weellistootaa fi qopheessitoota fiilmii filatamaniin dandeettiif beekamtii kennuun, waltajjiiwwan ciminni artistoota naannoo itti jajamu keessaa tokko tahaa ture.

en: The as of yet unfinished One World Trade Center becomes the tallest building in New York City, overtaking the Empire State Building.
om: Ijaarsi isaa ammallee kan hin xumuramne gamoon giddugala daldalaa 'waan worlid' gamoo Impaayer isteetis caaluun gamoo guddicha magaalaa Niiwuyork ni ta'a.

en: The United Kingdom government announces plans to make prisoners serving less than four years eligible to vote.
om: Mootummaan Yunaayitid Kiingidem sirreeffamtoonni seeraa murtii waggaa afurii gadiif mana hidhaa jiran filachuu akka danda'an gochuuf karoora isaa beeksise.

en: India offers Nepal an additional billion dollars to help it recover from the April 2015 Nepal earthquake.
om: Hindiin Neeppaal sochii lafaa bara 2015 ishee mudate irraa akka fooyyoftuuf akka ishee gargaruuf kennaa dabalataa doolara biliyoona tokkoo dhiyeessiteef

en: Mozambique announces it will reverse a rise in the price of bread that led to riots last week.
om: Moozambiki dabala gatii daabboo isa torban darbe jeequmsa kaase akka jijjiirtu beeksifte.

en: “To be one of the best institutes in Africa, EEFRI needs legal procedure, active involvement of the people and the concerned bodies as well as capital and human resources,” he added.
om: "Giddugala akka Afirikaatti sadarkaa dursaa ta'uuf EEFRI'n hojimaata seera-qabeessi, dammaqinaan hirmaannaan uummataa fi qaamota xiyyefannoo kennan akkasumas kaappitaala fi humna namaa ni barbaada" jechuun dabaleera.

en: Sandstorm has hit the city of Dire Dawa, in the eastern part of Ethiopia and its surroundings.
om: Bubbeen cirrachaa magaalaa Dirre Dawaa, kutaa baha Itoopiyaa fi naannawaa isaa rukute.

en: In his opening remarks, Israeli President Reuven Rivlin said that participants of both countries were aspiring to see a joint future to ensuring common concerns as food security, public health, infrastructure and energy.
om: Haasaa baniinsa isaa keessatti, Pirasdaantii Isiraa'el Reevin Rivliin hirmaattonni biyyoota lamaanii dhimmoota yaaddoo waliinii tahan akka wabii nyaataa, fayyaa hawaasaa, ijaarsaa fi annisaa mirkaneessuf fuuldura waliinii arguuf hawwii akka qaban dubbatan.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed called on Muslims to remember and practice the teachings of Prophet Muhammad while celebrating his birth.
om: Muummichi Ministeera Abiyyi Ahimed wayita ayyaana dhaloota isaa kabajanitti barsiisa Raajii Muhaammad akka yaadatanii fi hojiirra oolchan gaafatan.

en: The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia announces that 8-year old Zion Harvey became the first pediatric patient to receive a double hand transplant earlier this month.
om: Hospitaalli Ijoollee Filaadelfiyaa, mucayyoon waggaa 8 Ziyoon Harveen dhukkubsattuu ijoollee jalqabaa dursa ji'a kanaa keessa harki lamaanuu nama biraa irraa dhaabateef ta'uu beeksise.

en: BP announces it will plead guilty to charges of manslaughter and obstruction of Congress, and will pay a total of US$4.5 billion to the US Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission.
om: BP'n himannaa nama qaluu fi Koongiresii danquun yakkamaa akka ta'e akka amanu, akkasumas Qajeelcha Haqaa fi Nageenyaa US fi Koomishinii Waljijjiirraaf waliigalatti biliyoona US$4.5 akka kanfalu beeksise.

en: Ethiopia has done much in protecting biodiversity after the signing of the Rio Agreement in 1992, according to Ethiopian Biodiversity Institute.
om: Itoophiyaan baayoodaayiversitii kunuunsuuf erga walii galtee Riyoo 1992tti mallatteesiteen booda hojiilee hedduu hojjetteetti, akka Giddugala Baayoodaayiversitii Itoophiyaatti.

en: Regular training for the health professionals is according to him, a basic assistance the ministry had gave to improve the efficiency treatment.
om: Akka inni jedhetti leenjiin idilee hojjetoota fayyaa, deggersa bu'uuraa ministirichi waldhaansa gahaa fooyyessuuf kenneedha.

en: The Gambia announces that they have submitted a lawsuit against Myanmar for their role in the Rohingya genocide at the International Court of Justice in The Hague.
om: Gaambiyaan himannaa Mayaanmaar duguuggaa sanyii Rohingyaa keessaa ga'ee qabdi jedhu Mana Murtii Haqaa Addunyaa kan Haguwe kessatti argamutti galfachuu beeksiste.

en: Ephraim Mirvis is announced as the next Chief Rabbi of the United Kingdom, replacing Dr. Jonathan Sacks who will step down from the role in 2013.
om: Bara 2013'ttii aangoo irraa kan bu'an D.r Joonattaan Saaks bakka bu'uun Efireem Maarvis dursaa Rabbii Yunaayitid Kiingidam kan itti aanu ta'uun isaa labsame.

en: According to him, amendment is made on Trade Law besides drafting investment proclamation to encourage the private sector.
om: Akka inni jedhutti, foyya'insi Seera Daldalaatti dabalee labsii investimentii sektara dhuunfaa jajjabbeessuuf qopheessuun godhameera.

en: Ethiopia and France signed a military cooperation accord in March 2019 during President Emmanuel Macron’s visit to Addis Ababa.
om: Itiyoophiyaa fi Faransaay waliita'iinsa humna waraanaa waqtii Pireezidaantii Emaanu'eel Maakiroon Addis Ababa daawwatanitti Bitootessa 2019 mallatteessan.

en: Located in Mekanisa, it gives a different meaning to modernism and what we consider as modern.
om: Mekkaanisaatti kan argamu, ammayummaa fi ammayyaa jennee wanta fudhannuuf hiika biraa kenna.

en: Haiti will redo its presidential election after findings of widespread voter fraud in last years voting.
om: Haayitiin waliin dhahamuu sagalee bal'aa waggaa darbe erga bira geessee booda filannoo pirasdaantawaa ishee irra deebi'uufi.

en: Design Week Addis Ababa (DWAA), a weeklong celebration of innovation and creativity, which was launched on January 14, will close today.
om: Dizaayin Wiik Addis Ababaa (DWAA), kabajni kalaqaa fi waa uumuu torbee guutuu Amajjii 14 jalqabe arra ni cufama.

en: A Ukrainian court sentences a former police chief Olexiy Pukach to life imprisonment for murdering journalist Georgiy Gongadze in 2000.
om: Manni murtii yuukireen yakka ajjeechaa ajajaan Poolisii duraanii Oleeksii Pukaach gazexeessaa joorj Goongadzee irratti bara 2000 Rawwateef hidha umurii guutuutiin adabe.

en: The medical supplies are part of the project entitled “Improving the quality of health care provided to newborn babies in two zones of Tigray and SNNP regions, Ethiopia,” launched in March 2020.
om: Dhiyeessiin medikaalaa sun qaama pirojektii "Qulqullina kunuunsa fayyaa ijoollee reefuu dhalataniif zooniiwwan lamaan naannolee Tigraay fi SNNP, Itoopiyaa keessatti kennamu fooyyesuu" jedhamee waamamuu kan Bitootessa 2020 keessa eegalameeti.

en: It was the latest in a long line of staggering performances in the game-changing technology, which is reckoned to improve performance by between half a second and a second a lap.
om: Tekinoloojiwwan tapha jijjiiroo keessatti raawwwii ajaa'ibsiisoo yerooo dhihoo asii kan ta'e, raawwii walakkaa sekoondii fi darba sekoondii gidduu jiruun ni foyyeessa jedhamee amanama.

en: The Algerian government cuts food prices amid unrest, and vows to punish those responsible for rioting in recent days.
om: Mootummaan Aljeeriyaa jeequmsaan walqabatee gatii nyaataa ni hirrise, akkasumas warreen dhiyeenya kana jeequmsa kaasan akka adabu dhaadate.

en: The Tewodros Ashenafi Foundation was established by founder and CEO of SouthWest Holdings Ltd.
om: Faawundeeshiniin Tewodiros Ashennaafii hundeessaa fi CEO SawuthWeest Hooldingis Ltd dhaan hundeeffame.

en: In this regard, the region will not only penalize companies but award gold, silver and bronze to the companies that respected the code of conduct and realize chemical and wastage usage as well as labor protection.
om: Dhimma kanaan, naannochi dhaabbilee adabuu qofa osoo hin taanee badhaasa warqee, birrii fi nahaasaa dhaabbilee danbii ittiin bulmaataa kabajan fi itti fayyadamaa keemikaalaa fi balfaa akkasumas kunuunsa hojjettotta humnaa hojirra oolchaniif ni kenna.

en: Mahmoud Badr, the founder of the Tamarod grassroots movement that helped spark the July 2013 Egyptian protests, reportedly survives an assassination attempt.
om: Mahmuud Baadir, hundeessaan sochii hundee Tamaarood kan mormii Gibxii Adooleesa 2013 akka eegalamu gargaare, yaalii ajjeechaa irraa akka ooletu gabaasame.

en: The Space Shuttle Atlantis lifts off for the final mission of the US Space Shuttle program.
om: Xiyaarri hawaa Atiilaantis galma xumuraa sagantaa xiyaara hawaa Us'tif olbaateetti.

en: Federal Government Procurement and Property Administration Agency announced that it has finalized preparations to start electronics procurement system technology (e-GP).
om: Ejensiin Bulchiinsa Bittaa fi Qabeenyaa Mootummaa Federaalaa teekinooloojii sirna abbaa qabeenyummaa elektirooniksii (e-GP) jalqabuuf qophii akka xumure beeksise.

en: Poland publishes the transcript of flight data recorders from the fatal 2010 Polish Air Force Tu-154 crash which killed 96 officials and intellectuals on 10 April.
om: Poolaand barreeffama waraabduuwwan daataa balalii Humna Qilleensaa Poolaand Tu-154 isa bara 2010 kufee angawootaa fi beektota 96 gaafa Ebla 10 ajjeesee maxxansite.

en: American singer Taylor Swift wins four trophies, including Artist of the Year, and holds 23 American Music Awards, beating Whitney Houston.
om: Weellistun lammii Ameerikaa Teyilar Iswiifti badhaasa weellistuu baricha dabalatee, geepha afur mootetti, akkasumas witnii hostan caaluudhaan badhaasa Ameerikaa kan ta'an 23 qabatte jirti.

en: In addition to recommending holding the elections by taking the necessary precautions, the Ministry also suggested economic and social activities be restored with proper precautions taken to prevent the spread of the virus.
om: Of eeggannoo barbaachisaa gochuun, filannoon akka geggeeffamuun gorsa kennuun alatti, Ministirichi hojiileen diinagdee fi hawaasaas of eeggannoo dursaa barbaachisaa faffaca'iinsa vaayirichaa ittisu fudhachuun akka bakkatti deebi'us akeekeera.

en: The opposition movement in Venezuela seeks help from France.
om: Sochiin mormitootaa Venezuweellaa keessaa gargaarsa Faransaayi irraa barbaadan.

en: Seven-time Formula One drivers' champion Michael Schumacher is reported to be in critical condition after brain surgery in Grenoble for a head injury suffered while skiing in the French Alps.
om: Shaampiyooniin yeroo torbaa konkolaachisaa Foormulaa Wanii, Mikaayel Iskumaachar miidhama sammuu inni utuu Gaarren Faransaayi keessa cabbiirra kaatuu isa mudateef yaalii baqaqsanii yaaluu sammuu Girenoobel keessatti isaaf godhame booda haala ulfaataa keessa akka jirutu gabaasame.

en: Speaking on the meeting held on the draft Diaspora Policy in Addis Ababa, Diaspora Affairs Director General with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Faisel Aliyi said inputs obtained in the discussion processes were included in the draft.
om: Ministeera Haajaa Alaatti Daayirekterri Olaanaan Dhimma Diyaaspooraa, Fayisal Aliyyii, marii isa wixinee Qajeelfama Diyaasporaa irratti Addis Ababaa keessatti geggeeffame irratti dubbachuun, galteewwan adeemsa marichaa keessatti fudhataman wixinicha keessatti hammatamaniiru jedhe.

en: Police in India charge five men with the murder of a 23-year-old woman who was gang-raped on a bus in Delhi on December 16, 2012.
om: Poolisoonni Indiyaa hagayya 16 bara 2012 New Deelii Baasii keessaatti dubartii umurii 23 taatee irratti namoota gudeeddii gurmuu erga raawwaataniin booda lubbuu ishee galaafatan shan irratti himanna bane.

en: The Argentine National Congress approves installation of a Chinese satellite tracking station in Patagonia.
om: Kongireessiiin Biyyaalessaa Arjentiinaa ijaarsa giddugala hordoftuu saatalaayitii Chaayinaa Patagoniyaa keessatti mirkaneessan.

en: The Film Week hopes to bring African countries closer by showcasing each other’s works, forming a shared experience and creating opportunities for storytellers.
om: Torban Fiilmichaa hojii ofii wal walitti agarsiisuun, muuxannoo qoqqoodamuu uumuu fi kanneen seenaa himuu danda'aniif carraawwan uumuun biyyoota Afirikaa walitti butuuf abdii godhate.

en: Police in South London launch a murder hunt after a 15-year-old schoolboy is stabbed to death in the street.
om: Poolisoonnii kibba Landan sababa barataan umurii waggaa 15 daandii irratti cuubeen waraanamee ajjeeffamuu isaatiin walqabatee barbaacha yakkamaa ajjesee kanaa labsan.

en: Twenty one Ethiopian engineers got training in China and were involved in the design and development of the satellite.
om: Injiineroonni Itoopiyaa digdamii tokko tahan Chaayinaatti leenjii fudhatanii saxaxaa fi ijaarsa satalaayitichaa irratti hirmaataniiru.

en: Noting partnerships engender reliable changes; President Rivlin said “the agreements inked today will set forth to the ever growing ties between the two countries in addressing challenges in health, education and energy in particular”.
om: Michummaa jijjirama amansiisaa fidaa jiru yaadachiisuun; Pirasdaant Riivlin "Waliigalteen har'a godhame hidhata biyya lamaan gidduu rakkoowan fayyaa, barnootaa fi keessumaa ammoo annisaa furuuf hidhata guddaa jiru ka'a" jedhe.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has handed over the national science, technology and innovation award to 194 winners today.
om: Muummeen Ministeeraa Abiyyi Ahimed badhaasa saayinsii, teekinoolojii fi kalaqaa har'a injifattoota 194'f kennan.

en: Ethiopian Environment and Forest Research Institute announced a plan to cover the Abay Gorge areas ranging from Kere Goha to Dejen town.
om: Inistitiyuutiin Qorannoo Eegumsa Naannoo fi Bosonaa Itoopiyaa naannoowwan Abbay Gorgee kan Kerre Gohaa fi magaalaa Dejen gahu uwwisuu karoorsuu beeksie.

en: Africa’s first black woman to receive an Olympic gold medal, Derartu Tulu, has been elected to lead the Ethiopian athletics Federation on Thursday November 15, 2018.
om: Meedaliyaa warqee Olompikii fudhachuun dubartiin-gurraattin jalqabaa Afiriikaa, Daraartuun Tulluu federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa hogganuuf Kamisa Sadaasa 15, 2018 filatamte.

en: Haiti delays Carnival celebrations over concern that anti-government protests might turn violent.
om: Haayitiin yaaddoo mormiin faallaa mootummaa gara hookkaraatti cehuu mala jedhuun sirna kabaja Kaarnivaal achi butte.

en: The solar eclipse was visible in several cities across Ethiopia, including the historical town of Lalibela and the capital Addis Ababa starting from 6:50 a.m to 9:30 a.m.
om: Golgaan sirna aduu kun magaalaa garagaraa guutummaa Itoophiyaa keessatti magaalaa seena qabeettii Lalibalaa fi magaalaa gudditti Addis Ababaa dabalatee sa'atii 6:50 a.m hanga 9:30tti ni argama ture.

en: President of Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan announces a N3 billion fund to "intervene" in Nollywood.
om: Pirasdaantiin Naayijeeriyaa Guudlaak Joonaattaan Noolywuud keessatti "intervene" deggeruuf maallaqa biliyoona N3 beeksisan.

en: Substitute Ariet Odong made it 2-2 after the 78th minutes before the referee sent off Ethiopia’s coach Firew Hailegebral.
om: Jijjirraan kan seente Ariyeet Odoong daqiiqaa 78 booda abbaan murtii leenjisaa Itoophiaa Fireew Haayilegabreeliin gaggeessuun dura 2-2 goteetti.

en: Since it began operation in 2017, the hospital has provided health services for 116, 029 patients, of which 25 percent are mental disabled persons, it was learned.
om: Erga bara 2017 keessa hojii eegalee, hospitaalichi tajaajila fayyaa dhukkubsatoota 116, 026 tahaniif kenneera, kanneen keessaa dhibbantaan 25 namoota qaama miidhamummaa sammuu qaban tahuun hubatameera.

en: Israeli authorities approve 153 construction permits for settlement homes in East Jerusalem, and plan to approve another 11,000 in the coming months.
om: Aanga'oonni Isiraa'el Baha Iyyerusaalemitti eyyemoota ijaarsaalee manneen jireenyaatif oolanii 153 mirkaneesse, akkasumas ji'oota dhufanitti kanneen biroo 11,000 eyyemuuf ni karoorsa.

en: Meanwhile, the officials will undergo medical and physical tests besides theoretical and practical sessions under the supervision of experienced CAF instructors.
om: Osoo kanaan jiru, aanga'oonni qoorannoo fayyaa fi qaamaa yeroo barnootaa yaadaa fi hojiin deeggarame kan lenjistoota CAF muxannoo qabaniin qajeelfamutti dabalee ni geggeessu.

en: Gun battle between security forces and Taliban fighters leave four militants including their commander dead in Wardak province 40 km west of Afghanistan capital Kabul.
om: Lolli dhukaasaa humnoota nageenyaa fi loltoota Taalibaan gidduu kutaa biyyaa Wardak kan magaalaa guddoo Afgaanistaan Kaabul irraa gara dhiyaatti 40 km fagaattu keessatti tahe hidhattoonni afur ajajaa isaanii dabalachuun akka ajjeefaman godhe.

en: The Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam identifies a new Vincent Van Gogh painting, Sunset at Montmajour.
om: Godambaan Van Goog Amisterdaam keessaa fakkii Vinsent Vaan Goog haaraa Saanset Montmaajor keessatti adda baase.

en: Researchers in New Zealand have discovered that the MeNZB vaccine for meningitis may protect against gonorrhea by 30%.
om: Qorattoonni Niwu Zilaand keessaa Talaalliin meninjaayitis MeNZB 30%'n gonooriyaa irraa eeguu akka danda'u bira gahan.

en: Malaysian police use tear gas and water cannon to disperse thousands of protesters gathered in Kuala Lumpur calling for free and fair elections.
om: Poolisiin Maleejiyaa mormitoota kumaan lakka'aman kan Ku'aalaa Luumpur keessatti filannoo haqaa fi bilisaa akka geggeeffamuuf gaafatan bittimsuuf gaaza imimmaanessuu fi kan bishaan humnaan facaasuu fayyadaman.

en: French Culture Minister, Franck Riester said during the award giving ceremony that Mulatu has uplifted music to another level by combining Ethiopian and another melodies.
om: Yeroo qophii badhaasicha kennuu, Ministeerri Aadaa Faransaay, Firaank Reeyiste, Mulaatuun sagalee muuziqaa Itoopiyaa fi kan biraa walitti makuun muuziqaa gara gulantaa biraatti olkaaseera jedhe.

en: Match week eight of the Ethiopian Premier League (EPL) will feature across the country this weekend.
om: Torbee Taphaa saddetaffaan Piriimer Liigii Itoophiyaa(EPL) xumura torbanii kanatti guutuu biyyaatti ni geggeefama.

en: AIC Deputy Director-General Taye Girma told ENA that the center which aims to become a national center of excellence by establishing AI policy and creating conducive ecosystem for the private and public sector is facing two major challenges in general.
om: Itti aanaan Daayirekteera Olaanaa AIC Taayyee Girmaa giddugalichi dambiilee AI hundeessuunii fi sekteroota dhuunfaa fi hawaasaaf haala mijataa uumuun giddugala kabajamaa biyyaalessaa tahuufi kan kaayyeefate akka waliigalaatti rakkoolee gurguddaa lamatu isa mudachaa jira jedhe.

en: The author in his book presents a traumatic and detailed account of the extent of the massacre, which resulted in the deaths of more than two thousand monks, priests, and local residents at the monastery.
om: Barreessichi kitaaba isaa keessatti kan nama sururuu fi ragaa gadi fagoo ajjeechaa jumlaa sanaa, kan du'a monokseewwan, lubootaa, fi jiraattota naannoo gadaamichaa kuma lamaa oliif sababa tahe dhiyeessa.

en: A novel vaccine tested so far only on monkeys provided “completely short-term and partial long-term protection” from the deadly virus, researchers reported in the journal Nature Medicine.
om: Talaalliin haaraan haga ammaatti Jaldeessa qofa irratti kan yaalame "guutummaatti yeroo gabaabaaf akkasumas eegumsa yeroo dheeraa gar-tokkee tahe" vaayirisa hamaa irraa, qorattootatu gaazexaa Neechar Medissin irratti gabaase,

en: New data from the NASA space probe MESSENGER indicate that Mercury, the closest planet to the Sun, almost surely has water ice buried beneath the surface at its north pole.
om: Daataan haaraan qorannoo hawaa NASA, MESSENGER akka Merkuriin, pilaanetiin baayyee aduuttii dhiyaattu, dhugaamatti jechuun bifa danda'amuun gara poolii kaabaa isheetti cabbiin bishaanii dachii ishee jala awwaalamee akka jiru agarsiisa.

en: Ambassador Teshome and Vice Minister Liu Hua noted that the two countries need to give impetus to their relationship with multifaceted bilateral and multilateral engagements in the future.
om: Ambaassadar Tashoomee fi Itti aanaa Ministeerri Li'u Huhaan gara fulduraatti biyyoonni lamaan walitti dhufeenya isaaniitiif xiyyeeffannoo walitti dhufeenya gam-lamee fi gam-hedduu gam hedduun kennuu akka qaba qabsiisaniiru.

en: The United States and China agree to work together to reduce the use of hydrofluorocarbons which are thought to contribute significantly to global warming.
om: Yuunaayitid Isteetisii fi Chaayinaan itti fayyadama haayidroofiloorookaarbon kan caalmaan ho'a addunyaaf akka gumaachaa jirutti yaadamu hir'isuun waliin hojjechuuf waliigalan.

en: According to a letter issued by Tsigereda Kifle, deputy director of EPHI, HIV Kits including First Response HIV 1-2.0, Uni-Gold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beijing Wanta HIV-1/2 are said to be under evaluation.
om: Akka xalayaa Tsigeredaa Kifilee, itti aantuu daarikteeraa EPHI tiin qophaa'eetti, Deebii Jalqabaa HIV 1-2.0, Yuuni-Goold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beejing Waantaa HIV-1/2 dabalatee Meeshaaleen HIV qorannoo jala akka jiran hiamame.

en: Several Beirut port officials are placed under house arrest as an investigation starts into how 2,750 tons of ammonium nitrate was left unsecured at a warehouse at the port for six years.
om: Aangawoonni buufata doonii Beeruut muraasi akkamiin amooniyeem naayitireetiin tooniin 2,750 mankuusaa bakka buufata doonichaa keessatti waggaa ja'aaf utuu hin eegamin akka ture adda baasuuf akkuma qorannoon eegaleen hidhaa mana keessaa jala galan.

en: In golf, Tiger Woods wins the inaugural Zozo Championship in Japan by three shots over Hideki Matsuyama for his 82nd career PGA Tour title, tying him with Sam Snead atop the all-time list.
om: gama tapha Goolfiin Taayiger Wuuds tapha baniinsaa Chaampiyeenshippii Zoozoo jappaan keessatti geggeeffama jiru irratti Hideekii Maatisiyaama qabxii sadiin dursuun injifate kunis seena dorgommii badhaasa PGA TOUR kan mataa isaa yeroo 82ffaaf dursaa galmee dorgommichaa yeroo maraa kan ta'e Saam Sneed waliin taphata.

en: Violence between the Amhara and Gumuz ethnic groups left dozens of people dead last month in Amhara and its neighbouring region, Benishangul Gumuz.
om: Mummeen Ministeeraa Itoopiyaa Haayilee Maariyaam Dessaaleny hookkarichaaf "humnoota faallaa nageenyaa" ceepha'eera.

en: North Korea threatens the "final destruction" of South Korea during a United Nations conference on disarmament.
om: Kooriyaan Kaabaa konfiraansii Mootummoota Gamtoomanii humna waraanaa hiikkachiisuu irratti "diigamsa isa dhumaa" Kooriyaa Kibbaa akeekkachiifte.

en: Six armored personnel carriers belonging to the Ukrainian military are captured by pro-Russian protesters amid rising tensions between the protestors and the military.
om: Hiriira mormii deeggartoota Ruusiyaa yeroo ammaa mormitootaaf waraana mootummaa giduutti haalli jiru rakkisaa ta'aa dhufe kana keessatti, meshaaleen hidhannoo waraanaa qabeenyaa humna waraana Yuukireen ta'an ja'a hirmaattota hiriirichaatiin qabamaniiru .

en: Lawmakers from Ukraine ratify a landmark agreement with the European Union in tandem with a meeting of the European Parliament.
om: Seera baastonni Yukireen walgahii paarlaamaa Awurooppa hordofuun waliigaltee seene qabeessa Gamtaa Awurooppaa waliin raggaasisan.

en: Eid al-Adha is the feast of obedience and sacrifice that remembers the willingness of Prophet Ibrahim to sacrifice his son Ibrahim based on a call from God (Allah).
om: Iid al-Adha dhangaa abboomamuu fi wareegamuu isa Raajiin Ibiraahim ilma isaa Ibraahimiin waamicha Waaqaa (Allaa) irratti hundaa'uun wareeguuf fedhii agarsiise yaadachuufi.

en: A tropical storm watch is issued for Tropical Storm Don in the US state of Texas between Port Mansfield north to San Luis Pass. ,
om: Hordoffiin hobonboleettii tirooppikaalii US isteetii Teeksaas gidduu buufata doonii Mansifiildii kaaba gara Saan Luwiis Paas keessatti Hobonboleettii Tiroopikaalaa Doonii mudachuu maluuf akeekkachiisni godhame.

en: The story of the EPRDF-led developmental state is rather short; yet it is highly eventful.
om: Seenaan guddina biyyaa EPRDF'n geggeeffamu gabaabaa tahuyyuu, taheewwan hedduu qaba.

en: Greece faces suspension or expulsion from the European Union's Schengen Area if it can not prevent waves of migrants from crossing over the country into Macedonia.
om: Giriik imala baqattoota biyyattii keessa darbuun gara Maqedooniyaa imalan hin dhaabdu taanaan Icheengen Eeriyaa Gamtaa Awurooppaa keessaa bahuun ykn ugguramuun ishee eeggata.

en: City officials of Glendive, Montana declare that the tap water is safe to consume following the January 17 oil spill in the Yellowstone River.
om: Aangawoonni bulchiinsa magaalaa Gileendiiv ,moontana dhingalawuu boba'aa ji'a amajjii 17 laga Yeloowstoon keessattii qaqabeen booda bishaanni magaalichaa dhugatiif fayyaqabeessa labsan.

en: 2020 Stanley Cup Finals The Tampa Bay Lightning win the Stanley Cup for the first time since 2004 following their game 6 victory against the Dallas Stars.
om: Goolabdoonni Geeba Istaanlii bara 2020, Ze Taampaa Beey Laayitiniing tapha isaanii Daalas Istaars wajjin morkatan si'a 6 mo'ichuu hordofuun erga bara 2004 tii yeroo jalqabaaf Geeba Istaanlii injifatan

en: The Great Ethiopian Run was launched in 2001 by the initiative of the athletics icon Haile Gebreselassie and so far it has held 17 streets runs in Addis Ababa and other towns.
om: Figichi Guddaan Itoophiyaa kaka'umsa fakkeenya atileetiksii Hayilee Gabrasillaaseetin bara 2001 eegale akkasumas hanga ammaatti figichi daandii irraa 17 Finfinnaa fi magaalota biraatti geggeefameera.

en: Ethiopia and Djibouti have established a Joint Coordinating Committee in Djibouti to expedite the successful implementation of the plantation of nine million tree seedlings In Djibouti.
om: Itoopiyaa fi Jibuutiin Jibuutii keessatti dhaabbii biqiltuuwwan milioona sagalii ariitiin milkeessuuf Koree Qindeessii Waliinii Jibuutii keesatti hundeessan.

en: An outbreak of Legionellosis (Legionnaires' disease) in Quebec City, Canada, kills 8 people and infects 104.
om: Weerarri Legiyooneloosis (dhibee Leegiyooners) Kiyuubek Siitii, Kanaadaa keessatti namoota 8 ajjeesee 104 dhukkubsachiise

en: Egyptian archaeologists discover the largest tomb yet discovered in the ancient Saqqara necropolis.
om: Arkiyoolojistoonni Gibxii `bakka awaalchaa durii Saqqaaraa keessatti awwaalcha haga ammaatti argamee keessaa isa guddicha argatan.

en: A new outbreak of the Ebola virus disease kills at least 17 people in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
om: Weerarri dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaa haaraan Rippaanilika Diimokiraatawaa Koongoo keessatti yoo xiqqaate namoota 17 ajjeese.

en: A ceremony is held at the former site of Germany’s Buchenwald concentration camp to remember people imprisoned there because they were thought to be gay.
om: Bakka mana hidhaa duraanii Jarman Buchenwaald'tti dhiirota fedhii dhiira waliin walquunamtii saalaa gochuu qaban jechuun shakkamanii achitti hidhaman yaadachuuf qophiin godhame.

en: The Ukraine Parliament confirms all government candidates, including that of foreign minister, appointed the previous day by President Petro Poroshenko.
om: Paarlaamaan Yukiriyeen ministeera haajaa alaa dabalachuun kaadhimamtoonni mootummaa hunda guyyaa darbe Pirasdaantii Peetiroo Proshenkoon muudaman mirkaneesse.

en: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Commissioner Yinager said the drought and civil unrests in some part of the country has not barred the economy from growing.
om: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliin godhaniin, Komishiner Yinaager hongee fi jeequmsi kutaalee biyyatti muraasa keessaa dinagdeen akka hin guddanneef hin ittisne jedhaniiru.

en: South Korean media reports claim that North Korea has been placed under martial law with another nuclear test considered to be imminent.
om: Gabaasni miidiyaa Kooriyaa Kibbaa, Kooriyaan Kaabaa sirna mootummaa waraanaa jala akka galtuu fi shaakalli niyukileeraa kan biraan geggeeffamuuf akka jedhu akeeka.

en: Naegleria fowleri is found in tap water near New Orleans, marking the first time the pathogenic amoeba has been detected in U.S. public water supply.
