om: Neegileeriyaa foowuleriin bishaan boombaa keessatti naannoo Niwu Orliyaansitti dhiyaatee argame, ameebaa dhibee fidu isa dhiyeessii bishaan ummataa U.S. keessatti argame isa jalqabaa isa taasisa.

en: Russian and Syrian warplanes carry out airstrikes in southern Idlib, killing three civilians and wounding others.
om: Xiyyaaronni waraanaa Raashiyaa fi Siiriyaa kibba Idiib keessatti haleellaa qilleensarraa geggeessaniin, namoota nagaa sadii ajjeesanii kanneen biroo madeessan.

en: “In Ethiopia, progress in fighting malaria has contributed to the remarkable reduction in overall mortality among children under five."
om: "Itoopiyaa keessatti, adeemsa dhibee busaa loluu keessatti hammi du'aa ijoollee waggaa shanii gadii hir'ina guddaa agarsiiseera.

en: NASA's Mars Science Laboratory Curiosity rover lands safely on the surface of Mars.
om: Laaboratoriin Saayinsii Maarsii NASA konkolaataa Kiyuroositii irra keessa Maarsii irra nagaan qubachiise.

en: 1,200 new species and varieties of sea creatures discovered during the first world survey of marine life are presented at a conference in Jerusalem, Israel.
om: Sanyiiwwan haaraan 1,200 fi umamni galaanaa gosti garaagaraa yeroo qorannoo lubbu qabeeyyii bishaan keessaa addunyawaa jalqabaa argaman konfiraansii Yerussaalem, Isiraa'el irratti ibsaman.

en: In our diversity there is a lot of unity among us, so we want to spread that unity,” he noted.
om: Adda addummaa keenya keessa nu gidduu tokkummaa baayyeetu jira, kanaafuu tokkummaa sana babal'isuu barbaanna" jechuun dubbateera.

en: Canada’s funding for Ethiopia will help meet critical food, health and nutrition, and water and sanitation needs in response to the deteriorating situation throughout the country, the document said.
om: Deggersa maallaqaa Kanaadaan Itoopiyaaf gootu haala guutummaa biyyattii keessatti hammaataa dhufee deebii kennuuf fedhiiwwan nyaataa, fayyaa fi soorataa, akkasumas bishaanii fi qulqullinaa guutuuf gargaaruuf akka tahe, barruchi jedha.

en: Egypt's president Abdel Fattah el-Sisi makes his first official visit abroad to Algeria where security was top of the agenda.
om: Pirasdaantiin Gibxii Abdal Fattaa el-Siisii daawwannaa isaa jalqabaa biyya alaa gara Aljeeriyaatti, bakka nageenyi dhimma ijoo ta'etti godhe.

en: She took more than a minute off Ruth Chepngetich’s 1:04:02 in Istanbul last April.
om: 1:04:02 Ruut Cheepingetichii Ebla darbee Istaanbul keessattii irraa daqiiqaa tokko ol foyyeessiteetti.

en: India's government decides to relax rules concerning the operation of foreign-owned retailers such as Wal-Mart and Tesco within India.
om: Mootummaan Hindii sochii daldaloota namoota lammii biyya alaan dhuunfatamanii Hindii keessa jiran kanneen akka Wal-Maartii fi Teeskoon walqabatee akka seera fooyyessu murteesse.

en: It added that total rainfall above 100mm is forecasted in these regions.
om: Itti dabaluun hammi rooba waliigalaa 100mm naannolee sana keessatti nii eegama jedha.

en: The company said in a statement that it is looking to extensively expand its reach, investment in people and infrastructure in Ethiopia.
om: Ibsa isaa keessatti kampanichi qaqqabiinsa isaa babal'isuu akka barbaadu, namootaa fi ijaarsawwan irratti Itoopiyaa keessatti akka invest godhu dubbate.

en: A road run with the aim of promoting the tourism of Bale, in Oromia, has been held in the town of Bale Robe.
om: Fiigichi daandii irraa kaayyoon isaa tuurizimii Baalee, Oromiyaa keessaa beeksisuu ta'e, magaalaa Baalee Roobeetti gaggeeffame.

en: Philippine President Benigno Aquino III compares China's territory claims in the South China Sea to Nazi Germany's invasion of Czechoslovakia.
om: Pirasdaantiin Filiphiinsi Beniinyoo Aqu'iino III kan kootiin daangaa Chaayinaa Galaana Kibba Chaayinaa weerara Chegoslaavaakiyaa Naazii Jarmanii wajjin walmadaale.

en: Viswanathan Anand defeats Boris Gelfand to win the World Chess Championship for the fourth consecutive time, and the fifth time overall.
om: Viswaanaattaan Anaand, Booris Geelfaand injifachuun Chaampiyoonaa Cheezii Addunyaa yeroo walitti aanu afuriif akkasumas akka waliigalaatti yeroo shanaffaaf mo'ate.

en: A French court sentences former Rwandan army captain Pascal Simbikangwa to 25 years for his role in the 1994 Rwandan genocide.
om: Mannii murtii Faransaay ajajaa waraana Ruwandaa duraanii kaappiteen Paaskal Siimbikangiwaan gocha duguuggaa sanyii Ruwaandaa bara 1994 kessatti hirmaannaa taasiseen hidha waggaa 25 itti murtesse.

en: Areas close to Awash, Baro-Akobo and Nile river basins and tributaries are also exposed to flood risks, he added.
om: Naannolee Awwaash, Baaroo-Aqooboo fu laga Naayili fi itti yaa'ileetti dhiyaatan balaa lolaa saaxilamoodha, jedhe itti dabaluun.

en: In data collected by NASA's Juno spacecraft, an INAF team discovers suggestions of a new volcano close to the south pole of Jupiter's moon Io.
om: Daataa xiyyaara hawwaa NASA, Juunoo'n walitti qabame keessatti, gareen INAF poolii kaabaa addeessa Juppiiter loo tti dhiyaatee volkaanoon haaraa akka jiru yaada argate.

en: Prior to becoming a Goodwill Ambassador, Betty G served as UNHCR’s High Profile Supporter and visited a number of refugee camps in Ethiopia hosting South Sudanese, Eritrean and Somali refugees, according to a statement issued by UNHCR.
om: Akka dubbii UNHCR'n gadhiifameetti, Guudwiil Ambassadar ta'uun dura, Beetii G Deggertuu UNHCR Maqaa Guddaa Qabdu tahuun tajaajiluun mooraa baqattootaa Itoopiyaa keessatti lammiilee Sudaan Kibbaa, Eritiriyaa fi baqattoota Sumaalee qabatanii jiran heedduu daawatte.

en: The sudden death of writer Maeve Binchy, who sold more than 40 million books worldwide, is announced on Irish television by Vincent Browne.
om: Oduun du'aatii tasaa barreessaa Meyiiv Binchii kan sadarkaa idil addunyaatti kitaabota milliyoona 40 ol gurguratee televizyoona Ayrish irratti viinsent Braawonin labsame

en: Hong Kong's Centre for Health Protection confirms Hong Kong's first case of Zika virus in a 38-year-old woman and says it will report the case to the World Health Organization (WHO).
om: Giddugalli Eegumsa Fayyaa Hoong Koong dhukkubni vaayirasii Zikkaan inni jalqabaa Hoong Koong dubartii umrii 38 keessatti kan argame tahuu fi dhukkubicha Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaaf (WHO) akka gabaasu mirkaneesse.

en: “His innovative contribution to music, particularly jazz, has earned him a global prestige,” he added.
om: "Gumaachi inni muuziqaatti godhe, keessumaa jaaziitti, kabaja addunyaa isa argachiiseera" jedhe itt dabaluun.

en: At least 21 passengers on board an Indonesian ferry that sank last night on the Mahakam River in East Kalimantan are missing and presumed dead.
om: Baha kaalimatan laga Mahakam kessaattii eeda galgala dhidhima doonii Indooneezhiyaa mudateen yoo xiqqaate imaltooni 21 achi buuteen isaanii dhabamuusaatiin akka du'anittii tilmaamama.

en: Citing irreconcilable differences, Angelina Jolie files for divorce from Brad Pitt and seeks full custody of their six children.
om: Adda addummaa wal hin fudhanne caqasuun, Anjeeliinaa Joolii Biraad Piit irraa adda bahuuf wal-hiikuuf iyyatte akkasumas ijoollee isaanii ja'an guutummaatti ofii ishee akka guddistu gaafatte.

en: California regulators announce a ban on chlorpyrifos, an organophosphate nerve agent used as a pesticide.
om: To'attoonni Kaalifoorniyaa kilorofaayirifos, ejentiin narvii orgaanofoosfeetii akka farra ilbiisaatti fayyadu irra uggurri kahamuu beeksisan.

en: The Cambridgeshire Guided Busway, the longest guided busway in the world, opens after years of delays.
om: Karaan konkolaataa Baasii Qajeelfamuu Kaambirijshaa'ir, karaa konkolaataa baasii qajeelfamuu inni dheeraan addunyaa, turtii waggaa baayyee booda baname.

en: The performances, like so many that came before them, will have themes of patriotism.
om: Agarsiisonni sun, akkuma warreen hedduu isaan dura dhufanii, matadureewwan jaalala biyyaa ni qabaatu.

en: The new start-up businesses law and establishment of job creation fund would make Ethiopia preferable for beginners in technology, Dr Ahmedin indicated.
om: Fandiin seera biizinasii kalaqa jalqabaa haaraa fi carraa hojii uumuu jalqabdoota teekinoolojiif Itoopiyaa filatamtuu akka godhu, Dr Ahmeddin agarsiise.

en: Ethnic nationalism was kept ruthlessly in check under the Marxist Dergue regime and during the two decades of EPRDF rule that followed.
om: Namni umrii waggaa 34 sun akka sagalee siyaasaa cimaa garee saba Oromootti mul'ate, yeroo hojii muuziqaa isaa diina baayyee horate.

en: In 1997 MIDROC Gold acquired the Legadembi open pit gold mine for 172 million USD through privatization process.
om: Bara 1997 keessa Warqeen MIDROC karaa adeemsa qabeenya gara dhuunfaatti dabarsuu bakka albuuda warqee baasuu lafa banaa Lagadambii USD miliyoona 172'n fudhate.

en: According to the locals, the cause of the clashes an alleged ban of an Oromifa song that has a political content.
om: Akka jiraattonni naannoo jedhanitti, sababi walitti bu'insichaa dhowwamuu sirba Afaan Oromoo kan qabiyyee siyaasaa qabuuti.

en: Ethiopian and Kuwait held discussion on the draft memorandum of understanding (MoU) on the employment of domestic workers.
om: Itoophiyaa fi Kuweet gumee yaadachiistuu wal hubannaa (MoU) sirna qacarrii hojjeettoota biyya keessaa irratti marii taasisan.

en: Turkish prime minister Recep Tayyip Erdoğan accuses the United Nations Security Council of standing by with its "hands and arms tied" while the Syrian people are killed every day.
om: Ministeerri muummee Turkii Riseep Taayip Irdoogaan qondaalaa nageenyaa mootummoota gamtoomanii hoggaa itti lammiileen Siriyaa guyyuun ajjeefaman 'callisuun ilaale' jechuun himatani.

en: South Korea agrees in principle to resume discussions with North Korea on humanitarian issues including reuniting families separated by the Korean War.
om: Kooriyaan Kibbaa dhimmoota namoomaaf maatiiwwan Lola Kooriyaan adda bahan walitti deebisuu dabalatee Kooriyaa Kaabaa wajjin haasaa akka itti fuftu waliigalte.

en: South Korea bans all fishery imports from eight Japanese prefectures, amid concern over leaks of radioactive water from the crippled Fukushima nuclear plant.
om: Kooriyaan kibbaa sodaa dhangala'uu bishaan Raadiyoo Activii sababa balaa Gabbisa Niwukileerii Jaappaniin mudateen walqabatee oomisha qurxummii biyyoota jaappaan sagal irraa gara biyyattiitti seena ture hunda akka dhaabbatu ajajje.

en: In a bid to boost employment opportunities for Ethiopian nationals, the Ministry of Health as well as the Job Creation Commission (JCC) of Ethiopia has signed a trilateral MoU with the UAE-based Response Plus Holdings PJSC.
om: Qophii carraa hojii lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa guddisuuf qophaa'e irratti, Ministeerri Fayyaa akkasumas Koomishiniin Hojii Uumuu(KHU) Itoophiyaa walii galtee sadeenii deebii keennitoota PJSC kan UAE'n degeggaramuu waliin mallatteessan.

en: Founded by three partners engaged in distributing fuel from Nile Petroleum under a franchise arrangement, JR currently runs eight filling stations.
om: Michuuwwan sadiin kan hundaa'e kan boba'a Naayil irraa eeyyama waliigaltee raabsaatiin raabsuu hojjetu, JR yeroo ammaatti buufata raabsaa boba'aa saddeet qaba.

en: The Temple Mount in Jerusalem was closed to all visitors for the first time since 2000, following the attempted assassination of Israeli activist Yehuda Glick.
om: Gaarri Mana sagadaa Yerussaalem keessaa yaalii ajjeechaa falmaa mirgaa lammii Isiraa'el Yihudaa Giliikki irratti godhame hordofuun erga bara 2000 tii as yeroo jalqabaaf daawwattoota hundumatti cufamee jira.

en: Negash noted that the government highly encourages and motivates women to join the sector.
om: Negaash mootummaan dubartoonni akka sektericha seenan baayyee ni jajjabeessa ni kakaasas jedhan.

en: Dozens of dead bodies are found at the Abu Salim Hospital in Tripoli which had been abandoned by medical staff earlier in the week when it came under heavy gunfire.
om: Hospitaala Abu Saalim Tirippoolii keessaatti reeffii darzanootaan lakka'amu kan jalqaba torban kanaa keessa dhukaasi ulfaataan erga irratii banamee booda hojjetoonni fayyaa dhiisanii deeman argame.

en: Indian Embassy to Ethiopia in collaboration with Indian community in Addis Abeba marked today the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi in the capital at Gandhi Memorial Hospital.
om: Itoophiyaatti Imbaasiin Hindii walta'iinsa hawaasaa Hindii Finfinnee waliin har'a ayyaana dhaloota 150ffaa Mahatama Gaandii magaala guddittiitti Hospitaala Yaadannoo Gaandiitti kabajan.

en: “Kushineta is opening up its first store in megenagna and that’s a huge step forward,” said Yared, hoping the future is wide open for the industry.
om: "Kushineettaan mankuusaa isaa isa jalqabaa megenaanyaatti banate kun tarkaanfii guddaa gara fuulduraatti godhamedha," jedhe Yaareed, fuuldurri industirichaa baayyee bal'aa akka tahu abdachuudhaan.

en: He began his musical career in Addis Ababa in the 1940s and was a member of Ethiopia’s famous Police Orchestra.
om: Geetachoon hojii muuziqaa isaa Addis Ababaa keessatti bara 1940 keessa jalqabe akkasumas miseensa Orchestiraa Poolisii Itoopiyaa isa beekamaas ture.

en: Science publishes a series of papers on biodiversity in the deep sea, including tens of thousands of single-celled organisms most of which had not been previously identified.
om: Qorannooleen walitti fufoon lubbuu qabeeyyii gara garaa galaanaa gadi fagoo keessatti argaman irratti maxxanfamaniiru, lubbuu qabeeyyii kumoota kudhanii oliin lakkawwaman harki caaluu kan seel-qeenxee ta'aaniifi kana dura hin beekamne irratti.

en: South Korea and the United States commence a joint military exercise despite threats from North Korea.
om: Kooriyaa Kibbaa fi Yuunayitid Isteetis utuuma sodaachisuun Kooriyaa Kaabaa irra itti dhufuu shaakala waraanaa waliinii eegalan.

en: President of the United States Barack Obama signs a bill increasing security along his country's border with Mexico.
om: Pirasdaantiin Yuunaayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan sarara daangaa biyyi isaa Meksiikoo wajjin qabdutti seera eegumsa dabalu mallatteesse.

en: The President is the only African woman on the list.
om: Pirasdaantittiin dubartii Afirikaa tokkittii tarree sana keessa galteedha.

en: Russian President Vladimir Putin admits having sent Russian forces to Crimea last month to protect its military equipment there.
om: Pirasdaantiin Raashiyaa Vilaadimir Puutin meeshaa waraanaa isaa achi jiru eegsisuuf waraana Raashiyaa gara Kiriimiyaa ergee akka ture amane.

en: Donald Trump accepts the nomination of the Republican Party in the 2016 US Presidential election.
om: Doonaald Tiraamp filaannoo Pirasdaantawaa US bara 2016 keessatti kaadhimamaa Paartii Rippaabilikii tahuu fudhate.

en: The death toll in cyclone-hit northern Mozambique has risen to 38, as aid workers struggle to reach the worst-affected areas.
om: Yommuu hojjetoonni gargaarsaaa bakka baayyee miidhame qaqqabuuf carraaqaa jiranitti, hammi du'aa kaaba Moozaambiki kan bubbee bishaan irraan rukutamte keessatti mudate gara 38'tti ol guddate.

en: Eid al-Fitr, the "Feast of Breaking the Fast" that marks the end of the month-long dawn-to-sunset fasting of Ramadan, is celebrated in Istanbul's Hagia Sophia for the first time in 87 years.
om: Id al-Fitir, "Dhangaan Sooma Ittiin Hiikan" kan xumura soomana Ramadaanaa baatii guutuu kan bariiirraa kaasee hanga aduun lixxuuttii agarsiisu, waggoota 87 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf Hagi'aa Soofiyaa kan Istaanbul keessaatti kabajame.

en: The ruling People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola wins the Angolan general election with a preliminary 74.46% of the vote.
om: Kan bulchiinsa irra jiru Sosochiin Ummataa Birmadummaa Angoolaa filannoo waliigalaa Angoolaa bu'aa duraa sagalee 74.46%'n mo'ate.

en: Iran denies a plane carrying the Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel access to its airspace for two hours en route to India.
om: Iraan xiyyaarri Chaansileera Jarmanayii Anjeelaa Meerkeliin baatu gaafa gara Hindii deemu daangaa qilleensaa biyyattii sa'atii lamaaf fayyadamee akka ture haalte.

en: The current drought occurred in Borena, West Guji, Guji, East Bale, West Hararge zones, and it exists as an alert stage in East Hararge and Bale, according to Ketema.
om: Akka Kataman jedhetti, hongeen ammaa zooniiwwan Boorenaa, Gujii Lixaa, Gujii, Baalee Bahaa, Lixa Harargee keessatti kan mudate, akkasumas Harargee Bahaa fi Baalee keessatti sadarkaa akeekkachiisaa irra jira.

en: Kenenisa was left out of the 2016 Rio Olympics team because he did not fulfill the requirements which were set by the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EFF).
om: Qananiisaan sababa ulaagaalee Federeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EFF) tiin ka'aman hin guunneef garee Olompikii Riyoo 2016 keessaa hambifamee ture.

en: President Sahle-Work Zewde received Imtiaz Patel, Chairperson of the Board of Multichoice Group.
om: Pirasdaanti SaahileWorq Zawudee Imtiyaaz Paatel, dura ta'aa Boordii Garee Maltiichooyizii simatan.

en: Design Week Addis Ababa is an internationally recognized design and innovation event in Ethiopia.
om: Dizaayin Wiik Addis Ababaan qophii wixinee fi kalaqaa Itoophiyaa sadarkaa adunyaatti beekamtii qabuudha.

en: The top three teams will qualify for the World Cup in France.
om: Gareewwan jalqabaa sadan Geeba Addunyaa Faransaay keessaaf ni darbu.

en: Ethiopia’s gold industry is currently dominated by small-scale artisanal miners, but Newmont Corp. and Australia’s Allied Gold Corp. are among the companies exploring for the precious metal in the Horn of Africa nation.
om: Industiriin Warqee Itoophiyaa yeroo ammaatti albuuda baastota sadarkaa-xixiqqaatiin dhuunfatamee jira, garuu Niwmont Korp. fi Korporeeshinii walta'oo warqee Awustiraaliyaa dhaabbilee sibiila gati-jabeessa biyya Gaanfa Afiriikaa keessatti barbaadaa jiran keessa tokko.

en: Debris found near the Indian Ocean island of Réunion is consistent with material from a Boeing 777 and is being examined to confirm whether it is from Malaysia Airlines Flight 370.
om: Hafteen naannoo Garba Hindii odola Riiyuuniyenitti argame qaama isa Booying 777 irraa wajjin wal fakkaata, akkasumas Daandii Qilleensaa Maleejiyaa Balalii 270 irraa tahuu mirkaneessuuf qoratamaa jira.

en: According to Tenagne Tadesse, Program Assistant at the Institute, the films were selected on the basis of having been released less than 3 years ago, their coverage of social issues and documenting African realities, as well as the awards they had won and acclaim they had gained thus far.
om: Akka Tanaanyee Taaddaseen, Inistitiyuutichatti Gargaartuun Sagantaa jettetti, fiilmonni sun waggoota 3 asitti gad lakkifamuu, dhimmoota hawaasaa uwwisuu fi jireenya qabatamaa Afrikaanotaa galmeessuu isaanii, akkasumas haga ammaatti badhaasota isaan mo'atanii fi kabjama ummataa isaan haga ammaa argatan irratti hundaa'uun filataman.

en: Turkish Volkan Bozkır becomes the new President of the United Nations General Assembly.
om: Lammiin Turkii Voolkaan Boozkir Pirasdaantii haaraa Walitti-qabama Waliigalaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii ta'e.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has appreciated all those involved in organising a memorial concert in honour of Tilahun Gessesse.
om: Muummichi Ministeera Abiyyi Ahimed kabaja Tilahun Gassaseef warra konsertii yaadannoo qopheessuu keessatti hirmaatan hunda galateeffatan.

en: Indian National Congress won legislative assembly election of Indian state Karnataka with clear majority.
om: Koongiraasiin Biyyaalessa Indiyaa filannoo Yaa'ii qaamaa seera baasaa Indiyaa naannoo Karnatakkaa adda addummaa sagalee ballatiin injifate.

en: This Multi-Spectral Remote Sensing Satellite is named Ethiopia Remote Sensing Satellite-1 (ETRSS-1).
om: Satalaayitiin Speektira baayyee Fageenyaa irraa argu kun Satalaayitii Itoopiyaa Fageenyaa Irraa Argu-1 (ETRSS-1) jechuun moggahe.

en: In Major League Baseball, the Florida Marlins officially change their name to the Miami Marlins.
om: dorgomii Liigii Olaanoo kubbaa kachoon gareen Filooridaa Meeriliins maqaa isaanii gara Maayaamii Meriliinsitti jijjiirratan.

en: They will soon begin negotiations as part of a regional effort to end the conflict, according to Dina Mufti, Ethiopia’s foreign ministry spokesman.
om: Akka Diinaa Muftii, dubbi himaa ministeera haajaa alaa Itoopiyaatti, isaan yeroo dhiyootti haala tattaaffii naannichaa kan walitti bu'iinsa xumuruutti marii nii eegalu.

en: Digital Transformation Program Director General at Ministry of Innovation and Technology, Dr. Abiyot Bayou said, “The grant will support our ministry in guiding and enabling digital reform under the EoDB Programme.”
om: Ministeera Innoveeshinii fi Teekinoolojiitti Daayirekterri Olaanaan Sagantaa Tiraanisformeeshinii Dijitaalaa, Dr. Abiyot Baayyuu, "Gargaarsi maallaqichaa Sagantaa EoDB jalatti rifoormii dijitaalaa geggeessuu fi raawwachuu keessatti ministirii keenya ni deggera" jedhe.

en: The intoxicating aroma of freshly roasted coffee can be hard to resist.
om: Urgaan mirqaansu kan buna reef aka'amee irra baqachuun ni cima.

en: The World Health Organisation says that the death toll from the Ebola virus is over 2,900.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa baay'inni du'a vaayirasii Eboolaan dhufe 2,900 ol akka tahe ibse.

en: During the discussion, the Minister said Ethiopia and UK have been enjoying a longstanding and close relationship calling for further engagement to deepen the existing ties with multifaceted areas of cooperation.
om: Yeroo marichaa, Ministeerichi Itoopiyaa fi UK'n hariiroo yeroo dheeraa fi walitti dhiyoo tahe qabaachaa akka turan kaasuun hidhata jiru tumsa kallattii gargaraan caalaatti jabeessuuf walitti dhufuu dabalataaf waamicha dhiyeessan.

en: Former Prime Minister of Thailand Yingluck Shinawatra appears in court to face corruption charges.
om: Ministirri muummee Taayilaand duraanii Yingiluuk Shiinawatran himata dhimma malammaltummaan irratti dhiyaateef mana murtiitti dhiyaatan.

en: Among the 11 people four were swept away as they tried to cross a river in the Nifas sil Lafto suburbs of the city Hana mariam particular area, Nigatu Mamu, spokesman for the city’s fire and emergency division said.
om: Namoota 11 keessaa afur qarqara magaalaa Nifas Silk Laaftoo keessumaa bakka Haannaa Mariyaam jedhamutti utuu laga qaxxaamuruuf yaalanii lolaan fudhatamuu, dubbi himaan kutaa ibiddaa fi balaa tasaa magaalitti dubbate.

en: Wondessen was provisionally suspended until February 1, 2024 after testing positive for Cathinone.
om: Wandosen qorannoon kaatinooniitiin keessatti argamuun booda yeroo muraasaaf hanga Guraandhala 1, 2014tti dhorkameera.

en: The United States Holocaust Memorial Museum obtains a full copy of the archives of the United Nations War Crimes Commission from World War II and makes it available online.
om: Godambaan Yaadannoo Holookastii Yuunaayitid Isteetis garagalcha kuusaa Komishinii Yakka Waraanaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii Waraana Addunyaa II irraa guutummaatti fudhatee marsariitii irratti akka argamu godhe.

en: The Associated Press and Snopes say they are no longer providing fact-checking services for Facebook.
om: Asosheetid Pireesii fi Isnoops kana booda tajaajiloota haqa-adda baasuu Feesbuukiif akka hin kennine dubbatan.

en: Scientists discover an 800km long canyon that is up to 800m deep in places beneath the ice sheet that covers Greenland.
om: Saayintistoonni boyii 800 km dheeratu gadi fageenya hanga 800m qabu hafaa cabbii odola Giriinlaand haguuguu gaditti argatan

en: Volvo says it plans to phase out fossil fuels by building only electric or hybrid cars.
om: Voolvoon konkolaataawwan elektirikaa yookaan makaa ta'an qofa oomishuun boba'aa foosilii hojiin ala godhuuf akka karoorfate dubbate.

en: According to the Environmental Analysis lack of integration among the sectoral ministries and regional bureaus, problems of value addition in using natural resources and lack of strategy on green industry are identified as the main challenges that hamper effective actions against environmental climate change related actions.
om: Akka Xiinxala Eegumsa Naannootti hanqinni walsimannaa sektera ministirootaa fi biiroowwan naannolee gidduudhaa dhibuun, rakkoowwan leecalloolee uumama fayyadamuudhaan faayidaa dabaluu fi hanqinni tarsiimoo industirii magariisaa akka yaaddoowwan ijoo kan tarkaanfilee faallaa tarkaanfilee jijjjiirama qilleensaa eegumsa naannoon walqabate danqe tahuu adda baafamaniiru.

en: NASA's twin GRAIL probes have revealed the surface of the Moon in unprecedented detail, showing unexpectedly-deep cracks, craters and tectonic structures.
om: Kutaan qorannoo NASA lakkuu GRAIL dirri ji'a balbalooma argamee hin beekneen, caccabuu hin eegamne, lafa gadi bu'a fi caasaa tektoonikii ifoomsan.

en: In related news, speaker of the House of Peoples’ Representatives of Ethiopia, Tagesse Chafo slammed the recent resolution by the Arab league over the GERD.
om: Oduu walqabateen, Dubbi himaan mana maree bakka bu'oota ummata Itoophiyaa, Taggeseee Caafoo wal dhabdee furuu dhiyeenya Liigii Arabaatin GERD irratti dhiyaate mormaniiru.

en: They told The Reporter that the clashes started after police officers questioned why the banned song was played at a wedding ceremony.
om: Walitti bu'insichi kan jalqabe erga poolisoonni sirbi dhorkame qophii cidhaa irratti maaliif akka baname gaafatanii booda akka tahe Ze Rippoortetti himan.

en: The closed sixth year fifth ordinary session also saw lawmakers approve the Defense Forces Amendment Proclamation.
om: Walga'ii idilee waggaa ja'affaa marsaa shanaffaa cufame seera tumtoonni Labsii Fooyya'iinsa Humna Ittisaas mirkaneessuun ture.

en: Offering degrees in Business Administration and Computer Science at the graduate level, the American College of Technology (ACT) has been inaugurated in the capital.
om: Sadarkaa eebbaatti digirii Bulchiinsa Biizinesii fi Saayinsii Kompiwuuteraa kan kennu, Kolleejjiin Teekinoolojii Ameerikaa (ACT) magaalaa guddittii keessatti eebbifame.

en: Japan detains a Chinese fishing boat found near the disputed Pinnacle Islands in the East China Sea.
om: Jaappaan bidiruu qurxummii qabduu Chaayinaa isa bakka walfalmisiisaa Odola Pinaakilii kan Baha Galaana Chaayisaa keessaatti argame hiite.

en: Religious fathers and some clergy, while observing the holly day, made supplication to God to save the world from the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.
om: Abbootiin amantii fi luboonni muraasi, guyyaa ayyaanaa yeroo hordofan, addunyaa kana weerara vaayirasii koronaa (COVID-19) jalaa akka oolchuuf kadhata gara Waaqaatti godhan.

en: The external assessment team that conducted the final Polio outbreak assessment in Ethiopia on 8-12 June 2015 confirmed that Ethiopia has successfully interrupted polio transmission.
om: Gareen madaallii alaa qorannoo weerara pooliyoo isa dhumaa Itoopiyaa keesatti 8-12 Waxabajji 2015 geggeesse Itoopiyaan guutummaatti daddarbiinsa pooliyoo milkaa'inaan dhaabuu mirkaneese.

en: Briefing journalists, Ministry Plant Conservation Director Zebdios Salato said fragmented swarm of mature locusts have entered parts of the country.
om: Gaazexeessitootaaf ibsa kennuun, Daarikteerri Eegumsa Biqilaa Ministirichaa Zebdi'oos Salaatoo gareen hoomaa hawaannisa gaheeyyii kutaalee biyyattii seenuu dubbatan.

en: All 25,000 applicants to the University of Liberia fail their entrance exams.
om: Yuunivarsitii Laayibeeriyaa seenuuf namoonni galmaa'aan 25000 hunduu qormaataa seensaa kufani.

en: JR-Petroleum is the latest entrant among the four companies opening its doors on December 25, 2017.
om: JR-peetirooliyeemiin dhaabbilee afran Mudde 25,2017 banaman keessaa seenaa isa dhumaati.

en: Ethiopia Coffee and Betika Sports Betting Company have signed a five year sponsorship deal.
om: Bunni Itoophiyaa fi Dhaabbati tilmaama tapha Ispoortii Betika walii galtee ispoonsara waggaa shanii mallatteessan.

en: While this was intended to paralyze illegal money transfer agents and weaken the parallel market, the measure comes with a risk as it could result in a fall in business transactions and create a fear that it would lead to an economic slowdown.
om: Osooma kun daddabarsa maallaqaa seeraan alaa laamshessuu fi gabaa tarree dadhabsiisuuf ta'ee jiruu, safartuchi rakkoo jiilfaannee daldalaa kuffisuu fi sodaa suuta jedhiinsa diinagdee fiduu danda'a jedhu qaba.

en: The World Health Organization advises women in areas where the Zika virus is prevalent to delay pregnancies.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa dubartoota naannoo vaayirasiin Zikkaa itti heddummatu jiran ulfaa'uu akka achi butan gorse.

en: The legislature of the US state of California passes a bill banning new sales of semi-automatic rifles with removable magazines.
om: Seera tumtuun bulchiinsa kaaliforniyaa Yunaaytid Isteetis seera gurgurtaa qawwee awutoomatikaa baattoon rasaasaa isaa buqqa'u dhorku baase.

en: The 34-year-old had emerged as a powerful political voice of the Oromo ethnic group, and had made many enemies during his musical career.
om: Ajjeechaa weellisaa beekamaa Hacaaluu Hundeessaa hordofuun hookkara guyyaa lamaa Itoopiyaa keessatti namoonni 80 ol ajjeefaman.

en: Ethiopia first introduced cybercrimes in the 2004 Criminal Code which penalizes only cybercrimes of ‘hacking’, ‘dissemination of malware’ and ‘denial of service (DoS) attacks’.
om: Itoopiyaan yakka saayiberii kan 'hanna interneetaa(hacking)', 'vaayirasii kompiteraa raabsuu' fi 'haleellaa tajaajila dhorkachuu (DoS)' qofa adabsiisu yeroo jalqabaaf Seera Yakkaa bara 2004 keesatti beeksifte.

en: In addition, six upcoming Ethiopian designers together with other upcoming designers from the continent will display their designs.
om: Dabalataanis, dizaayineronni olguddataa jiran lammii Itoopiyaa ja'a dizaayineroota olguddataa jiran kan biroo ardicha irraa dhufan wajjin dizaayinii isaanii ni agarisisu.

en: A US judge blocks an agreement between Google and publishers about efforts to digitize books online at Google Books.
om: Abbaan seeraa US tokko waliigaltee Guugilii fi maxxansitoota gidduu kan kaka'umsa waa'ee kitaabota marsariitii Guugile Buuks irratti bifa digitaalaan dhiyeessuu danqe.

en: Ethiopian Premier League Share Company has decided Mekelle 70 Enderta and Fasil Kenema football clubs to participate in the 2020/21 CAF continental club football competitions.
om: waldaan Aksiyoona Pirimerligii Itiyoophiyaa Maqalee 70 andertaan fi gareen kubbaa miilaa Faasil Kenemaa dorgommii garee kubbaa miilaa ardii CAF 2020/21 irratti akka hirmaatuuf ,murteesse

en: M23 rebels announce their withdrawal from territory captured from government troops after a pullout deal was reached in Uganda.
om: Gareen diddaa M23 daangaa qabatanii turan gad lakkisuu isaanii walii galteen gad-lakkisanii ba'uu Yugaandaatti erga irra ga'ameen booda beeksisaniiru.

en: Beijing's air pollution reaches levels judged as hazardous to human health.
om: Faalamni qilleensaa Beejingi fayyaa namaatiif balaadha sadarkaa jedhamee murteeffamu gahe.

en: The second channel of Oromia Broadcasting Network (OBN), a regional broadcaster headquartered in Adama, has started trial transmissions today.
om: Chaanaaliin lammaffaa Oromiyaa Broodkastiing Neetwoork (OBN), tamsaasi televiijinii naannoo waajjira isaa ijoo Adaamaa godhatee, har'a tamsaasa yaalii isaa eegaleera.

en: The joint forces have taken control of the Zobl mountainous area and other very significant towns including Arjo, Fokissa and Boren.
om: Abukaattonni himatamtootaa gaaffii yeroo dabalataa morman. Ha tahu malee, poolisiin dhimmichi qorannoo gadi fagoo barbaada jechuun falmuun, yeroo dabalataa gaafate.

en: In a Europe-wide operation, police penetrate EncroChat, a top-secret communications system used by criminals to sell drugs and plan attacks.
om: Duula bal'aa Awrooppatiti taasifameen poolisiin toora sabqunnamtii iccitii gudda ta'e 'Enchrohat' jedhamu, kan yakkoomtoonni baala sammuu namaa hadoochu irratti daldalanii fi haleellaa rawwatamu irratti karoorsan cabsee seene.

en: Dubai Marathon champion Tirfi Tsegaye, who clocked a world-leading 2:19:41 earlier this year, and Tigist Tufa, who won the 2015 London Marathon and finished second in this year’s race, are the reserves for the women’s team.
om: Injifattuun Maraatoonii Dubaay Tirfii Tsegaayee, kan jalqaba waggaa kanaa qabxii addunyaa dursu 2:19:41 galmeessite, fi Tigist Tufaa kan Maraatoonii London 2015 mo'attee fi dorgommii waggaa kanaa keessatti lammaffaa bahuun kan goolabde, garee dubartootaa kanaaf eeggattuu dha.

en: The Sunday Herald becomes the first Scottish newspaper to declare its support for a Yes vote in the forthcoming referendum on Scottish independence.
om: Barruun Sundey Heraald murtoo-uummataa bilisummaa Lammiilee Iskootilaandii yeroo dhiyootti geggeeffamu deeggaruun gaazexaa Iskootilaandii isa jalqabaa ta'e.

en: According to Industrial Parks Development Corporation, Soulfflet Malt Ethiopia will have a capacity of producing 100,000 metric tons of malt per annum.
om: Akka Korporashinii Guddina Paarkii Industiriitti, Sooflet Maaltin Itoophiyaa dandeetti waggaatti meetirik toonii 100,000 oomishuu ni qabaata.

en: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights claims that ISIL has blown up the ancient Temple of Bel in Palmyra.
om: Dhaabbatni taajjabdoota mirga namoomaa siiriyaa Ayisil Paalmiraatti mana sagadaa Beel durii barbadeessuu isa ibseera.

en: Officials of the Ministry noted that 93 giant enterprises and nearly 6700 small and medium enterprises are found in the region, and that a task force has been established to conduct a survey and investigate the cost of damages to reinvigorate factories into normal production.
om: Aanga'oonni Ministeerichaa interpiraayizootni gurguddoon 93 fi interpiraayizootni xixiqqoo fi giddu-galeessaa 6700 akka naannoocha keessatti argaman, akkasumas gareen duulaa warshaalee oomishaa duraatti deebisuuf sassaabbii odeeffannoo fi gatii miidhaa qaqqabee qorachuuf hundaffamuu isaa yaadachiisee jira.

en: Cyclone Marcia is expected to strengthen to category 5 before making landfall in Central Queensland. ,
om: Bubbeen bishaan irraa Marshiyaa Giddugala Kuwiinsilaandii keessatti utuu lafa hin tuqin gara sadarkaa 5'tti akka olguddatu nii eegama.

en: A rogue member of the Afghan National Army opens fire on Australian Army soldiers in Kandahar Province killing three and an Afghan interpreter.
om: Miseensi raayyaa biyyoleessaa Afgaan kan namusaan ala tae dhukaasa baneen bulchiinsa kandahaaritti loltoota raayyaa Awustiraaliyaa sadiif turjumaana ajjeeseera.

en: German footballer Robert Huth is hospitalised with suspected meningitis.
om: Taphataan kubbaa miilaa Jermanii Roobert Hut shakkii meninjaayitasiin hospitaalatti yaalame.

en: These parks are designed to have swimming pools, basketball courtyards, amphitheaters and cafes, according to the Agency.
om: Paarkiiwwan kunneen puulii bishaan daakaa, dirreewwan kubbaa kachoo, ampiitiyaateriiwwan fi kaaffeewan qabaachuun saxaxaman, akka Ejensichaatti.

en: Two suspected Al-Qaeda militants are killed in a U.S. drone strike in the southeastern province of Hadhramaut.
om: Bulchiinsa kibba baha Haadramawut keessatti shakkamtoonni hidhattoota Alqaayidaa lama diroonii US'n rukutamuun ajjeefamaniiru.

en: U.S. airplane manufacturer Boeing unveils the first Boeing 737 MAX airplane at its factory in Renton, Washington.
om: Oomishaan xiyyaaraa U.S. Booyingiin xiyyaara isaa Boeing 737 MAX isa jalqabaa warshaa isaa Reenton, Waashingitonitti agarsiise.

en: Officials in Karamay in Xinjiang, western China, places a temporary ban on Islamic headscarves, clothing and those with beards from using public transport, following violence in the region.
om: Lixa chaayinaa, Ziinjiyaank bulchiinsa Karamaay keessatti Qamoleen motummaa jeequmsa nannichatti umamee tureen walqabatee martoo mata musliimotaa,uffannaalee fi namoota areeda qaban akka isaan geejjibawwan hawwaasaa hin fayyadamneef dhorkii yeroo murtaa'eef dabarsite.

en: According to her, the agreement signed between the two countries has helped to improve the tie in the economic sector.
om: Akka isheetti, waliigalteen biyyoota lamaan gidduutti mallattaa'e hidhaa sektara diinagdeetin jiru fooyyessuuf gargaareera.

en: North Korea agrees, for the first time in 6 years, to let the United States search for the remains of American soldiers killed during the Korean War.
om: Kooriyaan Kaabaa waggoota 6 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf, Yuunaayitid Isteetis haftee reeffa waraana Ameerikaa kan yeroo Waraana Kooriyaa ajjeefaman akka barbaaddu waliigalte.

en: A bus carrying around 50 school children rolls over on a highway south of Sveg in the northern region of Härjedalen, Sweden, killing three people.
om: Baasiin ijoollee mana barnootaa 50 baatee ture tokko karaa saffisaa kibba Siveeg isa naannoo kaaba Harjedaalen, Iswiidin keessatti, ofirra garagaluun namoota sadii ajjeese.

en: Ethiopian researchers have introduced a new species of sorghum seed that could give yield multiple times per year.
om: Qorattoonni Itoopiyaa sanyii ija bisingaa haaraa kan waggaatti yeroo baayyee oomisha kennuu danda'u beeksisan.

en: The state-owned monopoly is reportedly losing millions of dollars due to the telecom fraud.
om: Kan kophaa isaa hojjetu mootummaan dhuunfatamu kun sababa kanaa doolarota miliyoona lakka'aman akka dhabaa jiru gabaasame.

en: Simet film tells a historical story set in the momentous Zemene Mesafint period.
om: Fiilmiin Simmeet seenaa seena-qabeessa yeroo Zemene Mesaafintii barbaachisaa ture hima.

en: According to sources, Dawit won her first indoor competition in Prague in February 2014, running a time of 4:09.08 minutes.
om: Akka maddeeniitti, Daawwit dorgommii mana keessaa jalqabaa ishee Piraagu'etti Guraandhala 2014, yeroo daqiiqaa 4:09.08'tin injifatte.

en: Mines Minister Engineer Takele Uma said that the implementation of the new policy will eliminate the struggle manufacturers are facing including lack of raw material and forex.
om: Ministeerri Albuudaa Injiinar Taakkalee Uumaa hojiirra oolmaan immaammata haaraa dhamaatii oomishtootni kunneen meeshaa dheedhii fi sharafa dhabuun isaan mudataa jiru ni balleessa jedhaniiru.

en: More than 30 million anti-mosquito nets are distributed to such areas since last year, she noted.
om: Bara darbe agoobarri farra-bookee busaa miliyoona 30 ol ta'an bara darbe rabsamaniiru, jechuunis ibsiteetti.

en: The data will also serve as a vital input for policymakers and stakeholders who work on air pollution and related issues, Abate Getachew, head of the Meteorological Research at EMA told The Reporter.
om: Daataan sun warra imaammata qopheessaniifi abbootii dhimmaa faalama qilleensaa fi dhimoota itti dhiyaatan irratti hojjetaniif akka galtee murteessaa tahettis akka tajaajilu Abaatee Geetaachoo, EMA'tti hoogganaan Qorannoo Meetiroolojii Ze Ripporeretti hime.

en: Fossils discovered at the Franceville site in Gabon are claimed to be evidence that multicellular life on Earth began at least 1.5 billion years earlier than currently reckoned.
om: Hambaan lafee fi biqiltoota bakka Firaansiviille Gaabon keessaatti argame ragaa jireenyi seel-hedduu Lafa irratti yoo xiqqaate waggoota biliyoona 1.5 dura kan ammatti herregame dursee akka jalqabe agarsiisa.

en: Halloween, as an event, seems to be growing each year in Ethiopia, specifically in Addis Ababa.
om: Haalowiin akka ta'iitti waggaa waggaan Itoophiyaa keessatti keessumaa Finfinneetti waan guddataa jiru fakkaata.

en: The mobile application has been developed by the Consortium of Reproductive Health Associations (CORHA) together with United Nation Population Fund (UNFPA) and the Ethiopian Ministry of Health (MoH).
om: Appilikeeshiniin mobaayilichaa Tokkummaa Waldaalee Fayyaa Wal-hormaataa (CORHA) fi Fandii Ummataa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii fi Ministeera Eegumsa Fayyaa Itoopiyaa (MoH) waliin tahuun kan qophaa'edha.

en: The Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report estimates the effectiveness of the influenza vaccination in 2014–2015 at 23% which is the lowest since 2006.
om: Gabaasni Dhukkubsachuu fi Du'uu Torbanii bu'a qabeessummaan talaallii infiluweenzaa bara 2014-2015 keessa 23% irra akka jiruu fi erga bara 2006'tii isa gadaanaa tahuu tilmaame.

en: South Korean media reports that North Korean officials are expected to visit the United States to discuss a second summit between the two countries at an unspecified date.
om: Miidiyaan Kooriyaa Kibbaa angawoonni Kooriyaa Kaabaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis daawwachuun dhimma walgahii lammataa guyyaa hin beekamnetti biyyoota lamaan gidduutti godhamu akka mara'tan gabaase.

en: The White House announces $12 billion in bailouts for farmers and ranchers affected by recently imposed retaliatory tariffs.
om: Waayit Haawos taarifa ija bahumsaa dhiyeenya hojiirra ooleen qotee bultootaa fi horsiisee bultoota miidhamaniif deggersa maallaqaa biliyoona $12 beeksise.

en: Thousands of people in Dublin, Ireland, attend the Irish government's commemoration of the 1916 Easter Rising against British rule.
om: Deebliin Ayerlaand keessatti yaadannoo mootummaa Aayirish kan 'Fincila Faasikaa bulchiinsa Biriteen kan bara 1916' hirmaachuuf namoonni kumaatamni argaman.

en: The U.S. Department of Justice announces the seizure of 92 domain names believed to be used by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps to "spread pro-Iranian disinformation".
om: Dippaartmentiin Haqaa U.S maqaa doomenii 92 kan Garee Eegduu Warraaqsa Isilaamummaa Iraaniin fayyadamamu jedhamee amanamu kan "oduu doggogoraa Iraaniin deggeru facaasu" f oolan qabachuu isaa beeksise.

en: “Supply creates its own demand. People like me have given up on shopping. Even the mannequins outside the stores aren’t representative.”
om: "Dhiyyeessin barbaadama mataa isaa uuma. Nammonni akka koo bittaa irra abdii kutaniiru. Manneen uuffata dukkaana alaa iyyuu bakka bu'oo miti"

en: Tigray Interim Administration Agriculture and Rural Development Bureau disclosed that 10 million tree seedlings are readied to be planted in the region this rainy season.
om: Biiroon Bulchiinsa qonnaa fi misooma baadiyyaa mootummaa ce'umsaa Tigiraay biqiltuun mukaa miliyoona 10 waqtii roobaatti naannocha keessatti dhaabamuuf akka qophaa'e ifa taasise.

en: Elena Kagan is sworn in as the fourth woman to sit on the Supreme Court of the United States.
om: Ilenaa Kaagan dubartii dura teessuu mana murtii olaanaa Ameerikaa 4ffaa ta'uun sirna kakuu raawwaatte.

en: The World Health Organization (WHO) concludes that diesel exhaust causes cancer.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) aarri naafxaa Kaanserii akka fidu ibse.

en: Thousands of people are fleeing Kathmandu due to uncertainty over food supply.
om: Sababa dhiyeessii nyaataa gahaan dhabamuutiin namoonnii kumaatamaan lakkaawwaman katamanduu gad-lakkisuun imalaa jiru.

en: South African, the Bafana Bafana, is leading the group by a point ahead of Ghana, the Black Stars; and Ethiopia, the Walia Antelopes, placed third.
om: Afrikaan kibbaa,Baafanaa Baafanonni , Gaanaa 'urjilee gurrachota' qabxii tokkoon caaluun garecha irraa dursaa jiru ; fii Itiyoophiyaan Waaaliyaa Antelooppes, sadaffarraa teesseettii.

en: American actress Debbie Reynolds has a stroke and dies one day after her daughter Carrie Fisher's death.
om: Taatuun lammii Ameerikaa Deebbii Reeynoold du'a intala ishee Keerii Fiisher guyyaa tokko booda dhukkuba dhiiga sammuu keessaatiin qabamtee akkasumas lubbuun ishee darbeera.

en: A record level of smog is reported in Shanghai causing officials to issue the highest level health warning and delaying of hundreds of flights.
om: Hurriin sadarkaa rekordii kan aangawoonni akeekkachiisa fayyaa sadarkaa olaanaa akka kennaniifi balaliiwwan dhibbootaan lakkaa'aman akka turan isaan godhe Shaangaahi keessatti gaabasame.

en: Japan announced tightening of chemical exports to South Korea that are crucial for semiconductor industry.
om: Jaappaan alergee keemikaalaa kanneen industirii semikondaakteriif murtessaa tahan gara Kooriyaa Kibbaa erguu akka jabeessitu beeksifte.

en: The aftereffects of the drought caused heavy rain falls in many parts of the country that consequently threatened overflow of the Gibe River on top of the dam.
om: Miidhaan boodaa hongee rooba cimaan kutaalee biyyattii garagaraa keessatti mudate itti fufuun Lagi Gibee hidha irra darbee akka yaahu sodaachise.

en: Benjamin Netanyahu demands that any final agreement on the Iranian nuclear program include a "clear and unambiguous Iranian recognition of Israel's right to exist."
om: Benjaamin Naatinaawuun waliigalteen dhumaa sagantaa Niwukilarii Iraan mirga jiraachuu "Isiraa'el Iraan ifaa fi bifa waliin nama hin dhoofneen fudhachuushee" akka dabalatu gaafate.

en: In his opening remarks, Dr Aklilu Hailemichael, Ethiopia’s State Minister of Foreign Affairs, said such kinds of events are necessary to further cement the age-long and historical ties between the peoples of the two countries.
om: Dubbii saqiinsaa isaa irratti, Ministeerri ministeera dhimma alaa Itoophiyaa Dr Akiliiluu Hayilemikaa'el qophiileen akkasi walitti dhufeenya umurii-dheeraa fi seena-qabeessaa ummattoota biyyoota lamaanii gidduu jiru cimsuuf barbaachisaadha jedhaniiru.

en: Jemal and Gedion, on the other hand are both 11th graders, and agree that Eyob has the best tricks of all of them.
om: Jamaal fi Geediyoon, gama biraan lamaanuu barattoota kutaa 11, fi Eyyoob hunda isaanii irra maloota gaarii akka qabu walii galu.

en: Fissehazion said, “We believe consolidating all Ethiopian TV channels and broadcasting them from one orbital position will fuel growth in the Ethiopian media sector, as local networks will now be able to easily expand their audience reach.
om: Fissahaziyoon, "Chaanaalota TV Itoopiyaa hunda walitti qabuun argama orbitii tokkorraa tamsaasuun, neetwoorkiiwwan naannoo salphaatti qaqqabiinsa isaanii guddisuu waan danda'aniif sektera miidiyaa Itoopiyaa keessatti guddina nii dabala jedhe.

en: A high level event entitled “Impact for good; A cross-sectoral dialogue for strengthening partnership between Africa, Israel and the world Jewry” was held today here in Addis Ababa.
om: Qophiin sadarkaa olaanaa "Gaariif dhiibbaa uumuu; Marii sektera adda addaa Afirikaa, Isiraa'elii fi Yihudotaa addunyaa gidduutti michumaa jabeesuuf" jedhu har'a Addis Ababaa keessatti godhame.

en: Psy's "Gangnam Style" becomes the first video to reach 2 billion views on YouTube.
om: Viidiyoon 'Gaangnam staayil" kan Saayii'siin hojjetame Yuutuubii irratti si'a biliyoona 2 ol ilaalamuun kan jalqabaa ta'e.

en: The opening ceremony for the 2012 Summer Olympics takes place at the London Olympic Stadium with Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom declaring the Games open. ,
om: Qophiin baniinsa Olompikii Bonaa bara 2012 Istaadiyemii Olompikii London keessatti Elizaabet II'n Yunaayitid Kiingidem taphichi akka eegalamu labsuudhaan geggeeffame.

en: COVID-19 pandemic in Madagascar Madagascar reports its first death from COVID-19; that of a 57-year-old medical worker who suffered from diabetes and high blood pressure.
om: Weerara COVID-19 Madagaasakaar: Madagaaskaar du'a COVID-19'n dhufe isa jalqabaa gabaaste; kan hojjetaa fayyaa umrii 59 kan dhibee sukkaaraa fi dhiibbaa dhiigaa olaanaan miidhamu tokkoo.

en: Syrians in the capital Damascus race against time to prepare for a foreign strike, with many hoarding supplies and others scrambling to find accommodation further away from potential military targets.
om: Magaalaa guddittin Siriyaa damaasqoon yeroo waliin dorgommii irra jirti, xiyyoo waraanaa jalaa fagaachuuf baayyeen dhiyeessii yeroo kuusan kan hafan ammoo galaa barbaacha asiif achi fiigu.

en: Ethiopia and South Korea have signed an agreement that could enable to jointly work on issues tied with urban land development.
om: Itoophiyaa fi Koriyaan kibbaa waliigaltee dhimmoota guddina lafa magaalaa waliin walqabatu irratti hojjechuuf dandeessisu mallatteessan.

en: Antisa Khvichava, a woman regarded as the oldest person of all time, dies.
om: Antiisaa Kivaaychaavaan, akka dubartii dulloomtuu yeroo hundumaatti kan fudhatamtu, duute.

en: Reports claim that an Egyptian forensic official says that body parts recovered from EgyptAir flight 804 indicate that the crash was caused by an explosion.
om: Akka gabaasaaleen qaamoleen Foorensikii Misirii himutti bu'aan qorannoo kutaalee qaaamaa ' EgyptAir flight 804' irraa argaamanii kan agarsiisu sababi balaa kanaa dhoohinsa ta'uusati.

en: The Israel Defense Forces captures an Iranian ship carrying long-range artillery rockets to Palestinians in the Gaza Strip
om: Humni Ittisaa Isiraa'el doonii Iraan kan meeshaa waraanaa rooketiiwwan fageenyaa gara Filisxeem geessuu Gaazaa Istiriippii irratti to'annoo jala oolche.

en: Speaking of the award, Ethiopian Airlines Group CEO Tewolde GebreMariam quoted as saying the award is “a testimony to the leading role that Ethiopian Cargo & Logistics Services is playing to the socio- economic development in Africa and the rest of the world with safe, secure, dependable and competitive cargo and logistics services.’’
om: Waa'ee badhaasichaa gaafa dubbatu, CEO'n Garee Daandii Xiyyaaraa Itoopiyaa Tewoldee GabireMaariyaam badhaasichi "ragaa bahumsa gahee Xiyyaarri fe'umsa meeshaa Itoopiyaa fi Tajaajilli Loojistikii guddina hawaas-diinagdee Afirikaa keessaa fi guutummaa Addunyaa keessatti nageenyaa, eegumsaan, itti hirkannaanii fi dorgommii fe'isa meeshaa fi tajaajila loojistikii irratti taphataa jiruudha" jedhee hime.

en: Prevalence of unsafe social gatherings are also negatively contributing to the intensification of the pandemic, he noted.
om: Walitti qabamiinsi nageenyi isaa hin eegamne baayyachuunis babal'achuu weerarichaaf gumaacha badaa tahe godheera, jedhe.

en: Lebanon bans smoking in closed public places like restaurants and cafés.
om: Libaanon bakkeewwan hawaasaa kanneen akka manneen nyaataa fi kaaffeewwan keessatti akka tamboon hin xuuxamne dhorkite.

en: COVID-19 pandemic in Spain The Ministry of Health of Spain confirms the first case of coronavirus in the country in La Gomera, Canary Islands, from a German tourist.
om: Weerara COVID-19 Ispeen keessatti: Ministeerri Fayyaa Ispeen biyyattii keessatti namni dhukkuba vaayirasii koronaan qabame inni jalqabaa Laa Goomera, Odola Kaanaarii keessatti, tuuristii Jermanii tokko irraa tahuun isaa mirkanaa'eera.

en: The Parliament also called on its Member States “to halt exports of arms and surveillance technology to Ethiopia that are being used to facilitate attacks on civilians and perpetrate human rights violations,” the resolution reads.
om: Akkasumas Paarlaamichi biyyoota miseensotaaf " haleellaa fi cabuu mirga namoomaa sirrii hin taanee mijeessuf fee'umsa meeshaalee waraanaa fi tekinooloojii hordoffii gara Itoophiyaa akka dhaabbatuuf" waamicha dabarse.

en: The WHO Representative to Ethiopia, Dr. Boureima Hama Sambo, thanked Canada for the available funding to support the continuity of essential health services. He said, “The grant will not only strengthen the provision of quality, gender-responsive essential health services at primary care level but also boost health system resilience by building the capacity of regional and city health authorities to deal with current and future crises.”
om: Itoopiyaatti bakka bu'aan WHO, Dr. Boori'emaa Haamaa Saamboo, tajaajilli fayyaa murteessaa tahe akka itti fufu deggeruuf deggersa maallaqaa dhiyeesuu isheef Kanaadaa galateeffate. "Deggersi maallaqichaa dhiyeessii tajaajila fayyaa murteessaa sirna koorniyaaf deebii kennuu qulqullina qabu waldhaansa sadarkaa jalqabaatti kennuu jabeesuuf kana malees hanqina ammaa fi fuulduraa furuuf aanga'oota fayyaa sadarkaa naannoo fi magaalaaf dandeettii ijaaruun cimina sirna fayyaa guddisuuf."

en: The Guatemalan army blockades a ship from the Dutch NGO Women on Waves that provides material for abortions.
om: Humni waraanaa Guutemaalaa doonii NGO Dubartootaa Dachi irraa kanneen meeshaa ulfa ofirraa baasu dhiyeessu Weevs irratti uggure.

en: An American sailor who was lost for 66 days in the Atlantic Ocean is found by a German tanker.
om: Habuurtuun bishaanirraa lammiin Ameerikaa guyyaa 66f garba Atilaantik kessatti badee ture doonii boba'aa Jarmaniitiin argame.

en: Seven prisoners from Amasya Prison in Turkey say that they began "indefinite and irreversible" hunger strikes on October 5, and their health is at serious risk.
om: Hidhamtoonni torba Mana Hidhaa Amaasaa Turkii keessaa mormii beelaan godhamu "kan dhaabbii hin qabnee fi ofirra hin deebi'amne" Onkoloolessa 5 akka jalqaban dubbatan, fayyaan isaanii balaa hamaa irra jira.

en: The United Kingdom's Monarch Airlines goes into financial bankruptcy administration, suspending all flights, cancelling 300 thousand bookings, and leaving tens of thousands of passengers stranded.
om: Daandiin Qilleensaa Yuunayitid Kiingidem Monaarch balalii hunda adda kutuun, galmee balalii imaltootaa kuma 300 haquun, akkasumas imaltoota kumoota kudhaniin lakka'aman akka danqaman gochuun bulchiinsa kisaaraa faayinaansiitti seene.

en: Voters in the German capital of Berlin go to the polls for a state election, with current mayor Klaus Wowereit and his Social Democrats doing well.
om: Filattoonni magaalaa guddoo Jermanii Berliin kessatti argaman filannoo motummaa geggessuuf gara buufatalee filannoo deemaa jiru,hanga ammaatti kantiibaan yeroo amma Kilaawus Waawureeyt fi Sooshaal Dimokiraatonni bu'aa gaarii argataniiru .

en: Gaddafi has supplied Viagra to his forces to encourage them to commit mass rape, Susan Rice, United States Ambassador to the United Nations, has alleged.
om: Mootummootta Gamtoomanitti Ambasaaddarri Yunaayitid Isteetis, Suuzaan Raayis, Gaadaafiin guddeeddii hedduminaan akka raawwataniif humnoota waraanaa isaaf viyaagiraa dhiyeessaa jedhan.

en: Sahlework arrived today in Afar Regional State’s capital Semera to mark the national HIV/AIDS Day where discussions with various stakeholders are expected to be undertaken.
om: Saahleworq Guyyaa HIV/AIDS biyyaalessaa kan mariileen abbootii dhimmaa garagaraa wajjin akka geggeeffamu eegamu yaaadachuuf magaalaa guddoo Mootummaa Naannoo Affaar Semeraa seente.

en: The Prime Minister of Pakistan Raja Pervez Ashraf appears in the Pakistani Supreme Court over his failure to reopen investigations of corruption against President Asif Ali Zardari.
om: Mummichi ministeeraa Paakistaan Raajaa Parveez Ashraf irra deebiin qorannoo yakka malaammaltummaa pirezidaant Asiif Alii zerdaarii irratti banuu dhiisuu isaaniitiin mana murtii olaanaa Paakistaanitti dhiyaatan.

en: Pharmacy chain CVS Pharmacy announces it will change its name to "CVS Health" and cease marketing tobacco products.
om: Hidhati Faarmaasii, CVS Faarmaasiin maqaa isaa gara "CVC Health" tti akka jijjiiruu fi oomishawwan tambaa'oo gabaaf beeksisu akka dhaabu beeksise.

en: Ethiopia have appointed former Adama City FC coach Ashenafi Bekele as the new man in charge of the men’s national team.
om: Itoopiyaan leenjisaa Magaalaa Adaamaa FC duraanii Ashenaafii Baqqalee itti gaafatamaa haaraa garee dhiiraa biyyaalessaa gootee muudde.

en: Guzo Adwa has inspired similar initiatives driven to educating a wider set of people about Ethiopian history.
om: Guzoo Aduwaan dhaabbilee wal fakkaatoo waa'ee seenaa Itoophiyaa kutaa hawaasaa bal'aaf barumsa kennuf ka'an kakaaseera.

en: In response to an outbreak of an unidentified fatal disease in Quang Ngai province, Vietnam, the Vietnamese government asks for help from the World Health Organization.
om: Veetinaam kutaa bulchiinsa Kuwaan Gaay keessatti sababa weerara dhukkuba nama ajjeesaa maalummaansaa hinbeekamnii walqabatee mootummaan Veetinaam dhaabbata fayya addunyaa irraa gargaarsa gaafate.

en: The son of Caribbean artists, his mother was a one-hit wonder of the “Breakfast in Bed” song from four decades ago and his father was a calypso artist with some success within the Caribbean region.
om: Ilmi artistii Karibiyaan, haati isaa sirba tokkicha ishee beeksise kan waggaa kurnan afur duraa "Ciree siree irratti" turte abbaan isaa artistii kaalipsoo kan milkaa'ina muraasa naannoo Kariibiyaa keessaa ture.

en: Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd and Leader of the Opposition Tony Abbott participate in the first of three televised leaders debates ahead of September's federal election.
om: Mummichi ministeera Awustiraaliyaa Keevin Ruudii fi geggessaa mormitootaa kan ta'e Tonii Aboot filannoo Federaalaa Fulbaana dhufu geggeeffamu dursuun gaaffii fi deebii Televizijinii irratti darban sadii keessa tokko kan ta'e gaffii fi deebii isa duraa irratti ni hirmaatu.

en: Families and fans of the artist, government officials, religious leaders and thousands of Ethiopians from the capital and several places of the country have attended the funeral service at the historical cathedral.
om: Maatiiwwanii fi jaallattoonnin artistichaa, aangawoonni mootummaa, geggeessitoonni amantaa, fi lammiilee Itoopiyaa kumaan lakka'aman sagantaa awwaalchichaa kaateediraalicha seena qabeessatti hirmaataniiru.

en: UN Envoy Robert Serry is ordered to leave Crimea at gunpoint after being threatened by 10–15 armed men.
om: Ergamaan dhaabbata mootummota gamtoomanii Roobert Seeriin hidhattoota 10-15 ta'aniin akka Kireemiyaa gad-lakkisee deemuuf rasaasaan doorsifame.

en: In a press conference today, CEO of Ethio-telecom, Firehiwot Tamiru, said the company had made 10-40 percent reduction on international voice calls.
om: Har'a ibsa gaazexesummaa irratti, hojii gaggeessa olaanaan Itiyoo-telekoom, Firewoot Taammiruu, dhaabbatichi hir'isa gatii dhibbentaa 10-40 ta'u bilbila sagalee adunyaalessa irratti taasisee jira.

en: The government seeks to plant 20 billion seedlings by 2024, to help build a green climate-resilient economy.
om: Diinagdee magariisa jijjiirama qilleensaa dandamatu ijaaruuf, mootummichi biqiltuuwwan biliyoona 20 bara 2024'tti dhaabuu barbaada.

en: Director-General of INSA, Dr. Shumete Gizaw, for his part, said the discussion was focused on capacity building, technology, and system development to strengthen South Sudan’s information and cybersecurity.
om: Daarikteerri Waliigalaa INSA, Dr. Shuumatee Gizaw, gama isaan, marichi dandeettii ijaaruu, teekinoolojii, akkasumas odeeffannoo fi saayibersekiwuuritii Sudaan Kibbaa jabeessuuf sirna ijaaruudha jedhe

en: Chinese officials impose an emergency ban on tourists approaching pandas subsequent to the death of two pandas from a canine distemper virus.
om: Aangawoonni Chaayinaa erga paandaawwan lama vaayirasii kaaniin disteemperiin du'anii booda tuutistoota paandaawwanitti dhiyaatan irra uggura battalaa ka'an.

en: A 4.4-billion-year-old crystal from Western Australia has been confirmed as the oldest fragment of Earth's crust.
om: Baha Awutiraaliyaatti wanti jajjabaan umurii biliyoona 4.4 ta'u argame ture citaa kutaa qaama lafaa umuriin dheeraa ta'uunsaa mirkana'e.

en: Ireland is hit by snow and record low November temperatures that disrupt the nation.
om: Aayirlaand cabbii fi tempireechara gadaanaa Sadaasa keessa galmaa'ee kan biyyatti jeeqeen rukutamte.

en: Twelve people die of swine flu in the Indian state of Gujarat taking the death toll to 136 since January with 130 new cases reported.
om: Indiyaa nannawaa Gujaraat keessatti dhibee Utaalloo Boyyeetiin namoonni kudha lama du'uun ji'a Amajjii irraa eegalee walii galatti bayyiinni namoota dhibee kanaan du'anii 136 yoo qaqqabuu namoonni haaraan 130 ammoo dhibechaan qabamuu isaanii gabaafameera.

en: The Indian Council of Medical Research advises all states to suspend using COVID-19 rapid test kits for two days, after some kits were found to be faulty.
om: Manni maree Qorannoo Fayyaa Hindii erga meeshaaleen muraasi kan rakkoo qaban tahuu hubatee booda, naannoowwan hundi guyyaa lamaaf meeshaa harkaa qorannoo COVID-19 battalaa akka adda kutan gorse.

en: The Premier elaborated to the Forum that the economic reform is aimed at leveraging the collective power of Ethiopians specially, women and youth.
om: Muummichi Waltajjichaaf riiformiin diinagdee humna walee lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa keessumaa, dubartootaa fi darggaggoo fayidaa irraa oolchuuf akka kaayyeffate ibsaniiru.

en: It is also planning to provide support to Ethiopian content and content creators including investing heavily in local content as part of its hyper local content strategy.
om: Qabiyyeewwan fi qabiyyee uumtota Itoopiyaaf deggersa gochuu dabalatee akka tarsiimoo qabiyyee naannoo isaatti qabiiyyee naannoo irratti guddisee invest gochuuf karoorsaas jira.

en: A weekend killing in Australia has prompted the Indian government to issue an advisory for its college students studying in that country.
om: Ajjeechaan dhuma torbanii Awustiraaliyaa keessaa mootummaan Hindii barattoota isaa biyya sana keessa jiraniif ibsa gorsaa akka dafee baasu godhe.

en: Five thousand people are evacuated from low-lying areas off the coast of Tamil Nadu state in India and two sailors die in heavy seas before Cyclone Nilam hits the coast.
om: Indiyaa keessaatti kan argamtu naannoo Taamil Naaduutti buufata doonii irrattii obomboleetii Niilaam mudachuusaan dura daaktoonni bishaanii lama battalumattii yoo du'an namoonnii daka buufata doonii keessaattii argaman kumni shan naannoo sanarraa baqataniiru.

en: At least 57 people are dead and 12 are confirmed missing in the Seoul and Siheung region of South Korea due to landslides caused by heavy rain.
om: Kibba Kooriyaa naannawaa see'ol fi sihong keessatti sababa rooba hamaatiin sigiga lafaa mudateen yoo xiqqaate namoonni 57 yoo du'an namoonni 12 ammoo achibuuteen isaanii dhabamuun mirkana'e.

en: A new study finds that chimpanzees will solve puzzles for the fun of it.
om: Akka qorannoon haaraa ba'e akka jedhutti Chiimpaazonni bohaartiidhaaf jecha hibboo akka furan ifoomse.

en: The first possible case is reported in Mali, with the death toll rising in Guinea and Liberia to 90.
om: Baayinni nama du'ee Giinii fi Laayibeeriyaa keessatti gara 90'tti yeroo ol guddatu, namni dhukkubichaan qabame inni jalqabaa Maalii keessatti gabaasame.

en: Former British Labour Party minister Denis MacShane resigns his House of Commons seat after he wrongfully claimed at least £7,500 in expenses.
om: Ministeerri Jaarmiyaa Labarii Biriitish duraanii Deenis MaakSheen erga karaa sirrii hin taaneen baasii isaaf yoo xiqqaate £7,500 akka kanfalamuuf gaafatee booda teessoo isaa Haawos of Koomonii keessaa irraa bu'e.

en: Over 5,000 people have reportedly been infected by an outbreak of dengue fever in Pakistan.
om: Namoonni 5,000 caalan weerara dhaqna gubaa denguu Paakistaan keessaan akka hubaman gabaasame.

en: The Ethiopian National Football Team has qualified for the Africa Cup of Nations (CAF).
om: Gareen Kubbaa Miilaa Biyyooleessa Itoophiyaa Waancaa Biyyootaa Afirikaa(CAF) darbeera.

en: Hence, such gatherings should allow enough ventilation, maintain social distance, mandatorily use face masks, enforcing frequent hand washing and other necessary measures.
om: Kanaafuu, walitti qabamni akkasii qilleensa gahaa galchuu, walirraa fageenya hawaasaa hojiirra oolchuu, haguuggii fuulaa dirqama tahe fayyadamuu, harka dhiqannaa amma ammaa hojirra oolchuu fi tarkaanfilee barbaachisoo kan biraa hojiirra oolchuu qabu.

en: The head of a United Nations war crimes tribunal states that it is investigating 14 alleged instances of chemical weapons attacks.
om: Manni murtii yakkoota waraanaa mootummoota gamtoomanii olaanaan himata haleellaa keemikaala summawaatiin walqabatan 14 irratti qorannoo geggeessaa jira.

en: Up to 50,000 people flee their homes in a border area of South Sudan amid ethnic violence.
om: Hokkaraa sabummaa naannoo daangaa Sudaan Kibbaatiin haga namoota 50,000 kan tahan qe'ee isaanii irraa buqqa'an.

en: American basketball player Derrick Rose of the Chicago Bulls wins the NBA Most Valuable Player Award Award for the 2010-11 NBA season, the youngest player to do so.
om: Taphataan lammii Ameerikaa kubbaa saphanaa garee Chikaagoo Buuls ,Deerik Roos bara dorgommii NBA 2010-11 keessatti badhaasa taphataa hedduu fayyade jedhamuun mo'achuun taphata badhaasa kana mo'ate kan umuriin xiqqaa ta'uu danda'eera.

en: CANAL+ Group has made a significant investment in the entertainment industry.
om: Gareen CANAL+ industirii bashannanaa keessatti investimentii guddaa godhe.

en: U.S. President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump make an unannounced post-Christmas visit to troops at the Al Asad Airbase in Iraq, their first visit to a combat zone since taking office.
om: Pireezidantii U.S Donaald Tiraampii fi giifti-dureen malaniyaa tiraamp daawwannaa qilleen-dura osoo hin beeksifamne gara looltoota humna waraanaa kan qilleensarraa Al Asaad Iraaqitti argamutti taasisaniiru, kunis erga aangoo qabataanin as daawaanna isaanii naannoo waraanaa jalqabaati.

en: The Opportunity rover completes a Martian marathon, the first time any vehicle has traveled more than 26.2 miles on the surface of another world.
om: Konkolaataan Opporchunitii maraatoonii Marshaal, konkolaataan yeroo jalqabaaf fuula addunyaa biraa irra maayila 26.2 caalaa imale xumure.

en: Elite athletes will take part in the race which covers a distance of 1.6kms.
om: Atileetonni beekamoon dorgommii fageenya 1.6km haammatu irratti ni hirmaatu.

en: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports the number of deaths caused by vaping-associated pulmonary injury has risen to 27, with an additional 1,299 cases of non-fatal injuries.
om: Giddugalli To'annoo fi Ittisa Dhibee baay'inni du'a miidhama pulmoonerii veepiingiin walqabatee dhufu gara 27'tti akka olka'e, baay'nni dhukkubsataa miidhaa hamaa hin taane 1,299 dabalataas akka jiru gabaase

en: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation has handed over the award to Gebisa.
om: Faawundeeshiniin Biilii & Melindaa Geets badhaasicha Gabbisaaf kenneera.

en: Ukrainian security forces start dismantling protest camps in Kiev with two protesters feared dead after clashes with police. ,
om: Humni nageenyaa Yukireen mormii kaampii keev keessa ture addaan diiguuf yaalii taasiseen walittii bu'iinsa poolisii waliin uumameen namoonnii lama lubbuun darbuun isaanii hin olle jedhame.

en: France knocks out Belgium from the World Cup, with France moving on to the final against either Croatia or England.
om: Faransaayi Kirooshiyaa yookaan Engilaand wajjin isa dhumaa morkachuuf Beljiyeemiin Geeba Addunyaan ala goote,

en: United States President Barack Obama officially states that he supports the right for same-sex partners to marry.
om: Pirasdaantii Yuunayitid Isteetis Baaraak Obaamaan mirga walfuudhuu hiriyyoota saala walfakkaataa akka deggeru ifaan hime.

en: The State Minister also responded to questions raised by participants.
om: Ministeer Deetaan gaaffilee hirmaattotaan kaafameefis deebii kenneera.

en: At least 25 people are killed and many more injured after protesters and security forces clash in the Egyptian capital of Cairo, during a protest in response to an attack on a Coptic church.
om: Magaalaa guddoo Gibxii Kaayiroo keessatti haleellaa waldaa kiristaanaa Koptic mormuun deebii kenname irratti, walitti bu'iinsa namoota hiriira bahanii fi humnoota nageenyaa gidduutti uumameen, yoo xiqqaate namoonni 25 du'anii akkasumas kan baayyee caalan ammoo miidhaman.

en: Ministry of Trade and Industry discloses that 42.75 million USD has been garnered in a quarter of the Ethiopia’s fiscal year from exporting manufactured goods.
om: Ministeerri Daldalaa fi Industirii kurmaana jalqabaa bara baajataa Itoophiyaa kanatti USD miliyoona 42.75 meeshaalee oomishaa alatti erguu irraa akka argate ifa taasise.

en: In the league’s closing encounter of the first week, Sebeta Ketema and St. George drew nil.
om: Cufaa liigii torbee jalqabaa irratti, Katamaan Sabbataa fi Qulqulluun Goorgisiin qixxee bahanii jiru.

en: A court in the Vatican finds Pope Benedict XVI's former butler Paolo Gabriele guilty of theft for stealing and leaking confidential documents and sentences Gabriele to 18 months' imprisonment.
om: Manni murtii Vaatikan keessaatti argamu qopheessaa nyaataa duranii Phaaphaasii Benedikt XVI Paawuloo Gabreeliin yakka hannaatii fi galmeewwan iccitii baasuutiin irrattii mirkana'een hidhaa ji'a 18n adabe.

en: Mathematician John Milnor wins the 2011 Abel Prize for his contributions to topology, geometry and algebra.
om: Hayyuun herregaa Joon Milnar badhaasa Abeelii bara 2011 gumaachaa inni tooppolooji, ji'oometirii fi aljeebiraaf taasiseef mo'ate

en: Nepalese officials say monsoon rains have swollen two major rivers in the country and have increased the threat of widespread flooding.
om: Aangawoonni Neepaal roobni monsuun laggeen gurguddaa lama biyyattii keessaa guutee balaa lolaa bal'aa tahe akka dabale himan.

en: The United Nations' World Meteorological Organization confirms that a record high temperature of 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) has been recorded in Antarctica at the Esperanza Base.
om: Dhaabbatni meetirooloojii mootummoota gamtoomanii ho'i ol ka'aan 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) Antarkitikaaa keessatti Espeeraanzaa Beeziitti galmaa'uu isaa mirkaaneessee jira.

en: A European Union appeal committee votes to reauthorise the use of glyphosate as a herbicide for a five-year period.
om: Koreen oliyyannoo Gamtaan Awurooppaa itti fayyadama gilaayifooseet akka farra aramaatti yeroo waggaa shaniif akka irra deebiin ayyamamu filate.

en: Protesting indigenous people take over half of the city of Puno in south-eastern Peru, demanding an end to a Canadian mining project.
om: Mormitoonni jiraattota bakka sanaa durii magaalaa Puunoo kibba lixa Peeruu walakkaa tahu fudhachuun, pirojektiin albuuda baasuu Kanaadaa akka dhaabbatu gaafatan.

en: Former Malian President Amadou Toumani Toure arrives in Senegal after being ousted in a military coup.
om: Pirasdaantiin Maalii duraanii Amaduu Toomanii Tuuree fonqolcha waraanaan erga aangoo irraa buufamee booda Seenegaal gahe.

en: The UK's national debt exceeds £2 trillion ($2.61tn) for the first time, according to data from the Office for National Statistics.
om: Akka daataa Waajjira Istaatistiksii Biyyaalessaa irraa argameetti, liqaan biyyaalessaa UK yeroo jalqabaaf tiriiliyoona £2 ($2.61tn) caale.

en: German ex-Formula 1 champion Michael Schumacher is out of an induced coma and has left Grenoble Hospital in France for further rehabilitation.
om: shaampiyooniin Formulaa 1 jarman duraanii Maayikel Shuumaaker wal'ansaa koomaa keessa turee kessaa ba'uun akka haalaan dandamatuuf Hospitaala Greenobil kan faransayi keessatti argamuu gadi lakkisee ba'eera.

en: The New York Times newspaper announces it is to start charging people who access content on its website.
om: Gaazexaan Ze Niwu Yoork Taayims namoota marsariitii isaa irratti waan barreeffame dubbisan akka kanfalchiisuu jalqabu beeksise.

en: Italy announces its first case of novel coronavirus.
om: Xaaliyaaniin nama dhukkuba vaayirasii koronaa haaraan qabame isa jalqabaa ishee beeksifte.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed yesterday announced preparation to award the second new nationwide telecom license with the necessary policy adjustment.
om: Muummeen Ministeeraa Abiyyi Ahimed kaleessa heyyama telekoomii biyyaalessaa lammaffaa haaraa sirreeffama imaammata barbaachisaa wajjin badhaasuuf qophiirraa akka jiran beeksise.

en: Efforts begin in Solomon Islands to refloat a ship after an oil spill in what the government says will be a "very difficult operation."
om: Odola Solomoon keessatti erga wanta mootummaan "oppireeshinii baayyee ulfaataa" jedhe keessatti boba'aan dhangala'ee doonii tokko deebisanii bishaan irra bololiisuuf yaaliin eegalame.

en: Tropical Storm Nana is expected to strengthen into a strong tropical storm before it makes landfall in Belize tomorrow.
om: Obomboleettiin naannoo bantii lafaa Naanaan bor osoo daka Beeliiz hin qaqqabiin dura gara obomboleettii bantii lafaa hamaattii ni guddata.

en: Swedish auto manufacturer Volvo Cars resumes full production at its plant in Torslanda, Sweden, which had been shut down due to the COVID-19 pandemic since March 26, 2020.
om: Oomishaan konkolaataa Iswiidin Konkolaataan Voolvoo warshaa isaa Torsilaand, Iswiidin keessaa kan Bitootessa 26, 2020 irraa kaasee sababa weerara COVID-19'n cufamee turetti humna guutuun oomisha jalqabe.

en: President of Gambia Yahya Jammeh remains in power after a failed coup attempt while he was travelling outside the country.
om: Pirezidaantiin Gaambiyaa Yaahiyaa Jaameen yeroo isaan imaalaaf biyya alaa turanitti yaliin fonqolcha motummaa godhamee ture fashalaa'u isaatiin kana boodas hoggansaan itti fufu.

en: President of the Ethiopian Football Federation, Esayas Jira, has been elected as vice president of the Council for East and Central Africa Football Associations (CECAFA).
om: Pirasdaantiin Federeeshinii Kubbaa Miilaa Itoopiyaa, Isaayyaas Jiraa, akka itti aanaa pirasdaantii kaawunsilii Waldaalee Kubbaa Miilaa Bahaa fi Giddugala (CECAFA) tahuun filatame..

en: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Ambassador Ulusoy said, Turkish foreign direct investment in Ethiopia has continued to increase.
om: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliiniitiin, Ambaassaddar Uluusooy, investimentiin alaa kallattii Turkii Itoophiyaa keessatti dabaluu itti fufee jira jedhaniiru.

en: “Ethiopian is responding to COVID-19 outbreak effectively with extra cargo flights and is shouldering its continental responsibility by shipping masks and testing kits where those supplies are being used in the fight against COVID-19 in Africa,” Tewolde noted.
om: "Itoophiyaan balalii xiyyaara fee'umsaa dabaluu fi itti gaafatamummaa aardii fudhachuun haguugduu-fuulaa fi meeshaalee qorannoo bakkeen dhiyeessiin kunneen COVID-19'in Afiiriikaa keessatti ittisuuf fayyadamamaa jiranitti geessuun weerara COVID-19tiif haala gaariin deebii kennaa jira," Tawoldeen yaadachisaniiru.

en: The KUTU tour set out to embody the magic they have created through this alliance, with upcoming performances outside of Ethiopia and within Ethiopia as well.
om: KUTU'n tokkummaa kanaan waan addaa isaan uuman qophii agarsiisa Itoopiyaan alaa fi Itoopiyaa keessaattis dhufaa jiru irratti agarsiisuuf saganteessaniiru.

en: The 2015 Cricket World Cup begins with New Zealand playing Sri Lanka at Christchurch's Hagley Oval and Australia playing England at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
om: Geebni Kiriiketii Addunyaa bara 2015 Niw Ziilaand Sirii Laankaa wajjin Kiraayistcharch Hagley Oovaaliyitti akkasumas Awustiraaliyaan Ingilaand wajjin Meelboorn Kiriiket Giraawondiitti taphachuun eegalame.

en: The US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration reports that the number of traffic deaths has fallen to 32,788 in 2010, the lowest level since 1949.
om: Akka gabaasi bulchiinsi Nageenya Daandiwwanii Yunaaytid Isteetis ibsutti lubbuun namoota bala Tiraafikaan darbe bara 2010nii gara 32,788 tittii gadi irrachuu isaa, kunis erga bara 1949 as isa xiqqaa ta'uu agarsiisa.

en: Through PMI, hundreds of millions of people have benefited from protective measures and hundreds of millions more have been treated for malaria.
om: Karaa PMI, namoonni miliyoona dhibbootaan lakka'aman tarkaanfilee ittisaa irraa fayyadamaniiru akkasumas miliyoona dhibbootaan kan lakka'aman dabalataa ammoo dhibee busaa irraa yaalamaniru.

en: In North American Major League Baseball, the Kansas City Royals sweep the Baltimore Orioles in the 2014 American League Championship Series 4-0 to progress to the 2014 World Series.
om: Liigii Beezboolii Ameerikaa Kaabaa Keessatti, Rooyaalsiin Magaalaa Kansas Oriyoolsii Baaltimooriin Liigii Chaampiyoonii Ameerikaa bara 2014 keessattti 4-0'n injifachuun gara Woorlid Siriyesii 2014'tti tare.

en: Bulgarian remains believed by some to be John The Baptist are scientifically dated to the first century AD.
om: Lammiin Bulgaariyaa namoota muraasaan akka Yohaannisa Isa Cuuphu jedhamuun beekamu barri isaa Dh.K.B jaarraa jalqabaa akka ta'e saayinsiidhaan tilmaamame.

en: Ethiopia has been taking “very strong engagement” on land restoration, AU Great Green Wall Initiative Coordinator Elvis Paul Tangem said.
om: Itoophiyaan "xiyyeeffannoo hedduu cimaa" haaromsa lafaa irratti fudhachaa jirti qindeessaan Keenyan magariisa guddicha AU Elvis Pawul Taangem dubbataniiru.

en: Turkey sets up a commission of Turkish officials and bureaucrats to investigate May's Gaza flotilla raid.
om: Turkiin koomishinii aanga'oota fi hojjetoota biiroowwanii Turkii haleellaa tasaa bidiruu Meyi Gaazaa akka qorataniif qindeessite.

en: Some religious fathers who attended the welcoming ceremony for the president told ENA that urgent restoration is needed for the churches which are severely damaged.
om: Abbootiin amantaa tokko tokko kanneen sagantaa simannaa pirasdaantichaaf qophaa'e hirmaatan bataskaanota akka malee miidhamaniif haara'umsi atattamaa akka barbaachisu ENA'tti himan.

en: According to UNICEF, disposable sanitary products are expensive and often unavailable. As a result nearly 75% of Ethiopian women and girls do not have access to the menstrual supplies they need to manage their periods.
om: Akka UNICEF jedhetti, oomishaaleen qulqullinaa itti fayyadamanii gataman qaalii fi yeroo baayyee kan hin argamne dha. Sababa kanaan dubartoonnii fi durboonni Itoopiyaa meeshaalee ministireeshinii marsaa laguu isanii itti to'achuuf isaan barbaachisan hin qaban.

en: Philippines president Rodrigo Duterte says he plans to cut ties with his country's former colonial ruler, the United States, while strengthening ties with China.
om: Pirasdaantiin Filippiinsi Rodirigoo Duuterteen Chaayinaa wajjin walitti dhufeenya jabeessuun bulchitoota kolonii biyya isaa duraanii, Yunaayitid Isteetisii wajjin walitti dhufeenya kutuuf akka karoorse dubbate.

en: Scientists warn that penguin populations may be declining due to extreme environmental conditions related to climate change
om: Saayintistoonni sababa haalola qilleensa hamoo jijjirrama qilleensaan walqabatuun baayyinni pengiyuun gadi bu'uu akka danda'an akeekkachisan.

en: U.S. President Barack Obama signs an executive order declaring Venezuela a national security threat to the U.S.
om: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Baaraak Obaamaan ajaja olaanaa Venezu'eellaa akka yaaddoo nageenyaa biyyaalessaa U.S.tti labsu mallatteesse.

en: British Prime Minister David Cameron announces plans for every household in the UK to automatically have pornography blocked by their internet service provider, unless they choose otherwise.
om: Ministirri muummee Biriteen Deevid Kaameruun yoo filataniin alatti jirattonni Ingiliiz hundi hatattamaan marsariitiilee suuraalee qunnamtii saalaa daddabarsan akka cufaniif waamicha taasisan.

en: Alabama defeats LSU 21-0 to win the 2012 BCS National Championship, their second championship in three years, in the first shutout in BCS bowl history.
om: Alaabaamaan dorgommoo mo'attoota biyyoolessaa mo'uuf LSU 21-0'dhaan injifateera, waggaa sadii keessatti mo'icha mo'attootaa yeroo lammataa, seenaa keessatti injifannoo guddaa jalqabaa.

en: A South Korean court orders the dissolution of the Unified Progressive Party citing pro-North Korean stances.
om: Manni murtii Kooriyaa Kibbaa yaada deggersa Kooriyaa Kaabaa qaba jechuun Jaarmiyaa Yuunifaayid Pirogireesiiv akka diigamu ajaje.

en: He said that the government has given due attention to the tourism sector in a bid to increase revenue by creating conducive situation for sector actors including tour operators.
om: Daawwachiiftotaa dabalatee hojjetoota sekterichaaf haala mijataa uumuudhaan galii olkaasuuf mootummaan sektera tuurizimiif xiyyeeffannoo barbaachisu kennee jira jedhe.

en: Of the total winners 15 are women.
om: Injifattoota kanneen keessaa 15 dubartoota turan.

en: Baby Shark Dance, produced by Pinkfong, surpasses "Despacito" as the most-viewed video on YouTube.
om: Sirbi Beebii Shaark, Pinfong'n kan hojjetame, Yuutiyuubii irratti "Despacito" darbuudhaan viidiyoo hunduma caalaa ilaalame ta'e.

en: Barack Obama and Raul Castro exchange handshakes despite a United States embargo against Cuba.
om: Ameerikaan qoqqobbii kuubaa irra keessus Baaraak Obaamaa fi Raol Castroon harka walfuudhaniiru.

en: In the discussion held from 21-22 January 2020 at Sheraton Hotel in Kuwait city, the two sides concluded the negotiations with promising progress.
om: Marii Ammajji 21-22 2021 magaalaa Kuweet Hoteela Sharaatanitti ta'etti, gam-lameenu wal galteecha haala abdachiisa ta'en xumuraniiru.
