en: Taliban insurgents attack two checkpoints in the Kamdesh District in eastern Afghanistan killing four Afghan police officers
om: Hidhaattoonni Taalibaan bahaa Afgaanistaanitti kan argamtu aanaa Kamdeeshitti miseensota poolisii Afgaan afur ajjeesuun buufata sakkatta'iinsa lama haleelan

en: A Disapora Consultant Council which will strengthen ties between Ethiopians and foreign national of Ethiopian origin and the government will be formed, the director further noted.
om: Manni maree Gorsaa Diyaaspooraa kan hidhaa lammiiwaan Itoophiyaa fi dhalattoota Itophiyaa biyya alaa fi motummaa gidduu cimsuu ni uumama, jechuun daayirekteerichi dabalataan himaniiru.

en: Chinese tour companies suspend tourist flights to the Philippines amid rising tensions between the two countries over territorial disputes in the South China Sea.
om: Yeroo waldhabdeen biyyoota lamaan gidduutti sababa falmii daangaa Galaana Kibba Chaayinaa irratti babal'atetti dhaabbattoonni daawwannaa Chaayinaa balaliiwwan Tuuristii gara Filiphiinsitti godhamu adda kutan.

en: During the discussion, Dr Tedros commended Ethiopia’s leadership in health for all program and its efforts to prevent non-communicable diseases (NCDs).
om: Yeroo marichaa, Dr Teedros fayyaa hundaaf keessattii fi tattaaffii dhukkaboota daddarboo hin taane (NCDs) ittisuu ishiif geggeessaa Itoopiyaa jajan.

en: Pakistan condemns the latest deadly U.S. drone strike to violate its "sovereignty and territorial integrity".
om: "Olaantummaa fi walabummaa daangaa" kan cabsu dhiyeenya kana haleellaa dirooniin U.S goote Paakistaan ni balaaleffatti

en: Ethiopian artist Abby Lakew announced at a press conference arranged by her management company on Tuesday at Sapphire Hotel that she will be donating all proceeds from her latest album to charity.
om: Artistiin Itoophiyaa Abiy Laaqew ibsa gaazixessuummaa dhaabbata gorsaa isheetin kibxata hoteela Saafayeritti qophaa'ee irratti galii albamii ishee dhiyeenyaa hunda tola-ooltummaaf akka kennitu ibsite.

en: Botswana ends diplomatic relations with North Korea following a UN report on the latter's human rights record.
om: Bootsuwaanaan gabaasa galmee qabiinsa mirga namummaa UN hordofuun walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii Kooriyaa Kaabaa wajjin qabdu dhaabde.

en: In his comments, Ashebir acknowledged that the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) has the mandate to select the athletes.
om: Yaadota isaa keessatti, Ashabir Federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa(EAF) kan ga'e atileetota filuu qabu galateeffatee jira.

en: The census, planned to start this month, was postponed to next February due to various technical problems, according to the agency.
om: "Tattaaffiin kunneen nageenyaa fi tasgabbii ummata Somaaliyaa hundaaf qaqqabsiisuuf gargaara" jedhe.

en: NASA's MAVEN space probe successfully arrives in orbit over Mars.
om: Meeshaan qorannoo Hawaa NASA, MAVEN ooribitii Maarsii keessa milkaa'inaan qaqqabe.

en: According to organizers Soliyana’s submission called “Mathstainement” won the Pan-African prize leading participants from 54 countries.
om: Akka qindeessitootaatti kan Soliyaanaan galchite "Maatisteeniment" kan jedhamu hirmaattota biyyoota Afrikaa 54 irraa dhufan dursuun badhaasa Paan-Afrikaa mo'atte.

en: Sophia is quite a celebratory, attracting much attention as she travels the world But Getahun Mekuria, Ethiopia’s science and technology Minister, told BBC Amharic that Sophia would still appear at Saturday’s MCIT International Expo.
om: Soofiyaan baayyee beekamtuudha, akkuma addunyaa irra imalteen xiyyeeffannoo guddaa argatte, garuu, Ministeerri Saayiinsii fi Teekinoolojii, Geetahun Makuriyaa, Soofiyaan Eksipoo Addunyaalessaa MCIT irratti gaafa Sanbataa akka argamtu BBC Amhaariffaatti dubbate.

en: Peregrinate features the work of three photographers: South Africans Thabiso Sekgala and Musa Nxumalo, and Kenyan Mimi Cherono Ng’ok.
om: Peregiraayinet'n hojii suura kaastota sadii: Lammiiwwan Afrikaa Kibbaa Taabisoo Seekgalaa fi Muusaa Nuxumaaloo, fi Lammii Keeniyaa Miimmii Cheroonoo Ingook ni dhiyeessa.

en: Authorities arrest eight men after a gang rape in Freiburg, Germany on 14 October, with police seeking more men.
om: Jarmanii Fiirbarg keessatti ji'a onkolooleessa gaafa 14ii gudaddii yakka garmuun raawwatameen qaamoleen seeraa namoota saddeet yoo to'anna jala oolchan ammas yakkamtoonni hafan barbaadamaa jiru.

en: Abune Paulos, who died on August 16 at the age of 76 after an illness, was the patriarch of Ethiopia’s Orthodox Church since 1992, when he was elected to the highest order of the denomination.
om: Abuune Phaawuloos, kan gaafa Hagayya 16 umrii waggaa 76'tti dhukkubsatanii du'an, bara 1992 yeroo bakka olaanaa mana amantichaatti filataman irraa kaasuun patiriyaarkii Bataskaana Ortoodoksii Itoopiyaa turan.

en: Kenenissa, who is double Olympic gold medalist, will return to the championship by competing in the marathon after two years of injury.
om: Qananiisaa, badhaafamaa meedaliyaa warqee Olompikii yeroo lamaa kan ta'e, gara shaampiyoonummaatti miidhama waggaa lamaa booda maaraatoonii dorgomii ni deebi'a.

en: The accord also provides for air cooperation, joint operations and opportunities for training and equipment purchases.
om: Waliigaltichi walta'iinsa qilleensaa, duula waliinii fi carraa leenjii fi bittaa meeshaalee ni dhiyeessa.

en: Ethio Agri-CEFT, member of Midroc Investment Group, revealed preparations to install the largest edible oil processing complex in the country.
om: Etiyoo Agri-CEFT, miseensa garee investimentii Midirook, buufata qophii zaayitaa nyaataa fayyaalessa biyyatti keessatti guddaa ta'e ijaaruuf qophii isaa ifoomse.

en: Spain gives the late writer Miguel de Cervantes, author of Don Quixote, a formal burial at a Madrid convent nearly 400 years after his death in 1616.
om: Ispeen barreessaa buleessa Miiguel Deservantes,barreessaa kitaaba 'Doon Kiihotii' kanta'e bara 1616 du'e turtii waggaa 400 booda sirna awwaalchaa seera qabeessa kaawulaa Maadriditti goootefi jirti..

en: The UK government announces that Cornish people will be granted minority status under Council of Europe rules for the protection of national minorities.
om: Mootummaan UK akka seerota mana maree Awurooppaa eegumsa muraasotaatif baaseen uummatni Koornish akka beekamtii garee muraasaa akka argattu ifoomse.

en: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed and President Slahilework Zewudie today participated in cleaning-up campaign through sweeping their respective environments.
om: Ministeerri Muummee Abiy Ahimed fi Pireezidaantiin Sahilewarq Zawude har'a duula qulqulleessuu irratti naannoo isaanii qulqulleessuun hirmaataniiru.

en: Alberta Health Services confirms first avian flu death in Alberta.
om: Tajajilli fayyaa Albertaa sababa gosa utaalloo sinbiraan duuti jalqabaa galmaa'uu mirkaneesseera.

en: John Key, the Prime Minister of New Zealand, announces plans to deploy up to 143 New Zealand Defence Force personnel to Iraq on a training mission to last no more than two years.
om: Muummichi ministeeraa Neewuzilaand Joon Kiin ergama leenjii waraanaatiif turtii waggoota lama hin caalleef loltuu humna ittisa Niiwuzilaand 143 ta'an gara Iraaqitti erguuf karoora qabaachuu beeksisan.

en: A Scottish-designed bionic leg exoskeleton, designed to allow handicapped people to walk, is approved for sale in the United Kingdom.
om: Lammiin Iskootilaand gargaartuu miilaa namtolchee kan qaamaan alaa namoota qaamaan hir'uu deemsaaf gargaruuf oomishe Yunaaytid Kiingidam keessatti eeyyama gurgurtaa argate.

en: Hurricane Danielle strengthens to Category 4, becoming the first major hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
om: Hobonboleettiin Daani'eelle, hobonboleettii ijoo isa jalqabaa waqtii hobonboleettii Atilaantikii 2010 ta'uun gara Sadarkaa 4'tt guddate.

en: The California State Senate approves Assembly Bill 5, a bill to regulate gig economy work, introducing a formal test to classify workers as independent contractors or employees.
om: Seeneetiin Kaalifoorniyaa Labsii hojiilee diinagdee hammeentaa-yeroon hojjetaman sirreessuuf hojjettoonni qormaata seera qabeessaan madaalamuun gara hojjettoota dhabbataafi hojettoota walii galteetti akka qoqqoodaman taasisu labsii Yaa'ii 5 raggaasise.

en: Germany bans the flag of Hamas after it was used during protests over the 2021 Israel–Palestine crisis.
om: Jarmaniin bara 2021 jeequmsa Isiraa'el fi Filisxeemiin walqabatee hiriira mormii ka'e irratti qabatanii ba'uu isaaniitiin alaabaa Hamaas dhorkite.

en: The MSC Grandiosa disembarks from Genoa, Italy, on a seven-day cruise in the Mediterranean Sea, the first major cruise ship to sail in the Sea in almost five months because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
om: MSC Giraandiyosaan Jenoyaa, Xaaliyaanii irraa Galaana Medetireeniyaanii keessa guyyaa torbaaf imala jalqabe, sababa weerara COVID-19 gara ji'oota shanii keessatti doonii geejjiba namaa isa jalqabaa guddicha galaanicha keessa imale.

en: The world's two largest cement manufacturers, LaFarge of France and Holcim of Switzerland, agree to a merger that would create a firm with a market value of $55 billion.
om: Oomishtoonni Simmintoo gurguddoon addunyaa lama, LaFarge'n Faransaay fi Holcim'n Siwiizerlaand, walitti dabalamanii dhaabbata gatii gabaa biliyoona $55 qabu uumuuf waliigalan.

en: Noting the technology is now a matter of existence said, adding “We have shown that it is possible to start and finish with the help of coordination and good leadership.”
om: Sababi jiraachuu teekinooloojiidha jechuun qabsiisaa, "gargaarsa walta'iinsaa fi bulchiinsa gaariitiin jalqabanii xumuruun akka danda'amuu agarsiisneerra" jechuun dabalaniiru.

en: “Passing decision on who makes the cut is the responsibility of the Athletics Federation. Our main demand is to achieve results that will raise the flag of our country. So, we can’t stand by and watch when athletes who have one of the best times are left out of the competition due to improper practices,” Ashebir said.
om: "Murteen eenyutu fiiga jedhuu irratti dabarsuun gahee Federeeshinii Atileetiksiiti. Fedhi keenya olaanaan qabxii alaabaa biyya keenyaa olqabu galmessuudha,kanaafu yeroo Atiileetonni kana dura yeroo milkaa'inaa argamsiisanii turan sababa shaakallii dogoggoraan dorgommii keessa hafuu isaanii teenyee hin ilaallu,Ashabbir akka jedhetti

en: Gudaf Tsegay broke the women’s world record for the indoor 1500 metres on Tuesday after posting a time of three minutes, 53.09 seconds during a meeting in Lievin, France.
om: Gudaaf Tseeggay rikoordii adunyaa dorgommii dubartoota mana keessaa meetira 1500 Kibxata yeroo daqiiqa sadii erga maxxanfameen booda cabsiteetti, sekondii 53.09 yeroo walga'ii Liiven, Faransaayitti.

en: The death toll from the West Africa ebola outbreak reaches 121.
om: Dhiha Afriikaa keessatti sababa weerara dhibee Iboolatiin baayyinni namoota lubbuun isaanii darbee 121 qaqqabeera.

en: Tewodros Kassahun (Teddy Afro), Ethiopia’s best selling artist, controversial, often times poetic, at all times talented, released his long awaited album – Ethiopia – this week.
om: Tewoodiroos Kaasahun (Teedii Afroo), artiistii Itoopiyaa muuziqaan isaa heedduu gurguramu, kan wal falmsiisu, yeroo hedduu kan walalu, yeroo hunda dandeettii kan qabu, albemii isaa haalaan eegamaa ture -Itoopiyaa - torban kana gadhiise.

en: Taiwan reports the first human case of the H6N1 virus.
om: Taayiwaan dhukkubsata Vaayirasii H6N1 kan jalqabaa gabaaste.

en: As entertainment consumption becomes increasingly visual, artists are struggling to keep up with the audience demand. The audience is leading the market.
om: Akkuma bashannanaa fudhachuun gara waan ijaan mullatuutti guddachaa dhufeen, artistoonni fedhii dhaggeeffattoota isaanii guutuuf dhama'aa jiru. Dhaggeeffattoonni gabicha dursaa jiru.

en: The Parliament of Finland approves the construction of two nuclear power stations.
om: Manni maree bakka bu'oota uummataa Fiinlaand ijaarsaa buufataalee humna Niwukilerii lamaa raggasise.

en: The 10th criminal bench of the Federal Supreme Court granted police 14 days additional time for further investigation on Abdi Oumer Mohammed, former president of the Somali region and accomplices.
om: MM'chaa badhaafamaa 100ffaadha filattoota dhuunfaa 223 fi dhaabbattoota 78'n filatame.

en: Mexican Federal Police arrest a mayor and his wife, the alleged masterminds of the kidnapping of 43 students in Iguala, Guerrero.
om: Poolisiin Fedaraalaa Meeksiikoo magaalaa Gureero kutaa Iguwala kessatti yakka uggura barattoota 43 qindeessaniiru kan jedhamanii himataman kantiibaa magaalatti fi haadha warra isaanii to'annoo jala oolche.

en: France sets a new record for unemployment with 3.46 million recorded in October.
om: Faransaayi namoota hojii hin qabne miliyoona 3.46 Onkoloolessa keessa galmeessuun rekordii haaraa qabatte.

en: In basketball, the Golden State Warriors, the top seed in the ongoing NBA playoffs, announce that the NBA's reigning MVP, Stephen Curry, will miss at least two weeks with a sprained MCL.
om: Gama dorgommii kubbaa kachoo, gameessonni taphaa biyyaa, dorgomtoonni dursoon tapha NBA , dursaan MVP kan NBA , Isteefen kaariin yoo xiqqaate tapha irra torbee lamaaf sababa miidhama MCl'n akka hafu beeksisan.

en: Danish scientists find a genetic variant among Greenlanders that dramatically increases the risk of developing type-2 diabetes.
om: saayinstistoonni lammii Deenmaark jiraattoota Griinlaandii giddutti addaa addumma qaccee kan carraa dhibee sukkaaraa Taayp-2 n qabamuu haalaan dabalu argachuu beeksisan.

en: The oldest fossil (stromatolite) that had life is discovered in the melting snow at the Isua Greenstone Belt of Greenland.
om: Lafeen umuriin hunda caalu kan lubbuu qabeessaa kan ture mudhii Giriinistoon ishu'aatti Odolo Giriinlaanditti cabbii baqaa jiru keessaa argame.

en: Tunisian government and opposition leaders are deadlocked during talks over the determination of a new PM tasked with steering the country out of a months-long political crisis.
om: Mootummaan Tuniiziyaa fi geggeessitoonni mormitootaa MM haaraa kan kisaaraa siyaasaa ji'a tokkoo keessaa biyyattii baasuuf hojiin itti kennamu murteessuuf marii godhan keessatti waliigaluu dadhaban.

en: Gujarat reports a record 12,553 new cases of COVID-19 in the past 24 hours.
om: Gujaraat sa'atiiwwan 24 darban keessatti namoota COVID-19'n qabaman haaraa 12,553 galmeessite.

en: He said the draft Diaspora Policy is expected to be endorsed by the Parliament in April 2012. (ERTA)
om: Wixineen Qajeelfama Diyaasporaa Ebla 2012 (ERTA) keessa paarlaamaan akka mirkaneeffamu ni eegama jedhe.

en: A mass brawl breaks out in a refugee shelter in Berlin with a hundred police required to restore order.
om: kaampii baqattoota Beerliinitti argamu kessatti waldhabdee hamaa uumame tasgabbeessuuf humni poolisii dhibbaan lakkawwaman ni barbaachisa.

en: Near the city of Dire Dawa, Porc-Epic has long been a focus of study because of the variety of rocks characterized by a red or yellow color or streak, known as ochre, found there.
om: Naannoo magaalaa Dirre Dawwaatti, Poork-Epik sababa gosa dhagoota garaagaraa halluu diimaa fi keelloon qabanii yookaan halluu addda addaa, ochiree jedhamuun beekamu achitti argamuu xiyyeeffannnaa qorannoo ture.

en: Three time surfing world champion Andy Irons dies from suspected dengue fever, one of five people on the ASP World Tour to suffer from the illness in the past three weeks.
om: mo'ataan gosa Ispoortii dambalii bishaanirraa yeroo sadii kan ta'e Endii Ayireens dhibee qufaa Danjii ta'a jedhamee shakkamuun lubbuun isaa yoo darbu namoota ASP TOURii Addunyaa torbee sadan darban keessa dhibee kanaan hubaman shan keessaa tokko ture.

en: Wang Jun for his part said The Chinese Government would provide the necessary support to Ethiopia’s move towards digitized tax collection and tax administration services.
om: Waan Juun gama isaatiin mootummaan Chaayinaa Itoophiyaa gara gibira sassaabuu fi itti fayyadamaa gibiraa dijitaalaatti deemsisuuf deggarsa barbaachisa ta'e ni godha jedheera.

en: Unmarried girls and young women skillfully wove the grass into a bunch and wear them at their back while dancing on the occasion.
om: Durboonni hin heerumnee fi dubartoonni ijoolleen ogummaan margicha gurmuun dhahanii yeroo isaan qophicha irratti sirban duubaan isaan uwwisu.

en: Accordingly, the MTN Group Ltd. and a consortium led by Vodafone Group Plc, have bid for the licenses.
om: Haala walfakkaatuun, gareen MTN fi hidhati gareen Dhaabbata Dhuunfaa Voodaafoniin durfamu, eyyemaaf caalbaasii ni qabaatu.

en: The lawyers of the defendants contested the request for additional time. However, police requested for the additional time, arguing that the case demands deep investigation.
om: Dhaddachi yakkaa 10ffaan Mana murtii Waliigalaa Federaalaa Abdii Umar Mohammed, pirasdaantii naannoo Somaalee duraanii fi kan yakka gargaare irratti poolisootaaf yeroo dabalataa guyyoota 14 qorannoo dabalataaf kenne.

en: In a men's football match attended by women supporters for the first time in decades, Iran beats Cambodia 14–0.
om: Dorgommii kubbaa miilaa dhiirotaa deggertoota dubartootaan hirmaatame isa waggootaa kurnan muraasa kessatti yeroo jalqabaaf tahe keessati, Iraan kamboodiyaa 14-0 dhaan injifatte.

en: The MoU was signed at the Ethiopia and China Industrial Matchmaking Conference held in Addis Ababa.
om: MoU'n konfiransii michoomsuu Industirii Itoophiyaa fi Chaayinaa Finfinneetti geggeeffame irratti mallattaa'e.

en: Egypt's ruling Supreme Council of the Armed Forces announces a law banning all forms of discrimination, in the wake of recent violence between Coptic protesters and security forces.
om: Hookkara dhiyeenyaa momitoota Kooptikii fi humnoota nageenyaa gidduutti tahe booda, Manni Maree Olaanaa Humna Waraanaa Gibxii seera qoodinsa gosa kamiiyyuu dhorku dabarse.

en: The first U.S. case of MERS is reported in Munster, Indiana, of someone who travelled to Saudi Arabia.
om: Namni dhibee MERS'n qabu U.S. jalqabaa kan Munister, Indiyaanaa keessatti gabaasame nama gara Saawud Arabiyaatti imalee turedha.

en: A series of blasts at an ammunition depot in Svatove, Luhansk region of eastern Ukraine leaves four dead and eight injured.
om: Balaa dhohiinsa walitti-aanaa kuusaa rasaasaa Sivaatoov baha yuukireen nannoo Luhiinisk kessattii mudateen namnii afur yoo du'u namoonni saddeet miidhamniiru.

en: Gold extends a fresh three-month low as a stronger U.S. dollar sapped investor appetite for the metal.
om: Warqeen akkuma gatiin doolaara U.S. olkahaan fedhii inveesteronni sibiilaaf qaban dadhabsiise gadaanaa ji'oota sadii haaraa itti fufe.

en: Strictly adhering to prevention measures is critical he said, adding that, “we can also maintain productivity and meet our goals while observing these measures put in place.”
om: Ittisa jiran haalan hordofuun baayye barbaachisaadha jedheera, itti dabaluunis "oomishtummaa fi galma keenya wantoota kana osooma eegne jirruu ga'uu dandeenya" jedheera.

en: The festival opened to local and international filmmakers and film enthusiasts alike at Vamdas Cinema and Entertainment in partnership with the Embassy of Brazil in Addis Ababa and the Association of Black Audiovisual Professionals on Wednesday July 18.

en: Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam, Group CEO of Ethiopian Airlines, says, “We are glad to introduce inflight internet connectivity with the latest broadband satellite technology, Ka-band, offering our passengers seamless digital experience as they fly Ethiopian.

en: “Hurting the wider business community just to cripple few illegal money operators is not fair. Of course, weakening the parallel market is a step in the right direction but adopting a radical measure will cause more problems,” said Wujrayib Yibgeta, Vice President of Addis Ababa Traders Forum.

en: Delta Air Lines says that it expects sharp fuel cost increases in 2011, perhaps to $2.60 a gallon from $2.47 last year.

en: In his new work entitled "The Massacre of Debre Libanos Ethiopia 1937; the Story of One of Fascism’s Shocking Atrocities", the author yet again presents the events surrounding both the assassination attempt in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia on 19 February 1937, and the reprisal killings and massacre that occurred in the days and months that followed.
om: Hojii isaa haaraa "Ajjeechaa jumlaa Debire Libaanos Itoopiyaa 1937; seenaa hammeenya Faashistii Nama Naasisu keessaa tokko" jedhamee waamamu keessatti, barreessichi ammas irra deebiin taateewwan yaalii ajjeechaa 19 Guraandhala 1937 Addis Ababaa, Itoopiyaa keessaa, fi ajjeechaawwanii fi ajjeechaa jumlaa ija bahumsaa isa guyyootaa fi ji'oota itti aananii dhufan keessatti tahe dhiyeessa.

en: California Governor Jerry Brown declares a drought emergency and asks residents of the state to voluntarily conserve water.

en: The Nobel Committee awarded the prize for Abiy for his efforts to achieve peace and international cooperation, particularly for his decisive initiative to resolve the border conflict with neighboring Eritrea last year, three months after he came to power in April 2018.

en: Excluding skin cancer, 50% of the 10 Million people diagnosed with cancer annually live in developing countries.

en: Belgium officials lower the official death toll from 35 to 32, with nearly 100 still hospitalized.

en: Huawei installed the up-to-date telecom equipment in the AAU pharmacy campus for educational purposes. After 3 years’ know-how transfer, Addis Ababa University will gain 100% ownership of the ICT Practice Center.
om: Haawween dhimma barnootaaf AAU kampaasii faarmaasii keessatti meeshaa teelkoom haara'aa tahe dhaabe. Waggoota 3 akka itti dabarsan baruu booda, Yuunivarsitiin Addis Ababaa abbummaa Giddugala Shaakala ICT 100% ni fudhata.

en: Trade is suspended on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and Shenzhen Stock Exchange for a second time in a week after share prices tumble following the devaluation of the yuan.
om: Daldalli Sharafa Aksiyoonaa Shaangaayii fi Sharafa Aksiyoonaa Sheenzen irraa gatii yu'aan gadi hir'achuu isaa hordofuun erga gurgurtaan aksiyoonaa kufee booda torban tokko keessatti yeroo lammataaf adda cite.

en: Shangtex is the second largest textile company in China.
om: Shaangiteks Chaayinaa keessatti dhaabbata huccuu guddinaan lammaffaa dha.

en: The US launches a fourth round of air strikes targeting Islamic State fighters near Erbil, and Kurdish forces regain control of two towns in Nineveh province after heavy fighting.
om: US naannoo Irbilitti loltoota Isilaamik Isteet xiyyeeffachuun haleellaa qilleensa irraa marsaa afuraffaa eegalte, humnoonni Kurdish lola ulfaataa booda deebisanii magaalaa lama kutaa bulchiinsaa Naayinawee keessaa to'atan.

en: They call it “the lung of Addis Ababa”.
om: Isaan "Somba Addis Ababaa" jedhanii waaman.

en: Star Trek Into Darkness earns an estimated US$70.6 million during its opening weekend in the US and Canada.
om: Istaar Tireek Intuu Daarkines US fi Kaanaadaa keessatti dhuma torbanii waqtii baniinsa isaa keessatti miliyoona US$70.6'tti tilmaamamu argate.

en: Israel blocks all Palestinian export of agricultural products from the occupied West Bank following Palestinian limitations on imports of Israeli cattle.
om: Filisxeem horii gaanfaa Isiraa'el gara biyya ishee galchuu daangesuun, Isiraa'el alargee oomisha qonnaa Filisxeem kan Weest Baank isa qabame irraa dhufu hundumaa dhorkite.

en: Mali's interim President Diouncounda Traore returns to the country after a two-month absence.
om: Pirasdaantiin yeroo Maalii Diyookundaa Tiraa'oree ji'a lamaaf erga dhabamee booda gara biyyattiitti deebi'e.

en: The first to East Africa, the 2.1 million USD investment of the project includes a donation scope of 1.9 Million USD worth of equipment for training and demonstration, and the Train the Trainer program to Addis Ababa Institute of Technology (AAiT) teaching staff.
om: Afrikaa Bahaatiif isa jalqabaa kan tahe, pirojektiin investimentii USD miliyoona 2.1 arjooma meeshaalee leenjii fi shaakalaa, fi sagantaa leenjisaa leenjisuu hojjetoota barsiisota Inistitiyuutii Tekinoolojii Addis Ababaa (AAiT)f USD miliyoona 1.9 baasu dabalata.

en: Former television journalist Shelly Yachimovich is elected as the head of the Israeli Labor Party.
om: Gaazexeessaan televiijinii duraanii Sheelii Yaachimoovich akka dursaa Jaarmiyaa Labarii Isiraa'elitti filataman.

en: The Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) is scheduled to celebrate the ‘global running day’ with a one-mile race on Wednesday, June 6, 2018.
om: Federeeshiniin Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EAF) 'guyyaa figicha adunyaa' dorgommii maayila tokkootin kabajuuf Roobii, Waxabajjii 6, 2018 beellameera.

en: WHO Director-General Tedros will attend the 32nd Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union.
om: Daayirekterri-Olaanaan WHO Tediroos walga'ii idilee bulchitoota biyyoot fi motummootaa gamtaa Afiriikaa 32ffaa ni hirmaatu.

en: In a meeting held late on Friday, the Ministry of Trade and Industry (MoTI) consulted business owners and managers from the Tigray region on ways of addressing the problems companies faced during the operation.
om: Walgayii Jimaata ta'e irratti, Ministeerri Daldalaa fi Industirii(MoTI) abbootii qabeenyaa fi hoggantoota daldalaa naannoo Tigiraay irra dhufan daandiiwwan ittiin raakkoolee kubbaaniyyoonni yeroo duulichaatti isaan mudate furanii irratti gorsan.

en: A journalist for the British newspaper Financial Times is killed by a crocodile in Sri Lanka.
om: Gazixeessaan gaaazexaa Biriteen kan ta'e Faayinaanshaal Taayimsiif hojjetu Sirilaankaa keessatti naachaan nyaatame.

en: The Emperor of Exmoor, a red deer believed to be Britain's largest wild animal, is shot and killed.
om: Mootiin mootota Eksimoor,bineensa bosonaa guddicha Biriteen jedhamee kan amanamu bosonuun Diimaan rasaasaan rukutamuun ajjeefame.

en: Ethiopia announced an immunization campaign to vaccinate more than 7 million Children against polio next week, according to Ethiopian Public Health Institution.
om: Itoopiyaan torban dhufu ijoollee milyoona 7 akka pooliyoon hin qabne talaaluuf duula madiinummaa beeksifte, akka Dhaabbata Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaatti.

en: The Ethiopian National Football Team has qualified for the Africa Cup of Nations (CAF) today.
om: Har'a Gareen Kubbaa miilaa Biyyoolessaa Itoophiyaa Waancaa Biyyoota Afiriikaatif(CAF) darbe.

en: Yonhap News Agency reports that North Korea has fired two projectiles from Pyongan Province into the Sea of Japan.
om: Ejensiin Oduu Yonhaap, Kooriyaan Kaabaa furguggifamaa lama Piroviinsii Piyoongaan irraa gara Galaana Jaappaanitti akka dhukaaste gabaase.

en: During the event, a memorandum of understanding was also signed for P4G, the Partnering for Green Growth and the Global Goals 2030 which is an initiative with 12 middle-power partner countries including Denmark and South Korea.
om: Yeroo qophichaa, waliigalteen walhubannaa P4G. Guddina Magriisaa fi Galma Addunyaa bara 2030 michoomuu kan kaka'umas Denmaarkii fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa dabalachuun biyyoota humna giddugaleessaa 12 fis mallatteeffame ture.

en: A judge in Amsterdam delays the extradition of the man suspected of a lethal stabbing on the Bruges Market Square, citing concerns over the living conditions in Belgian jails.
om: Abbaan seeraa Amisterdaam keessaa dabarfamee kennamuu namicha waraansa hamaa Iskuweerii Gabaa Biruuges irraan shakkame, yaaddoo haalota jireenya manneen hidhaa Beeljiyeem caqasuun tursiise.

en: Radar scans at the tomb of Tutankhamun, Pharaoh of Ancient Egypt, reveal two chambers adjoining the tomb, raising prospect of finding the resting place of Queen Nefertiti.
om: Raadaariin iddoo awwaalcha Tutankaamun, Fara'oonii Gibxi Durii qoratu, kutaawwan lama iddoo awwaalchaa sana akka walitti buusan, bakki awaalchaa Mootittii Nefertittii argamuu akka danda'u adda baase.

en: The President of Spanish Football Federation and Vicepresident of FIFA and UEFA, Ángel María Villar, is arrested with his son amid a corruption scandal.
om: Pireezidaantiin federeeshinii kubbaa miilaa Ispeen fi itti aanaan pireezidaantiin FIFA fi UEFA kan ta'an Anjeel Maariyaa Villaar salphina malaamaltummaa keessa osoo jiranii ilma isaanii waliin to'annaa jala oolan.

en: The United States Border Patrol finds a sophisticated tunnel between Tijuana in Mexico and Otay Mesa, California, used by drug smugglers.
om: Eegdonni daangaa yunaaytid Isteetis holqa nam-tolchee haalaan ijaarame kan daldaltoonni baala sammuu nama adoochu itti fayyadama turan giddulameen magaalota kutaa Meeksiikoo tijuwaana fi kutaa Kaaliforniyaa Otaay Meesaa kessaatti arganiiru.

en: New York-based Human Rights Watch says that more than 400 people have been killed in clashes with the security forces in Oromia, although the government disputes this figure.
om: Falmattoonni Oromoo baayyeen mana hidhaa qaalitti tursama, akka miidiyaan mormitoota deggeru jedhetti.

en: The second President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, is sworn into office, after the resignation of Nursultan Nazarbayev.
om: Aangoo gadilakkisuu Nuursultaan Nazaarbayev 'iin walqabatee Pireezidaantiin Kazaakistaan Lammaffan Kaasim Joomaart Tokaaye kakuu rawwachuun wajjira seenan.

en: 18,000 Palestinians are facing life-threatening shortages of water in the Yarmouk Camp neighborhood of Damascus.
om: Lammiiwwan Filisxeem 18,000 tahan Dunkaana Yaarmok ollaa Daamsqoo keessatti hanqina bishaanii miidhaa lubbuu qaqqabsiisuu danda'uutu isaan quunnamaa jira.

en: Sponsored by U.S. Embassy and the Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA), the program helps Ethiopian youth to develop tech-based solutions to address community challenges.
om: Imbasii U.S fi Ejensii Waltahumsaa Addunyaalessaa Jaappaan (JICA)'n kan deggeramu, sagantichi dargaggoonni Itoopiyaa akka isaan furmaata tekinoolojii irratti hundaa'een rakkoowwan hawaasaaf furan gargaaruufi.

en: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky invites his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to a face-to-face meeting on the front line in the war-torn Donbas to negotiate an end to the conflict.
om: Pirasdaantiin Yukiriyeen Voloodimir Zeleniskii gita isaa Raashiyaa Vilaadmir Puutiniin bakka waraanaan diigamte Doonbas keessatti fuuldura waraanaatti mareen akka rakkoo xumuraniif marii fuulaa fuulattiif afeere.

en: Ethiopia's year-on-year headline inflation crept up to 8.8 percent in June, up from 8.7 percent the previous month, the statistics office said on Tuesday.
om: Qaala'iinsi waggaa-gara-waggaa Itoophiyaa Waxabajjiitti gara dhibbentaa 8.8tti suutan dabaleera, dhibbentaa 8.7 kan ji'a darbee irraa dabaluun, waajjira istaatistiksiitu Kibxata dubbate.

en: The Houses of Peoples' Representatives (HPR) is expected to elect a new Supreme Court president to replace the outgoing Tegene Getaneh, who resigned from his post citing health problems that render him unable to carry out his duties.
om: Manni Maree Bakka Bu'oota Ummataa (HPR) kan bahaa jiru Tegenee Getaanee, isa rakkoon fayyaa akka hojii isaa hin geggeessine isa dhorkuu himuun bakka isaa irraa gadhiise kan bakka bu'u pirasdaantii Mana Murtii Waliigalaa filachuuf ni eegama.

en: Initiated by Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed (PhD) in a bid to combat climate change and environmental degradation, it is part of the six billion seedlings planned to be planted in Ethiopia and neighboring countries in the coming rainy season.
om: Muummicha Ministeera Abiy Ahmadiin (PhD) jijjiirama qilleensaa fi manca'uu naannoo hambisuuf kan jalqabame, inni qaama biqiltuuwwan biliyoona ja'a Itoopiyaa keessaa fi biyyoota ollaatti waqtii roobaa dhufaa jirutti dhaabuuf karoorfameedha.

en: The historic deal was signed by Mohamed HamdanDaglo, deputy chief of the military council, and opposition leader, Ahmed al-Rabie, in Khartoum, Sudan.
om: Waligalteen seena qabeessiichi Mohaammed HamdanDaagloo, itti aanaa hogganaa mana maree waraanaa, fi hogganaa mormitu, Ahmed al-Raabii dhaan, Kaartuum, Sudaan keessatti mallatteeffame.

en: Ethiopian gold exports surged after the central bank offered higher prices for the metal in a bid to curb smuggling and as part of wider efforts to spur investment in mining.
om: Ekispoortiin warqee Itoophiyaa erga baankiin giddu galeessaa gatii olaanaa sibiilichaaf kontirobaandii dhorkuu fi yaalii investimentii albuudaa irratti jajjabeessuuf taasifamuu irratti dhiyeesseen booda kaka'umsa godheera.

en: Brown University researchers discover that a substantial amount of water may be present beneath the surface of the Moon. ,
om: Qorattoonni Unibarsitiin Biraawon bishaan hammi isaa baayyee tahe dachii ji'aa jala jiraachuu akka malu argatan.

en: The hydropower plant that entered in to its commissioning phase six months ago was unable to generate in full capacity owing to the low level of water caused partly by the EL Nino induced drought in the country.
om: Wiirtuun humna ibsaa bishaanii inni ji'oota ja'a dura sadarkaa hojii jalqabsiifamuu gahe sababa hamma bishaanii gadi aanaan hongee El niino biyyattii keessatti mudateen uumameen humna guutuudhaan ifsaa maddisiisuu hin dandeenye.

en: A Syria Civil Defence volunteer search and rescue team says 33 people, mostly women and children, were affected by toxic gas dropped from a helicopter on Saraqeb in rebel-held Idlib Governorate.
om: Akka gareen tola ooltota ittisa lammiilee fi baraartotaa Siiriyaa jedhutti bulchiinsa Idiliib kan garee warraaqsaan to'atamtee jirtu naannawaa Saaraaqiibitti gaasii nama boosisu xiyyararraa irratti darbatameen namoonnii 33 ta'an miidhaman, caalmaan ammoo dubartoota daa'imman ta'uu isaanii gabaaseera.

en: Australia experiences its hottest night since 1902, as a heat wave grips the country.
om: Awustiraaliyaan erga bara 1902 tii yeroo dambaliin ho'aa biyyattii miidhe halkan baay'ee ho'aa keessumeessite.,

en: The stay-home protests are currently taking place in Gondar and in some parts of Bahir Dar.
om: Mormiin mana turuu yeroo ammaa Gondarii fi kutaa Baahir Daar tokko tokko keessatti geggeeffamaa jira.

en: Incumbent Prime Minister Perry Christie of the Progressive Liberal Party concedes defeat to Hubert Minnis of the Free National Movement.
om: Mummichi Ministeera yeroo ammaa ammaa Peerii Kiristiin miseensa Paartiii Bilisummaa Guddinaa ta'an bakka bu'aa Paartii warraaqsa Bilisaa biyyaalessaa Hubeert Miniisiin injifatamu amanan.

en: The 2017/18 Ethiopian Premier League (EPL) defending champions, Jimma Aba Jiffar, is all set to use online mobile system for its day to day activities which enables fans get relevant information regarding the club.
om: Pirimiyeer Liigiin Itoopiyaa (EPL) bara 2017/18 kan injifate, Jimmaan Abbaa Jifaar, hojiilee isaa guyyaa guyyaa kan deggertoonni waa'ee kilabichaa odeeffannoo barbaachisu akka argatan godhu sirna mobaayilaa sarara irraa fayyadamuuf qophii hunda xumure.

en: Italian authorities seize 23 million euro (approximately US$30 million) from a Vatican bank account in a money laundering probe.
om: Aangawoonni mootummaa xaaliyaanii qorannoo daddabarsa maallaqa seeraan alaa taasisaniin herrega baankii Vaatikaan keessaa yuuroo moliyoona 23(tilmaamaan miliyoona US$30) akka hin sochoonee dhorkite.

en: But as of Thursday, a wave of protester and unrest has been observed in Finote Selam and Bure, towns in West Gojam Zone of the Amhara Regional State, becoming the latest regions to join the mood of protest in the regional state.
om: Garuu haga Kamisaatti, dambaliin mormitootaa fi hookkarri magaalota Finoote Selaam fi Buree Zoonii Goojjam Bahaa Mootummaa Naannoo Amaaraa keessatti muldhachuun, naannoo boodana mootummaa naannichaa keessatti yaada mormiitti seene tahe.

en: A hearing in the U.S. Senate is held about alleged human rights violations in the Philippines's war against illegal drugs.
om: Waa'ee cabuu mirgoota namoomaa waraana Filiphiinsi isa qorichoota seeraan alaa irratti godhame keessatti ta'ee Seeneetii U.S. keessatti dhageettiin godhame.

en: Liu Xiang breaks the 50-metre backstroke swimming world record, setting it at 26.98 seconds, to win the women’s gold medal at the Asian Games.
om: Luu Zhaang dorgommii taphoota Eshiyaa irratti gosa dorgommii bishaan dugdaan daakkii meetira 50n Rikoordii haaraa sekondii 26.98 ta'e galmeessuun Meedaliyaa warqii dubartoota mo'atte.

en: The announcement, while confirmed by external research, is still met in some quarters by skepticism.
om: Gabaasichi qorannoo alaatin mirkaana'u iyyuu shakkiin teessootti isa mudachaa jira.

en: Floods in Mississippi worsen, with the Army Corps of Engineers saying an area between Simmesport, Louisiana and Baton Rouge may be inundated under 20-30 feet of water.
om: Lolaan Misisiippii keessaa hammaachuun, Enjiineronni Army Koorps bakki Siimerport, Liwuziyaanaa fi Baaton Roog gidduu faanni 20-30 bishaan lolaan guutuu mala jedhan.

en: The heat-related death toll in the Canadian province of Quebec rises to 70, with 34 of those occurring in Montreal.
om: Hammi du'aa ho'a wajjin walqabatee mudatu kutaa bulchiinsa Kanaadaa Kiyuubek keessatti gara 70'tti yoo ol guddatu, 34 kan Montiriyaal keessatti mudateedha.

en: Fans attend the Vive Latino festival in Mexico City despite coronavirus concerns.
om: Yaaddoo vaayirasii koronaa utuu jiruu deggertoonni festivaala Vive Latiinoo Meeksikoo Siitii keessatti hirmaatan.

en: The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change said that it has been working to bring the consultants and organization operating in the country in one association.
om: Ministirri Eegumsa Naannoo, Bosonaa fi Jijjjiirama Qilleensaa gorsitootaa fi dhaabbatoota biyyattii keessatti hojjetan waldaa tokko keessatti walitti fiduuf hojjetaan jira jedhe.

en: Social networking service Facebook, and its photo-sharing subsidiary Instagram, ban private, person-to-person sales of guns via their services.
om: Tajaajilli walitti hidhamiinsi hawaasaa Feesbuukii fi dhaabbanni suura qoodu isa jala jiru biroon Inistaagiraam, gurgurtaa qawwee dhuunfaa, namaa gara namaattii karaa tajaajiloota isaanii godhamu dhorke.

en: Polish President Andrzej Duda vetoes a bill that would have demoted all communist-era military officers who served between 1944 and 1990 to private.
om: Pirasdaantiin Poolaand Andirzeej Duudaa labsii aangawoota waraanaa bara koomunistii kan 1944 fi 1990 gidduu tajaajilan hunda sadarkaa isaanii gara dhuunfaatti jijjiiru aangoo isaa fayyadamee morme.

en: Divers in Thailand rescue four more boys from the cave Tham Luang Nang Non bringing the total to eight rescued.
om: Daaktonni bishaanii Taayiland Holqa Taam Laang Nang Non keessaa Ijoollee haaraa baraarera, mana afur dabalateee walii galaan namoonni baraararaman saddeet ga'aniiru .

en: Especially the tendency of the central government to undertake mega projects with finance secured from external creditors, even with a high interest, coupled with the critical foreign currency shortage in the country have weighed negatively on the country’s ability to meet its debt obligations
om: Keessumaan fedhiin mootummaa giddu galeessaa pirojektiiwwan gurguddoo maallaqaa liqeessitoota alaa irraa argameen hojjechuuf yaaluu, fedha olaanaan, hanqina sharafa alaa biyyaa keessaa waliin cimdoomuun dandeetti biyyattin dirqama liqaa ba'uu ishee irratti dhiibbaa geessiseera.

en: The system enables investors to see different investment opportunities, to request for license from where they are living and to pay payments in simple and clear way, he added.
om: Sirnichi investeroonni carraa investimentii garagaraa akka arganiif, eyyema bakka jiraatanii akka gaafatanii fi kaffaltii salphaatti akka kaffalanii ni dandeessisaa fi daandicha ni qulqulleessa, jechuun dabalaniiru.

en: Serge Haroche and David Wineland win the 2012 Nobel Prize in Physics for their work on quantum optics.
om: Serjee Harochee fi Deevid Waayinlaand hojii isaanii Ku'aantam Optiksiif Badhaasa Noobelii 2012 Fiiziksiidhaan injifatan.

en: The government of the Philippines and the Communist Party cancel peace talks after president Rodrigo Duterte declares martial law in Mindanao.
om: Mootummaan Filiiphiinsii fi paartiin Koomunistii erga pirasdaantiin Roodirigoo Duutertee Mindanaa'oo keessatti seera bulchiinsa waraanaa labsee booda marii nagaa haqe.

en: Chinese vessels reportedly harassed Filipino fishermen off the coast of the Philippines last January 27, according to the Philippine military.
om: Akka waraanni Filiphiinsi jedhetti, dooniin Chaayinaa daangaa galaana Filiphiinsi irratti Amajji 27 darbe qurxummii qabdoota lammii Filiphiinsi akka qoccole gabaasame.

en: Singer George Michael cancels the Australian leg of his tour due to "major anxiety", resulting from his recovery from life-threatening pneumonia last November.
om: Weellisaan Joorj Maayikel sababa 'Dhiphina olaanaa' tin daawwanna walitti fufaa isaa gara awustiraaliyaa haqeera, kunis dandamannaa dhukkubaa sombaa lubbuu isaaf sodaachisaa ture kan sadaasa darbee irraan kan ka'eedha

en: The second SolveIT! a nationwide innovation competition for Ethiopian youths, has been launched in Addis Ababa last Friday.
om: SoolvIT lammaffaan! Dargaggoota Itoopiyaaf dorgommii kalaqaa biyyaalessaa kan tahe, Jimaata darbe Addis Ababaa Itoopiyaa keessatti eegalsiifame.

en: The Swiss National Bank introduces a minimum exchange rate of 1.20 CHF/EUR to prevent the overvaluation of the Swiss franc.
om: Baankiin Biyyaalessaa Iswiis hamma malee tilmaamamuu firaankii Iswiis hambisuuf gatii sharafaa gadaanaa 1.20 CHF/EUR akka ta'u beeksise

en: The PM congratulated all Ethiopians in all corners of the country for finalizing a successful Green Legacy season this year with 6.7 billion seedlings planted, surpassing the set target.
om: MM'chaa milkaa'inaan goolabamuu waqxii Ashaaraa Magariisaa waggaa kanaa biqiltuu biliyoona 6.7 dhaabuun, karoora ol raawwatameen walqabatee lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa hunda kutaa biyyatti hunda keessatii argamaniin baga gammadan jedhan.

en: Martin Winterkorn resigns as the CEO of Volkswagen as a result of an emissions cheating scandal.
om: Sababa muffii gowwomsaa haara baasuun CEO'n VolkisWaagen, Maartin Wiinkerkoorn aangoo gad dhiise.

en: Aden unrest Airstrikes on the Al-Qaeda-held Al-Mansoura district in the port city of Aden, kill at least 17 militants and injure 20 civilians, according to local medics and a Yemeni security official.
om: Akka qaamoleen nageenyaa Yeemenii fi tajaajiltoonni fayyaa naannoo sanaa himanitti haleellaan xiyyaaraa Adeen bulchiinsa Al-manshuuraa magaalaa buufataa Adeen kan garee Alqaayidaan qabamtee jirtu irrattii osoo walirrii hin cinne raawwachaa jirtuun yoo xiqqaate lubbuun hidhattoota 17 yoo darbu namoonni nagaan 20 ammoo miidhamaniiru.

en: Fatah and Hamas agree to form a unity government on the Gaza Strip.
om: Sulula Gaazaa irratti Hamaasii fi Faatahin motummaa waliinii hundeessuuf waliigalan.

en: Two members of the protest band Pussy Riot are left with chemical burns and head injuries after being attacked by a group of people in a McDonald's.
om: Miseensonni mormii baandii Pasii Raayot lama garee namootaa MaakDoonaald keessaan erga rukutamanii booda guba keemikaalaa fi midhama mataa wajjin bahan.

en: In ice hockey, the 2015 World Junior Ice Hockey Championship closes with Canada beating Russia in the gold medal game, while Slovakia captures bronze.
om: Aayis hookii keessatti, yeroo Siloovaakiyaan meetii argattu, Chaampiyoonaan Aayis Hookii Jalqabaa Addunyaa bara 2015, tapha medaaliyaa warqee keessatti Kanaadaan Raashiyaa mo'achuudhaan walitti siqe.

en: Former Brazilian football star Zico signs a contract to manage the Iraq national football team.
om: Urjiin kubbaa miilaa Biraazil duraanii Zikkoon garee kubbaa miilaa biyyaalessaa Iraan hoogganuuf waliigaltee mallatteesse.

en: John William King is executed by lethal injection by the state of Texas, 21 years after the murder of James Byrd Jr., for which he was sentenced.
om: Himata ajjeechaa Jeems Bayird juniyerii hidhameef waggaa 21 booda Joon Wiiliyaams kiing kutaa bulchiinsa magaala teeksaasiin adabbii lilmoo nama ajjeessuun waranamuun ajjeefame.

en: Mali confirms that a 2-year-old girl has tested positive for Ebola, marking the country's first documented case.
om: Maaliin mucaan durbaa waggaa lamaa qorannoo iboolaaf posatiivii agarsiisuu, kan biyyattii keessatti nama dhukkubichaan qabamuun galmaa'e isa jalqabaa ta'uu mirkaneesse.

en: Prince Muqrin bin Abdulaziz Al Saud is confirmed as second-in-line to the Saudi Arabian throne.
om: Ilmi mootii Makrin bin Abdulaaziz Al Sawudii teessoo mootummaa Sawud Arabiyaa argachuuf lammaffaa irra akka jiru mirkanaa'e.

en: According to him, 34 institutions are providing services using digital technologies.
om: Akka inni jedhetti, dhaabbileen 34 teekinolojiiwwan dijitaalaa fayyadamuun tajaajila kennaa jiru.

en: The Egyptian Football Association announces that Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah has tested positive for COVID-19 shortly before Egypt's 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier match against Togo.
om: Waldaan Kubbaa Miilaa Gibxii dorgommii gulaallii Geeba Biyyoota Afirikaa bara 2021 kan Gibxi Toogoo waliin taphattu xiqqoo dursee taphataan sarara duraa Liiverpuul Mohaammed Saalaan qorannoo COVID-19'f posatiivii akka tahe beeksise.

en: A society rich with ancient sites, a population that is still young – Axum is a shock.
om: Hawaasa bakkeewwan durduriin badhaadhan, ummata ammayyuu ijoollee - Aksum naasuudha.

en: The Church of England adopts legislation paving the way for the appointment of female bishops.
om: Waldaan Ingilaand seera phaaphaasii dhalaa akka muudamtu haala mijeessu baase.

en: The United States Agency for International Development (USAID), the development arm of America’s Department of State has completed its seven-year-long strengthening of Human Resources for Healthcare projects in Ethiopia.
om: Ejensiin Guddina Addunyaa Yunaayitid Isteetis (USAID), dameen guddinaa Ministeera Haajaa Alaa Ameerikaa pirojektoota isaa Qabeenya Humna Namaa Eegumsa Fayyaa Itoopiyaa keessaa jabeessuu waggaa torba dheeratu xumure.

en: A group named Turkestan Islamic Party claims the responsibility for the attack on Ürümqi Railway Station in China.
om: Gareen Jaarmiyaan Turkeestaan Isilaamik Buufata Daandii Baaburaa Yurumqii Chaayinaa keessaa irratti haleellaa raawwachuu hime.

en: The World Health Organisation estimates that the death toll from the Ebola virus outbreak has risen to 887.
om: Akka Dhaabbanni Fayyaa ddunyaa tilmaamutti sababa weerara dhibee Vaayiresii Iboolaatiin baayyinni lubbuu namoota darbee 887 ga'eera.

en: Japan and South Korea fail to make progress toward resolution, but agree to continue dialogue.
om: Jaappaanii fi Kooriyaan Kibbaa araaraaf fooyya'iinsa agarsiisuu dadhaban, garuu akka marii itti fufan waliigalan.

en: Indian Minister of Power R. K. Singh announces that India will halt the importation of US$2.8 billion worth of Chinese power equipment due to heightened tensions between the two nations.
om: Ministeerri Annisaa Hindii, R. K. Sing, Hindiin meeshaalee annisaa Chaayinaa biliyoona US$2.8 baasu sababa olka'uu waldhabdee biyyoota lamaan gidduu jiruu biyya isheetti galchuu akka dhaabdu beeksise.

en: A bronze statue of Sir Alex Ferguson, a most successful manager in Manchester United’s history, was unveiled outside Old Trafford.
om: seenaa Maanchister Yunaaytid keessatti leenjisaa milka'aa kan ta'an Ser Aleeks Fargusaniif siidaan Meetiirraa ijaarame bakkee mooraa Oldi Tiraaforditti agarsiifame.

en: The death toll of the heat wave in Japan rises to 57, while 18,347 others are hospitalized.
om: Dambalii ho'aa Jaappaan kessattii mudateen lakkoofsi namoota lubbuun darbanii gara 57ti yeroo guddatu, namoonni 18,347 ta'an ammoo Hospitaala seenaniiru.

en: In an Exclusive interview with ENA Acting General- Director of the Agency, Jonse Gedefa said that the agency has been running the e-GP technology system project that would help to clear the government procurement activities from human error and misappropriation.
om: Afgaaffii addaa ENA fi Daayirekteera-Olaanaaa Ejensichaaa irratti, Joonsee Geddefaa ejensichi hojiiwwan bittaa meeshaa mootummaa dogongora namaa fi mulqa seeraan alaa irra bilisa akka ta'uuf gargaaruuf pirojektii sirna teekinooloojii e-GP adeemsisaa jira jedhaniiru.

en: Denmark suspends future weapons export licenses to Saudi Arabia in response to the killing of Jamal Khashoggi and the Saudi Arabian-led intervention in Yemen.
om: Ajjeefamuu Jamaal Kaashogii fi gidduugaltummaa Yemen keessaa kan Sawud-Arabiyaan durfameen walqabatee Denmaark heyyama alargee meeshaalee waraanaa gara Sa'ud Arabiyaa adda kutte.

en: During his visit, Infantino met with a delegation of the Ethiopian Football Federation led by Juneydi Basha, its president.
om: Yeroo daawwannaa isaatti, Infaantiinoon jila Federeeshinii Kubbaa miilaa Itoophiyaa pireezidaantii isaa Junaddiin Baashaan durfamu waliin mari'ateera.

en: “When we look at the past two years GTP-II performance, expected and unexpected things have happened such as drought and unrest which were unexpected, but if the prevailing peaceful situation remains unchanged and we do more in the two and half years left, the planned economic growth will be achieved,” the Commissioner said.
om: "Raawwii GPT-II waggoota lamaan darbanii yeroo ilaallu, wantootni eegamanii fi hin eegamne raawwataniiru kanneen akka hongee fi jeequmsaa kan hin eegamne yeroo ta'an, garuu haalli nagaa duraa ture yoo hin jijjiramu ta'e waggoota lamaa fi walakka hafanitti caalaa ni hojjenna, karoorri guddina diinagdee ni milkaa'a" Komiishinerichi jedhaniiru.

en: Riviera Beach, Florida, is paying $600,000 to a hacker who took over local government computers three weeks ago.
om: Filooridaa Riveeraa Biich keessatti torbee sadii dura Haakerii Kompiiwutarota bulchiinsa naannnoo sana ta'ateef qarshii Doolaara 600000 kaffaluuf jira.

en: A teenage girl suicide bomber kills five people and injures fourteen others in the Damaturu area in northeast Nigeria.
om: Kaaba baha Naayijeeriyaa nannoo Damaturu jedhamutti shamarreen gocha bade balleessaa boombiin raawwatteen lubbuu namoota shanii yoo galaafattu namoonni kudha afur ammoo miidhamaniiru.

en: It is recalled that Ethio Telecom has recently announced the launching of 4G LTE service in 92 towns nationwide and in the capital, Addis Ababa as phase-I 4G LTE service expansion strategic plan for the 2020/21 budget year.
om: Itiyoo Telekoom dhiyeenya kana tajaajila 4G LTE magaaloota 92 guutuu biyyaa keessatti argamanii fi magaala guddutti keessatti akkasumas karoorri tarsiimawaa tajaajila 4G LTE sadarkaa-I bara bajataa 2020/2021 jalqabuun isaa ni yaadatama.

en: There will be also small and medium scale manufacturing companies that have the capacity to produce electronics machines in this country,” Getahun stated.
om: Akkasumas dhaabbatoota oomishaa xiqqaa fi giddugaleessaa dandeettii oomisha maashinoota elektirooniksii biyya kana keessatti qaban ni jiraatu," Getahun jedheera.

en: The report was prepared upon the request of the governments of Ethiopia and Sudan and describes the illegal activities that are taking place from the Horn of Africa via Libya to Europe as a “dangerous and organized illicit trade”.
om: Gabaasichi kan qophaa'e gaaffi mootummoota Itoopiyaa fi Sudaan irratti hundaa'uuni akkasumas inni hojiilee seeraa alaa Gaanfa Afrikaa irraa kahuun karaa Liibiyaa Awurooppaa seenu "daldala seeraan alaa hamaa fi qindaa'e" jechuun ibsa.

en: And it does not take long for anyone who sets foot in the area to understand why.
om: Akkasumas nama naannicha irra miilaan ejjete kamiifiyyuu dhugaa isaa hubachuun yeroo dheeraa hin fudhatu.

en: The African Union choose Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma of South Africa as its leader, making her the first woman to occupy the post, in a hard fought battle with incumbent Jean Ping of Gabon.
om: Gamtaan Afirikaa falmii jabaa kan aangoorra ture Jiin Piingii Gaabon waliin godhame booda Kosazaanaa Jilamini-Zumaa Afrikaa Kibbaa akka hoogganaatti filachuun, dubartii jalqabaa bakkicha qabattu ishee taasise.

en: Despite the boycott attempt by Democratic Tsunami, El Clásico is played in Camp Nou, Barcelona, with important security measures.
om: Yaalii uggura Diimokiraatik Tsunaamii malee, El Kilaasikoon Kaamp Nuu, Baarseloonaa keessatti tarkaanfilee nageenyaa barbaachisootiin taphatame.

en: The mother of Assange arrives in London ahead of his final legal bid against extradition to Sweden.
om: Haatii Assaanj Caaalbaasii seeraa qabeessa akka gara Siwiidiinitti dabrfamte kennamtuuf godhame isa xumuraa dursuun Landan seenan

en: The newly elected President of Ukraine Petro Poroshenko vows to continue Kiev's anti-terrorist operation against pro-Russian militants in the east.
om: Pireezidaantiin Yuukireen Haaraa filataman Petiro Poresheenkoon duula farra shororkeessummaa Keev kan hidhattota deeggartoota raashiyaa bahaatti argaman irratti godhamu itti fufsiisuuf waadaa seenan.

en: The past year has resulted in just about everything going remote, and our ability to accelerate digital inclusion has become our number one focus.”
om: Barri darba wanta hundumaa fageenyaan akka ta'u godheera, dabalataan dandeetti keenya hirmaachisummaa dijitaalaa saffisiisuuf xiyyeeffannoo keenya jalqabaa ta'eera."

en: The ruling Ethiopian Peoples' Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) and opposition parties have recently put their differences aside and have agreed to come to a roundtable to find ways of redeeming the already tense political environment.
om: Addi Diimokiraatawaa Warraaqsa Ummattoota Itoopiyaa (EPDRF) fi jaarmiyaalee mormitootaa dhiyeenya kana garagarummaa isaanii cinatti dhiisuun waliin ta'anii karaa haala siyaasaa durayyuu hammaate ittiin furan barbaaduuf waliigalan.

en: Former Santo Domingo mayor Roberto Salcedo Sr. resigns from the government and the Dominican Liberation Party.
om: Kantiibaan Santa Domeengoo duraanii kan ta'e Roobeertoo Saalseedoo Siniyor mootummaafi Paartii bilisummaa Dominikaanota keessaa ofbaase.

en: Many in the industry agree with that.
om: Namoonni baayyeen industiricha keessa jiran itti waliigalu.

en: The United Nations Security Council approves unanimously new sanctions against North Korea for its recent nuclear test.
om: Manni Maree Nageenyaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii shaakala niwukileeraa ishee dhiyeenya kanaaf qoqqobbii haaraa Kooriyaa Kaabaa irratti guutummaatti mirkaneesse.

en: American businessman Jacob Ostreicher escapes Bolivia two years after being imprisoned without charge.
om: Daldaltichi lammii Ameerikaa Jaakob Ostireecher erga waggaa lamaaf murtii malee hidhamee booda Boliiviyaa keessaa bahe.

en: Cobalt Air suddenly announces its dissolution, cancelling all future operations and leaving many passengers stranded in Cyprus.
om: Koobaalt Eeyiriin, hojiiwwan gara fuulduraa hunda haquunii fi imaltoota baayyee Qoopiroos keessatti akka danqamanii jiranitti dhiisuun dingata diigamuu isaa beeksise.

en: Meta-analysis of 42 previous studies concludes chocolate may be good for the heart.
om: Xiinxalli qabiyyee qorannoolee darban 42 akka Chokkooleettiin onneef gaarii ta'uu danda'u dimshaashesse.

en: Tombs discovered near Egypt's pyramids reinforce the theory they were built by free workers rather than slaves.
om: Awwaalonni naannoo piraamiidii misir'tti argaman garboota irra namoota bilisaan ijaaramuu isaanii calaqqisu.

en: The highly popular Kana Television has launch of two new shows – an original Kana production and an international localized drama series – to further enhance the viewing experience of its growing audience.
om: Baayyee kan beekamu Teleevijiniin Qaanaa fedhii daawwannaa hordoftoota isaa guddachaa jiru caalmaatti guddisuuf agarsiisa haaraa lama jalqabe - qophii orijinaala Qaanaa fi diraamaa walitti fufaa addunyaa gara naannootti jijjiirame.

en: A three-man crew lands safely after four months in the International Space Station.
om: Gareen namoota sadii qabu turtii ji'a afuriif buufata hawaa addunyaarraa erga taasisaniin booda nagaan gara lafaatti deebi'aniiru.

en: Tornadoes hit the Arkansas towns of Vilonia and Mayflower with reports of casualties.
om: Hobonboleettiin magaalawwan Arkaansas Vilooniyaa fi Meeflaawor dhaheen miidhamni namaa gabaasame.

en: This robot is currently available in Ethiopia for ICT Week sponsored by Ethio-Telecom.
om: Roobootin kun yeroo ammaatti Itoophiyaa keessatti torbee ICT Etiyoo-telekoomin deeggarame irratti ni argama.

en: The Joint Committee on Vaccination and Immunisation announce a recommendation that half of million people with severe immunosuppressed will receiving a third dose of the COVID-19 jabs.
om: Koreen Waliinii Talaallii fi Madiinummaa gorsa isa namoonni walakkaa miliyoonaa kan immiwunosappireesdii hamaa qaban doozii sadaffaa COVID-19 fudhatan beeksise.

en: Robert Kaplan, head of the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas, says that low bond yields suggest sluggish growth ahead for the economy of the United States. .
om: Roobert Kaaplaan, dursaan Baankii Riservii Federaalaa Daalas, aksiyoonni gadaanaan argamuun guddinni suuta jedhaan diinagdee Yunaayitid Isteetis dura akka jiru akeeka jedhe.

en: Hercules 264, a Gulf of Mexico natural gas drilling rig, partially collapses off the coast of Louisiana after catching fire.
om: Lolaa meeksiikoo qonna boolla boba'aa uumama Heerkulas 264 hojjetamaa ture irrattii bala abiddaa qaqabeen gartokkeen isaa gara buufata doonii Luuziyaanatti jige.

en: Nigeria is the defending champion.
om: Naayijeeriyaan injifattuu dorgommii duraanii ti.

en: According to him, almost all government institutions and private entities require AI applications to deliver effective services with the support of AI technology.
om: Akka inni jedhetti, dhaabbileen mootummaan hunda jechuun bifa danda'amuu fi qaamoleen dhuunfaa tajaajiloota bu'a qabeessa deggersa teekinoolojii AI'n dhiyeessuuf hojiirra oolmaa AI barbaadu.

en: David Davis resigns as the United Kingdom's Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union amid disagreements with Prime Minister Theresa May over Brexit negotiations.
om: Deevid Deevis Gamtaa Awurooppaa keessaa bahuuf Muummee Ministeeraa Teresaa Meeyiin maree dhimma Bireeksitiin walqabatee waldhabdee tureef aangoo Ministeera Haajaa Alaa Yuunaayitid Kiingidem irraa bu'e.

en: A Camair-Co plane is fired upon while attempting to land at Bamenda Airport, but the pilot manages to safely land the plane with no casualties reported.
om: Xiyyaarri Kamaa'ir-Ko Buufata Xiyyaaraa Baameendaatti qubachuuf utuu yaaluu ibiddi qabate, garuu balaliisaan miidhaan tokko utuu hin qaqqabin nagaan xiyaaricha qubachiise.

en: Former News International Chief Executive Rebekah Brooks is arrested by police investigating phone hacking and corruption at the organisation.
om: Hojii rawwachiistuun sagantaa Oduu idl addunyaa duraanii Riibqaan Buruk poolisii yakka hatuuxummaa bilbilaa fi malaammaltummaa dhaabbatichatti qorachaa jiruun to'annoo jala oolte jirti.

en: The Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam (GERD) will regulate the water flow of Nile River and reduce flooding risks and sedimentation in downstream countries, Arba Minch University Water Resource Research Center Director Samuel Degalo said.
om: Hidhi Haaromsaa Guddichi Itoophiyaa(GERD) ya'a bishaanii laga Abbayyaa ni to'ata, akkasumas lolaa fi dhiqama biyyee biyyoota gadii akka hir'isu, Daayiriketeerri giddugala qorannoo Yuuniversitii Arbaa Mincii Saamu'el Digaaloo dubbataniiru.

en: Located on the boundary of Oromia and Amhara region, the Abay Gorge is a serios of gorges to a depth of some 1,500 meters.
om: Daangaa naannoo Oromiyaa fi Amaaraa irratti kan argamu, Abbay Gorgeen sulula walitti fufaa gafa meetira 1,500 gadi fagaatuudha.

en: EPHI Emergency Operation Center Deputy Incident Manager, Dr. Mikyas Teferi said 227 people have died due to the COVID-19 pandemic during the past week alone.
om: Itti aanaan Bulchaa Giddugala Hojii Balaa Tasaa EPHI, Dr Mikkiyaas Tafarii torban darbe kana qofatti namoonni 227 weerara COVID-19'n du'uu isaanii dubbate.

en: Two small planes (took off from Langley Regional Airport) collide mid-air near Mission, British Columbia, in western Canada, with at least one person dead.
om: Xiyyaaronni xixiqqaan lama (Dirree Xiyyaaraa Naannoo Laangileey irraa kahan) naannoo Miishin, Biritish Kolombiyaa, lixa Kanaadaa keessatti walitti bu'uun, yoo xiqqaate namni tokko du'e.

en: Mebrahtu’s motivation came from personal experience.
om: Kaka'umsi Mebraatuu muuxannoo dhuunfaa irraa dhufe.

en: The National Hockey League locks out its players after the expiry of the collective bargaining agreement.
om: Liigiin Hookii biyyaleessaa erga yeroon walii galteen waliinii xumurameen booda taphattoota isaa ni cufa.

en: A multi-sectoral stakeholders’ platform joined hands to rescue over 131,000 cattle on the verge of death in Borena zone of southern Oromia.
om: Waltajjiin abbaa dhimmaa seketera garagaraa godina Booranaa Kibba Oromiyaa keessattin beeylada 131,000 qarqara du'aa irra jiran oolchuf harka walqabatan.

en: Last week, the National Bank of Ethiopia introduced a new rule that forces depositors make a maximum of five transactions per week.
om: Torbee darbe, Baankiin Biyyoolessaa Itoophiyaa seera haaraa fayyadamtoota baankii torbeetti yoo baayyate tajaajila shan akka fayyadama dirqisiisu beeksise.

en: Nominations for the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards are announced with Game of Thrones receiving 24 nominations.
om: Kaadhimamtootni badhaasa Eemii jalqabaa 67ffaa Geem of Siroons kadhimama 24 argachuu isaa waliin ibsame.

en: The Afro-Ukrainian hip hop trio consisting of the three Ethiopian-Ukrainian sisters, Bethlehem (Betty), Miriam and Siona Endale have already left an imprint on the Ukrainian hip-hop scene.
om: Hip hooppiin Afroo-Yukiraniyaan tiryoo obbolowwan durbaa lammii Itoopiyaa fi Yukireen sadan of keessaa qaba, Beetileem (Beetii), Miriyaamii fi Siyoonaa Indaalee seenaa hiip hooppii Yukiraniyaan keessatti ashaaraa hambisan.

en: The 41st anniversary of the foundation of the Tigray People’s Liberation Front (TPLF) is celebrated in Mekelle through commemoration of the martyrs, panel discussion and other programs.
om: Rakkoo biraa mummichi ministeeraa waldhaansoo qabu tasgabbii dhabuu waraana keessa jirudha.

en: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un orders nuclear weapons to be ready for use at any time.
om: Geggeessaan Kooriyaa Kaabaa Kiim Joong Un meeshaaleen waraanaa niwukilarii yeroo kamittuu itti fayyadamaaf akka qophii ta'an ajajan.

en: Government Communication Affairs Office Minister, Bereket Simon, stressed the need to further consolidate soil and water conservation so as to protect the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam from silt and sediment.
om: Ministeerri Waajjira Dhimma Koomunikeeshinii Mootummaa, Bereket Simoon, Hidha Guddicha Haaromsa Itoopiiyaa cirrachaa fi kuufama biyyee irraa eeguuf eegumsa biyyee fi bishaanii caalmaatti jabeessuun akka barbaachisu dubbate.

en: According to the head, the reason behind the delay is related to the fleeing the contactor from the area.
om: Akka hogganichaatti, sababni turuu isaa duuba jiru kontiraacterri naannoo sanaa irraa baqachuun walqabatee akka tahedha.

en: Celebrating this festival are also those who have returned from abroad.
om: Akkasumas festivaalicha kan kabajan warreen biyya alaati deebi'aniidha,

en: She has worked as an actress, dancer and makeup artist in the infamous National Theatre, the oldest in its kind in the country.
om: Isheen akka taatuutti, weellistuutti akkasumas artistii meekaappiitti Tiyaatira Biyyaalessaa badaa, biyyattii sana keessatti dulloomaa hunda caalu keessatti hojjetteetti

en: In the latest advance in Operation Indian Ocean, Somali government forces assisted by AMISOM troops capture seven towns in the central Hiran province from Al-Shabaab.
om: Babal'inni 'Duula Garba Indiyaa' erga eegalee as humni waraana motummaa Soomaliyaa loltu AMISOM waliin ta'uun magaalota kutaa bulchiinsa giddugala Hiiraan keessatti argaman torba garee Alshabaab jalaa bilisa baasaniiru .

en: A US court sentences two more Somali pirates to life in prison for capturing a yacht off the coast of Africa in February.
om: Manni murtii Ameerikaa hattoota galaanarraa lammii soomaliyaa ta'an kan buufata galaanaa irraa doonii ugguruun himatan lamaan hidhaa umurii guutuun adabe.

en: However, there are challenges such as lack of access to loan from banks and most of the tourism destinations are far from the capital of Ethiopia, he added
om: Haa ta'u malee, rakkooleen akka liiqii baankiiwwan irra dhabuu fi ga'umsi tuurizimii harki caaluu magaalaa gudditti Itoophiyaa irrraa fagaachuu akka jiran, dabalaniiru.

en: A.C. Milan says it has reached an agreement with Manchester City F.C. to sign Italian striker Mario Balotelli.
om: A. C. Miilaan taphataa sarara duraa lammii Xaaliyaanii Maariyoo Baalotelii mallatteessisuuf Maanchester Siitii wajjin akka waliigaltee irra gahe beeksise.

en: Vatican Press Secretary announces that the last remaining patient has recovered and that there are zero active cases in the state.
om: Barreessaan Pireesii Vaatikaan dhukkubsataa inn dhumaa hafe fayyuudhaan biyyattii keessatti lakkoofsi namoota dhukkubaan qabamanii zeeroo tahe.

en: He appeared onstage in a warrior's animal-skin tunic and lion's mane headdress.
om: Inni waltajjii irratti uffannaa loltootaa gogaa bineensaa irraa tolfamuu fi rifeensa leencaa mataatti uffachuun mul'ata.

en: Ethiopia's system of ethnic federalism was always going to be vulnerable to politicians playing on atavistic sentiments.
om: Banamuun dirree siyaasaa obbo Abiyyi jalattii cufaa yaaddoo sabummaa bane.

en: Israel kills ten people in airstrikes conducted against Syrian military targets in the Golan Heights in response to two rockets fired at Mount Hermon late Saturday.
om: Rooketii lama Gaara Heermon irratti Sanbata darbee furguggifameef deebii kennuuf Isiraa'el haleellaan qilleensaa naannoo Goolan Heeyititti waraana Siiriyaa xiyyeeffateen namoota 10 ajjeefte.

en: After my debut competition,I have achieved several medals in all local tournaments.
om: Dorgommii jalqabaa koo booda, meedaliyaa hedduu dorgommiiwwan naannoo irratti mo'adheera.

en: The Committee on the Rights of the Child of the United Nations condemns the government of the Cook Islands for criminalizing homosexual sex.
om: koreen hojii geggeesituun Mirgoota Daa'immanii Motummoota Gamtoomanii bulchiinsi odola Cook walqunnamtii saala walfakkaataa gosa yakkatti ramaduu isaatiif qeeqan.

en: A new study by scientists finds that areas around the Persian Gulf could become uninhabitable to humans in less than 100 years due to rising temperatures.
om: Sababii olka'uu tempireecharaan yeroo waggaa 100 gaditti bakki naannoo Galfii Pershiyaa jireenya namaaf kan hin mijanne akka ta'uu danda'u qorannoon haaraan saayintistootaa argarsiise.

en: Oje Ken Ollivierre, the Jamaican reggae star widely known as Protoje is set to rock Addis on July 29th at Laphto Mall.
om: Ooje Keen OlliVerre, Reegeen lammii Jamaa'ikaa Pirotojee jedhamuun beekamu gaafa Adoolessa 29 Galma Gabaa Laaftootti Addis'tti sirbuuf.

en: Dr. Dereje exclusively told FBC that number of new confirmed cases, intensive care patients and death tolls from the delta variant are alarmingly increasing putting socio-economic situation at stake.
om: Dr. Darajjeen addatti lakkoofsi namoota haaraa dhibichaan qabamuun mirkanaa'e, dhukkabsattoonni kutaa hordoffii olaanaa fi hammi du'aa gosa deltaan dhufe akka malee dabalaa jiraachuun haala hawaas-diinagdee yaaddoo keessa galchuu addatti FBC'tti hime.

en: Seifu Tura Abdiwak of Ethiopia and Ruth Chepngetich of Kenya won Sunday in the return of the Chicago Marathon, which was scrapped last year amid the coronavirus pandemic.
om: Seeyifuu Turaa Andiwaaq Itoopiyaa fi Ruut Chepingetich'n Keeniyaa deebii Maraatoonii Chikaagoo, kan waggaa darbe sababa weerara vaayirasii koronaan haqame ture keessatti Dilbata injifatan.

en: Ethiopia qualified for CAF after the match between Niger and Madagascar ended in a draw, while Cote d’Ivoire beat Ethiopia 3 to 1.
om: Itoophiyaan CAF'dhaaf taphni Nijeer fi Madagaaskaar gidduu walqixaan erga dhumeen booda osooma Ayivorikost Itoophiaa 3 fi 1 mootee jirtuu dabarte.

en: The International Federation of Association Football (FIFA) will hold its 70th congress in Addis Ababa next year.
om: Federeshiniin Waldaa Kubbaa Miilaa Adunyaa(FIFA)'n konngirasii isaa 70ffaa bara dhufuu Finfinneetti gaggeessa.

en: NASA's Kepler space observatory announces the discovery of three new planets in the Goldilocks zone capable of supporting life.
om: Buufatni qorannaa Hawaa NASA Kepler jedhamu argannoolee pilaaneetiii nama jiraachisu danda'an sadii naannawaa Gooldiilooksitti gabaaseera.

en: Cleanup continues after the Refugio Oil Spill at Refugio State Beach along the coast of Santa Barbara County, California.
om: kaalifforniyaa buufata doonii Saanta Baarbaaraa bulchiinsa diirra galaanaa Rafuujiyoo keessatti boba'aan Refuujiyoo dhangala'uu isaatiin walqabatee hojiin quluqulleessuu itti fufeera.

en: The Israeli Air Force launches an attack against tunnels leading from Gaza into Israel in response to missile attacks and mortar fire.
om: Humni qilleensaa Isiraa'el haleellaa misaayelaa fi ibbiddaa ciccimaa irra ga'eef deebii kennuuf holqoota gara gaazaa geessan irratti haleellaa ni bana.

en: During a national discussion forum on the Environment, Forest and Climate Change Sector Commission Commissioner Prof. Fekadu Beyene said that the country has achieved remarkable successes in terms of mitigating and responding to the effects of climate change.
om: Yeroo marii biyyaalessaa Naannoo, Bosonaa fi Jijjiirama Qilleensaa irratti Komiishinariin sekterichaa Komiishiner Prof. Fiqaaduu Bayyanee biyyattiin miidhaa jijjiirama qilleessaa hambisuu fi deebii kennuu irratti milkaa'insa ajaa'ibaa agarsiistetti jedhe.

en: British music journalism magazine New Musical Express (NME) issues its final print edition after 66 years, becoming a purely digital medium.
om: Barruun gaazexessummaa muuziqaa Biriitish Niwu Muzikal Eksipres (NME) guutummatti miidiyaa dijitaalawaa tahuun, waggoota 66 booda gulaallii maxxansamu isaa dhumaa kenne.

en: Kenyan Eliud Kipchoge topped all male runners and Ethiopian Tigist Tufa won the women's elite event in the 35th running of the London Marathon.
om: Lammiin Keeniyaa Eliid Keepchoogeen fiigdota dhiiraa mara yoo injifatu lammii Itiyoophiyaa kan taate Tigist Tufaa ammoo dorgommii fiigichaa Landan 32ffaa irratti badhaasa dubartii urjii ta'ii kanaa jedhamu mo'atte.

en: The project will also work with public and private healthcare providers to better utilize resources and revenues to finance their services.
om: Akkasumas Pirojektichi uummataa fi qaamolee tajaajila fayyaa dhiyeessan waliin qabeenyoota caalmaatti fayyadamuu fi tajaajila isaanii foyyeessuf galii dabaluuf ni hojjeta.

en: Last Friday Premier Abiy has called residents for clean-up campaign to keep their localities free from rubbish.
om: Jimaata darbe Ministeerri Muummee Abiy jiraattotaaf naannoo isaanii balfaa irra eeguuf duula qulqullinatiif waamicha taasisaniiru.

en: A study concludes that continuous standing and walking reduces the risk of type II diabetes better than either sitting/lying or exercise.
om: Qorannoon tokko walitti fufanii dhaabachuu fii deemuun taa'uu/hirkachuu yookaan sochii qaamaa gochuu caaalaa balaa diyaabetis taayip II akka hir'isu agarsiise.

en: “We struggle in terms of finding training space since we have no licenses or permits to do our work,” Arega argues.
om: "Hojii keenya hojjechuuf Waraqaa eyyemaa yookin eyyema waan hin qabnef bakka shaakalaa argachuuf ni rakkanna," jechuun Areggaan ni hima.

en: It has since shot to number 1 in Billboard’s World Album chart – a milestone for Ethiopian music.
om: Ergasii Biilboordii gabatee Albemii Addunyaa irratti lakkoofsa 1'tti kan ol utaale, muuziqaa Itoopiyaaf tarkaanfii guddaadha.

en: Zoma is a sustainable museum that tries to bring the focus to traditional architecture in Ethiopia.
om: Zoman muuziyeemii itti fufaa xiyyeeffannoo gara sirna ijaarsaa aadaa Itoophiyaatti fiduuf yaaluudha.

en: The Spanish government passes a decree which amends the Historical Memory Law to allow the government to exhume Francisco Franco's remains from the Valle de los Caídos.
om: Mootummaan Ispeen awwaalcha Firaansisko Firaankoo qotee lafee isaa Valle de los Kayidos keessaa akka baasuuf mootummaaf hayyamuuf labsii Seera Yaadannoo Seena-qabeessa fooyyessu baase.

en: Briefing journalists today, Mines and Petroleum Minister Takele Uma pointed out that the income is remarkable when compared to same period of last Ethiopian year, which was 90 million USD.
om: Har'a gaazexissitootaaf ibsa kennaniin, Ministeerri Albuudaa fi Peetirooliyeemii Taakkalee Uumaa galichi yeroo walfakkaataa bara darbee waliin walbira yeroo qabamu aja'iibsiisa ta'uu isaa heeraniiru, inni USD miliyoona 90 kan tureedha.

en: In Afghanistan, Taliban soldiers invade a hotel in Kabul, kill guests, and hold some hostages.
om: Afgaanistaan keessatti, loltoonni Taalibaan hoteela Kaabul keessaa tokko weeraruun, keessummoota ajjeesanii, namoota muraasa hidhan.

en: The National Disaster Risk Management Commission warned about a potential flash flood in some parts of the country due to torrential rains in the coming days.
om: Komiishinin To'aannoo Balaa Biyyaalessaa kutaalee biyyattii baayyee keessatti lolaa guddaan sababa rooba guyyoota as adeemaa jiran keessa tahuun jiraachuu akka malu akeekkachiise.

en: Energy-rich Kazakhstan suspends Russian fuel and gas imports to protect its domestic market from a surplus due to a weakened ruble which has sent ripples of economic uncertainty through Central Asia.
om: Annisaan badhaatuun Kaazaakistaan gabaa ishee biyya keessaa dhiyeessii irraa hafaa irraa eeguuf sababa dadhabuu raabilii kan Giidugala Eeshiyaa keessatti tasgabbii dhabuu diinagdee fidaa jiruuf boba'aa fi gaazii Raashiyaa gara biyya isheetti galchuu adda kutte

en: In an exclusive interview with ENA, ECX Corporate Communications Manager Netsanet Tesfaye said the trading of all pluses through the authority starting this Ethiopian budget year will help combat contraband.
om: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliiniitiin, DOI hogganaan sab-quunnamtii xindocha Natsaannat Tasfaayee daldalli qabaanyaa hunnda karaa abbaa taayitichaatin ta'u bara baajataa Itoophiyaa kanaa qabee kontirobaandii ittisuuf ni gargaara jedhaniiru.

en: The United States Food and Drug Administration approves the Merck & Co. drug, Bridion, that reverses the effects of muscle relaxants used during surgery.
om: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Daawwaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis daawwaa Merk & Co., Biraayidiyooniin, isa dhiibbaa hiikamuu maashaa ofirra deebisu isa yeroo baqaqsanii yaaluu fayyadu mirkaneesse.

en: 8,500 prisoners are granted amnesty in Myanmar by President Win Myint.
om: Mayaanmar keessatti sirreeffattamnonni seeraa 8500 pireezidanti Wiyin Miintiin dhiifamni godhafameefi.

en: Over the last two years, Ethiopia’s green economy strategy has been fully mainstreamed into the recently launched yet 10 year perspective development plan, which runs from 2021 to 2030, Prime Minister Abiy noted.
om: Waggoota lamaan darban, tarsiimoon diinagdeen magariisaa Itoopiyaa karoora guddinaa waggaa 10 itti fufaa bara 2021 haga 2030 tti turu dhiyeenyatti jalqabsiifametti guutummaatti dabalamuu Muummeen Ministeeraa Abiyyi dubbatan.

en: The European Union has reached agreement to share at least 40,000 migrants over two years. ,
om: Gamtaan Awurooppaa waggoota lama keessatti yoo xiqqaate godaantota 40,000 waliif qooduuf walii galte irra gahe.

en: Brothers Mesfin and Endalk compete for their father’s throne in Gondar.
om: Obbolawan Mesfiinii fi Endaalk teessoo mootummaa abbaa isaanii Gondar keessaaf waldorgomu.

en: Pope Francis accepts the resignation of Robert Finn as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Kansas City–Saint Joseph for failing to report a suspected child abuser.
om: Poop Firaansis kanneen ijoollee irratti miidhaa geggeessan gabaasuu dhabuu isaatiif hojii gadhiisuu Roobert Fiin kan phaaphaasii Kaatolikii Roomaa Kutaa Magaalaa Kansas-Qulqulluu Yoosef fudhatan.

en: Tourists who attended the festivity expressed their happiness with the peaceful the celebration despite that fact that the country is in state of emergency.
om: Tuuristoonni ayyaanicha irratti hirmaatan utuuma biyyattiin labsii yeroo atattamaa keessa jirtuu ayyaanichi nagaan kabajamuu isaa gammaduu isaanii ibsan.

en: Letesenbet Gidey of Ethiopia smashed the world half marathon record with 1:02:52 at Valencia half-marathon, an average of 2:59 min/km!
om: lammiin Itiyoophiyaa Eletesenbet Gidaay Rikoordii walakkaa maaraatoonii galma 1:02:52'n cabsuun dorgommii walakkaa maraatoonii Vaalenshiyaa ,giddu galeessaan 2:59 daq/km!

en: Laboratory test conducted on blood specimen sent to Dakar, Senegal, has revealed the existence of yellow fever causing virus in the specimen, the institute stated in a press release it sent to ENA.
om: Qorannoon labooratoorii sumuda dhiigaa Senegaal Dakar'tti ergame irratti ta'e argama vaayirasii busaa keelloo fidu agarsiisa, inistitiyuutichi ibsa gaazexaa ENA'f erge irratti ibseera.

en: Getnet Asefa, the manager of Icog Labs – the engineering firm behind her Amharic programming, explained that Sophia was fixable and they would find alternative parts for her.
om: Geetineet Aseffa, hoogganaan Icog Laabs - dhaabbata injiinaringii pirograamiingii Amaariffa ishee duuba jiru, Soofiyaan kan suphamu dandeessu akka turtee fi isaan qaamota kan biroo isheef barbaadaa akka jiran ibse.

en: She also announced up to 51 percent tariff cut on international short text-messaging.
om: Akkasumas hir'isa gatii erga gabaabaa irratti hanga dhibbentaa 51 gahu ta'uu isaa ifoomsiteetti.

en: So much for ‘when in Rome, do as the Romans do.’
om: "Room keessa yeroo jirtutti, akka warri Rooman hojjetanitti hojjechu" kan jedhuuf daangaa darbaadha.

en: Israeli Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu says that Israel is "fully entitled to work against" attempts by the Gaza-bound "provocation flotilla" to smuggle arms into the Hamas-controlled Gaza Strip.
om: Muummichi Ministeeraa Isiraa'el Biniyaamin Naatinaahuu, Isiraa'el yaalii "bidiruu qocolloo" Gaazaa deemu kan meeshaa waraanaa gara Haamaas isa Istiriippii Gaazaa to'atee jiruutti dhoksaan geessuu "guutummaatti irratti hojjechuuf mirga qabdi" jedhe.

en: Pacific Gas and Electric Company files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy for its recent roles in the California wildfires.
om: Kampaaniin Gaasii fi Elektirikii Paasifik sababa gahee isaa abidda caakkaa Kaaliforniyaa keessaan liqa kanfaluu akka hin dandeenye Chaapter 11'f iyyate.

en: The World Health Organization declares an end to its global health crisis over the spread of the Zika virus as it has been shown to be a dangerous mosquito-borne disease like malaria or yellow fever.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa tatamsa'uu vaayirasii Zikkaa, hamaa akka dhibee busaa yookaan busaa keelloo kan bookeen dhufu tahuu isaa mirkanaa'uun walqabatee miidhaan fayyaa addunyaa akka xumuramuu qabu labse.

en: A gas explosion in an apartment block kills five people and injures a dozen in the Argentine city of Rosario.
om: Arjentiina magaalaa Roozariyoo keessaattii dhohiinsa boba'aa nannoo mana jireenyaatti mudateen lubbuun namoota shanii yoo darbu namoonnii hedduun ammoo miidhamaniiru

en: But each Monday is unlike the one before it.
om: Garuu tokkon tokkoon Wiixataa akka isa duraanii miti.

en: Secretary Yamamoto made the remark following the discussion with Ethiopia’s Foreign Minister Workneh Gebeyehu in Addis Ababa on Friday.
om: Barreessaa Yamamootoon dubbii kana maree Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Itoophiyaa Warqina Gabayyoo waliin Jimaata godhan booda taasisan.

en: In his speech made here on Monday while opening the Joint Session of the two Houses, President Girma said the government will move forward by formulating good governance and public initiation for development to execute the various development programs.
om: Dubbii isaanii Wiixata sirna baniinsa walga'ii waliinii manneen lamaanii godhan irratti, Pireezidantii Girmaan mootummaan bulchiinsa gaarii fi kaka'umsa uummataa uumuu guddinaaf sangantaalee guddinaa garagaraa raawwachuuf ciminaan ni hojjeta jedhaniiru
