en: Schools all over the country have closed their doors in response to COVID-19 pandemic, leaving parents and caregivers scrambling to find daily activities for their children.
om: Manneen barnoota guutummaa biyyattii keessa jiran weerara COVID-19'n walqabatee cufamuun, maatiiwwanii fi kanneen kunuunsa kennan ijoollee isaaniif hojii guyyuu barbaacha akka jooran isaan godhe.

en: A diesel fuel leak in Shaanxi, China reaches the Yellow River, a water source for millions of people.
om: Dhangala'uun boba'aa naafxaa Shaanshii, Chaayinaa keessaa Laga Yellow, madda bishaanii namoota miliyinootaa bira qaqqabe.

en: Following the first confirmed case of COVID-19 in Ethiopia in March 2020, the Government of Ethiopia took several public health measures and protocols to prevent increased levels of infection.
om: Nama Itoopiyaa keessatti dhukkuba COVID-19'n qabamuun isaa mirkanaa'e isa jalqabaa Bitootessa 2020 keessaa hordofuun, hamma infeekshinii dabalaa deemu hambisuuf Mootummaan Itoopiyaa tarkaanfii fi pirotokolii fayyaa hawaasaa muraasa fudhate.

en: The Secretary General of the Ethiopian Football Federation (EFF), Bahiru Tilahun, and the owner of Sisay Aderisse Promotion, Sisay Aderisse, held a joint press conference on Tuesday, December 7, 2021 at Sheraton Hotel, where it was stated that fans will be able to attend the event.
om: barreessaan olaanaan Federeeshinii kubbaa miila Itiyoophiyaa (EFF) ,Baahiruu Tilaahun, fi abbaan qabeenyaa mana maxxansaa Siisaay Adeerisse,siisaay Aderissee, ibsa gaazexesummaa waliinii kibxata, Mudde 7, 2021 hoteela Shaaratan bakka itti deeggartootni isaa hirmaachuu danda;u jedhametti taasise

en: Scientists identify a new species of elephant shrew, named Macroscelides micus.
om: Saayintistoonni sanyii Arba shiruu haarawaa ta'e Makiroosilidas maayikas jedhamu argataniiru.

en: Ministry of Mines and Petroleum disclosed that it has earned 513 million USD from export of mines during the last ten months.
om: Ministeerri Albuudaa fi Peetirooliyeemii ji'oota kurnan darban keessatti dolaara Ameerikaa miliyoona 513 albuuda biyya alaatti erguuu irraa akka argate ifoomse.

en: The economic reform is designed to eliminate macroeconomic imbalances and lay the foundation for sustainable and inclusive growth.
om: Haaromsi diinagdee kun wal simannaa dhabuu maakiroo ikoonoomii balleessuu fi guddina walitti fufaa fi hammataadhaaf dhagaa bu'uuraa ni kaa'uuf wixineeffame.

en: Once the seed is sown, it gives output two to three times per year for 20 generations, if it gets water continuously, said Minister of Science and Technology that supports the research.
om: Erga ijichi faca'ee booda, yoo walitti fufiinsaan bishaan argateef, dhaloota digdamaaf waggaatti yeroo lamaa fi sadiif ija kenna, jedhe qorannicha kan deggeru Ministeerri saayinsii fi Teekinoolojii.

en: The 2021 Green Legacy edition was officially closed in Adama today in the presence the Prime Minister and other senior government officials.
om: Ashaaraa Magaariisni marsaa kanaa kan 2021 har'a Adaamaatti bakka Ministeerri Muummee fi aanga'onni gameeyyii mootummaa biroon argamanitti cufame.

en: He continued to refine his instrumental shellela style, recording an entire album in 1970, Negus of Ethiopian Sax, which was later released as part of the Ethiopiques CD collection.
om: Bara 1970 keessa albama guutuu waraabuudhaan gosa sagalee muuziqaa shillelaa fooyyessuu itti fufe, Mootii Saaksii Itoopiyaa, kan booda qaama walitti qabama Itoopikas CD tahuun gadhiifame.

en: Ethiopia experienced its first peaceful transition of power in its modern history, followed by South Africa and Zimbabwe”, Ambassador Saida added.
om: Itoopiyaan seenaa ishee ammayyaa keessatti walharkaa fuudhamiinsa aangoo karaa nagaa isa jalqabaa keessumeessite, Afrikaa Kibbaa fi Zimbaabuween hordofamuun" , Ambasaadar Saidaan itti dabaluun.

en: Elvis Luciano of the Toronto Blue Jays becomes the first person born in the 2000s to play in a Major League Baseball game.
om: Toronto Biluu Jeeyinsii keessaa kan ba'e Elviis Luusiyaanoon dhalataa bara 2000'ootaa kessaa kan taphoota liigii olaanoo kubbaa kachoo keessa taphate isa duraa ta'uu danda'eera.

en: Nonetheless, the parties are finding it hard to agree on some points, which would be the legal framework.
om: Haatahu malee, jaarmiyaaleen qabxiilee tokko tokko, kan uwwisa seeraa tahuu danda'u irratti waliigaluuf rakkataa jiru.

en: As of this day, local and central government are prohibited from making announcements in a way that could affect the outcome of the referendum.
om: Har'aa eegalee mootummoonni naannoo fi gidu galeessaa beeksisoota murtee ofiin murteessuu uummataa irratti dhiibbaa qaban akka hin geggeessine dhorkaman.

en: Two Long Island Rail Road trains collide into a car in Westbury, New York, United States, killing all three occupants in the car.
om: Yunaaytid Istaatis ,magaala Niyork, Weestiburii keessatti baaburri Tuu Loong Ayiland Reeyil Rood konkolaataa waliin walitti bu'uun imaltoota sadii lubbuun darbeera.

en: Former National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) astronaut, Charles Bolden, gave a lecture today to space enthusiast students drawn from the Ethiopian Space Science Society (ESSS) and different schools in Addis Ababa.
om: Astiroonotiin Bulchiinsa Eeroonitsii fi Hawaa (NASA) duraanii, Chaarles Boolden, har'a barattoota hawaa jaallatanii kan Waldaa Saayinsii Hawaa Itoopiyaa fi manneen barnootaa adda addaa Itoopiyaa keessaa irraa walitti qabaniif ibsa godhe.

en: A gunman kills one person and injures seven others before himself being shot dead at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center's Western Psychiatric Institute & Clinic in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
om: Yunivarsitii inistitiyuuti giddu gala yaala sammuu lixaa fi kilinika piitisbarg kan kaalifoorniyaa pitisbarg kessatti argamu keessatti hidhataan tokko nama tokko ajjeesuun namoota sagal erga madeesseen booda rasaasaan rukutamuun ajjeefame.

en: The Jamaican Coast Guard intercepts a Honduran vessel fishing near Pedro Cays, killing the captain and wounding two crewmen.
om: Eegdonni Galaanaa Jamaa'ikkaa naannoo Peediroo Keeyisitti dooniin Honduras utuu qurxummii qabuu akka darbee hin deemne danquun, ajajaa doonichaa ajjeesuun hojjetoota doonichaa lama madeesse.

en: Coordinator of the innovation unit in the agency, Biruhtesfa Mulugeta said activities are well underlay to increase access of such touchless technologies in the country as a part of an innovating response to the pandemic.
om: Ejensicha keessatti kutaan qindeessaa kalaqaa, Birutesfaa Mulugeetaa akkaataa furmaata karaa teekinojii weerarichaaf kennuu teekinoolojii tuttuqaa hin qabne akkasii biyyattii keessatti bal'inaan akka argatamu gochuuf hojiileen hojjetamaa jiraachuu dubbate.

en: Written and directed by Moges Tafesse, Quragnaye addresses the question: “How far would you take punishment into your own hands or wait for the system to levy the appropriate punishment?”.
om: Mogos Tasfaayeetin barraa'ee kan qindaa'ee, Quraanyaayeen gaaffii:" hangam adaba harka keetti fudhatta yookin sirnichi murtee sirnaawaa kennuuf eegda?" jedhu heera.

en: Lack of adherence to precautions set to curb spread of the virus among the community and poor performance of preventive and control activities have contributed to an alarming increase of transmission of the pandemic .
om: Tamsa'ina vaayirichaa hawaasa keessaa hir'isuuf of eeggannootti hojiirra oolchuu dhabuunii fi hojiileen ittisaa fi to'annoo gad aanaa tahuun akka malee dabaluu tatamsa'ina weerarichaaf gumaacheera.

en: The new channel, called ‘OBN Horn Of Africa’ as per the decision of the regional state, targets strengthening unity and fraternity among people in the east African region, according to Adisu Arega, head of social cluster with the rank of Deputy Chief Administrator of Oromia.
om: Chaanaaliin haaraa, akka murtee mootummaa naannichaan 'OBN Hoorn of Afirikaa' jedhamuun waamamu ummata naannoo baha Afirikaa gidduutti tokkummaa fi jaalala jabeessuuf kan xiyyeeffateedha, akka sadarkaa itti aanaa Bulchaa Olaanaa Oromiyaatti hogganaa kilaastera hawaasummaa, Addisuu Araggaa jedhanitti.

en: So, my good performances helped me to participate in international competitions across the world.
om: Kanaaf, raawwiin gaariin kiyya dorgommii adunyaaleessa adunyaa guutuu irratti akka hirmaadhuuf na gargaareera.

en: A suicide bomber wearing an explosives belt kills at least 21 people, mostly Shiites, in Balad Ruz, the town north of Baghdad.
om: Magaalaa kaabaa Baagidaditti argamtu Balaad Ruuzitti, bade-balleessaan qabattoo dhohiinsa uuman uuffachun yoo xiqqaate namoota 21 gara caalu Shiyaayitoota ajjeeseera.

en: Jamaican health officials confirm the country's first case of the Zika virus in a 4-year-old child who recently returned from a trip to Texas.
om: Hojjeetonii Fayyaa Jammayikaa mucaa umuriin waggaa 4 kan yeroo dhiyootti imala gara Teeksaas irra deebi'erratti yeroo jalqabaatiif dhibeen Vaaayirasii Ziikaa argamuu kirkaneessaniiru.

en: This can slow economic growth and even increase unemployment but is often seen as necessary to cool down the economy and keep prices in check.
om: Kun guddina diinagdee suutessuu danda'a fi hoji-dhabdummaayyuu guddisuu danda'a garuu yeroo baayyee diinagdee qabaneessuu fi gatii toora irratti eeguuf meeshaa barbaachisaadha.

en: As the leading air cargo service provider in Africa, Ethiopian Airlines, coupled with the competitive geo-strategic advantage Djibouti has, this project, when fully operational, will double the cargo operation of the Airlines and make Djibouti a hub for sea-Air cargo logistics.
om: Akka dursaa dhiyyeessa daandii qilleensaa fee'umsaa Afiriikaatti, Daandiin Qilleensaa Itoophiyaa, faayidaa dorgamaa tarsiimoo-teessumaa Jibuutiin qabdu waliin michoomeera, pirojektiin kun yeroo dhumutti, hojii fee'umsaa daandii qilleensichaa dachaan ni dabala akkasumas giddugala fee'umsaa galaanaa-qilleensaa Jibuutii ni godha.

en: 22 police agents are wounded in Brussels when celebrations for Morocco's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification turn violent.
om: gammachuun tapha calallii waancaa FIFA Morokoo bara 2018'ii gara jeequmsaattii jijjiiramuu isatiin miseensonnii poolisii Braasels 22 mada'aniiru.

en: Head of KOICA in Ethiopia, Doyong A, also said that LG and KOICA (Korea International Cooperation Agency) cooperatively realized the establishment of the college and will strengthen supporting the college to make it center of excellence in information technology and electronics field of studies.
om: Hogganaan KOICA Itoopiyaa keessaa, Doyong A, LG fi KOICA'n (Ejensiin Walta'umsa Addunyaalessaa Kooriyaa) waltahuun hundeeffama kolleejjichaa milkeessaniiru akkasumas muummee barnoota tekinoolojii odeeffannoo fi elektirooniksiin giddugala guddinaa akka tahuuf kollejjicha deggeruu nii jabeessu.

en: Similar to Marathon Competition Rankings, Road Running competitions are ranked in 3 different categories, namely: combined ranking of the Men's and Women's races, Men's Road running ranking and Women's Road Running ranking.
om: Akkuma Sadarkeessuu Dorgommii Maaraatoonii, Dorgommii figicha Daandiirraa gartuu garagaraa 3tti sadarkeeffamaniiru, isaanis maqaadhaan: sadarkeessu dorgommii dhiiraa fi dhalaa makaa, sadarkeessuu figicha daandiirraa dhiiraa fi sadarkeessu figicha daandiirra dhalaati.

en: The American Federal Bureau of Investigation is investigating claims that the Hillary Clinton campaign has been hacked as part of recent cyber-attacks on the Democrats. ,
om: Waajjirri qorannoo federaalaa Ameerikaa duulli filannoo Hilaarii Kilinten yakka Sayiberii dhiheenya kana Dimokiraatota irratti godhame waliin walqabachuu isaa qorachaa jira.

en: Greek labor unions begin a general strike to protest ongoing government austerity measures shuting down public medical, educational, and transportational services.
om: Waldaan hojjetoota Giriik tarkaanfii qusannaa mootummaa deemaa jiru mormuuf tarkaanfii hojii dhaabuu waliigalaa tajaajiloota fayyaa hawaasaa, barnootaa fi geejjibaa cufuun eegale.

en: In Ethiopia, PMI has procured about 20 million insecticide treated bed nets, 9 million rapid diagnostic tests, and more than 15 million treatments to prevent malaria.
om: Itoopiyaa keessatti, PMI uwwisaawwan siree farra ilbiisaan cuuphame miliyoona 20, meeshaa qorannoo battalaa miliyoona 9, akkasumas dhibee busaa ittisuuf yaaliiwwan miliyoona 15 ol bite.

en: The Commercial Bank of Ethiopia (CBE) announced that it is ready to serve the 1 million Ethiopian Diaspora expected to come to their home country for twenty-four hours seven days a week and provide several financial services.
om: Baankiin Daldala Itoophiyaa (BDI) Diyaaspooraa lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa miliyoona 1 gara biyyaa isaanitti ni dhufu jedhamanii eegamaniif torbeetti guyyaa torban sa'atii digdamii-afuriif tajaajiluu fi tajaajila maallaqaa garagaraa kennuuf qophaa'uu isaa beeksise.

en: Windows 8 along with Internet Explorer versions 8, 9 and 10 are now officially unsupported by Microsoft.
om: Wiindoows 8 Ekisploreri Interneetii gulantaa omishaa 8,9, fi 10 dabalatee kan booda maayikiroosoftiidhaan hin deggaraman.

en: A North Korean defector claims children are being born with deformities near North Korea's nuclear testing site.
om: Biyya Kooriyaa Kaabaa ganee kan bahe tokko bakka qorannoo niyukilaaraa Kooriyaa Kaabaatti dhiyootti ijoolleen hir'ina qaamaa qaban dhalataa akka jiran dubbate.

en: Abu Qatada, a Palestinian Muslim cleric allegedly affiliated with al-Qaeda, is deported from the United Kingdom to Jordan to face charges of terrorism.
om: Garee Al-qaa'edaa waliin walitti dhufeenya qabachuudhaan kan himataman dursaan amantii Musliimaa Paalatayinii Abu-Qataadaan yakka shororkeessummaatiin adabamuuf Yunaaytid Kiingidamirra gara jordaanitti Ari'ataman.

en: A research that will serve as a roadmap for afforestation of the Abay Gorge has been jointly conducted by Ethiopian Environment and Forest Research Institute, Selale University, Debre Markos University and Forest and Climate Change Commission.
om: Qorannoon akka karoora deebisanii bosonaan uwwisuu Abbay Gorgeetti fayyadu Inistitiyuutiin Qorannoo Eegumsa Naannoo fi Bosonaa Itoopiyaa, Yuunivarsitii Salaalee, Yuunivarsitii Dabre Maarqosii fi Komiishinii Bosonaa fi Jijjiirama Qilleensaan waltahuun geggeeffame

en: Researchers identify a new, though threatened, language known as Koro.
om: Qorattoonni afaan haaraa Kooroo jedhamu, kan baduu gahe yoo ta'ellee adda baasan.

en: Communitary forces take several towns in Mexican state of Michoacán trying to expel the Knights Templar Cartel forces, and prompting the intervention of Mexican Army against them.
om: Humnoonni hawaasaa naannoo Meeksikoo Michoo'asan keessaa magaalota muraasa qabatanii humnoota Naayit Teempiler Kaartel baasuuf yaalan, akkasumas Humni Waraanaa Meeksikoo faallaa jaraa akka dhaabatan akeekkachiisan.

en: Commenting on the work of Dr. Kesetebirhan on the nominee page, Mrs. Gates described him as a tireless advocate for family who has been instrumental to the training of various family planning service providers in Ethiopia.
om: Hojicha Dr. Kessetebirhaan irratti yaada kennuun fuula kaadhimumma sana irratti, Aadde Gaates maatii warra leenjii dhiyeessii tajaajila karoora maatii adda addaaf Itoopiyaa keessatti sababa tahiif dadhabbii malee falma jechuun isa ibsite.

en: The newly elected British House of Commons commences its session with the State Opening of Parliament ceremony in which the Queen's Speech is delivered.
om: Miseensonni mana maree Biriteen Haaraa muudaman sirna baniinsa yaa'ii mana mareechaa irrattii haasawaa Mootiittiin taasistuun eegalama.

en: Russia's track and field athletes will not be allowed to compete in the Rio Olympic Games, even if they did not fail drug tests, after an appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport is rejected.
om: Atileetonni Raashiyaa dorgamtonni Tiraakiirraa fi bakkee marti yoo qorannoo dawaa kufuu baataniyyu erga oliyyannoon mana Murtii Waldhabdee Ispoortii himannaa isaanii jala kuuffiseen booda dorgommii Olompikii Riyoo kamirrattiyuu hirmaachuu hin danda'an jedhame.

en: The NFL's Oakland Raiders officially relocate to Las Vegas, and are now known as the Las Vegas Raiders.
om: Ooklaand Raayidersiin NFL ifaan gara Laas Veegas jijjiiramee, amma Laas Veegas Raayideers jedhamuun beekama.

en: Real estate developers are reported to have severely damaged the UNESCO world heritage site of Cyrene, Libya.
om: Warri Riil Isteet babal'isan bakka hambaa addunyaa UNESCO Saayiriin, Liibiyaa irraan miidhaa guddaa akka gahan gabaasame.

en: Protesters gather in Bangkok to shut down the city centre in an effort to bring down the government of Prime Minister of Thailand Yingluck Shinawatra.
om: Mormitootni mootummaa ministeera muummichaa Taayilaand Yiingikuuk Shinaawaatiraa buusuuf jecha walakkaa magaalatti cufuuf Baankookitti walitti qabaman.

en: Microsoft announces a $1.5 billion investment in Italy, as part of its expansion of cloud computing services around the world.
om: Maakiroosooft sababa babal'ina tajaajila kilaawod Kompiwuutingii adddunyaa irraaf Xaaliyaanii keessatti inveestimentii biliyoona $1.5 akka godhu beeksise.

en: The World Health Organization launches a plan to prevent the global spread of an artemisinin-resistant malaria.
om: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa addunyaa gosti dhibee Busaa Artisiminiinii dandamachuu danda'u akka addunyaarra hin tamsaane ittisuuf karoora baase.

en: Colombey authorities report the tomb of French national hero Charles de Gaulle has been vandalized.
om: Qaamoleen seeraa Kolombiyaa awwalchi goota biyyaalessaa Faransaay kan ta'e Chaarles De Guweella diigamuu isaa gabaasan.

en: Turkish Airlines begins a service to Somalia, the first regular service to the capital Mogadishu except regional East African flights to operate in twenty years.
om: Daandiin Qilleensaa Turkii gara Somaaliyaatti waggoota digdama keessatti balaliiwwan naannoo Baha Afrikaatti utuu hin taane gara magaalaa guddoo Moqaadishuutti tajaajila idiliee isa jalqabaa eegale.

en: Leul Shoaferaw, local filmmaker and founder of Eerie Productions Inc., states the week is a tremendous platform to introduce the best of African films to the Ethiopian audience and filmmakers.
om: Lihuun Shifarraa, fiilmi qopheessaan naannoo fi hundeessaan Eeree Pirodaakshin Ink., torbanichi fiilmiiwwan gaggaarii Afirikaa hordoftootaa fi qopheessitoota fiilmii Itoopiyaaf waltajjii baayyee gaarii akka tahe hime.

en: Mulatu Astatke is an Ethiopian musician and arranger considered as the father of Ethio-Jazz.
om: Mulaatuu Astaatikee weellisaa fi qindeessaa lammii Itoopiyaa abbaa Itiyoo-Jaaz jedhamuun beekamuudha.

en: The third in a series of competitions, Solve IT 2020 will be promoted across 15 cities in Ethiopia and seeks to support youth across the country to develop innovative projects, promote entrepreneurship, and solve local problems through technology.
om: Dorgommiilee walitti fufaa keessaa inni sadaffaan, Soolv IT 2020 magaalota Itoopiyaa keessaa 15 keessatti dargaggoonni biyyattii guutummaa keessa jiran pirojektii kalaqaa akka babal'isan, hojii uumuu beeksisuu, fi rakkoolee naannoo karaa teekinoolojiin furuuf gargaaruuf ni beeksifama.

en: Nest Labs announces plans to recall 440,000 smoke alarms to fix a problem that could cause the alarms to not go off immediately after detecting smoke.
om: Laabiin Nest dogoggora isaa kan dammaqsituun erga haara adda baasee booda battala deebi'ee cufamuu dhabuu sirreessuuf dammaqsituu haaraa 440,000 gara warshaatti deebisuuf karoora qabu beeksise.

en: President Sahle-Work appreciated the commitment of the company to incorporate Ethiopian content and content creators on the platform and highlighted the importance of using such platforms for education as well as entertainment.
om: Pirasdaantiin SaahileWorqi Zawudee qabiyyeewwanii fi qabiyyee uumtota Itoopiyaa miidiyaa isaaniitti makuuf kutannoo kampanichaa jajuun barbaachisummaa bashannanaan alatti miidiyicha barnootaaf itti fayyadamuu barbaachisa akka tahe ibsan.

en: The Walt Disney Company announces that its animation chief, John Lasseter, will leave the company after December 31, after he was accused of misconduct late last year.
om: dhaabatni waalt diznii dura bu'aan suura-sochootu(animeeshinii) Joon Lasatar akka Mudde 31 booda dhaabaticha gad lakkisu beeksiseera, kunis rakkoo naamusaatin bara darbe erga himatameen booda

en: Billy Kenoi, the mayor of Hawaii's Big Island, declares a state of emergency to deal with the growing outbreak of dengue fever, which is spread by infected mosquitoes.
om: Biilii kenooy, kantiibaan odola guddaa Hawaayi, weerara qufaa deengee bookee busaa dhibamaniin babal'atee ittisuuf labsii yeroo hatattamaa dabarse.

en: In tennis, Russia and Italy advance to the final of the 2013 Fed Cup World Group defeating Slovakia and Czech Republic respectively.
om: Teenisii keessatti, Raashiyaa fi Xaaliyaniin irraa jalaan Silooveeniyaa fi Rippaabilika Cheeck injifachuun gara xumura Garee Geeba Feed Addunyaatti darban.

en: A prolonged drought in the Amazon region forces Brazil to declare a state of emergency in 25 towns.
om: Hongeen naannoo Amaazoon keessatti dheerate, Biraazil akka magaalota 25 keessatti labsii yeroo atattamaa labsitu dirqamsiise.

en: In basketball, the Golden State Warriors defeat the Cleveland Cavaliers in four games to win the National Basketball Association Championship.
om: Kubbaa kachoon, Goolden Isteet Waariyers taphoota afur keessatti Kelevelaand Kavaliyeers'n injifachuun Waldaa Shaampiyoonaa Kubbaa Kachoo Biyyaalessaa mo'atan.

en: Writer Ruth Prawer Jhabvala, the only person to have won both an Academy Award and a Booker Prize, dies at the age of 85.
om: Barreessituun Ruut Piraawer Jaabvaalaan, namni isheen qofti lamaanuu Badhaasa Akkaadaamii fi Badhaasa Buuker injifatte, umrii waggaa 85'tti duute.

en: The President of the Philippines Benigno Aquino declares a state of national calamity in the country following Typhoon Bopha, which has claimed over 450 lives.
om: Pirasdaantiin Filiphiinsi Beeninyoo Akuyiinoo Taayphoon Bopha kan lubbuu namoota 450 galaafate hordofuun labsii yeroo miidhamaa biyyaalessaa biyyattii keessatti labsan.

en: Ethnic violence, typically sparked by land disputes, has displaced nearly three million people across Ethiopia.
om: Hookkarri gareewwan saba Amaaraa fi Gumuz gidduu ji'a darbe naannoo Amaaraa fi naannoo ollaa, Benishaangul Gumuz keessatti namoonni darzanootaan lakka'aman akka du'an godheera.

en: An Africa Cup of Nations qualification match between Senegal and Ivory Coast is abandoned due to rioting at the Stade Leopold Senghor in Dakar.
om: Taphni gulaallii Geeba Biyyoota Afirikaa Senegaalii fi Aayivorii Koost gidduutti geggeffamu sababa jeequmsa Isteed Liyooppoold Sengor kan Daakar keessaatti hambifame.

en: Ethiopia has encountered some 2,800 cyber-attack attempts during the last Ethiopian fiscal year (2020/21), according to the Director-General of Information Network Security Agency (INSA), Dr. Shumete Gizaw.
om: Akka Daayirekteera Olaanaa Ejensii Nageenya Odeeffannoo (INSA), Dr. Shuumatee Gizawutti, bara Baajataa Itoopiyaa darbe (2020/21), Itoopiyaan yaalii haleellaa saayiberii 2,800 tahantu ishee mudatee ture.

en: Ethiopian Prime Minister Hailemariam Desalegn has blamed "anti-peace forces" for the violence.
om: Eegaan Mirga Namoomaa Niwu Yoork keessatti maadheffate Oromiyaa keessatti namoonni 400 caalan walitti bu'iinsa qaamolee nageenyaa wajjin godhameen du'aniiru jedhe, mootummaan lakkofsa kana mormus.

en: We do this in four ways: by creating new learning opportunities so that young people can enjoy access to better education; by using our technical expertise to develop and provide access to new healthcare solutions; by supporting youth employment through vocational training and skills development; and by reducing our impact on the environment.”
om: Kanas daandiiwwan afuriin goona, dargaggootni barnoota fooyya'aa argachuu akka danda'an carraa barumsaa haaraa uumuun, ogummaalee teekinikaa fayyadamuun furmaatilee kunuunsa fayyaa haaraa uumuu fi dhiyeessuuf, leenjii ogummaa fi misooma dandeettiitiin hojii dargaggootaa deeggaruun, fi faalama naannoo irratti gumaacha qabnu hir'isuun" jedhaniiru.

en: The number of Zika virus infected in Singapore rises above 40.
om: Siingaappoor keessatti namoonnii dhibee Vaayirasii Ziikaan faalaman 40 darbeera.

en: The Daily Mail reports that the world record for the number of water skiers pulled by a single boat (145) has been broken.
om: Rikardiin addunyaa bidiruu tokkoon harkifamuun baayyinni namoota bishaan irra kaatanii (145) cabuu Deeyilii Meeyil gabaase.

en: Fikru has shown his work worldwide in over 50 exhibitions and across three continents.
om: Fiqiruun hojiiwwaan isaa sadarkaaa addunyaatti agarsiisota 50 ol fi ardiilee sadii irratti dhiyeesseera.

en: On the occasion, President Dr. Mulatu Teshome congratulated the newly appointed Ethiopian Ambassadors on their appointment and wished a successful tenure.
om: Sochiin Haqa Hawaasaa Lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa diigamuu Arbanyooch Caamsaa 7, Jaarmiyaan Dimokiraatawaa Itoopiyaa (EDP), Jaarmiyaan Dimokiraatawaa Lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa Hundaa (AEDP), Jaarmiyaan Semaayaawwii, Jaarmiyaan Dhaloota Haaraa (NGP), Sochii Naannoo Gaambeelaa (GRM), fi Jaarmiyaan Tokkummaan Dimokiraasii fi Haqaafii (UDJ) irraa akka dhufe hubatame.

en: Inaugurating the delayed Genale Dawa (GD-III) hydroelectric power project on Tuesday Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed (PhD) made an appeal to local investors to build the next phase of the hydroelectric project GD-6, in the same river basin that requires an estimated financial outlay of USD one billion.
om: Pirojektii humna ibsaa bishaanii Gennaalee Daawaa (GD-III) isa lafarra harkifate gaafa Kibxataa eebbisiisuun Muummeen Ministeeraa Abiyyi Ahimad (PhD) inveesteroonni naannichaa pirojektii humna ibsaa itti aanu GD-6, kan tilmaamaan baasii faayinaansii USD biliyoona tokko gaafatu, dachaa lagichaa sanaa keessatti akka ijaaran waamicha godhan.

en: The government of Venezuela expels three United States diplomats after accusing them of "economic sabotage".
om: Mootummaan Veenezuweellaa dippilomaatota Yunaayitis Isteetis sadii erga "diinagdee itti yaaduun miidhan" jechuun himatee booda biyyaa baase.

en: The Cuban-born American arsonist who torched 87 people in March 1990 at The Bronx Happy Land fire, Julio González, dies in prison at the age of 61.
om: Dhalataa Kuubaa fi lammii Ameerikaa feedhiin abidda qabsiiistuun bara 1990 ji'a sadaasaa keessa iddoo sirna abidda-qabsiisuu Birooniks Happy Laand irratti namoota 87 abiddaan kan gube ture Juuliyoo Goonzaalez umurii isaa 61tti mana hidhaa keessati boqote.

en: KUTU was formed as a result of a meeting in Addis Ababa between French violinist Théo Ceddaldi and Ethiopian new age singers Hewan Gebrewold and Haleluya Tekletsadik with band members Valentin Ceccaldi on bass, Akemi Fujimori on keyboards and Cyril Atef on drums.
om: KUTU'n bu'aa marii Addis Ababaatti vaayolinistii lammii Faransaayi Tiyoo Sedaldii fi weellistoota yeroo haaraa Itoopiyaa Hewaan Gebirewold fi Haaleluyyaa Tekiletsaadiq gidduutti miseensonni baandii Vaatentin Sekaaldii beezii irratti, Akemii Fuujimori kiiyboordii irratti akkasumas Saayiril Ateef diraamii irratti tahuun godhameen kan hundaa'eedha.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei warns that Iran will retaliate if sanctions that breach the Nuclear Deal are approved.
om: Ayatollaa Kameenii yoo uggurri Waliigaltee Niwukeeraa cabsu mirkanaa'e Iraan akka ijaa baatu akeekkachiisan.

en: Prime Minister of Greece Alexis Tsipras makes a new offer for reforms which could signal a late deal in the country's debt talks.
om: Mummichi ministeeraa Giriik Aleeksiis Siparaas sirreeffama haaraa dubbii Liqii biyyattii keessatti walii galtee boodatti harkifate ta'uunsaa mul'atu dhiyeessan.

en: The BBC World Service is to close five of its language services with the loss of 650 jobs.
om: Taajajilli adunyaawaa BBC hojjettoota 650 kan hir'isu tajaajiloota afaanii kennu keessaa shan cufuuf jedha.

en: The Syrian military shoots down a Turkish F-4 Phantom fighter jet after it had entered Syrian airpsace over the Mediterranean Sea.
om: Waraanni Siiriyaa Galaana Mediteraaniyaan irratti erga inni daangaa qilleensaa Siiriyaa seenee booda xiyyaara waraanaa Turkii F-4 Faantom rukutee buuse.

en: Yemen's Shiite rebels say they have given control of the port of Hodeida to the coast guard and local administrators.
om: Finciltoonni Shiitee Yemen to'annoo buufata doonii Hodee'idaa eegdota galaanaa fi bulchitoota naannootti akka kennan dubbatan.

en: People in over 180 cities of China attend protests sparked by Japan's nationalization of the Senkaku Islands and the 81st anniversary of the Mukden Incident.
om: Namoonni magaalota Chaayinaa 180 ol keessaa mormii biyyaalessuu Odolawwan Senkaakuu Jaappaan fi ayyaanaa yaadannoo 81ffaa Taatee Mukden'n dhoye irratti hirmaatan.

en: “Since it would be possible to drink from sea water in the near future thanks mainly to the salt being separated from the water by using technology.”
om: "Dhiyootti bishaan galaanaa dhuguun wanta danda'amuuf keessumaa galatni isa ashaboon fayyadama tekinooloojiitiin bishaan irra adda ba'uuf haa ta'u"

en: The accents of the actors do not strictly abide by their character’s locales and the sparsely decorated palace grounds beg for more attention to set dressing.
om: Loqodoonni taatowwanii naannoo taatootif haalaan hin ajajaman akkasumas lafjaleen masaraa xiqqooshee faayame xiyyeeffannoo dabalataatif kadhata.

en: The release of one of the most acclaimed artist Teddy Afro’s album, entitled “Ethiopia,” definitely is one of the stories that “broke the Internet” (went viral) among Ethiopians and the Ethiopian diaspora.
om: Gadhiifamuun albamii artistii baayyee jajamu keessaa tokko kan Teedii Afroo, moggaasi isaa "Itoopiyaa," seenaawwan "interneetii cabse" diyaasporaa lammiiwwan Itooopiyaa fi Ertiraa gidduutti (hedduminaan babal'ate) keessaa sirriitti isa tokkodha.

en: In another event not far way from the bird dieoff, scientists are investigating a fish kill of nearly 100,000 drum in the Arkansas River.
om: Ta'ii kan biraatin, osoo du'a sinbiraa irraa hin fagaatin, du'a qurxummii laga arkansaasitti mudate kan tilmaaman dibbee 100,000tti siqatuu saayintistootni qorachaa jiru.

en: The company built the first underground mining in Ethiopia and undertook a vast exploration work in Sakaro and Metekel license area and discovered commercial primary gold deposits.
om: Dhaabbatichi bakka albuudi baafamu lafa jalaa isa jalqabaa Itoopiyaa keessatti ijaaruun hojii qorannoo bal'aa heyyama Sakaaroo fi naannoo Matakalitti geggeessuun kuufama warqii daldalaa jalqabaa argate.

en: Edwin P. Wilson, a former Central Intelligence Agency operative and arms trafficker, has died on September 10th.
om: Edwiin P. Wiilsan, hojjetaa Ejensii Intaliijensii Giddugalaa duraanii fi daldalaan seeraan alaa meeshaa waraanaa, Fulbaana 10 tti du'e.

en: The report also concludes that the fact that the authority of federal prosecution is vested on the Ministry of Justice which combines judicial and executive powers is a serious problem.
om: Gabaasichi aangoon abbaa alangaa federaalaa Ministirii Hagaaf kenname kan aangoo abbaa seeraa fi qaamota raawwachiiftuu walitti qabatu rakkoo hamaa akka tahe guduunfeera.

en: The agreement was signed by State Minister Hirut Zemene and Don Simeon Oyono, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Equatorial Guinea.
om: Itoopiyaa fi Iqu'itoriyaal Giiniin har'a namoota paasportii dippiloomaasii fi tajaajilaa qabaniif gama lachuun visa'n akka hin barbaachifne godhu mallatteessan.

en: Ethiopia has pledged to provide one billion tree seedlings to the Neighboring countries in its belief that climate change and desertification in the region demands Regional solutions.
om: Itoopiyaan ilaalcha jijjiiramni qilleensaa fi gara gammoojjiitti jijjiiramuun naannichaa furmaata naannoo barbaada jedhu irraa kahuun biqiltuu dhaabbii biliyoona tokko biyyoota ollaaf akka dhiyeessitu waadaa galte.

en: The award which launched on 26 September, 2016 recognizes and highlights the achievements of the next generation of family planning leaders worldwide.
om: Badhaasichi inni 26 Fulbaana, 2016 irratti eegalame addunyaa guutuu irratti milkaa'inaa geggeessitoota karoora maatii dhaloota itti aanuuf beekamtii kenna.

en: The signing ceremony took place during the Ethiopian Minister of Health Dr. Lia Tadesse’s visit to Abu Dhabi last week.
om: Sirni mallattoo yeroo Ministeerri Fayyaa Itoophiyaa DR. Liyaa Taddesee torbee darbe Abu Daabii daawwanitti ta'e.

en: The deputy governor of Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank, says that the country is likely to become a cashless society within the next three to five years.
om: Itti aanaan bulchaa baankii giddu galeessaa Iswiidinii, Riksibaank, waggoota itti aanan sadii haga shaniitti biyyattiin hawaasa maallaqa callaa hin fayyadamne ni taati jedhe.

en: Bureau Natural Resources Development and Safety Net Sector Coordinator Desta Gebreselassie told ENA that tree planting holes are being prepared at various nurseries.
om: Qindeessaan Biiroo Kunuunsa Qabeenya Uumamaa fi Sektara Sefti neetii Dastaa Gabrasillaaseen akka bolli biqilaa dhaabuu iddoowwan biqilaa hedduutti akka qophaa'a jiran ENA'tti himaniiru.

en: “We are introducing the technology to local tanneries and we highly encourage them to apply it but we cannot force them to use it,” she told The Reporter.
om: "Tekinooloojicha warshaalee gogaa naannoo barsiisaa jirra akkasumas ni jabeessinee akka hojiirra oolchaniif ni jajjabeessinaa garuu akka fayyadamaniif hin dirqisiisnu",jechuun Riporteeritti himteetti.

en: Pope Francis urges ethnic Hungarians and Romanians to mend their differences toward a peaceful existence in one country.
om: Hangafni phaaphaasii Firaansis saboota hangaarotaa fi roomanotaa garaagarummaa isaaniii biyyaa tokko keessa jiraachuf gara geesisutti akka fidan akeekkachiisan

en: Ambassadors of Iran, Saudi Arabia, Luxembourg, Norway, Finland, North Korea, Bangladesh, Russia, Australia, Venezuela, Czech Republic, among others, and a number of diplomats of several countries were in attendance of the event.
om: Kanneen biroo keessaa Ambaasaaddarri Iraan, Saawud Arabiyaa, Luuksenberg, Noorweey, Fiinlaand, Kooriyaa Kaabaa, Baangilaadish, Raashiyaa, Awustiraaliyaa, Veneezuweellaa, Chek Rippaabilik, akkasumas dippolomaatonni baayyeen qophicha hirmaatan.

en: Visiting Addis Ababa this week, Sara Terry, senior policy advisor to the Office of Air Quality Planning and Standards under the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), has brought her team to initiate the work of air quality management system in the capital.
om: Torban kana Addis Ababaa daawwachuun, Saaraa Teerii, gorsaa olaanaan imaammataa Ejesnii Eegumsa Nannoo (EPA) US jalatti waajjira Istaandardii fi Qulqullina Qilleensaa Karoorsuu, hojii sirna bulchiinsa qulqullina qilleensaa magaala gudditti keessatti jalqabuuf garee ishee fidde.

en: The President of Russia Vladimir Putin meets with the President of Ukraine Petro Poroshenko in Minsk, Belarus, as disputes in eastern Ukraine continue.
om: Akkuma waldhabdeen baha Yukireen keessatti itti fufeen, Pirasdaantiin Raashiyaa Viladmir Puutin Pirasdaantii Yukiriyeen Peetroo Porosheenkoo wajjin Miniskii, Bilaarus keessatti wal arge

en: Beijing Wanti was registered by the Food, Medicine, Healthcare Administration and Control Authority on July 5, 2016 representing by a local company called GeZ Chemicals and Pharmaceutical PLC.
om: Beejing Wanti'n Abbaa Taayitaa Bulchiinsaa fi To'annoo Nyaataa, Qorichaa, Eegumsa Fayyaan gaafa Adoolessa 5, 2016 kampaanii naannoo PLC Keemikaalotaa fi Pharmasitikaalii GeZ jedhamuun bakka buufamee galmaa'e.

en: GlaxoSmithKline settles the largest healthcare fraud case in US history for $3 billion dollars.
om: GalaksoIsmiizKaayin yakka waliin dhahuu eegumsa fayyaa keessaa seenaa US keessatti doolaara biliyoona $3'n fure.

en: Serbia closes its southern border with Macedonia to migrants from countries not affected by war as part of measures to prevent illegal immigration.
om: Serbiyaan tarkaanfii baqannaa seeraan alaa to'achuuf daangaa ishee gara kibbaa Maqedooniyaa wajjin qabdu baqattoota biyyoota waraanaan hin miidhamne irraa dhufanitti cufte.

en: South African President Jacob Zuma urges party unity and warns economic recovery will be slow at a gathering celebrating the 98th anniversary of the African National Congress.
om: Pirasdaantiin Afrikaa Kibba Jaakob Zuumaa ayyaana waggaa 98ffaa jaarmiyaa Kongireessii Biyyaalessaa Afrikaa kabajuuf bakka namootni walitti qabamanitti tokkummaa jaarmiyaa akka jiraatu gorsuun deebi'ee fooyya'un diinagdee suuta jechuu akka malu akeekkachiisan.

en: Police on Easter Island evict indigenous protesters battling for ancestral lands and a larger share of tourist revenues from the grounds of a luxury hotel.
om: Poolisoonnii Odola Iister irraa mormitoota jiraattota durii kanneen lafti abboota isaanii fi galiin tuuristii lafa hoteelota qaala'oo irraa dhufu qoodni guddaan akka isaaniif kennamuuf falman dhiibanii baasan.

en: Mali confirms that it has a new case of Ebola virus, this time in the capital Bamako.
om: Maaliin yeroo kana magaalaa guddoo Bamaakoo keessatti namni haaraan dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaan qabame jiraachuu mirkaneesse.

en: Bereket, who is also secretary of the National Council for the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam Project, said soil and water conservation and natural resource protection should be undertaken in Amhara, Oromia and Benishangul Gumuz states towards the same goal.
om: Barakat, barreessaa Mana Maree Biyyoolessaa Hidha Haara'umsaa Guddicha Itoopiyaas kan tahe, kunuunsi biyyee fi bishaanii fi eegumsi leecalloolee uumamaa naannolee Amaaraa, Oromiyaa fi Benishaangul keessatti kaayyoo tokkichaa hojiirra ooluu qaba jedhe.

en: Some 200,000 residents of Addis Ababa living in extreme poverty are going to be provided with support in the second phase of the food security program which will start tomorrow.
om: Jiraattota Addis Ababaa 200,000 ta'an kanneen hiyyummaa garmalee keessa jiraachaa jiraniif marsaa lammaffaa sagantaa nageenya nyaataa kan boor eegalu keessatti deggersi godhamuufi.

en: Abiy noted that the Prophet taught that the world need four pillars to survive – teaching of the wise, justice of the elderly, prayer of the good and courage.
om: Abiyyi barsiisa Raajichi isa addunyaan ooluuf utubaa afur - barsiisa beekaa, murtii/haqa jaarsaa, kadhata isa gaarii fi jabina ittiin rakkoo darban akka barbaaddu yaadachiise.

en: The Bank of Korea increases the main interest rate in South Korea by a quarter percentage point to 3% due to concerns over inflation.

en: Robert Zoellick, the President of the World Bank, claims that the world economy has entered the "danger zone", with the United States, European Union and Japan having to make tough decisions.
om: Roobert Zoolikk, Pirasdaantii Baankii Addunyaa, Yunaayitid Isteetis, Gamtaan Awurooppaa fi Jaappaan murtiilee jajjaboo dabarsuu isaaniitiin diinagdeen addunyaa "zoonii balaa" akka seene dubbate.

en: On the other hand, dry conditions are expected in northern Sudan, eastern and northern Kenya, western and southern Tanzania.
om: Gama biraan, qilleensi gogaan kaaba Sudaan, bahaa fi kaabaa Keeniyaa, dhihaa fi kibbaa Taanzaaniyaatti ni eegamu.

en: Rescue work is carried out to attempt to locate survivors in remote areas of south-eastern Brazil.
om: Hojiin baraaruu bakka fagoo kibba baha Biraazil keessatti bakka namoota lubbuun hafanii adda baasuuf geggeeffame.

en: Three international oil trading firms bidding to supply fuel to the Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) in the 2019 fiscal year.
om: Dhaabbileen daldalaa adunyaa sadii Interpiraayizii Dhiyeessi Peetirooliyeemii Itoophiyaatif bara bajataa 2019tti boba'aa dhiyeessuuf caalbaasii irra jiru.

en: Mekelle November 29/2018 A cycling tournament that starts from Mekelle and extends to Asmara and Mitswa in Eritrea will begin tomorrow, according to Tigray Region Youth and Sports Affairs Bureau.
om: Maqalee Sadaasa 29/2018: Akka Biiroo Dhimmoota Dargaggoo fi Ispoortii Naannoo Tigraayitti, dorgommiin biskileettii Maqalee irraa jalqabee gara Asmaraa fi Mitsawaa Eritraa keessatti dheeratu boor eegala.

en: The World Health Organization states that the spread of polio is an international public health emergency.
om: akka Dhaabbanni Faayyaa Addunyaa jedhuttii babali'innii dhibee Pooliyoo haala ariifachiisaa fayyaa hawaasa addunyaa ta'uu dubbateera.

en: The Ethiopian delegation led by the Health Minister, Dr Amir Aman, is attending the 72nd international health forum commenced today in Geneva.
om: Jilli Itoophiyaa Ministeera Fayyaa Dr Amiir Amaanin durfamu fooramii fayyaa internaashinaalaa 72ffaa har'a Jeenevaatti jalqabe hirmaataa jiru.

en: A man sets himself on fire outside the Oslo courthouse where mass murderer Anders Behring Breivik is on trial for the 2011 Norway attacks.
om: Mana murtii Osloo bakka ajjeesaan namoota baayyee Andeers Beehiriing Bireeviki haleellaawwan Noorweey 2011 itti himatamaa ture fuulduratti namichi tokko ibidda ofitti qabsiise.

en: In American football, the Philadelphia Eagles win the National Football Conference, defeating the Minnesota Vikings 38–7.
om: tapha kubbaa miilaa Ameerikaatiin gareen Filaadolfiyaa Iigils garee Minisootaa Vaayiking 38-7 injifachuun dorgommii kubbaa miilaa Koonfiransii biyyaalessa mo'atan.

en: A study released by the University of California, San Diego shows that vitamin D increases the chances of survival in patients suffering from breast cancer.
om: Qorannoon Yunibarsitii Kaaliforniyaa, Saan Diyaagoon gadhiifame tokko vaayitaamin D'n dhukkubsattoota kaanserii harmaan rakkachaa jiraniif carraa baraaramuu akka dabalu agarsiisa.

en: Eyob, a 9th grader, who has been skating for the past five years, is a daredevil who tries various tricks.
om: Eyyoob, Barataa Kutaa 9ffaa, waggoota shanan darbanii sigagaachu Iskeetii irraa kan ture, maraatuu maloota hedduu yaaluudha.

en: Liberia suspends diplomatic ties with Libya, after United States Secretary of State Hillary Clinton called on countries to sever ties with Libya.
om: Laayibeeriyaan erga Ministeerri Dhimma Alaa Yuunayitid Isteetis biyyoonni hidhata Liibiyaa wajjin qaban akka laaffisan erga gaafattee booda hidhata dippiloomaasii liibiyaa wajjin qabdu adda kutte.

en: Last September EPSE has floated a tender inviting international oil trading companies for the supply of fuel to be delivered as of January 2019.
om: Fulbaana darbe EPSE'n dhaabbilee daldala boba'aa Adunyaatiif dhiyeessi boba'aa Amajjii 2019 dhiyaatuuf caalbaasii dhiyeesse.

en: Some Saudi Arabian women challenge a ban on female drivers, posting accounts and pictures of themselves driving automobiles.
om: Dubartoonni Saa'ud Areebiyaa tokko tokko Midiyaalee Hawaasaa irratti Akkawuntii fi suuraalee osoo Awutomobilii Konkolaachisanii kafaman gadilakkisuun daangeffama akka dubartoonni hin konkolaachisneef kaawwame irratti mormii isaanii agarsiisu.

en: Wildfires in Southern California, USA, lead to hundreds of evacuations.
om: Abiddi caakkaa Kibba Kaaliforniyaa, USA, keessaa baafamuu namootaa dhibbootaan lakka'amu fide.

en: Four bodies are recovered from the ocean after an airplane of the Chilean Air Force crashed near Robinson Crusoe Island on Friday.
om: Xiyyaarri Humna Qilleensaa Chiilii naannoo Odola Roobinsan Kiruusoo tti gaafa Jimaataa erga kufee booda reeffi afur garba keessaa argame.

en: While the king of Gondar decides who will succeed him and make peace within the divided country, the son, Endalk, is rightly suspicious that his younger brother Mesfin is the favorite and likely successor.
om: Yeroo mootiin Gondar nama isa dhaalu murteessee biyya qoqqoodamte keessatti nagaa buusetti, ilmisaa, Indaalk, obboleessi isaa quxisuun Mesfin isa jaallatamee fi isa dhaalu tahuu akka malu sirriitti shakke.
